analyzed: na etat evam kṣaṇika ādi bhāvanāyāḥ mithyā rūpa tvāt  na ca mithyājñānasya niḥśreyasa kāraṇa tvam atiprasaṅgāt yathā ca na kṣaṇika tvam śūnyatvam nairātmyam vā tathā vakṣyāmaḥ atha āsakti pratiṣedha artham evam bhāvanīyam tat na anyathā api bhāvāt tathā hi padārtha tattva jñānam pravṛtteḥ kāraṇam doṣa darśanam ca nivṛtteḥ iti dṛṣṭam yathā madhu viṣa saṃpṛkte nne doṣa adarśanāt guṇa buddhitaḥ pravartate doṣa darśanāt

original: yaccedaṃ rāgādiviyuktajñānaṃ viśiṣṭabhāvanāta iti, tannāsti । kṣaṇikatve kāryakāraṇabhāvapratiṣedhasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt । upetyavādena tūcyate, na rāgādimato vijñānāt tadrahitasyotpattiryukteti । tathā hi<?> yathā hi “bodhād bodharūpatā” jñānāntare, tadvad rāgādirapi syāt tattādātmyāt । viparyaye vā tadabhāvaprasaṅgāditi । na ca vilakṣaṇādapi kāraṇād vilakṣaṇakāryasyotpattidarśanād bodhād bodharūpateti pramāṇamasti । ata evāsya jñānasya jñānāntarahetutvena pūrvakālabhāvitvaṃ samānajātīyatvamekasantānatvaṃ vā na heturvyabhicārāt । tathā hi, pūrvakālabhāvitvaṃ tatsamānakṣaṇaiḥ, samānajātīyatvañca santānāntarajñānairvyabhicārīti । teṣāṃ hi pūrvakālabhāvitvena samānajātīyatve 'pi na vivakṣitajñānahetutvamiti । ekasantānatvañca antyatājñānena vyabhicārīti । atha neṣyata evāntyaṃ jñānaṃ sarvadā ārambhāt । tathā hi, maraṇaśarīrajñānamapi jñānāntaraheturjāgradavasthājñānañca suṣuptyavasthājñānasyāpīti । nanvevaṃ maraṇaśarīrajñānasyāntarābhavaśarīrajñānahetutve garbhaśarīrajñānahetutve vā santānāntare vijñānajanakatvaprasaṅgo niyamahetorabhāvāt । atha iṣyata eva upādhyāyajñānaṃ śiṣyajñānasyānyasya kasmānna bhavatīti ? atha karmavāsanā niyāmiketi cet, na । tasyāpi jñānavyatirekeṇāsambhavāt । tathā hi, tattādātmye sati vijñānaṃ bodharūpatayā viśiṣṭaṃ bodhācca bodharūpatetyaviśeṣeṇa vijñānaṃ vidadhyādityalam ।
analyzed: yat ca idam rāga ādi viyukta jñānam viśiṣṭa bhāvanātaḥ iti tat na asti kṣaṇika tve kārya kāraṇa bhāva pratiṣedhasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt upetya vādena tu ucyate na rāga ādimataḥ vijñānāt tad rahitasya utpattiḥ yuktā iti tathā hi yathā hi bodhāt bodha rūpa tā jñāna antare tadvat rāga ādiḥ api syāt tad tādātmyāt viparyaye vā tad abhāva prasaṅgāt iti na ca vilakṣaṇāt api kāraṇāt vilakṣaṇa kāryasya utpatti darśanāt bodhāt bodha rūpa tā i

original: yaccedaṃ suṣuptyavasthājñānasya jāgradavasthājñāne kāraṇatvamiti, asadetat । suṣuptyavasthāyāṃ jñānasadbhāve jāgradavasthāto na viśeṣaḥ syād ubhayatrāpi svasaṃvedyajñānasya sadbhāvāviśeṣāt । yadvā nidrayānabhibhūtatvaṃ viśeṣa iti cet, asadetat । taddharmatayā tasyāpi tādātmyenābhibhāvakatvāsambhavāt । vyatireke tu rūpādipadārthānāmeva sattvāt tatsvarūpaṃ nirūpyam । abhibhavaśca yadi vināśaḥ, na vijñānasya sattvaṃ vināśasya vā nirhetukatvam । atha tirobhāvaḥ, na vijñānasya sattvena tatsattaiva saṃvedanamityabhyupagame tasyānupapatteḥ । atha suṣuptyavasthāyāṃ vijñānāsattvenāntyajñānasadbhāvādekasantānatvaṃ vyabhicārīti ।
analyzed: yat ca idam suṣupti avasthā jñānasya jāgrat avasthā jñāne kāraṇa tvam iti asat etat suṣupti avasthāyām jñāna sadbhāve jāgrat avasthātaḥ na viśeṣaḥ syāt ubhayatra api sva saṃvedya jñānasya sadbhāva aviśeṣāt yat vā nidrayā anabhibhūta tvam viśeṣaḥ iti ced asat etat tad dharmatayā tasya api tādātmyena abhibhāvaka tva asambhavāt vyatireke tu rūpa ādi padārthānām eva sattvāt tad svarūpam nirūpyam abhibhavaḥ ca yadi vināśaḥ na vijñānasya sattvam

original: yaccedaṃ viśiṣṭabhāvanāvaśād rāgādivināśa iti, asadetat । nirhetukatvād vināśasyābhyāsānupapatteśca । abhyāso hyavasthitasyārthasyātiśayādhāyakatvādupapadyate, na kṣaṇikajñānamātra iti । ata eva yogini sakalakalpanāvikalaṃ vijñānamutpadyate । na ca <I,010> santānāpekṣayātiśayastasyaivāsambhavāt, aviśiṣṭād viśiṣṭotpatterayogācca । tathā hi, pūrvasmādaviśiṣṭād uttarottaraṃ sātiśayaṃ kathamupajāyata iti cintyam ।
analyzed: yat ca idam viśiṣṭa bhāvanā vaśāt rāga ādi vināśaḥ iti asat etat nirhetuka tvāt vināśasya abhyāsa anupapatteḥ ca abhyāsaḥ hi avasthitasya arthasya atiśaya ādhāyaka tvāt upapadyate na kṣaṇika jñāna mātre iti atas eva yogini sakala kalpanā vikalam vijñānam utpadyate na ca santāna apekṣayā atiśayaḥ tasya eva asambhavāt aviśiṣṭāt viśiṣṭa utpatteḥ ayogāt ca  tathā hi pūrvasmāt aviśiṣṭāt uttarottaram sa atiśayam katham upajāyate iti cintyam

original: yacca santānocchittirniḥśreyasamiti, tanna । nirhetukatayā vināśasyopāyavaiyarthyamayatnasādhyatvāt ।
analyzed: yat ca santāna ucchittiḥ niḥśreyasam iti tat na nirhetuka tayā vināśasya upāya vaiyarthyam ayatna sādhya tvāt

original: anye tu anekāntabhāvanāto viśiṣṭapradeśe 'kṣayaśarīrādilābho niḥśreyasamiti manyante । tathā ca nityabhāvanāyāṃ grahānityatve ca dveṣa ityubhayaparihārārthamanekāntabhāvaneti । evaṃ sadasadādiṣvapi yojyam । pratyakṣañca svadeśakālakāraṇādhāratayā sattvaṃ paradeśādiṣvasattvamityubhayarūpatā । tathā ghaṭādirmṛdādirūpatayā nityaḥ sarvāvasthāsūpalambhāt । ghaṭādirūpatayā cānityastadapāyāt । evamātmāpyātmarūpatayā nityaḥ sarvadā sadbhāvāt । sukhaduḥkhādiparyyāyarūpatayā cānityastadvināśāt । evaṃ sarvatra svakāryeṣu kartṛtvaṃ kāryāntareṣu cākartṛtvamityūhyam । atha svaśabdābhidheyatvaṃ śabdāntarānabhidheyatvañceti ।
analyzed: anye tu anekānta bhāvanātaḥ viśiṣṭa pradeśe kṣaya śarīra ādi lābhaḥ niḥśreyasam iti manyante tathā ca nitya bhāvanāyām graha anitya tve ca dveṣaḥ iti ubhaya parihāra artham anekānta bhāvanā iti  evam sat asat ādiṣu api yojyam pratyakṣaḥ ca sva deśa kāla kāraṇa ādhāra tayā sattvam para deśa ādiṣu asattvam iti ubhaya rūpatā tathā ghaṭa ādiḥ mṛd ādi rūpatayā nityaḥ sarva avasthāsu upalambhāt ghaṭa ādi rūpatayā ca anityaḥ tad apāyāt

original: tadetadasāmpratam, mithyājñānasya niḥśreyasakāraṇatvena pratiṣedhāt । anekāntajñānañca mithyaiva, bādhakopapatteḥ । tathā hi, nityānityayorvidhipratiṣedharūpatvād abhinne dharmiṇyabhāvaḥ । evaṃ sadasattvāderapīti । yaccedaṃ ghaṭādirmṛdādirūpatayā nitya iti, asadetat । mṛdrūpatāyāstato 'rthāntaratvāt । tathā hi, ghaṭādarthāntaraṃ mṛdrūpatā । mṛttvaṃ sāmānyaṃ tasya tu nityatvena ghaṭasyātathābhāvastato 'nyatvāt । ghaṭasya tu kāraṇād vilayopalabdheranityatvameva । yaccedaṃ svadeśādiṣu sattvaṃ paradeśādiṣvasattvamiṣyata evetaretarābhāvasyābhyupagamāt । tathā hi, itarasmin deśādāvitarasya ghaṭasyābhāvo nānutpattirna pradhvaṃsastatra tasya sarvadā sattvāt । dvairūpye tu svadeśādiṣvanupalambhaprasaṅgaḥ । evamātmano 'pi nityatvameva । sukhaduḥkhādestadguṇatvena tato 'rthāntarasya vināśe 'pyavināśāt । kāryāntareṣu cākartṛttvaṃ na pratiṣidhyate । tathā hi, yad yasyānvayavyatirekābhyāmutpattau vyāpriyata ityupalabdhaṃ tat tasya kāraṇaṃ nānyasyetyabhyupagamyate । evaṃ śabdāntarānabhidheyatve 'pi na sarvaṃ sarvaśabdābhidheyamityabhyupagamāt ।
analyzed: tat etat asāmpratam mithyājñānasya niḥśreyasa kāraṇa tvena pratiṣedhāt anekānta jñānañca mithyā eva bādhaka upapatteḥ tathā hi nitya anityayoḥ vidhi pratiṣedha rūpa tvāt abhinne dharmiṇi abhāvaḥ evam sat asat tva ādeḥ api iti yat ca idam ghaṭa ādiḥ mṛd ādi rūpatayā nityaḥ iti asat etat mṛd rūpatāyāḥ tatas rtha antara tvāt tathā hi ghaṭāt artha antaram mṛd rūpatā mṛd tvam sāmānyam tasya tu nitya tvena ghaṭasya atathābhāvaḥ tatas nyatv

original: na cānekāntabhāvanāto viśiṣṭaśarīrādilābhe 'sti pratibandhaḥ । na cotpattidharmāṇāṃ śarīrādīnāmakṣayatvaṃ nyāyyam । tathā muktāvapyanekānto na vyāvartata iti mukto na muktaśceti syāt । evañca sati sa eva muktaḥ saṃsārī ceti prasaktam । evamanekānte 'pya<I,011>nekāntābhyupagame dūṣaṇam । vastuno hi sadasadrūpatā'naikāntikaḥ । tasyāpyanaikāntikābhyupagame rūpāntaramapi pratyakṣam, evaṃ nityānityarūpatāvyatiriktañca rūpāntaramityādi vācyam ।
analyzed: na ca anekānta bhāvanātaḥ viśiṣṭa śarīra ādi lābhe sti pratibandhaḥ na ca utpatti dharmāṇām śarīra ādīnām akṣaya tvam nyāyyam tathā muktau api anekāntaḥ na vyāvartate iti muktaḥ na muktaḥ ca iti syāt evam ca sati saḥ eva muktaḥ saṃsārī ca iti prasaktam evam anekānte dūṣaṇam vastunaḥ hi sat asat rūpatā anaikāntikaḥ tasya api anaikāntika abhyupagame rūpa antaram api pratyakṣam evam nitya anitya rūpatā vyatiriktam ca rūpa antaram ityādi vācya

original: anye tu ātmaikatvajñānāt paramātmani layaḥ sampadyata iti bruvate । tathā hi, ātmaiva paramārthaḥ san, tato 'nyeṣāṃ bhede pramāṇābhāvāt । pratyakṣaṃ hi padārthānāṃ sadbhāvagrāhakameva na bhedasyetyavidyāsamāropita evāyaṃ bheda iti manyante ।

original: evaṃ śabdādvaitavijñānamapi mithyārūpatayā na niḥśreyasasādhanamiti draṣṭavyam । tathā hi, sarvārthānāṃ śabdarūpateti pramāṇābhāvaḥ । atha bhede 'pi pramāṇābhāva iti cet, tadasat । cakṣurādinā śabdarūpatāviyuktānāmarthānāṃ pratibhāsanāt । śabdarūpatā hi śrāvaṇatvamarthasya sataḥ । na cārtheṣvetadasti śrotreṇāgrahaṇāt । atha śabdasyaivāvasthābhedād grahaṇavaicitryamiti cet, tanna । śabdarūpatāyāmeva tatsyāt, tatra ca pramāṇābhāva eva । atha śabdasamparkeṇa pratibhāsa eva pramāṇamiti cet, na । akṛtasamayasya vāyvādestadantareṇāpi pratibhāsanāt । na ca śabdāntareṇa samparko yuktaḥ samayavaiyarthyaprasaṅgāditi । śabdarūpatāyāṃ sādhyāyāṃ na śabdasampṛktapratibhāsaḥ pramāṇam । ata eva vaikharī madhyamā paśyantī sūkṣmā ceti bhedapratipādanamunmattabhāṣitam । na ca śabdādvaitajñānāt sūkṣmāvasthā sampadyata ityasti pratibandhaḥ ।
analyzed: evam śabda advaita vijñānam api mithyā rūpatayā na niḥśreyasa sādhanam iti draṣṭavyam tathā hi sarva arthānām śabda rūpa tā iti pramāṇa abhāvaḥ atha bhede pi pramāṇa abhāvaḥ iti ced tat asat cakṣuḥ ādinā śabda rūpa tā viyuktānām arthānām pratibhāsanāt śabda rūpatā hi śrāvaṇa tvam arthasya sataḥ na ca artheṣu etat asti śrotreṇa agrahaṇāt atha śabdasya eva avasthā bhedāt grahaṇa vaicitryam iti ced tat na śabda rūpatāyām eva tat syāt ta

original: anye tu maheśvaraprasādādaśuddhaiśvaryavināśe tadguṇasaṃkrāntiṃ manyante । taccāsat । anyaguṇānāmanyatra vṛtteradarśanāt । maheśvaraprasādaśca muktau na pratiṣidhyate tasyāstadadhīnatvāditi sthitamasadvādapratiṣedhāt । ṣaṭpadārthasādharmyavaidharmyatattvajñānaṃ muktasya niḥśreyasakāraṇamiti ।
analyzed: anye tu maheśvara prasādāt aśuddha aiśvarya vināśe tad guṇa saṃkrāntim manyante tat ca asat anya guṇānām anyatra vṛtteḥ adarśanāt maheśvara prasādaḥ ca muktau na pratiṣidhyate tasyāḥ tad adhīna tvāt iti sthitam asadvāda pratiṣedhāt ṣaṣ padārtha sādharmya vaidharmya tattva jñānam muktasya niḥśreyasa kāraṇam iti

original: {sūtrastha-athetyādiśabdavicāraḥ}

athetyādivākyasya <?> sūtreṇāpi sambandho vyākhyānāntaramiti manyante, taccāsat । sarvasmin vyākhyāne sūtritatvopadarśanaṃ bhāṣyasyeṣyata eva । athāto dharmaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ <vai. sū. 1.1.1>, yato 'bhyudayaniḥśreyasasiddhiḥ sa dharmaḥ <vai. sū. 1.1.2> iti । 〈pūrva〉sūtre athaśabdo 'pyānantarye vartata ityanyasyāsambhavānnamaskārānantaramiti labhyate । sa ca jñānaprastāvād īśvarasyaiveti । bhāṣyakāraśca sūtrakārābhimataṃ parasya gurornamaskāramanūdyāparasya namaskāraṃ karotīti vyākhyeyaṃ na tu kaṇāda eva, svātmani kriyāvirodhāt ।
analyzed: atha ityādi vākyasya sūtreṇa api sambandhaḥ vyākhyāna antaram iti manyante tat ca asat sarvasmin vyākhyāne sūtrita tva upadarśanam bhāṣyasya iṣyate eva atha atas dharmam vyākhyāsyāmaḥ vai sū yatas bhyudaya niḥśreyasa siddhiḥ sa dharmaḥ vai sū iti pūrva sūtre atha śabdaḥ u pi ānantarye vartate iti anyasya asambhavāt namaskāra anantaram iti labhyate sa ca jñāna prastāvāt īśvarasya eva iti bhāṣyakāraḥ ca sūtrakāra abhimatam parasya guroḥ namaskāram anū

analyzed: yat vā buddhiḥ viśeṣaṇa antara upacaritā lakṣaṇam itarasmāt bhedakam tat ca avivakṣita viśeṣam sādharmyam tathā hi dravya guṇa karmasu anugata sāmānya vaśāt anugata jñāna janaka tvam sāmānye tu svarūpatayā eva tathā atyanta vyāvṛttyā viśeṣeṣu eva ayuta siddheṣu abādhyamāna iha buddhiḥ samavāyaḥ eva iti vyāvṛttau api buddhi vedya tvam samāna tvāt sādharmyam

original: evaṃ kāryāṇāṃ bhāvaḥ kāryatvaṃ tadabhāvo 'kāryatvaṃ svakāraṇasattāsambandhābhāvaḥ ।
analyzed: evam kāryāṇām bhāvaḥ kārya tvam tad abhāvaḥ kārya tvam sva kāraṇa sattā sambandha abhāvaḥ

original: tathā kāraṇānāṃ bhāvaḥ kāraṇatvaṃ tadabhāvo 'kāraṇatvaṃ samavāyyasamavāyikāraṇatvābhāvaḥ । nimittakāraṇatvañca jñānotpattāviṣyata eva ।
analyzed: tathā kāraṇānām bhāvaḥ kāraṇa tvam tad abhāvaḥ kāraṇa tvam samavāyi asamavāyi kāraṇa tva abhāvaḥ nimitta kāraṇa tvañca jñāna utpattau iṣyate eva

original: tathā na sāmānyaviśeṣavattvamasāmānyaviśeṣavattvam aparasāmānyābhāvaḥ । na tadupalakṣitaḥ samavāyaḥ, samavāye tadabhāvaprasaṅgāt ।
analyzed: tathā na sāmānya viśeṣavat tvam asāmānya viśeṣavat tvam apara sāmānya abhāvaḥ na tad upalakṣitaḥ samavāyaḥ samavāye tad abhāva prasaṅgāt

original: (“sakalāśrayavināśe 'pi sāmānyasamavāyayorna vināśaḥ”)<PDhS>
analyzed: sakala āśraya vināśe pi sāmānya samavāyayoḥ na vināśaḥ

original: nityānāṃ bhāvo nityatvamavināśitvam, ubhayāntopalakṣitasattāsambandhābhāvo vā । tathā hi kāryavastuno vināśitvaṃ dṛṣṭam, sāmānyādeścākāryatvādavināśaḥ । na cāśrayavināśād vināśaḥ, tasyaikāśrayavināśe 'pyāśrayāntare svānuraktapratyayajanakatvāt । tathā hyekāśrayavināśe 'pyāśrayāntare sattā satsaditijñānahetuḥ । samavāyaścehapratyayaheturiti । anayorāśrayavināśānna vināśaḥ ।
analyzed: nityānām bhāvaḥ nitya tvam avināśi tvam ubhaya anta upalakṣita sattā sambandha abhāvaḥ vā tathā hi kārya vastunaḥ vināśi tvam dṛṣṭam sāmānya ādeḥ ca akārya tvāt avināśaḥ na ca āśraya vināśāt vināśaḥ tasya eka āśraya vināśe pi āśraya antare sva anurakta pratyaya janaka tvāt tathā hi eka āśraya vināśe pi āśraya antare sattā sat sat iti jñāna hetuḥ samavāyaḥ ca iha pratyaya hetuḥ iti anayoḥ āśraya vināśāt na vināśaḥ

original: anityāśrayaṃ sāmānyaṃ samastāśrayavināśena nirādhārasyābhāvād vinaṃkṣyatīti ? naitadevam, akāryavastutvena avināśitvasiddheḥ samastāśrayavināśe 'pyavasthānamiṣyate । ata eva kevalamāśrayābhāvād gotvādirūpatayā na vyapadiśyata iti । akāryavastunaśca vināśe gaganādīnāmapyucchedaprasaṅgaḥ ।
analyzed: anitya āśrayam sāmānyam samasta āśraya vināśena nirādhārasya abhāvāt vinaṃkṣyati iti  na etat evam akārya vastu tvena avināśi tva siddheḥ samasta āśraya vināśe pi avasthānam iṣyate atas eva kevalam āśraya abhāvāt go tva ādi rūpatayā na vyapadiśyate iti akārya vastunaḥ ca vināśe gagana ādīnām api uccheda prasaṅgaḥ

original: athānityāśrayasyāśrayotpattyanantaraṃ rūpādivadupalambhād asiddhamakāryatvamiti cet, na । upalambhasyobhayathābhāvāt ।
analyzed: atha anitya āśrayasya āśraya utpatti anantaram rūpa ādi vat upalambhāt asiddham akārya tvam iti ced na upalambhasya ubhayathā bhāvāt

original: na jñāyate kiṃ vastūtpattyanantaramutpadyate ? atha abhivyajyata iti ? utpāde bādhakopapatterabhivyajyata itīṣyate । tathā hi, dravyasyaiva samavāyikāraṇatvavidhānena guṇakarmaṇostatpratiṣedhāt tadādhārasyotpattyabhāvaḥ । tadyathā sāmānyādhārasya yugapadutpattiṃ <I,042> vinā samavāyikāraṇābhāvācceti । tathā hi, yatra samavetaṃ kāryaṃ tadavaśyaṃ samavāyikāraṇam, sāmānyasya kramabhāviṣu svādhāreṣu sarveṣu samavāyopalabdheḥ sarvaṃ samavāyikāraṇamiti । sakalādhāraniṣpattāvevotpattiriti pūrvabhāviṣūpalambho na syāt ।
analyzed: na jñāyate kim vastu utpatti anantaram utpadyate atha abhivyajyate iti utpāde bādhaka upapatteḥ abhivyajyate iti iṣyate  / tathā hi dravyasya eva samavāyi kāraṇa tva vidhānena guṇa karmaṇoḥ tad pratiṣedhāt tad ādhārasya utpatti abhāvaḥ tat yathā sāmānya ādhārasya yugapad utpattim vinā samavāyi kāraṇa abhāvāt ca iti tathā hi yatra samavetam kāryam tat avaśyam samavāyi kāraṇam sāmānyasya krama bhāviṣu sva ādhāreṣu sarveṣu samavāya upalabdheḥ sarvam

original: atha sargādau bhūyasāṃ svādhārāṇāmutpādādutpannaṃ sāmānyaṃ kramabhāviṣvādhāreṣu samaveṣyatīti cet, na । kāryāntareṣvadarśanāt । na hi rūpādikāryaṃ svādhāreṣu samavetamupajātamanyena samavāyavṛttyā sambadhyamānaṃ dṛṣṭamiti । na ca krameṇotpadyamāneṣvanyat sāmānyamiti vācyam, bhede pramāṇābhāvāt । abhede tvanugataṃ jñānameva pramāṇamiti vakṣyāmaḥ sāmānyaparīkṣāyām ।
analyzed: atha sarga ādau bhūyasām sva ādhārāṇām utpādāt utpannam sāmānyam krama bhāviṣu ādhāreṣu samaveṣyati iti ced na kārya antareṣu adarśanāt na hi rūpa ādi kāryam sva ādhāreṣu samavetam upajātam anyena samavāya vṛttyā sambadhyamānam dṛṣṭam iti na ca krameṇa utpadyamāneṣu anyat sāmānyam iti vācyam bhede pramāṇa abhāvāt abhede tu anugatam jñānam eva pramāṇam iti vakṣyāmaḥ sāmānya parīkṣāyām

original: tadevam utpattipakṣe bādhakopapattervastūtpattyanantaraṃ samabhivyajyata ityakāryatvānnityatvaṃ siddham ।
analyzed: tat evam utpatti pakṣe bādhaka upapatteḥ vastu utpatti anantaram samabhivyajyate iti akārya tvāt nitya tvam siddham

original: evamarthaśabdānabhidheyatvañca svasamayārthaśabdābhidheyatvābhāva iti । yadyapi dravyādereva kāryatvādividhānād ihākāryatvādirlabhyate tathāpi sādharmyasya vivakṣitatvādabhidhānamiti । sāmānyādīnāṃ kāryatvādyabhāvo 'pi sādharmyamiti ।
analyzed: evam artha śabda anabhidheya tvam ca sva samaya artha śabda abhidheya tva abhāvaḥ iti yadi api dravya ādeḥ eva kārya tva ādi vidhānāt iha akārya tva ādiḥ labhyate tathā api sādharmyasya vivakṣita tvāt abhidhānam iti sāmānya ādīnām kārya tva ādi abhāvaḥ pi sādharmyam iti

original: {navadravyasādharmyam}
analyzed: nava dravya sādharmyam

original: (“pṛthivyādīnāṃ navānāmapi dravyatvayogaḥ, svātmanyārambhakatvam, guṇavattvam, kāryakāraṇāvirodhitvam ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: pṛthivī ādīnām navānām api dravya tva yogaḥ sva ātmani ārambhaka tvam guṇavat tvam kārya kāraṇa avirodhi tvam

original: evaṃ padārthānāṃ sādharmyamabhidhāya dravyāṇāṃ sādharmyanirūpaṇārthamāha “pṛthivyādīnām”(*) ityādi । pṛthivī ādiryeṣāṃ tāni pṛthivyādīni teṣām । na jñāyate kiyatāmataḥ “navānāmapi dravyatvayogaḥ”(*) sādharmyam । dravyatvena yogo dravyatvopalakṣitaḥ samavāya iti । yadyapi samavāyaḥ pañcapadārthavṛttistathāpi dravyatvenopalakṣito 'sādhāraṇatvād bhavatyeva lakṣaṇamiti ।
analyzed: evam padārthānām sādharmyam abhidhāya dravyāṇām sādharmya nirūpaṇa artham āha pṛthivī ādīnām ityādi pṛthivī ādiḥ yeṣām tāni pṛthivī ādīni teṣām na jñāyate kiyatām atas navānām api dravya tva yogaḥ sādharmyam dravya tvena yogaḥ dravya tva upalakṣitaḥ samavāyaḥ iti yadi api samavāyaḥ pañca padārtha vṛttiḥ tathā api dravya tvena upalakṣitaḥ sādhāraṇa tvāt bhavati eva lakṣaṇam iti

original: na ca dravyāṇāṃ bhāvo dravyatvamityukte 'rthādavagamyate yoga iti vācyam । gamyavṛttyāśrayaṇena śabdavṛttipratiṣedhe 'tiprasaṅgāt ।
analyzed: na ca dravyāṇām bhāvaḥ dravya tvam iti ukte rthāt avagamyate yogaḥ iti vācyam gamya vṛtti āśrayaṇena śabda vṛtti pratiṣedhe tiprasaṅgāt

original: na copacaritabhedatvādavāstavaṃ lakṣaṇamiti dūṣaṇam, śrotrasyeva viśiṣṭārthakriyājanakatvāt ।
analyzed: na ca upacarita bheda tvāt avāstavam lakṣaṇam iti dūṣaṇam śrotrasya iva viśiṣṭa artha kriyā janaka tvāt

original: nāpi 〈a〉samarthaviśeṣaṇatā । yogapadaṃ vinā hi asambhavitvāśaṅkānativṛtteriti । śeṣaṃ lakṣaṇadūṣaṇasya pratisamādhānaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ pṛthivyadhikāre ।
analyzed: nā api asamartha viśeṣaṇa tā yoga padam vinā hi asambhavi tva āśaṅkā anativṛtteḥ iti śeṣam lakṣaṇa dūṣaṇasya pratisamādhānam vakṣyāmaḥ pṛthivī adhikāre

original: lakṣaṇañca bhedārthaṃ vyavahārārthañceti । tathā hi, pṛthivyādīnītarasmād bhidyante, dravyāṇīti vā vyavahartavyāni dravyatvayogāt, ye tu na bhidyante nāpi dravyāṇīti vyavahriyante na te dravyatvayuktā yathā rūpādayaḥ, na ca tathā na dravyatvayuktāni pṛthivyādīnīti, tasmāditarasmād bhidyante dravyāṇīti vā vyavahartavyānīti ।
analyzed: lakṣaṇam ca bheda artham vyavahāra artham ca iti tathā hi pṛthivī ādīni itarasmāt bhidyante dravyāṇi iti vā vyavahartavyāni dravya tva yogāt ye tu na bhidyante na api dravyāṇi iti vyavahriyante na te dravya tva yuktāḥ yathā rūpa ādayaḥ na ca tathā na dravya tva yuktāni pṛthivī ādīni iti tasmāt itarasmāt bhidyante dravyāṇi iti vā vyavahartavyāni iti

original: evaṃ dravyaśabdasya pravṛttau pṛthivyādīnāṃ navānāmapi dravyatvayogo nimittamiti śabdārthanirūpaṇaparatvenāpi sambadhyate vākyam । tathā ca na sāmānyavataḥ śabdārthatve kiñcid bādhakamastīti vakṣyāmaḥ ।
analyzed: evam dravya śabdasya pravṛttau pṛthivī ādīnām navānām api dravya tva yogaḥ nimittam iti śabda artha nirūpaṇa para tvena api sambadhyate vākyam tathā ca na sāmānyavataḥ śabda artha tve kiñcid bādhakam asti iti vakṣyāmaḥ

original: tathā atīndriyaśaktipratiṣedhārthañca । tattu pṛthivyādīnāṃ navānāmapi dravyatvayogo nijā śaktiriti ।
analyzed: tathā atīndriya śakti pratiṣedha artham ca tat tu pṛthivī ādīnām navānām api dravya tva yogaḥ nijā śaktiḥ iti

original: {dravyatvasya sāmānyatvavicāraḥ}

atha akṛtasamayasya gopiṇḍeṣvivānugatākārajñānasyānupapatterna dravyatvaṃ sāmānyamastīti । yathā hi nārikeladvīpavāsino gopiṇḍopalambhādekākāratā pratibhāsate naivaṃ pṛthivyādiṣūpalabhyamāneṣviti । athāsti kṛtasamayasya dravyaṃ dravyamiti jñānam । tacca saṅketavaśādeva bhaviṣyatīti ।
analyzed: atha akṛta samayasya go piṇḍeṣu iva anugata ākāra jñānasya anupapatteḥ na dravya tvam sāmānyam asti iti yathā hi nārikela dvīpa vāsinaḥ go piṇḍa upalambhāt eka ākāra tā pratibhāsate na evam pṛthivī ādiṣu upalabhyamāneṣu iti  atha asti kṛta samayasya dravyam dravyam iti jñānam tat ca saṅketa vaśāt eva bhaviṣyati iti

original: tadasat । sāmānyasya niyatavyañjakavyaṅgyatayā vyañjakānupalabdhāvapyanupalabdherabhāvāt । tathā hi, dravyatvaṃ kriyāvattvādidharmopalambhādabhivyajyate, atiśayadravyāśritatvopalabdherguṇatvamevaṃ karmalakṣaṇopalabdheḥ karmatvamiti । śeṣeṣvapi cintyam, vyañjakamapyūhyam ।
analyzed: tat asat sāmānyasya niyata vyañjaka vyaṅgya tayā vyañjaka anupalabdhau api anupalabdheḥ abhāvāt tathā hi dravya tvam kriyāvat tva ādi dharma upalambhāt abhivyajyate atiśaya dravya āśrita tva upalabdheḥ guṇa tvam evam karma lakṣaṇa upalabdheḥ karma tvam iti śeṣeṣu api cintyam vyañjakam api ūhyam

original: na ca sarveṣāṃ vyañjakopalabdhirvidyata iti sāmānyānupalambho vighātaka eva । kṛtasamayasya vyañjakopalabdherbhavatyeva dravyādiṣvanugatajñānam । sāsnādinā vā kṛtasamayenāpi saṃvedyata iti yuktaṃ gavādiṣvanugatākāravijñānamiti ।
analyzed: na ca sarveṣām vyañjaka upalabdhiḥ vidyate iti sāmānya anupalambhaḥ vighātakaḥ eva kṛta samayasya vyañjaka upalabdheḥ bhavati eva dravya ādiṣu anugata jñānam sāsnādinā vā kṛta samayena api saṃvedyate iti yuktam gavādiṣu anugata ākāra vijñānam iti

original: yatra ca dravyaguṇakarmātmakaṃ nimittaṃ na sambhāvyate 'bādhitānugatāyāṃ saṃvidi tatra sāmānyameva nimittam । na ca dravyādiṣvanugatasaṃvedane 'bhāva iva kiñcid bādhakamastīti । tathā hi, abhāvo 'bhāva ityanugatasaṃvedanaṃ dravyaguṇakarmānimittamapi na sāmānyād <I,044> bhavati sāmānyasyābhāvena samavāyābhāvāt । samavetañca sāmānyaṃ viśeṣamupalabdham ।
analyzed: yatra ca dravya guṇa karma ātmakam nimittam na sambhāvyate bādhita anugatāyām saṃvidi tatra sāmānyam eva nimittam na ca dravya ādiṣu anugata saṃvedane bhāvaḥ iva kiñcid bādhakam asti iti tathā hi abhāvaḥ bhāvaḥ iti anugata saṃvedanam dravya guṇa karma a nimittam api na sāmānyāt bhavati sāmānyasya abhāvena samavāya abhāvāt samavetam ca sāmānyam viśeṣam upalabdham

original: athedamevābhāvatvānuraktamabhāvo 'bhāva iti jñānamabhāvatvasyābhāvena samavāyaṃ darśayatīti cet, na । anekāntāt । tathā hi, sāmānyādau satsaditi jñānaṃ vinā sattāsamavāyamityuktapūrvam । sāmānyavattve cābhāvasya bhāvarūpataiva syāt । evañca anutpatteranāditvānnityatvaṃ vināśasya ca ādimatvādanityatvaṃ prasajyeta । prāgabhāvasya ca nityatvena vastūpalambho na syāt । tayoḥ svarūpaparihārasthitivirodhāt ।
analyzed: atha idam eva abhāva tva anuraktam abhāvaḥ bhāvaḥ iti jñānam abhāva tvasya abhāvena samavāyam darśayati iti ced na anekāntāt tathā hi sāmānya ādau sat sat iti jñānam vinā sattā samavāyam iti ukta pūrvam sāmānyavat tve ca abhāvasya bhāva rūpatā eva syāt evañca anutpatteḥ anādi tvāt nitya tvam vināśasya ca ādima tvāt anitya tvam prasajyeta prāgabhāvasya ca nitya tvena vastu upalambhaḥ na syāt tayoḥ svarūpa parihāra sthiti virodhāt

original: na ca abhāvopamardātmano bhāvasyotpattiryukteti prāgiti viśeṣaṇāsambhavaḥ । pradhvaṃsānutpattiśca, tasya hi utpattimadapekṣitatvāt । sambhave 'pi utpattimattvena vināśasya vināśe bhāvagrahaṇaṃ syāt । yathā hi vināśānutpatteḥ pūrvaṃ bhāvo gṛhyate tadvad vināśāpāye 'pi gṛhyeta, virodhābhāvasyāviśeṣāt । na caitad dṛṣṭamataḥ sāmānyavad vyatirekaḥ ।
analyzed: na ca abhāva upamarda ātmanaḥ bhāvasya utpattiḥ yuktā iti prāk iti viśeṣaṇa asambhavaḥ pradhvaṃsa anutpattiḥ ca tasya hi utpattimat apekṣita tvāt sambhave pi utpattimat tvena vināśasya vināśe bhāva grahaṇam syāt yathā hi vināśa anutpatteḥ pūrvam bhāvaḥ gṛhyate tadvat vināśa apāye pi gṛhyeta virodha abhāvasya aviśeṣāt na ca etat dṛṣṭam atas sāmānya vat vyatirekaḥ

original: na copādhiṃ vinā abhāvo 'bhāva iti jñānaṃ śakyaṃ bhavitum । kintarhi ? ghaṭābhāvaḥ paṭābhāva iti jñānotpattervailakṣaṇyameva । athāsti ghaṭābhāvo ghaṭābhāva ityanugatajñānamiti cedatrāpyupādhivaśādupalakṣaṇatvam, sāmānyameva jñānaheturiti draṣṭavyam mukhyaṃ bādhakopatteḥ । na caivaṃ dravyaṃ dravyamiti jñāne kiñcid bādhakamastīti sāmānyasiddhernāsambhavīdaṃ lakṣaṇamiti ।
analyzed: na ca upādhim vinā abhāvaḥ bhāvaḥ iti jñānam śakyam bhavitum kin tarhi ghaṭa abhāvaḥ paṭa abhāvaḥ iti jñāna utpatteḥ vailakṣaṇyam eva  atha asti ghaṭa abhāvaḥ ghaṭa abhāvaḥ iti anugata jñānam iti ced atra api upādhi vaśāt upalakṣaṇa tvam sāmānyam eva jñāna hetuḥ iti draṣṭavyam mukhyam bādhaka upatteḥ na ca evam dravyam dravyam iti jñāne kiñcid bādhakam asti iti sāmānya siddheḥ na asambhavi idam lakṣaṇam iti

original: tathā guṇā vidyante yeṣāṃ te guṇavantasteṣāṃ bhāvo guṇavattvaṃ guṇopalakṣitaḥ samavāyaḥ, samavetā vā guṇāḥ । te 'pyasādhāraṇatvād bhedakāḥ । yathā na guṇādiṣu guṇavattvaṃ tathā vakṣyāmo guṇ(asaṅkare)〈āvasare〉 ।

original: tathā kāryakāraṇayoravirodhaḥ kāryakāraṇāvirodhaḥ, sa vidyate yeṣāṃ te kāryakāraṇāvirodhinaḥ, teṣāṃ bhāvo kāryakāraṇāvirodhitvam । kāryakāraṇayoḥ parasparāvirodhitvameka eva dharmaḥ ।

original: yadi vā dharmadvayaṃ kāryāvirodhitvaṃ kāraṇāvirodhitvañceti 〈tadā〉 kāryeṇa na virudhyante na vināśyante iti kāryāvirodhinasteṣāṃ bhāvaḥ kāryāvirodhitvaṃ kāryeṇa vināśābhāvaḥ । sa ca sarveṣu pṛthivyādiṣvastīti sādharmyam na punarlakṣaṇaṃ vipakṣaikadeśe 'pi <I,045> bhāvāt । tathā hi kāryeṇa virudhyante śabdabuddhyādayo na sarve guṇāḥ, tathā karmāṇy api kāryeṇa virudhyante, na kāryeṇaiva āśrayavināśe 'pi vināśāt ।
analyzed: yadi vā dharma dvayam kārya avirodhi tvam kāraṇa avirodhi tvam ca iti tadā kāryeṇa na virudhyante na vināśyante iti kārya avirodhinaḥ teṣām bhāvaḥ kārya avirodhi tvam kāryeṇa vināśa abhāvaḥ sa ca sarveṣu pṛthivī ādiṣu asti iti sādharmyam na punar lakṣaṇam vipakṣa eka deśe bhāvāt tathā hi kāryeṇa virudhyante śabda buddhi ādayaḥ na sarve guṇāḥ tathā karmāṇi api kāryeṇa virudhyante na kāryeṇa eva āśraya vināśe vināśāt

original: na ca padārthāpekṣayāpi lakṣaṇavivakṣāyāṃ vipakṣaikadeśe vartamānasya gamakatvam । tathā kāraṇāvirodhitvaṃ yadi kāraṇena na virudhyante iti kāraṇāvirodhinasteṣāṃ bhāvaḥ kāraṇāvirodhitvam, kāraṇena vināśābhāvaḥ । sa ca ākāśādiṣvasti kāraṇābhāvāditi pakṣe vyāpakasyāpi sato na vipakṣād vyāvṛttirityalakṣaṇatvam । tathā hi, na kāraṇena guṇā vināśyante nāpi karmeti ।
analyzed: na ca padārtha apekṣayā api lakṣaṇa vivakṣāyām vipakṣa eka deśe vartamānasya gamaka tvam tathā kāraṇa avirodhi tvam yadi kāraṇena na virudhyante iti kāraṇa avirodhinaḥ teṣām bhāvaḥ kāraṇa avirodhi tvam kāraṇena vināśa abhāvaḥ sa ca ākāśa ādiṣu asti kāraṇa abhāvāt iti pakṣe vyāpakasya api sataḥ na vipakṣāt vyāvṛttiḥ iti alakṣaṇa tvam tathā hi na kāraṇena guṇāḥ vināśyante na api karma iti prati kāraṇa apekṣayā api karma

original: atha kāraṇaṃ na virundhanti na vināśayantīti kāraṇāvirodhinasteṣāṃ bhāvaḥ kāraṇāvirodhitvaṃ kāraṇāvināśakatvaṃ kāryadharma iti । atra nityadravyeṣu kāraṇābhāvāt kāraṇāvirodhitvaṃ kāraṇāvināśakatvaṃ cintanīyamiti । vipakṣaikadeśe vartamānasyāgamakatvameva । tathā hi, śabdabuddhyāderyadyapi kāraṇavināśakatvaṃ tathāpi na rūpādīnāmastītyativyāptiḥ । evaṃ karmāpi na kāraṇaṃ vināśayatīti ।
analyzed: atha kāraṇam na virundhanti na vināśayanti iti kāraṇa avirodhinaḥ teṣām bhāvaḥ kāraṇa avirodhi tvam kāraṇa avināśaka tvam kārya dharmaḥ iti atra nitya dravyeṣu kāraṇa abhāvāt kāraṇa avirodhi tvam kāraṇa avināśaka tvam cintanīyam iti vipakṣa eka deśe vartamānasya āgamaka tvam eva tathā hi śabda buddhi ādeḥ yadi api kāraṇa vināśaka tvam tathā api na rūpa ādīnām asti iti ativyāptiḥ evam karma api na kāraṇam vināśayati iti kāraṇa avinā

original: na ca kāryāvirodhitvenāviśeṣastatra hi kāryeṇāvināśatvaṃ kāraṇadharmaḥ, kāraṇāvirodhitvaṃ kāraṇāvināśakatvaṃ kāryadharma ityapunaruktam । tadevamubhayathāpi vipakṣaikadeśāvyāvṛttaḥ sādharmyameva na tallakṣaṇamiti siddham ।
analyzed: na ca kārya avirodhi tvena aviśeṣaḥ tatra hi kāryeṇa avināśa tvam kāraṇa dharmaḥ kāraṇa avirodhi tvam kāraṇa avināśaka tvam kārya dharmaḥ iti apunaruktam tat evam ubhayathā api vipakṣa eka deśa avyāvṛttaḥ sādharmyam eva na tat lakṣaṇam iti siddham

original: (“antyaviśeṣavattvam anāśritatvanityatve ca anyatrāvayavidravyebhyaḥ ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: antya viśeṣavat tvam anāśrita tva nitya tve ca anyatra avayavi dravyebhyaḥ

original: evamantyā viśeṣā vidyante yeṣāṃ te tadvantaḥ, teṣāṃ bhāvo 'ntyaviśeṣavattvam, antyaviśeṣopalakṣitaḥ samavāyaḥ, samavetā vā antyaviśeṣāḥ ।
analyzed: evam antyāḥ viśeṣāḥ vidyante yeṣām te tadvantaḥ teṣām bhāvaḥ ntya viśeṣavat tvam antya viśeṣa upalakṣitaḥ samavāyaḥ samavetāḥ vā antya viśeṣāḥ

original: tathā anāśritatvañca nityatvañcetyanāśritatvanityatve । anāśritatvamāśritatvābhāvaḥ, nityatvamavināśitvam, ubhayāntānupalakṣitā vastusattā vā ।
analyzed: tathā anāśrita tvam ca nitya tvam ca iti anāśrita tva nitya tve anāśrita tvam āśrita tva abhāvaḥ nitya tvam avināśi tvam ubhaya anta anupalakṣitā vastu sattā vā

original: kimetaddharmatrayaṃ sarveṣu pṛthivyādiṣvasti vyāpakañcetyāha “anyatrāvayavidravyebhyaḥ”(*) । iti । avayavidravyāṇi varjayitvā nityadravyeṣveveti ।
analyzed: kim etat dharma trayam sarveṣu pṛthivī ādiṣu asti vyāpakam ca iti āha anyatra avayavi dravyebhyaḥ iti avayavi dravyāṇi varjayitvā nitya dravyeṣu eva iti

original: nanu dharmatrayasya sāpavādatvāviśeṣe 'pyantyaviśeṣavattvenāsamāsakaraṇe kiṃ prayojanamiti । antyaviśeṣāṇāmavyāpakatve 'sādhāraṇatājñānenaiva । anāśritatvaniyatvayoścānyatrāpi sadbhāvāt sādhāraṇatvenāsamāsakaraṇam । tathā hi, nityatvaṃ guṇādiṣvapya<I,046>stīti sādhāraṇam, anāśritatvaṃ samavāyasyāpi mukhyavṛttau bādhakopapattergauṇavṛttyāśrayaṇena sambhāvyate, na paramārthata iti sādhāraṇam ।
analyzed: nanu dharma trayasya sāpavāda tva aviśeṣe pi antya viśeṣa vat tvena asamāsa karaṇe kim prayojanam iti antya viśeṣāṇām avyāpaka tve sādhāraṇa tā jñānena eva anāśrita tva niya tvayoḥ ca anyatra api sadbhāvāt sādhāraṇa tvena asamāsa karaṇam tathā hi nitya tvam sādhāraṇam anāśrita tvam samavāyasya api mukhya vṛttau bādhaka upapatteḥ gauṇa vṛtti āśrayaṇena sambhāvyate na paramārthataḥ iti sādhāraṇam

original: {dravyaṣaṭkasādharmyam}
(“pṛthivyudakajvalanapavanātmamanasāmanekatvāparajātimattve ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: pṛthivī udaka jvalana pavana ātma manasām aneka tva apara jātimat tve

original: evaṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ navānāṃ padārthāntarād vyāvṛtaṃ sādharmyamabhidhāya punasteṣāṃ svabhedād vyāvṛttaṃ sādharmyaṃ darśayati “pṛthivyudakajvalanapavanātmamanasām”(*) iti । cārthe dvandvaḥ samāsaḥ । anekatvañcāparajātimattvañcetyanekatvāparajātimattve ।

original: anekatvañca kṣityāderviśeṣalakṣaṇayogino vyaktibhedaḥ, anekatvasaṃkhyā vā । nākāśādervyaktibhedo nānekatvasaṃkhyā vā sambhavatīti tasmād vyāvṛttiriti ।
analyzed: aneka tvam ca kṣiti ādeḥ viśeṣa lakṣaṇa yoginaḥ vyakti bhedaḥ aneka tva saṃkhyā vā na ākāśa ādeḥ vyakti bhedaḥ na aneka tva saṃkhyā vā sambhavati iti tasmāt vyāvṛttiḥ iti

original: anekatvādevāparajātimattvam । aparajātirdravyatvāpekṣayā pṛthivītvādirūpā । sā vidyate yeṣāṃ tāni tadvanti, teṣāṃ bhāvo 'parajātimattvam, aparajātyupalakṣitaḥ samavāyaḥ, samavetā vā aparajātiriti ।
analyzed: aneka tvāt eva apara jātimat tvam apara jātiḥ dravya tva apekṣayā pṛthivī tva ādi rūpā sā vidyate yeṣām tāni tadvanti teṣām bhāvaḥ para jātimat tvam apara jāti upalakṣitaḥ samavāyaḥ samavetā vā apara jātiḥ iti

original: {dravyapañcakasādharmyam}
(“kṣitijalajyotiranilamanasāṃ kriyāvattvamūrtatvaparatvāparatvavegavattvāni ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: kṣiti jala jyotiḥ anila manasām kriyāvat tva mūrta tva para tva apara tva vegavat tvāni

original: evaṃ “kṣitijalajyotiranilamanasām”(*) sādharmyaṃ kriyāvattvañca mūrtatvañca paratvañcāparatvañca vegavattvañceti tathoktāni । tathā ca kriyā calanarūpā, sā vidyate yeṣāṃ tāni tadvanti, teṣāṃ bhāvaḥ kriyāvattvam, samavetā kriyā, tatsamavāyo vā । tathā mūrtiravyāpi dravyaparimāṇam, sā vidyate yeṣāṃ tāni mūrtāni, teṣāṃ bhāvo mūrtatvam । samavetā mūrtistatsamavāyo vā । mūrtatvādeva ca paratvāparatvādisadbhāvaḥ kriyāvattvañceti । parāparāṇāṃ bhāvaḥ paratvāparatve yatsadbhāve kṣityādiṣu parāparavyavahāra iti, samavetau paratvāparatvaguṇau, tatsamavāyo vā । vego vidyate yeṣāṃ tāni vegavanti, teṣāṃ bhāvo vegavattvam, samaveto vegaguṇastatsamavāyo vā । etāni ca kṣityādiṣveveti niyamyante, na tu sarvadā teṣu bhavantīti ।
analyzed: evam kṣiti jala jyotiḥ anila manasām sādharmyam kriyāvat tvañca mūrta tvañca para tvañca apara tvañca vegavat tvañca iti tathā uktāni tathā ca kriyā calana rūpā sā vidyate yeṣām tāni tadvanti teṣām bhāvaḥ kriyāvat tvam samavetā kriyā tad samavāyaḥ vā tathā mūrtiḥ avyāpi dravya parimāṇam sā vidyate yeṣām tāni mūrtāni teṣām bhāvaḥ mūrta tvam samavetā mūrtiḥ tad samavāyaḥ vā mūrta tvāt eva ca paratva apara tva ādi sadbhāvaḥ kriyāvat tva

original: {dravyacatuṣṭayasādharmyam}
analyzed: dravya catuṣṭaya sādharmyam

original: (“ākāśakāladigātmanāṃ sarvagatatvaṃ paramamahattvaṃ sarvasaṃyogisamānadeśatvañca ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: ākāśa kāla diś ātmanām sarva gata tvam parama mahā tvam sarva saṃyogi samāna deśa tvam ca

original: evam “ākāśakāladigātmanām”(*) sarvagatatvādi sādharmyam । sarvaśabdaścānantaroktamūrteṣveva vartate । sarveṣu gatāḥ sarvagatāḥ sarvaprāptāḥ, teṣāṃ bhāvaḥ sarvagatatvam । sarvamūrtaiḥ <I,047> saṃyogaḥ । sa cānyatarakarmajaḥ saṃyogajo vā । sa tūbhayaniṣṭhatvāviśeṣe 'pyākāśādereva sādharmyam । tasya hi sarvamūrtaiḥ saha saṃyogo na mūrtānāmanyatamasyeti ।
analyzed: evam ākāśa kāla diś ātmanām sarvagata tva ādi sādharmyam sarva śabdaḥ ca anantara ukta mūrteṣu eva vartate sarveṣu gatāḥ sarva gatāḥ sarva prāptāḥ teṣām bhāvaḥ sarva gata tvam sarva mūrtaiḥ saṃyogaḥ sa ca anyatara karma jaḥ saṃyoga jaḥ vā sa tu ubhaya niṣṭha tva aviśeṣe pi ākāśa ādeḥ eva sādharmyam tasya hi sarva mūrtaiḥ saha saṃyogaḥ na mūrtānām anyatamasya iti

original: tathā paramamahatāṃ bhāvaḥ paramamahattvam । niratiśayaparimāṇaṃ tatsamavāyo vā ।
analyzed: tathā parama mahatām bhāvaḥ parama mahā tvam niratiśaya parimāṇam tad samavāyaḥ vā

original: tathā sarvasaṃyogisamānadeśatvaṃ sarvāṇi ca tāni saṃyogīni ca mūrtadravyāṇi, taiḥ samānāḥ saṃyogāsteṣāmākāśādayo deśā ādhārāsteṣāṃ bhāvaḥ sarvasaṃyogisamānadeśatvaṃ sarvasaṃyogisaṃyogādhāratvam ।
analyzed: tathā sarva saṃyogi samāna deśa tvam sarvāṇi ca tāni saṃyogīni ca mūrta dravyāṇi taiḥ samānāḥ saṃyogāḥ teṣām ākāśa ādayaḥ deśāḥ ādhārāḥ teṣām bhāvaḥ sarva saṃyogi samāna deśa tvam sarva saṃyogi saṃyoga ādhāra tvam

original: na ca saṃyogasyobhayaniṣṭhatvānmūrtānāmapyeṣa dharma iti vācyam । yathā hyekamākāśaṃ sarvamūrtasaṃyogādhāro naivamekaṃ mūrtamityarthād viśeṣo labhyate । na ca sarvagatatvenāviśeṣaḥ । sarvagatatvaṃ hi sarvasaṃyogastadupalakṣito vā samavāyaḥ, sarvasaṃyogisaṃyogādhāratvamiti ।
analyzed: na ca saṃyogasya ubhaya niṣṭha tvāt mūrtānām api eṣa dharmaḥ iti vācyam yathā hi ekam ākāśam sarva mūrta saṃyoga ādhāraḥ na evam ekam mūrtam iti arthāt viśeṣaḥ labhyate na ca sarvagata tvena aviśeṣaḥ sarvagata tvam hi sarva saṃyogaḥ tad upalakṣitaḥ vā samavāyaḥ sarva saṃyogi saṃyoga ādhāra tvam iti

original: yad vā sarve ca te, saṃyogo vidyate yeṣāṃ te saṃyoginaste ca sarvasaṃyogino ghaṭādayaḥ śarāvādayaśca, teṣāṃ samānāḥ saṃyogā iti । śeṣaṃ pūrvavat ।
analyzed: yat vā sarve ca te saṃyogaḥ vidyate yeṣām te saṃyoginaḥ te ca sarva saṃyoginaḥ ghaṭa ādayaḥ śarāva ādayaḥ ca teṣām samānāḥ saṃyogāḥ iti śeṣam pūrvavat

original: anye tūpacāreṇaiva vyutpattyā vā, saṃyogiśabdena saṃyoga evocyate iti manyante । saṃyujyanta iti saṃyogāste vidyante yeṣāṃ te saṃyoginaḥ saṃyogā eva, sthānādupacāro veti । sarvasaṃyogināntu samānāśca te deśāścetyekatve satyādhāra iti ।
analyzed: anye tu upacāreṇa eva vyutpattyā vā saṃyogi śabdena saṃyogaḥ eva ucyate iti manyante saṃyujyante iti saṃyogāḥ te vidyante yeṣām te saṃyoginaḥ saṃyogāḥ eva sthānāt upacāraḥ vā iti sarva saṃyoginām tu samānāḥ ca te deśāḥ ca iti ekatve sati ādhāraḥ iti

original: atra caikatve satīti viśeṣaṇaṃ śabdavṛttyā labhyata iti sāmarthyāśravaṇamapāstaṃ bhavati । taccāsat । indriyasāmānyalakṣaṇe viśeṣaguṇalakṣaṇādau ca tasyaiva samāśrayaṇādiha prayāsamātrameveti ।
analyzed: atra ca ekatve sati iti viśeṣaṇam śabda vṛttyā labhyate iti sāmarthya āśravaṇam apāstam bhavati tat ca asat indriya sāmānya lakṣaṇe viśeṣa guṇa lakṣaṇa ādau ca tasya eva samāśrayaṇāt iha prayāsa mātram eva iti

analyzed: atha go śabda śravaṇāt śāvaleya ādi viśeṣa apratipatteḥ na viśeṣaḥ śabda arthaḥ satyam  kim tarhi sāmānya yuktaḥ rthaḥ pratīyate na śāvaleya ādi viśeṣaḥ sa ca śāvaleya ādi śabdebhyaḥ eva pratīyate iti na ca etāvatā sāmānyam eva śabda arthaḥ pradhāna upasarjana bhāvena ubhayoḥ pratibhāsanāt tathā gām ānaya ityādi prayogeṣu sāmānyavataḥ rthasya ānayana ādi kṛtyā sambandhāt

original: atha sāmānyamabhidhāya kathaṃ viśeṣe vartate, sūtravirodhāt ? na । sūtrārthāparijñānāt । tathā ca sūtrasyārthaḥ śabdo hi ekadā viśeṣaṇaṃ pratipādya punarviśeṣaṇaṃ na pratipādayatīti viramya vyāpāro niṣiddhaḥ । na punarviśeṣaṇaṃ pratipādya viśeṣyaṃ nābhidhatta iti । tathā karma vibhāgaṃ kṛtvottarasaṃyogaṃ karoti, akṛtasaṃyogasya vināśābhāvāt । na ca vibhāgaṃ kṛtvā saṃyogaṃ karotīti viramya vyāpārapratiṣedhaḥ । tathā viśeṣaṇabuddhirviśeṣyabuddhiṃ kṛtvā na kāryāntaramārabhata iti । evaṃ sukhādiṣvapi pratiṣedhaḥ ।
analyzed: atha sāmānyam abhidhāya katham viśeṣe vartate sūtra virodhāt na sūtra artha aparijñānāt tathā ca sūtrasya arthaḥ śabdaḥ hi ekadā viśeṣaṇam pratipādya punar viśeṣaṇam na pratipādayati iti viramya vyāpāraḥ niṣiddhaḥ na punar viśeṣaṇam pratipādya viśeṣyam na abhidhatte iti tathā karma vibhāgam kṛtvā uttara saṃyogam karoti akṛta saṃyogasya vināśa abhāvāt na ca vibhāgam kṛtvā saṃyogam karoti iti viramya vyāpāra pratiṣedhaḥ tathā vibhā

original: nanūktaṃ kṣīṇaśaktirviśeṣaṇe iti, “viśeṣyaṃ nābhidadhyāt” iti tāvacchakteḥ kāryaviṣayatvāt । kāryañca viśeṣaṇapratipattivad viśeṣyapratipattilakṣaṇamupalabhyamānaṃ śaktervyavasthāpakam । atha kāryasyaivābhāvaṃ brūyāt ? sa caivaṃ bruvāṇaḥ svasaṃvedanamapi bādhate, viśeṣyapratipatteḥ saṃvedanāt । bhinnajñānālambanayośca viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvapakṣe codyaṃ naikajñānālambane iti । samānañcaitadupalabhyamānasya śabdasyārthapratipādakatvābhyupagamāt । svātmapratipattau ca kṣīṇatvāt sāmānyapratipādakatvaṃ na syāt । atha sāmānyapratipatterdṛṣṭatvānna tatra śabdaśakteḥ prakṣayaḥ ? tarhi viśeṣapratipatterapi dṛṣṭatvānna śaktiprakṣayaḥ । arthapratipādanārthaśca śabdaprayoga iti ।
analyzed: nanu uktam kṣīṇa śaktiḥ viśeṣaṇe iti viśeṣyam na abhidadhyāt iti tāvat śakteḥ kārya viṣaya tvāt kāryam ca viśeṣaṇa pratipatti vat viśeṣya pratipatti lakṣaṇam upalabhyamānam śakteḥ vyavasthāpakam  atha kāryasya eva abhāvam brūyāt sa ca evam bruvāṇaḥ sva saṃvedanam api bādhate viśeṣya pratipatteḥ saṃvedanāt bhinna jñāna ālambanayoḥ ca viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva pakṣe codyam na eka jñāna ālambane iti samānam ca etat upalabhyamānas

original: yaccoktaṃ śabdasāmānyapratipattyanyathānupapattyā viśeṣādhyavasāye pravṛttinivṛttī syātāmiti । tatra kiṃ sāmānyamātrapratipattyanyathānupapattyā viśeṣāvabodhaḥ; tadviśeṣapratipattyanyathānupapattyā vā ? yadi sāmānyamātrapratipattyanyathānupapattyā ? tathā sati sāmānyamātrapratipattau viśeṣamātrapratipattiriti pravṛttyabhāvaḥ । atha viśiṣṭasāmānyapratipattyanyathānupapattyā ? sa tarhi viśeṣapratipanno viśeṣaṇamiti śabdādeva pratīyate ।
analyzed: yat ca uktam śabda sāmānya pratipatti anyathā anupapattyā viśeṣa adhyavasāye pravṛtti nivṛttī syātām iti tatra kim sāmānya mātra pratipatti anyathā anupapattyā viśeṣa avabodhaḥ tad viśeṣa pratipatti anyathā anupapattyā vā yadi sāmānya mātra pratipatti anyathā anupapattyā tathā sati sāmānya mātra pratipattau viśeṣa mātra pratipattiḥ iti pravṛtti abhāvaḥ atha viśiṣṭa sāmānya pratipatti anyathā anupapattyā sa tarhi viśeṣa pratipannaḥ viśeṣa

original: atha pramāṇāntarāditi yadi śabdāt ? kathaṃ sāmānyameva śabdārthaḥ, viśeṣasyāpyabhidhāyakatvāt । atha pramāṇāntaram ? na vā<?>, pramāṇāntaravyāpārānanubhavāt । na ca <I,060> sāmānyaṃ parapakṣe viśeṣād bhinnaṃ sambhavatītyabhede sāmānyapratipattivad viśeṣapratipattiprasaṅgaḥ । anyathā hi etatpratipattāvitarapratipatterbhedaḥ । atha iṣyata eva kenacidrūpeṇa abhinnaṃ bhinnañceti । na । bhedābhedayorvidhipratiṣedharūpatvād abhinne dharmiṇyasambhavaḥ । tathā hi kiṃ yena rūpeṇa bhinnaṃ tenaiva rūpeṇābhinnamuta rūpāntareṇeti vācyam । yadi deśabhedāpekṣayā bhinnaṃ rūpabhedena tvabhinnamityavipratipattiḥ । paro vibhinnadeśabhedāpekṣayā bhedaṃ pratipadyata iti ।

analyzed: atha anugata vyāvṛtta ātma tayā pratibhāsāt vastu bodha ātmaka tvam tat asat anugata sāmānya sambandhāt anugatam sva rūpeṇa tu vyāvṛttam iti iṣyate eva dvi rūpatā  na ca ekatve tādātmye sati dvi rūpa tā upapadyate iti samavāya lakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ bhyupagantavyaḥ sva rūpa bhedena tu bhede samavāyam vinā niyata viśeṣeṇa vyapadeśa anupapattiḥ pṛthivyāḥ pṛthivī tvam ityādi sambandham vinā yāvat pṛthivyāḥ vyapadiśyate tad avasthā antareṇa kasmā

original: tathā “śaktayaḥ sarvabhāvānāṃ kāryārthāpattigocarāḥ” <ślo. vā., śūnya. ślo. 254> iti tannirāsaḥ । yat pṛthivītvābhisambandhāt pṛthivī kāryaṃ karotīti pṛthivītvameva nijā śaktiranyā tu caramasahakārirūpā, tatsadbhāve kāryakaraṇāt tadabhāve cākaraṇāditi । tathā hi, vidyamānā api tantavaḥ kāryaṃ nārabhante 'ntyatantusaṃyogaṃ vineti saiva śaktiḥ । atha arthāntaramarthāntarasya kathaṃ śaktiḥ ? anarthāntaratve 'pi samānametat । saiva tasyaiva śaktiriti । atha yadi pūrveṣāṃ caramasahakāryeva śaktistasyāpyaśaktasyākāraṇatvādanyā śaktirvācyetyanavasthā । naitadevam । caramasya hi sahakāriṇaḥ pūrvasahakāriṇa eva śaktiḥ, itaretarābhisambandhena kāryakaraṇāt । sa eva ca samagrāṇāṃ bhāvaḥ sāmagrīti bhāvapratyayenocyate, tena hi satā samagravyapadeśadarśanāt ।

original: nanu yadi atīndriyā śaktirneṣyate, maṇimantrādinā tarhi pratibaddho 'gnirna sphoṭādikāryamārabhata iti kasya pratibandhaḥ ? na cāgneḥ, na cāgnisaṃyogasya upalabhyamānatvā<I,061>diti śakteḥ pratibandhaḥ । tadasat । maṇimantrādipratibandhakābhāvasyāpi kāryotpattau sahakāritvāt । tadabhāve tu na kāryasyodaya iti tadviśiṣṭasaṃyoga eva śaktiḥ । na punaḥ śakteḥ pratibandho nānutpattirvināśo vā sambhavatīti । cirotpannatvād vinaṣṭāyāśca punarutpattikāraṇābhāvādanutpattiprasaṅgaḥ । aśaktasya kāryānutpādakatvādityanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ pratibandhakābhāvaviśiṣṭo 'gnisaṃyoga evāgniśaktiriti jñātam । evamatrāpi pṛthivītvaṃ nijā śaktiraparā tu sahakāribhūteti ।
analyzed: nanu yadi atīndriyā śaktiḥ na iṣyate maṇi mantra ādinā tarhi pratibaddhaḥ gniḥ na sphoṭa ādi kāryam ārabhate iti kasya pratibandhaḥ na ca agneḥ na ca agni saṃyogasya śakteḥ pratibandhaḥ tat asat maṇi mantra ādi pratibandhaka abhāvasya api kārya utpattau sahakāri tvāt tad abhāve tu na kāryasya udayaḥ iti tad viśiṣṭa saṃyogaḥ eva śaktiḥ na punar śakteḥ pratibandhaḥ na anutpattiḥ vināśaḥ vā sambhavati iti cira utpanna tvāt vinaṣṭāyāḥ c

original: tathā ca rūparasagandhasparśavatī pṛthivī <vai. sū. 2.1.1> ityanena viśeṣaguṇāścatvāro 'bhihitāḥ । “tathā cākṣuṣavacanāt”(*) iti । saṃkhyāḥ, parimāṇāni, pṛthaktvam, saṃyogavibhāgau, paratvāparatve, karma ca rūpidravyasamavāyāccākṣuṣāṇi <vai. sū. 4.1.12> iti sūtraṃ darśayati ।
analyzed: tathā ca rūpa rasa gandha sparśavatī pṛthivī vai sū iti anena viśeṣa guṇāḥ catvāraḥ bhihitāḥ tathā cākṣuṣa vacanāt iti saṃkhyāḥ parimāṇāni pṛthaktvam saṃyoga vibhāgau paratva aparatve karma ca rūpi dravya samavāyāt cākṣuṣāṇi vai sū iti sūtram darśayati

original: sūtrasyārthaḥ - rūpidravyamupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ mahattvādyupetam, tatra samavāyāt saṃkhyādayaśca pratyakṣagrāhyā iti, anyapareṇāpi sūtreṇa rūpavati dravye saṃkhyādīnāṃ sadbhāvo 'bhihitaḥ । anyathā hyavidyamānatvādev tatra teṣāmupalambho na syāditi ।
analyzed: sūtrasya arthaḥ rūpi dravyam upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam mahā tva ādi upetam tatra samavāyāt saṃkhyā ādayaḥ ca pratyakṣa grāhyāḥ iti anya pareṇa api sūtreṇa rūpavati dravye saṃkhyā ādīnām sadbhāvaḥ bhihitaḥ anyathā hi avidyamāna tvāt eva tatra teṣām upalambhaḥ na syāt iti

original: padārthaśca saṃkhyā iti bahuvacanaṃ saṃkhyātvavyatirekeṇaikatvatvādyaparasāmānyapradarśanārtham । parimāṇānīti । tathā parimāṇatvāpekṣayāṇutvādyaparasāmānyajñāpanārtham । pṛthaktvamityekavacanaṃ pṛthaktvatvasāmānyāpekṣayā ekapṛthaktvatvādyaparasāmānyaśūnyatāpradarśanārtham । saṃyogavibhāgāviti dvivacanena saṃyogatvavibhāgatvavyatirekeṇa aparasāmānyābhāve 'pi vibhāgasya saṃyogāpekṣitājñāpanārthaṃ samāsakaraṇam । tathā paratvāparatve ityapi dvivacanaṃ para(tva)〈tvā〉para(tva)〈tvaṃ 〉sāmānyāpekṣayā aparasāmānyābhāve 'pi sāhacaryajñāpanārthaṃ samāsakaraṇamiti ।

original: atha viruddhānāṃ nīlādīnāṃ kathamekarūpārambhakatvam ? yathā śuklānāmiti । yathā hi bahūni śuklarūpāṇi ekaṃ śuklarūpamārabhanta ityupalabdhaṃ tathā nīlādīnāmapi citrarūpārambhakatvaṃ dṛṣṭatvādabhyupagantavyam । atha citraśabdasya nānāparyāyatvād ekaṃ citrañca itīdameva citramāścaryamiti । tadasat ? yathā nānārūpeṣu citravyapadeśaḥ “citrāstantavo nīlādirūpasambandhinaḥ” iti, tathā tadārabdhe 'pi paṭe citravyapadeśaḥ “citraḥ paṭaḥ” iti “citraṃ rūpamasya” iti । na cāvaśyaṃ nānārūpasambandhiṣvapi paṭādiṣu citravyapadeśo dṛṣṭaḥ । nānārūpaistu kāraṇairārabdhe 'vaśyaṃ bhavatīti ।
analyzed: atha viruddhānām nīla ādīnām katham eka rūpa ārambhaka tvam yathā śuklānām iti yathā hi bahūni śukla rūpāṇi ekam śukla rūpam ārabhante iti upalabdham tathā nīla ādīnām api citra rūpa ārambhaka tvam dṛṣṭa tvāt abhyupagantavyam atha citra śabdasya nānā paryāya tvāt ekam citram ca iti idam eva citram āścaryam iti tat asat yathā nānā rūpeṣu citra vyapadeśaḥ citrāḥ tantavaḥ nīla ādi rūpa sambandhinaḥ iti tathā tad ārabdhe pi paṭe citra vyapadeśa

original: athaikatvāccitrarūpasya ekāvayavasahite 'pyavayavinyupalabdhe śeṣāvayavāvaraṇe vicitrapratibhāsaḥ syāt ? na । sahakāryabhāvāt । tathā hyavayaveṣu nānārūpopalambhasahakārīndriyamavayavini citrapratibhāsaṃ janayatītyanvayavyatirekābhyāmupalabdham, tena śeṣāvayavāvaraṇe tadrūpāṇāmagrahaṇādavayavini citrapratibhāsābhāvaḥ । na cāpratibhāsādekāntenāsattvaṃ sahakāryabhāvenāpyanupalambhāt ।
analyzed: atha eka tvāt citra rūpasya eka avayava sahite pi avayavini upalabdhe śeṣa avayava āvaraṇe vicitra pratibhāsaḥ syāt na sahakāri abhāvāt tathā hi avayaveṣu nānā rūpa upalambha sahakāri indriyam avayavini citra pratibhāsam janayati iti anvaya vyatirekābhyām upalabdham tena śeṣa avayava āvaraṇe tad rūpāṇām agrahaṇāt avayavini citra pratibhāsa abhāvaḥ na ca apratibhāsāt ekāntena asattvam sahakāri abhāvena api anupalambhāt

original: yacca rūpamātramupalambhānyathānupapattyā jñāyata iti kaiściduktaṃ tatrāpi na doṣo vipratipadyamānasyānumānopanyāsāt । tathā hi, śuklādiviśeṣavyatiriktaṃ citraṃ rūpaṃ <I,066> kṣitau vidyamānamapi vaijātyād yo na manyate taṃ pratyanumānaṃ kṣiterupalambhād rūpa〈va〉ttvaṃ vijñāyata iti, cakṣuṣopalambhācca । siddhe rūpavattve śuklādiśabdairvyapadeśāsambhavāccitraśabdenābhidhīyata iti siddham ।
analyzed: yat ca rūpa mātram upalambha anyathā anupapattyā jñāyate iti kaiścid uktam tatra api na doṣaḥ vipratipadyamānasya anumāna upanyāsāt  tathā hi śukla ādi viśeṣa vyatiriktam citram rūpam kṣitau vidyamānam api vaijātyāt yaḥ na manyate tam prati anumānam kṣiteḥ upalambhāt rūpavat tvam vijñāyate iti cakṣuṣā upalambhāt ca siddhe rūpavat tve śukla ādi śabdaiḥ vyapadeśa asambhavāt citra śabdena abhidhīyate iti siddham

original: etena raso vyākhyātaḥ । rasaḥ ṣaḍvidho madhurādiḥ kṣitāveva । vyaktibhedena ekasyāñca vyaktāviti । tathā caikasyāmapi harītakyāmupalabhyate ṣaḍvidho rasa iti । ata eva ṣaḍbhedasyānyatrānupalambhād itarebhyo bhedakatvam ।
analyzed: etena rasaḥ vyākhyātaḥ rasaḥ ṣaḍvidhaḥ madhura ādiḥ kṣitau eva vyakti bhedena ekasyām ca vyaktau iti tathā ca ekasyām api harītakyām upalabhyate ṣaḍvidhaḥ rasaḥ iti atas eva ṣaṣ bhedasya anyatra anupalambhāt itarebhyaḥ bhedaka tvam

original: tathā gandho dvividhaḥ surabhirasurabhiśca । ekasyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ vyaktibhedena 〈ekasyāṃ〉 ceti pūrvavat । atha surabhigandhābhāva evāsurabhiriti vyavahārasambhavād gandhasya dvaividhyamanupapannam ? na । ubhayostīvratarādibhedabhinnatvāt । yathā hi surabhigandhe tīvratarādivyavahārastathā asurabhigandhe 'pīti । surabhigandhābhāve ca etannopapannam, abhāvasya niratiśayatvāditi ।
analyzed: tathā gandhaḥ dvividhaḥ surabhiḥ asurabhiḥ ca ekasyām pṛthivyām vyakti bhedena ekasyām ca iti pūrvavat  atha surabhi gandha abhāvaḥ eva asurabhiḥ iti vyavahāra sambhavāt gandhasya dvaividhyam anupapannam na ubhayoḥ tīvratara ādi bheda bhinna tvāt yathā hi surabhi gandhe tīvratara ādi vyavahāraḥ tathā asurabhi gandhe pi iti surabhi gandha abhāve ca etat na upapannam abhāvasya niratiśaya tvāt iti

original: sparśo 'syāḥ pṛthivyā anuṣṇāśītatve sati pākajaḥ । anuṣṇa iti uṣṇasparśavyavacchedārtham । aśīta iti śītāt, pākaja iti vāyavīyāt । atha pākajo 'gnisaṃyogaja ityukte na vyabhicāro 'stīti kimarthamanuṣṇāśītagrahaṇamiti cet, svarūpakathanārtham ।
analyzed: sparśaḥ syāḥ pṛthivyāḥ anuṣṇa aśīta tve sati pāka jaḥ anuṣṇaḥ iti uṣṇa sparśa vyavaccheda artham aśītaḥ iti śītāt pāka jaḥ iti vāyavīyāt atha pāka jaḥ gni saṃyoga jaḥ iti ukte na vyabhicāraḥ sti iti kimartham anuṣṇa aśīta grahaṇam iti ced svarūpa kathana artham

original: anye tu (kila) pākādagneruṣṇasparśo bhavatīti anuṣṇagrahaṇam । aśītagrahaṇameva tu svarūpārthamiti ।
analyzed: anye tu kila pākāt agneḥ uṣṇa sparśaḥ bhavati iti anuṣṇa grahaṇam aśīta grahaṇam eva tu svarūpa artham iti

original: atha rūpādīnāmiva vailakṣaṇyāpratibhāsanānna pākajatvaṃ sparśasya । tanna । pratyakṣeṇa vailakṣaṇyāpratītāvapyanumānena pākajatvaprasiddheḥ । tathā ca pārthivasparśaḥ, pākajaḥ, pārthivaviśeṣaguṇatvāt, tadgatarūpādivaditi ।
analyzed: atha rūpa ādīnām iva vailakṣaṇya apratibhāsanāt na pāka ja tvam sparśasya  tat na pratyakṣeṇa vailakṣaṇya apratītau api anumānena pāka ja tva prasiddheḥ tathā ca pārthiva sparśaḥ pāka jaḥ pārthiva viśeṣa guṇa tvāt tad gata rūpa ādi vat iti

original: nanvevaṃ sāmānyaguṇānāmapi pākajatvaprasaṅgaḥ pārthivaguṇatvād rūpavaditi । naitad yuktam । sāmānyaguṇānāṃ pakṣīkaraṇe 'gnisaṃyogenaivānekāntaḥ । tathā hi, pārthivaparamāṇāvagnisaṃyogo 'gnisaṃyogajo na bhavati pārthivaguṇaśceti । na caivaṃ pārthivaviśeṣaguṇatvaṃ vyabhicaratīti । sapakṣaikadeśe vartamānasyātyantaṃ vipakṣād vyāvṛttergamakatvameva । na ca pakṣe pratyakṣāgamābhyāṃ virudhyata iti na kālātyayāpadiṣṭaḥ । na ca prakaraṇasamaḥ tattvānupalabdheraprayojakatvāt । ataḥ pākajasparśādikāraṇatvād itarebhyo bhidyate pṛthivīti ।
analyzed: nanu evam sāmānya guṇānām api pāka ja tva prasaṅgaḥ pārthiva guṇa tvāt rūpa vat iti na etat yuktam sāmānya guṇānām pakṣīkaraṇe gni saṃyogena eva anekāntaḥ tathā hi pārthiva paramāṇau agni saṃyogaḥ gni saṃyoga jaḥ na bhavati pārthiva guṇaḥ ca iti na ca evam pārthiva viśeṣa guṇa tvam vyabhicarati iti sapakṣa eka deśe vartamānasya atyantam vipakṣāt vyāvṛtteḥ gamaka tvam eva na ca pakṣe pratyakṣa āgamābhyām virudhyate iti na kāla atyay

original: samānānāṃ bhāvaḥ sāmānyam bhedādhiṣṭhānamato bhedamāha “sā tu dvividhā”(*) iti । sā tu pṛthivī dvividhā । kena rūpeṇetyāha “nityā cānityā ca”(*) । nityā paramāṇulakṣaṇā paramāṇusvabhāvā । kāryalakṣaṇā kāryasvabhāvā tvanityeti bhedaḥ । bhede ca sati sāmānyalakṣaṇamupapadyata ityasambhavitvāśaṅkāvyudāsaḥ ।
analyzed: samānānām bhāvaḥ sāmānyam bheda adhiṣṭhānam atas bhedam āha sā tu dvividhā iti sā tu pṛthivī dvividhā kena rūpeṇa iti āha nityā ca anityā ca nityā paramāṇu lakṣaṇā paramāṇu svabhāvā kārya lakṣaṇā kārya svabhāvā tu anityā iti bhedaḥ bhede ca sati sāmānya lakṣaṇam upapadyate iti asambhavi tva āśaṅkā vyudāsaḥ

original: sarvasya kāryasya vināśe samavāyikāraṇābhāvāt punarutpattirna syādityāśaṅkānirāsārthañca vākyam “sā tu dvividhā nityā cānityā ca”(*) | anityāyāśca nāśe nityā punardvyaṇukādiprakrameṇa svargādau kāryamārabhata iti siddham ।
analyzed: sarvasya kāryasya vināśe samavāyi kāraṇa abhāvāt punarutpattiḥ na syāt iti āśaṅkā nirāsa artham ca vākyam sā tu dvividhā nityā ca anityā ca  / anityāyāḥ ca nāśe nityā punar dvyaṇuka ādi prakrameṇa svarga ādau kāryam ārabhate iti siddham

original: kathaṃ punaḥ paramāṇusvabhāvā pṛthivī jñāyata ityāśaṅkyāha “kāryalakṣaṇā”(*) । kāryeṇa lakṣyate jñāyata iti । tathā hi kāryaṃ samavāyikāraṇapūrvakaṃ tatkāraṇamapi anyasamavāyikāraṇajanyamiti yāvadādyaṃ kāryaṃ tadapi samavāyikāraṇajanyamiti । tajjanakāḥ paramāṇavaḥ । tathā kāryādalpaparimāṇaṃ samavāyikāraṇam । tasyāpyanyadalpaparimāṇamityādyaṃ kāryaṃ niratiśayāṇuparimāṇairārabdhamiti jñāyate ।
analyzed: katham punar paramāṇu svabhāvā pṛthivī jñāyate iti āśaṅkya āha kārya lakṣaṇā kāryeṇa lakṣyate jñāyate iti tathā hi kāryam samavāyi kāraṇa pūrvakam tat kāraṇam api anya samavāyi kāraṇa janyam iti yāvat ādyam kāryam tat api samavāyi kāraṇa janyam iti tad janakāḥ paramāṇavaḥ tathā kāryāt alpa parimāṇam samavāyi kāraṇam tasya api anyat alpa parimāṇam iti ādyam kāryam niratiśaya aṇu parimāṇaiḥ ārabdham iti jñāyate

original: atha tadavayavānāmapi paryavasānaṃ neṣyate nityakāraṇānabhyupagamāt । tarhi kāryasyākasmikasyāsambhavāt tatkāraṇe 'pyanyaṃ samavāyikāraṇamityanavasthāyāṃ kāryadravyasyālpatarādibhedo na syāt । tathā hi, alpakāraṇārabdhamalpaṃ bhūyaḥkāraṇārabdhaṃ 〈mahad〉 iti dṛṣṭam । na ca kāryadravyasya nityakāraṇānabhyupagamenānavasthāyāmetadupapadyate, sarvasyāpi anantakāraṇajanyatvāviśeṣāditi । yathā anantakāraṇairārabdhā golakarūpā pṛthivī tathā ghaṭādikāryamapītyekākāratāprasaṅgaḥ । na ca saṃkhyāpalaparimāṇairekākāratopalabdhā ghaṭāderbhinnaparimāṇatvāt bhinnapalatvācceti । tathā hi kiñciddhīnaṃ pañcapalamadhikatarañca daśapalaṃ samānakāraṇairārabdhaṃ bahubhiśceti vaicitryam । taccānavasthāyāṃ na syāt ।
analyzed: atha tad avayavānām api paryavasānam na iṣyate nitya kāraṇa anabhyupagamāt tarhi kāryasya ākasmikasya asambhavāt tad kāraṇe pi anyam samavāyi kāraṇam iti anavasthāyām kārya dravyasya alpatara ādi bhedaḥ na syāt tathā hi alpa kāraṇa ārabdham alpam bhūyaḥ kāraṇa ārabdham mahat iti dṛṣṭam na ca kārya dravyasya nitya kāraṇa anabhyupagamena anavasthāyām etat upapadyate sarvasya api ananta kāraṇa janya tva aviśeṣāt iti yathā ananta kāraṇaiḥ ārabdhā

original: na ca nityānabhyupagame pralayāvasthāyāṃ sarvasya kāryadravyasya vināśe punarutpattirbhavet, abhāvasya samavāyikāraṇatvābhāvāditi । yathā ca pralayāvasthāyāṃ sambhavati tathā ca vakṣyāmo bhūtaparīkṣāyāmiti । ato nānavasthā vyāvartanīyā । paṭādikāraṇakāraṇānāmalpatarādibhāvenāvasthitānāmādikāryamabhyupagantavyam ।
analyzed: na ca nitya anabhyupagame pralaya avasthāyām sarvasya kārya dravyasya vināśe punarutpattiḥ bhavet abhāvasya samavāyi kāraṇa tva abhāvāt iti yathā ca pralaya avasthāyām sambhavati tathā ca vakṣyāmaḥ bhūta parīkṣāyām iti atas nā anavasthā vyāvartanīyā paṭa ādi kāraṇa kāraṇānām alpatara ādi bhāvena avasthitānām ādi kāryam abhyupagantavyam

original: tadādyaṃ kāryaṃ samavāyikāraṇajanyaṃ kāryatvāt, yad yat kāryaṃ tattat samavāyikāraṇajanyaṃ yathā paṭādi, tathā caitat kāryam, tasmāt samavāyikāraṇajanyamiti । <I,068> na ca kāryatvamabhāvena vyabhicaratīti vācyam । svakāraṇasattāsambandharūpatvāt kāryatvasya । tathā ghaṭādikāraṇakāraṇeṣvalpatarādibhāvaḥ kvacid viśrāntastaratamaśabdavācyatvād mahāparimāṇavat । yatra viśrāntāste paramāṇava iti ।
analyzed: tad ādyam kāryam samavāyi kāraṇa janyam kārya tvāt yat yat kāryam tat tat samavāyi kāraṇa janyam yathā paṭa ādi tathā ca etat kāryam tasmāt samavāyi kāraṇa janyam iti  / na ca kāryatvam abhāvena vyabhicarati iti vācyam sva kāraṇa sattā sambandha rūpa tvāt kārya tvasya tathā ghaṭa ādi kāraṇa kāraṇeṣu alpatara ādi bhāvaḥ kvacid viśrāntaḥ taratama śabda vācya tvāt mahā parimāṇa vat yatra viśrāntāḥ te paramāṇavaḥ iti

original: atha sāvayavāḥ paramāṇavo mūrtatvād ghaṭavat, ṣaṭkena yugapat sambadhyamānatvāt, tathā pūrvabhāgo 'parabhāga iti digupalakṣitairdeśairvyapadiśyamānatvāt, sāvayavakāryārambhakatvācca tantvādivaditi ।
analyzed: atha sa avayavāḥ paramāṇavaḥ mūrta tvāt ghaṭa vat ṣaṭkena yugapad sambadhyamāna tvāt tathā para bhāgaḥ iti diś upalakṣitaiḥ deśaiḥ vyapadiśyamāna tvāt sa avayava kārya ārambhaka tvāt ca tantu ādi vat iti

original: sarvametadāśrayāsiddhaṃ paramāṇusadbhāvāsiddheḥ । atheṣyata eva paramāṇoḥ sadbhāvaḥ, tarhi paramāṇusadbhāvāvedakapramāṇasyābhyupagamāt tadviparītānumānaṃ nirviṣayatvādapramāṇamiti । abhedyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ pareṇābhyupagamāt tasyāniṣṭāpattiḥ kriyata iti prasaṅgasādhanam । tatra yadi pramāṇenābhyupagatāḥ pareṇa paramāṇavastasya prāmāṇyābhyupagame 'nutthānaṃ viparītānumānasya । athāpramāṇāt, evaṃ tarhi tasyāpramāṇatayā paramāṇusadbhāvo na sidhyatīti kimanumānopanyāsenāśrayāsiddhatāprasaṅgāt ।
analyzed: sarvam etat āśraya asiddham paramāṇu sadbhāva asiddheḥ atha iṣyate eva paramāṇoḥ sadbhāvaḥ tarhi paramāṇu sadbhāva āvedaka pramāṇasya abhyupagamāt tad viparīta anumānam nirviṣaya tvāt apramāṇam iti abhedyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ pareṇa abhyupagamāt tasya aniṣṭa āpattiḥ kriyate iti prasaṅga sādhanam tatra yadi pramāṇena abhyupagatāḥ pareṇa paramāṇavaḥ tasya prāmāṇya abhyupagame nu tthānam viparīta anumānasya atha apramāṇāt evam tarhi tasy

original: tathā paramāṇavaḥ sāvayavāśceti pratijñāvākye padayorvirodhaḥ । tathā hi, paramāṇuśabdasya niratiśayāṇuvācitvam, sāvayavatve vā avayavāpekṣayādhikaparimāṇatvamiti virodhaḥ । na ca samānādhikaparimāṇatve samavāyikāraṇatvamiti tadavayavāḥ paramāṇavaḥ । teṣāmapi sāvayavatve tadavayavāḥ, teṣāmapi sāvayavatve tadavayavā ityanavasthāyāmuktaṃ dūṣaṇamalpatarādibhedānupapattiriti ।
analyzed: tathā paramāṇavaḥ sa avayavāḥ ca iti pratijñā vākye padayoḥ virodhaḥ tathā hi paramāṇu śabdasya niratiśaya aṇu vāci tvam sāvayava tve vā avayava apekṣayā adhika parimāṇa tvam iti virodhaḥ na ca samāna adhika parimāṇa tve samavāyi kāraṇa tvam iti tad avayavāḥ paramāṇavaḥ teṣām api sāvayava tve tad avayavāḥ teṣām api sāvayava tve tad avayavāḥ iti anavasthāyām uktam dūṣaṇam alpatara ādi bheda anupapattiḥ iti

original: atha mā bhūdanavastheti niravayavāḥ paramāṇavo 'bhyupagamyante pramāṇataḥ, tarhi tena bādhyamānatvāt sāvayavatvānumānamapramāṇamiti ।
analyzed: atha mā bhūt anavasthā iti niravayavāḥ paramāṇavaḥ bhyupagamyante pramāṇataḥ tarhi tena bādhyamāna tvāt sāvayava tva anumānam apramāṇam iti

original: atha niravayavatvādaṇūnāṃ ṣaṭkena yogo digdeśavyapadeśaśca na syāt । na । anyathāpi bhāvāt । tathā hi, saṃyogasyāvyāpyavṛttitayā pūrvottarādidigvyavasthite yugapat sambandhe 'pi na sāvayavatvam । evaṃ pūrvabhāgo 'parabhāga iti yadyasti vyapadeśaḥ so 'pi mukhye bādhakopapatterbhākto draṣṭavyaḥ, avyāpyavṛttisaṃyogādhāratvasāmānyāditi ।
analyzed: atha niravayava tvāt aṇūnām ṣaṭkena yogaḥ diś deśa vyapadeśaḥ ca na syāt na anyathā api bhāvāt tathā hi saṃyogasya avyāpya vṛtti tayā pūrva uttara ādi diś vyavasthite yugapad sambandhe na sāvayavatvam evam para bhāgaḥ iti yadi asti vyapadeśaḥ saḥ pi mukhye bādhaka upapatteḥ bhāktaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ avyāpya vṛtti saṃyoga ādhāra tva sāmānyāt iti

original: yacca sāvayavārambhakatvaṃ (tatra)<?>〈tacca〉 yadi sahāvayavairārambhakatvaṃ tadasiddhaṃ niravayavatvāt ।
analyzed: yat ca sa avayava ārambhaka tvam tatra tat ca yadi saha avayavaiḥ ārambhaka tvam tat asiddham niravayava tvāt

original: bhedamāha “sā ca dvividhā, nityā anityā ca”(*) nityā pṛthivī nīrūpatayā anityāto bhidyate 'nityā tu nityātaścetyavāntarabhedādeva bhedaḥ । atha teṣāmapi viśeṣāntarād bhedābhyupagame 'navasthetyuktam । tadasat । tatrāpyasādhāraṇadharmasyāsādhāraṇadharmād bhedābhyupagame 'pi jātiguṇakriyādirūpatayā ṣaṭsvevāntarbhāvādanavasthāyāmapyadoṣaḥ । vyāvṛttasvarūpaṃ padārthānāṃ nirvikalpakajñāne pratibhāsata ityuktottarametat ।

original: yad vā lakṣaṇena lakṣyamāṇasyaikānekatvopalabdheḥ saṃśaye sati tannirāsārthaṃ vākyam । “sā tu dvividhā”(*) iti । naikatvamākāśasyeva 〈iti〉 vipratipattinirāsārtham ।

original: kāryalakṣaṇāyā dharmāntaraṃ nirūpayati “sā ca sthairyādyavayavasanniveśaviśiṣṭā”(*) iti । sthirāyā bhāvaḥ sthairyam, tadādiryeṣāṃ mṛdutvakaṭhinatvādīnāṃ te sthairyādayaste cāvayavānāṃ sanniveśaśca racanāviśeṣastairviśiṣṭeti ।
analyzed: kārya lakṣaṇāyāḥ dharma antaram nirūpayati sā ca sthairya ādi avayava sanniveśa viśiṣṭā iti sthirāyāḥ bhāvaḥ sthairyam tad ādiḥ yeṣām mṛdu tva kaṭhina tva ādīnām te sthairya ādayaḥ te ca avayavānām sanniveśaḥ ca racanā viśeṣaḥ taiḥ viśiṣṭā iti

original: gurutvavidhārakasyāsambhavāt sarvadā patanaṃ kṣitau vidyamānamapi pūrvaparabhāgādavadhāraṇānnopalabhyata iti digvāsasāṃ matam, tannirasyate । sthairyapadena sthairyaṃ sthiratvamapāta iti yāvat । yadi punaḥ pātaḥ syād gurutvātiśayena pātātiśayopalabdheḥ kṣiteratiśayena pātādupari kṣiptasya loṣṭāderbhūmisambandho na syāt । tathā hi, loṣṭasya yāvadupari gamanaṃ punarmandamāgamanaṃ tāvat kṣiteḥ śīghrapātitayā yojanaśatādivyavadhānaṃ syāditi sambandhābhāvaḥ । dṛṣṭastu sambandha iti jñāyate na patanaṃ kṣiteriti । ata eva apatanānyathānupapattyā jñāyate gurutvavidhārakaṃ kiñcidastīti । anyathā hi gurutvavidhārakābhāve pāto 'vaśyaṃ syāditi । sa tu na bhavatīti pratibandho 'numīyate । atra hi guruṇo dravyasya <I,070> pratibandhakatve tasyāpi gurutvayogitayā pātaḥ syāditi vāyormahataḥ pratibandhakatvam । dṛṣṭaṃ hyalpīyaso 'pi vāyorupari parṇādivyavasthāpane gurutvavidhārakatvam । pṛthivīpratibandhakastvādisṛṣṭāvutpanno 'tiśayena mahān vāyuḥ pṛthivīmudakādisahitāṃ tṛṇamiva dhārayate ।
analyzed: guru tva vidhārakasya asambhavāt sarvadā patanam kṣitau vidyamānam api pūrva para bhāgāt avadhāraṇāt na upalabhyate iti digvāsasām matam tat nirasyate sthairya padena sthairyam sthira tvam apātaḥ iti yāvat yadi punar pātaḥ syāt guru tva atiśayena pāta atiśaya upalabdheḥ kṣiteḥ atiśayena pātāt upari kṣiptasya loṣṭa ādeḥ bhūmi sambandhaḥ na syāt tathā hi loṣṭasya yāvat upari gamanam punar mandam āgamanam tāvat kṣiteḥ śīghra pāti tayā yojana śat

original: tathā sthairyam, pṛthivyā akṣaṇikatvamiti, kṣaṇikatvāpākaraṇārthañca sthairyagrahaṇam । yathā ca kṣaṇikatvaṃ na sambhavati tathā vakṣyāma iti ।
analyzed: tathā sthairyam pṛthivyāḥ akṣaṇika tvam iti kṣaṇika tva apākaraṇa artham ca sthairya grahaṇam yathā ca kṣaṇika tvam na sambhavati tathā vakṣyāmaḥ iti

original: yetu niravayavāmakāryāñca pṛthivīṃ manyante tannirāsārthamavayavasanniveśaviśiṣṭeti । avayavā hi bhāgāste kṣitāvupalabhyante tatsanniveśo racanāviśeṣaḥ pratyakṣa iti । tathāvayavasanniveśaviśiṣṭatvācca kāryatvam । tathā hi, pṛthivī kāryā, avayavasanniveśaviśiṣṭatvāt, yad yadavayavasanniveśaviśiṣṭaṃ tattat kāryaṃ dṛṣṭam, yathā ghaṭādi, tathā cāvayavasanniveśaviśiṣṭā pṛthivī, tasmāt kāryeti ।
analyzed: ye tu niravayavām akāryām ca pṛthivīm manyante tad nirāsa artham avayava sanniveśa viśiṣṭā iti avayavāḥ hi bhāgāḥ te kṣitau upalabhyante tad sanniveśaḥ racanā viśeṣaḥ pratyakṣaḥ iti tathā avayava sanniveśa viśiṣṭa tvāt ca kārya tvam tathā hi pṛthivī kāryā avayava sanniveśa viśiṣṭa tvāt yat yat avayava sanniveśa viśiṣṭam tat tat kāryam dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭa ādi tathā ca avayava sanniveśa viśiṣṭā pṛthivī tasmāt kāryā iti

original: nanu kāryatve 'pyavayavasanniveśaviśiṣṭatvānupalabdherbuddhyādāvityaprayojakatvādapramāṇamiti jaiminīyāḥ । tadasat । sapakṣaikadeśavṛttergamakatvābhyupagamāt । tathā hi, yad yadavayavasanniveśavat tattat kāryaṃ dṛṣṭam । na punaryad yat kāryaṃ tattadavayavasanniveśavaditi brūmaḥ । na ca sapakṣaikadeśe vartamānasyāgamakatvam, dhūmānumānasyāgamakatvaprasaṅgāt । tathā hi, yadi dhūmavattvaprayuktaṃ syādagnimattvam antareṇa dhūmavattvamagnimattvaṃ na bhavediti । atha viṣamavyāptikatvād yo yo dhūmavān sa so 'gnimānityeva vyāptiḥ, na punaryo yo 'gnimān sa sa dhūmavānityevam । tarhyavayavasanniveśavattvasyāpi sapakṣaikadeśe vartamānasya nāprayojakatvam ।
analyzed: nanu kārya tve pi avayava sanniveśa viśiṣṭa tva anupalabdheḥ buddhi ādau iti aprayojaka tvāt apramāṇam iti jaiminīyāḥ tat asat sapakṣa eka deśa vṛtteḥ gamaka tva abhyupagamāt tathā hi yat yat avayava sanniveśavat tat tat kāryam dṛṣṭam na punar yat yat kāryam tat tat avayava sanniveśavat iti brūmaḥ na ca sapakṣa eka deśe vartamānasya agamaka tvam dhūma anumānasya agamaka tva prasaṅgāt tathā hi yadi dhūmavat tva prayuktam syāt agnimat tvam antareṇa dhūma

original: atha abhūtvā bhāvitvasyānupalabdherna kṣiteḥ kāryatvam । kimatra pratyakṣeṇānupalabdhiḥ ? athābhūtvā bhāvitvasyānumānena vā ? pratyakṣeṇānupalabdhau kasyacid ghaṭādau nopalabhyata ityakāryatāprasaṅgaḥ । atha tatrāpyabhūtvā bhāvitvamavayavasanniveśatvena jñāyata iti kṣitāvapyavayavasanniveśavattvenaivābhūtvā bhāvitvaṃ gamyata iti samānam । kāryatvena ca kartṛpūrvakatvaṃ gamyata iti vakṣyāmo bhūtaparīkṣāyām ।

original: tathā kāryalakṣaṇāyā dharmāntaramāha “aparajātibahutvopetā”(*) iti । aparā tu jātiḥ pṛthivītvāpekṣayā ghaṭatvapaṭatvādirūpā, tasyā bahutvamaparisaṃkhyātatvam, tadupetā tadyukteti । na caivaṃ paramāṇulakṣaṇe 'tivailakṣaṇyam ।
analyzed: tathā kārya lakṣaṇāyāḥ dharma antaram āha apara jāti bahutva upetā iti aparā tu jātiḥ pṛthivī tva apekṣayā ghaṭa tva paṭa tva ādi rūpā tasyāḥ bahu tvam aparisaṃkhyāta tvam tad upetā tad yuktā iti na ca evam paramāṇu lakṣaṇe ti vailakṣaṇyam

original: tathā kāryalakṣaṇāyāḥ kāryaṃ nirūpayati “śayanāsanādi”(*) । bhedenānekamupakāraṃ karotīti “anekopakārakarī ca”(*) । yadevārthakriyākāri tadeva paramārthasat, arthakriyāviraho hyabhāvalakṣaṇamiti darśanasya sattāsambandhena sattābhyupagame 'pyabhyupagamavādena nirāsārthaṃ caitad bhavatīti ।
analyzed: tathā kārya lakṣaṇāyāḥ kāryam nirūpayati śayana āsana ādi bhedena anekam upakāram karoti iti aneka upakāra karī ca  yat eva arthakriyā kāri tat eva paramārtha sat arthakriyā virahaḥ hi abhāva lakṣaṇam iti darśanasya sattā sambandhena sattā abhyupagame pi abhyupagama vādena nirāsa artham ca etat bhavati iti

original: pṛthivīkāryasyānantatvādaśakyaṃ tatparijñānaṃ mā bhūdityavāntarabhedena vaidharmyaṃ vīpsāyāṃ pratijñātamāha “trividhañcāsyāḥ kāryam”(*) iti । yathā hyevaṃbhūto dharmaḥ kāryaparamāṇurūpatayā nityānityabhedaḥ, kāryarūpāyāñca sthairyādidharmayogo 'parajātibahutvañcāsyāḥ pṛthivyāstathā trividhañca kāryamiti kṣiteḥ kāryasyānantye 'pi śarīrādirūpeṇa parasparaṃ vyāvṛttātmatayā trividhāvasthitasya tattvajñānaviṣayatvam । tathā hi, śarīramindriyaṃ viṣaya iti saṃjñā yasya tat “śarīrendriyaviṣayasaṃjñakam”(*) sarvaṃ kṣiteḥ kāryamiti jñeyam ।
analyzed: pṛthivī kāryasya ananta tvāt aśakyam tad parijñānam mā bhūt iti avāntarabhedena vaidharmyam vīpsāyām pratijñātam āha trividham ca asyāḥ kāryam iti yathā hi evaṃbhūtaḥ dharmaḥ kārya paramāṇu rūpatayā nitya anitya bhedaḥ kārya rūpāyām ca sthairya ādi dharma yogaḥ para jāti bahu tvam ca asyāḥ pṛthivyāḥ tathā trividham ca kāryam iti kṣiteḥ kāryasya ānantye śarīra ādi rūpeṇa parasparam vyāvṛtta ātmatayā trividha avasthitasya tattva jñāna

original: anye tvasyāḥ paramāṇulakṣaṇāyāstrividhaṃ kāryaṃ śarīrādirūpamiti manyante, vyavahitasyāpi idaṃśabdena kvacit parāmarśāditi ।
analyzed: anye tu asyāḥ paramāṇu lakṣaṇāyāḥ trividham kāryam śarīra ādi rūpam iti manyante vyavahitasya api idaṃśabdena kvacid parāmarśāt iti

original: tatra śarīrasyetarasmād vaidharmyamāha “śarīraṃ dvividham”(*) iti । viśeṣasya sāmānyāpekṣitvād viśeṣābhidhāne 'vaśyaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ vidyamānamantevāsinohyatāmityūhanaśakteḥ saṃvardhanāya na sāmānyalakṣaṇamavocat । tathā hi, śarīrābhidhāne śarīratvaṃ śarīravyavahārakāraṇaṃ jñāyata eva lakṣaṇamiti । tathecchānuvidhāyikriyāśrayatvaṃ narte śarīrāt sambhavatīti śarīravacanādarthāllabhyata iti svaśabdenāvacanam । granthādau tu śarīrādidvāreṇetyativyāptyabhāvaḥ ।
analyzed: tatra śarīrasya itarasmāt vaidharmyam āha śarīram dvividham iti viśeṣasya sāmānya apekṣi tvāt viśeṣa abhidhāne vaśyam sāmānya lakṣaṇam vidyamānam antevāsinā uhyatām iti ūhana śakteḥ saṃvardhanāya na sāmānya lakṣaṇam avocat tathā hi śarīra abhidhāne śarīra tvam śarīra vyavahāra kāraṇam jñāyate eva lakṣaṇam iti tathā icchā anuvidhāyi kriyā āśraya tvam na ṛte śarīrāt sambhavati iti śarīra vacanāt arthāt labhyate iti sva śabdena avacan

original: atha śarīratvaṃ sakalaśarīravyāpakatvād bhedāntarād vyāvṛtteśca yuktaṃ lakṣaṇam । na caivam icchānuvidhāyikriyāśrayatvam । tasya hi vipakṣād vyāvṛttasyāpi sataḥ pakṣe sarvatrāsambhavāt । tathā hi, mṛtādyavasthāyāmetanna sambhavatītyavyāpakam । atha jīvaccharīrasyaitallakṣaṇamiti cet, tanna । suptamūrchitādyavasthāyāmapyanupalabdheḥ । kathaṃ tarhīdaṃ lakṣaṇam ? yogyatāśrayaṇāt । tathā hi, śarīramitarasmād bhidyate sākṣādicchānuvidhāyikriyāśrayayogyatvāt śarīratvasambandhācca, yastvevaṃ na bhavati na cāsau sākṣādicchānuvidhāyikriyāśrayayogyaḥ śarīratvayuktaśca yathendriyādiriti ।
analyzed: atha śarīra tvam sakala śarīra vyāpaka tvāt bheda antarāt vyāvṛtteḥ ca yuktam lakṣaṇam na ca evam icchā anuvidhāyi kriyā āśraya tvam tasya hi vipakṣāt vyāvṛttasya api sataḥ pakṣe sarvatra asambhavāt tathā hi mṛta ādi avasthāyām etat na sambhavati iti avyāpakam atha jīvat śarīrasya etat lakṣaṇam iti ced tat na supta mūrchita ādi avasthāyām api anupalabdheḥ katham tarhi idam lakṣaṇam yogyatā āśrayaṇāt tathā hi śarīram itarasmāt bhidyate sāk

original: āmaraṇād yasya paṭutvāpaṭutvābhyāmindriyāṇāṃ paṭutvāpaṭutve taccharīramiti <I,072> kecit । tathā hi, auṣadhopayogādapīndriyeṣu paṭutvaṃ sambhavatītyāmaraṇāditi padam । tathā cāvyādhitasya śarīrapaṭutvenāmaraṇamindriyapaṭutvaṃ dṛṣṭam । vyādhitasya tvauṣadhopayogena vyādhyupaśame śarīrapaṭutvādevendriyapaṭutvamiti paśyāmaḥ । śarīrasyāpaṭutvādevendriyeṣu ca kācakāmalādidoṣāḥ sambhavantīti tatpaṭutvena vyāvṛtta iti ।

original: idānīmuddeśavata udakasya lakṣaṇaparīkṣārthamāha “aptvābhisambandhāt”(*) ityādiprakaraṇam । aptvenābhisambandho 'ptvenābhilakṣitaḥ sambandhaḥ samavāyo lakṣaṇamiti । tathā hyāpa itarasmād bhidyante 'ptvābhisambandhāt, ye tu na bhidyante na te aptvābhisambaddhāḥ yathā kṣityādayaḥ, na ca tathāpaḥ, tasmād bhidyanta iti । vyavahāro vā sādhyate, vivādāspadībhūtadravyamāpa (dravyaṃ) ityevaṃ vyavahartavyamaptvābhisambandhāt । ye tvāpa ityevaṃ na vyavahriyante na te 'ptvābhisambaddhāḥ । yathā kṣityādayaḥ । na tathedam, tasmādāpa ityevaṃ vyavahartavyamiti । śeṣañca lakṣaṇasyākṣepapratisamādhānaṃ pṛthivyadhikāre jñeyam । evaṃ śabdārthanirūpaṇāya śakteratīndriyatvapratiṣedhārthañcāptvābhisambandhāditi vākyaṃ pūrvavadyojanīyam ।

original: “ete ca pūrvavat”(*) iti guṇaviniveśādhikāre siddhāḥ । tathā hi, rūparasasparśavatya āpo dravāḥ snigdhāśca <vai. sū. 2.1.2> iti pañcaviśeṣaṇāḥ siddhāḥ । te cāsādhāraṇatvāditarasmād bhedakā ityasādhāraṇatāpratipādanārthamāha “śuklamadhuraśītā eva rūparasasparśāḥ”(*) । sūtreṇa sāmānyaśabdenāpyarthādabhihitā iti । tathā hi, śuklameva hi rūpamabhāsvaramapsu, madhura eva rasaḥ, śīta eva sparśa iti ।
analyzed: ete ca pūrvavat iti guṇa viniveśa adhikāre siddhāḥ tathā hi rūpa rasa sparśavatyaḥ āpaḥ dravāḥ snigdhāḥ ca vai iti pañca viśeṣaṇāḥ siddhāḥ te ca asādhāraṇa tvāt itarasmāt bhedakāḥ iti asādhāraṇa tā pratipādana artham āha śukla madhura śītāḥ eva rūpa rasa sparśāḥ sūtreṇa sāmānya śabdena api arthāt abhihitāḥ iti tathā hi śuklam eva hi rūpam abhāsvaram apsu madhuraḥ eva rasaḥ śītaḥ eva sparśaḥ iti

original: athāvayavasyāpyanekabhūtairārambhaḥ । tathā hi, pārthivāpyābhyāṃ paramāṇubhyāṃ dvyaṇukam, punarāpyataijasābhyām, tathā taijasavāyavīyābhyāmārabdhamiti । evaṃ vāyuśabdatanmātrābhyām । etāni dvyaṇukānyutpannāni tryaṇukādiprakrameṇa śarīramārabhanta ityabhyupagame ca rūpādīnāmutpattirna bhavet । tathā hi “guṇāśca guṇāntaramārabhante” <vai. sū. 1.1.10> iti sūtreṇānekasya guṇasya guṇārambhakatvamuktam । evañca sati pārthivāpyābhyāmaṇubhyāmārabdhe dvyaṇuke gandhotpattirna syāt । tasya hyekatvenājanakatvāt । evamāpyataijasābhyāmārabdhe dvyaṇuke raso na syāt । tathā taijasavāyavīyābhyāmārabdhe dvyaṇuke rūpābhāvaḥ । tathā vāyuśabdatanmātrābhyāmārabdhe sparśābhāva iti । tadevaṃ gandharasarūpasparśānāṃ dvyaṇukeṣvabhāve tatkāryakāryeṣvapyabhāvāditi śarīre 'pyabhāvaprasaṅgaḥ ।

original: indriyasvarūpanirūpaṇārthamāha “indriyañca rasavyañjakam”(*) iti । rasopalabdhiḥ karaṇakāryā, kriyātvāt, yā yā kriyā sā sā karaṇakāryā yathā chidikriyā, tathā ceyaṃ kriyā, tasmāt karaṇakāryeti । yacca rasopalabdhisampādakaṃ karaṇaṃ tadāpyam, tadrasanam, rūparasādiṣu madhye niyamena rasavyañjakatvāt । yad yad rūpādiṣu madhye niyamena rasavyañjakaṃ tattadāpyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā dantāntargatodakam, tathā caitat, tasmādāpyamiti । rasanavyāpārād rasatvādīnāmapi grahaṇasya sambhavādasambhavitvaṃ syāditi rūpādiṣu madhye iti padam । tathā hi, śuṣkakaṇṭhasya modakādiṣu rasopalabdhirnopalabdhā । udakasadbhāve tu rūpādiṣu madhye rasasyaikasyopalabdhiriti sapakṣe sattvam । anāpye caitanna sambhavatīti vipakṣād vyāvṛttiriti । tadetadasādhāraṇatvāditarasmād bhedakamapīti jñeyam ।
