original: bhūyastvāditi । bhūyasāmāpyāvayavānāṃ rasopalabdhiprāpakādṛṣṭāpekṣāṇāṃ saṃyoge satīṣaditarāvayavasamparke ca viśeṣotpāda upadiśyate । ata eva anyāvayavābhibhavānupapattiḥ । jalāvayavānāṃ bhūyastvāditareṣāñca alpatvāditi । rasavattvañca rasanendriyasya rasotkarṣaḥ । sāmānyaśabdenāpyartho 'nukta iti raso jñāyate 'neneti rasajñānamindriyam । <I,083> tasminnutpādye prakṛtiḥ kāraṇamudakaṃ bhūyastvād vyākṛtānnimittāt । tasmādetadevendriyam, rūpādiṣu madhye niyamena rasaprakāśakañceti ।
analyzed: bhūyas tvāt iti bhūyasām āpya avayavānām rasa upalabdhi prāpaka adṛṣṭa apekṣāṇām saṃyoge sati īṣat itara avayava samparke ca viśeṣa utpādaḥ upadiśyate atas eva anya avayava abhibhava anupapattiḥ jala avayavānām bhūyas tvāt itareṣām ca alpa tvāt iti rasavat tvam ca rasanā indriyasya rasa utkarṣaḥ sāmānya śabdena api arthaḥ nuktaḥ iti rasaḥ jñāyate nena iti rasa jñānam indriyam  / tasmin utpādye prakṛtiḥ kāraṇam udakam bhūyas tvāt vyākṛ

original: yad vā kāryaniyamaḥ kāraṇaniyamaṃ vinā na ghaṭata iti niyamena rasanendriyād rasopalabdherevotpattiḥ kuta ityāha bhūyastvādrasavattvācca nimittād rase jñaptiḥ jñānam, tatra prakṛtiḥ kāraṇaṃ rasanendriyamiti । tathā hi, saṃyuktasamavāyāviśeṣe 'pi niyamena rasopalambhānyathānupapattyā jñāyate niyamahetuḥ । sa cānyasyāsambhavād rasotkarṣo bhūyastvañceti kalpyate ।
analyzed: yat vā kārya niyamaḥ kāraṇa niyamam vinā na ghaṭate iti niyamena rasanā indriyāt rasa upalabdheḥ eva utpattiḥ kutas iti āha bhūyaḥ tvāt rasavat tvāt ca nimittāt rase jñaptiḥ jñānam tatra prakṛtiḥ kāraṇam rasanā indriyam iti tathā hi saṃyukta samavāya aviśeṣe pi niyamena rasa upalambha anyathā anupapattyā jñāyate niyama hetuḥ sa ca anyasya asambhavāt rasa utkarṣaḥ bhūyaḥ tvam ca iti kalpyate

original: yad vā rasopalambhānyathānupapattyānyasyāsambhavāj jñāyate, rasotkarṣe kiṃ nimittamityāha bhūyastvamiti । tathā hyāpyatvāviśeṣe 'pi rasasyaivotkarṣo na rūpāderiti bhūyastvaṃ viśiṣṭotpāde nimittam । sa cādṛṣṭavaśāt । adṛṣṭasya ca vyavasthāhetutvāditi ।
analyzed: yat vā rasa upalambha anyathā anupapattyā anyasya asambhavāt jñāyate rasa utkarṣe kim nimittam iti āha bhūyaḥ tvam iti tathā hi āpya tva aviśeṣe pi rasasya eva utkarṣaḥ na rūpa ādeḥ iti bhūyaḥ tvam viśiṣṭa utpāde nimittam sa ca adṛṣṭa vaśāt adṛṣṭasya ca vyavasthā hetu tvāt iti

original: viṣayaṃ nirūpayati । śarīrendriyavyatirikto dvyaṇukādiprakrameṇārabdho viṣayaḥ । tasya hi viṣayabhāvenaivopakāritvāditi । sa tu saritsamudrahimakarakādiriti ।
analyzed: viṣayam nirūpayati śarīra indriya vyatiriktaḥ dvyaṇuka ādi prakrameṇa ārabdhaḥ viṣayaḥ tasya hi viṣaya bhāvena eva upakāri tvāt iti sa tu sarit samudra hima karaka ādiḥ iti

original: (“tejastvābhisambandhāttejaḥ । rūpasparśasaṃkhyāparimāṇapṛthaktvasaṃyogavibhāgaparatvāparatvadravatvasaṃskāravat । pūrvavadeṣāṃ siddhiḥ । śuklaṃ bhāsvarañca rūpam । uṣṇa eva sparśaḥ । naimittikañca dravatvam । saṃkhyādayaśca pūrvavat ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: tejaḥ tva abhisambandhāt tejaḥ rūpa sparśa saṃkhyā parimāṇa pṛthaktva saṃyoga vibhāga para tva apara tva drava tva saṃskāra vat pūrvavat eṣām siddhiḥ śuklam bhāsvaram ca rūpam uṣṇaḥ eva sparśaḥ naimittikam ca drava tvam saṃkhyā ādayaḥ ca pūrvavat

original: (“tadapi dvividham aṇukāryabhāvāt । kāryaṃ śarīrāditrayam । śarīramayonijameva dharmaviśeṣasahitebhyo 'ṇubhyo jāyate ādityaloke । pārthivāvayavopaṣṭambhāccopabhogasamartham । indriyaṃ sarvaprāṇināṃ rūpavyañjakamanyāvayavānabhibhūtaistejo 'vayavairārabdhaṃ cakṣuḥ । viṣayalakṣaṇaṃ caturvidhaṃ bhaumaṃ divyamudaryamākarajañca । tatra bhaumaṃ kāṣṭhendhanaprabhavamūrdhvajvalanasvabhāvaṃ pacanasvedanādisamartham । divyamabindhanaṃ sauravidyudādi । bhuktasyāhārasya rasādibhāvena pariṇāmasamarthamudaryam । ākarajaṃ suvarṇādi । tatra saṃyuktasamavāyād rasādyupalabdhiriti ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: tat api dvividham aṇu kārya bhāvāt kāryam śarīra ādi trayam śarīram ayoni jam eva dharma viśeṣa sahitebhyaḥ ṇubhyaḥ jāyate āditya loke pārthiva avayava upaṣṭambhāt ca upabhoga samartham indriyam sarva prāṇinām rūpa vyañjakam anya avayavān abhibhūtaiḥ tejaḥ vayavaiḥ ārabdham cakṣuḥ viṣaya lakṣaṇam caturvidham bhaumam divyam udaryam ākara jam ca  tatra bhaumam kāṣṭha indhana prabhavam ūrdhva jvalana svabhāvam pacana svedana ādi samartham divyam ap

original: idānīmuddeśavatastejolakṣaṇaparīkṣārthamāha “tejastvābhisambandhāt”(*) ityādi prakaraṇam । tejastvenābhisambandhastejastvopalakṣitasamavāyo lakṣaṇamiti । tathā hi, tejaḥ, itarasmād bhidyate, tejastvābhisambandhāt । ye tu na bhidyante na te tejastvābhisambandhāḥ yathā kṣityādayaḥ, na ca tathā tejaḥ, tasmāditarasmād bhidyata iti । vyavahāro vā sādhyate । tathā tejaḥśabdasya sāmānyavānartha iti jñāpanārthamatīndriyaśaktipratiṣedhārthañca pūrvavad vyākhyeyam ।
analyzed: idānīm uddeśavataḥ tejaḥ lakṣaṇa parīkṣā artham āha tejaḥ tva abhisambandhāt ityādi prakaraṇam tejaḥ tvena abhisambandhaḥ tejaḥ tva upalakṣita samavāyaḥ lakṣaṇam iti tathā hi tejaḥ itarasmāt bhidyate tejaḥ tva abhisambandhāt ye tu na bhidyante na te tejaḥ tva abhisambandhāḥ yathā kṣiti ādayaḥ na ca tathā tejaḥ tasmāt itarasmāt bhidyate iti vyavahāraḥ vā sādhyate tathā tejaḥ śabdasya sāmānyavān arthaḥ iti jñāpana artham atīndriya

original: evaṃ samavāyitvaguṇavattvapratipādanārthañca rūpādivākyam । tathā hi, rūpasparśādayaḥ saṃskāraparyantā vidyante yasya tat tadvaditi । “pūrvavadeṣāṃ siddhiḥ”(*) iti । yathā pṛthivyadhikāre rūpādayo viśeṣaguṇā guṇaviniveśādhikāre siddhāstadvadihāpīti । tathā “tejorūpasparśavad” <vai. sū. 2.1.3> iti sūtreṇa viśeṣaguṇāvuktau । tau cāsādhāraṇatvād itarasmād bhedakāvityasādhāraṇatāmāha “śuklaṃ bhāsvarañca rūpam”(*) prakāśanaśīlamiti । “uṣṇa eva sparśaḥ”(*) na sparśāntaramiti । “naimittikañca dravatvam”(*) iti । “saṃkhyādayaśca pūrvavat”(*) iti । “trapusīsaloharajatasuvarṇānāṃ taijasānāmagnisaṃyogād dravatvamadbhiḥ sāmānyam” <vai. sū. 2.1.7> iti sūtreṇa dravatvamuktam ।
analyzed: evam samavāyi tva guṇavat tva pratipādana artham ca rūpa ādi vākyam tathā hi rūpa sparśa ādayaḥ saṃskāra paryantāḥ vidyante yasya tat tadvat iti pūrvavat eṣām siddhiḥ iti yathā pṛthivī adhikāre rūpa ādayaḥ viśeṣa guṇāḥ guṇa viniveśa adhikāre siddhāḥ tadvat iha api iti tathā tejaḥ rūpa sparśa vat vai iti sūtreṇa viśeṣa guṇau uktau tau ca asādhāraṇa tvāt itarasmāt bhedakau iti asādhāraṇa tām āha śuklam bhāsvaram ca rūpam prakāśana

original: lakṣaṇena lakṣyamāṇasyaikānekatvopalabdhau saṃśaye sati tannirāsāya, advaitavādinaśca pratiṣedhāya, sāmānyasamarthanāya, bījasadbhāvapratipādanāya ca “tadapi dvividham”(*) iti pūrvavad vākyaṃ vyākhyeyam । tathā hi, na kevalaṃ pṛthivyudakañca dvividham, kiṃ tarhi ? etadapīti । tejo 'pi hi dvividhamiti । kena rūpeṇetyāha “aṇukāryabhāvāt”(*) iti । paramāṇusvabhāvaṃ nityaṃ kāryasvabhāvañcānityam । kāryasya cānantyādaparijñānaṃ mā bhūdityāha “kāryaṃ śarīrāditrayam”(*) iti । śarīramindriyaṃ viṣayamityanena rūpeṇa jñeyamityavāntaravaidharmyam ।
analyzed: lakṣaṇena lakṣyamāṇasya eka aneka tva upalabdhau saṃśaye sati tad nirāsāya advaita vādinaḥ ca pratiṣedhāya sāmānya samarthanāya bīja sadbhāva pratipādanāya ca tat api dvividham iti pūrvavat vākyam vyākhyeyam tathā hi na kevalam pṛthivī udakam ca dvividham kim tarhi etat api iti tejaḥ hi dvividham iti  kena rūpeṇa iti āha aṇu kārya bhāvāt iti paramāṇu svabhāvam nityam kārya svabhāvam ca anityam kāryasya ca ānantyāt aparijñānam mā bhūt iti āha kārya

original: śarīrasya sāmānyalakṣaṇamuktamityutpattirevocyate “śarīramayonijameva”(*) iti । ayonijaṃ hi śukraśoṇitasannipātānapekṣam । “dharmaviśeṣasahitebhyo 'ṇubhyaḥ”(*) iti । taijasāḥ paramāṇavaḥ samavāyikāraṇam, tatsaṃyogāścāsamavāyikāraṇam, pārthivādyavayavāśca nimittakāraṇamiti । taccādityaloke siddhamāgamāt । atha tejo 'vayavinaḥ kṣaṇikatāyāṃ tadārabdhaṃ viśiṣṭopabhogājanakamityāha “pārthivāvayavopaṣṭambhāccopabhogasamartham”(*) iti । tacca śarīraṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇalakṣitatve sati tejo 'vayavairārabdhatvāditarasmād bhidyata iti viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ jñeyam ।
analyzed: śarīrasya sāmānya lakṣaṇam uktam iti utpattiḥ eva ucyate śarīram ayoni jam eva iti ayoni jam hi śukra śoṇita sannipāta anapekṣam dharma viśeṣa sahitebhyaḥ ṇubhyaḥ iti taijasāḥ paramāṇavaḥ samavāyi kāraṇam tad saṃyogāḥ ca asamavāyi kāraṇam pārthiva ādi avayavāḥ ca nimitta kāraṇam iti tat ca āditya loke siddham āgamāt atha tejaḥ vayavinaḥ kṣaṇikatāyām tat ārabdham viśiṣṭa upabhoga ajanakam iti āha pārthiva avayava upaṣṭambhāt

original: athendriyasvarūpanirūpaṇārthamāha “indriyaṃ sarvaprāṇināṃ rūpavyañjakam”(*) iti । rūpopalabdhiḥ, karaṇakāryā, kriyātvāt yā yā kriyā sā sā karaṇakāryā yathā chidikriyā, tathā ceyaṃ kriyā, tasmāt, karaṇakāryeti । yadrūpopalabdheḥ sampādakaṃ karaṇaṃ taccakṣuriti । tacca taijasam, rūpādiṣu madhye niyamena rūpavyañjakatvāt । yad yad rūpādiṣu madhye niyamena rūpavyañjakaṃ tattaijasam, yathā pradīpaḥ, tathā ca rūpādiṣu madhye niyamena rūpavyañjakaṃ cakṣuḥ, tasmāttaijasamiti । cakṣuṣo hi rūpavaddravyādi prakāśakatvopalabdherniyamena rūpaprakāśakatvamasiddhaṃ syāditi “rūpādiṣu madhye” iti padam । rūparasagandhasparśeṣu madhye niyamena rūpavyañjakatvaṃ vivakṣitamiti ।
analyzed: atha indriya svarūpa nirūpaṇa artham āha indriyam sarva prāṇinām rūpa vyañjakam iti rūpa upalabdhiḥ karaṇa kāryā kriyā tvāt yā yā kriyā sā sā karaṇa kāryā yathā chidi kriyā tathā ca iyam kriyā tasmāt karaṇa kāryā iti yat rūpa upalabdheḥ sampādakam karaṇam tat cakṣuḥ iti tat ca taijasam rūpa ādiṣu madhye niyamena rūpa vyañjaka tvāt yat yat rūpa ādiṣu madhye niyamena rūpa vyañjakam tat taijasam yathā pradīpaḥ tathā ca rūpa ādiṣu madhye niy

original: atha taijasatvāccakṣuṣo rūpasyevoṣmaprakāśakatvamapi syāt, tasya hi taijasatvāt saṃyuktasamavāyasyāviśeṣād, anyasya ca viśeṣahetorabhāvādityāha “anyāvayavānabhibhūtaistejo 'vayavairārabdhaṃ cakṣuḥ”(*) ato rūpasyaiva vyañjakamiti । tathā hīṣatpārthivāvayavasaṃyuktairanabhibhūtaistejo 'vayavairārabdhaṃ cakṣuriti rūpasyaiva vyañjakam ।
analyzed: atha taijasa tvāt cakṣuṣaḥ rūpasya iva ūṣma prakāśaka tvam api syāt tasya hi taijasa tvāt saṃyukta samavāyasya aviśeṣāt anyasya ca viśeṣa hetoḥ abhāvāt iti āha anya avayava anabhibhūtaiḥ tejaḥ vayavaiḥ ārabdham cakṣuḥ atas rūpasya eva vyañjakam iti tathā hi īṣat pārthiva avayava saṃyuktaiḥ anabhibhūtaiḥ tejaḥ vayavaiḥ ārabdham cakṣuḥ iti rūpasya eva vyañjakam

original: atha itthambhūtārambhe kiṃ pramāṇam ? kāryaniyamaḥ । tathā hi cakṣurvyāpārād rūpādiṣu madhye rūpasyaivopalabdhirdṛṣṭā । sā ca kāraṇaniyamaṃ vinā na syādityanyasyāsambhavād viśiṣṭotpādo 'tra nimittam । sa cādṛṣṭād rūpopalabdhisampādakāt tasya hi vastuvyavasthāhetutvāditi ।
analyzed: atha ittham bhūta ārambhe kim pramāṇam kārya niyamaḥ tathā hi cakṣuḥ vyāpārāt rūpa ādiṣu madhye rūpasya eva upalabdhiḥ dṛṣṭā sā ca kāraṇa niyamam vinā na syāt iti anyasya asambhavāt viśiṣṭa utpādaḥ tra nimittam sa ca adṛṣṭāt rūpa upalabdhi sampādakāt tasya hi vastu vyavasthā hetu tvāt iti

original: bhūyastvād rūpavattvācca rūpajñāne prakṛtiḥ kāraṇaṃ tejaḥ <vai. sū. ?> iti । asya ca sūtrasyedaṃ bhāṣyam । rūpaṃ jñāyate 'neneti rūpajñānaṃ cakṣustasminnutpādye prakṛtiḥ kāraṇaṃ tejo bhūyastvānnimittādato rūpasyaiva prakāśakamindriyañceti । bhūyastvaṃ hi bhūyasāṃ tejo 'vayavānāṃ viśiṣṭādṛṣṭopagṛhītānāmīṣaditarāvayavasamparke cārambhakatvamiti । yad vā rūpe jñaptirjñānam, tasminneva rūpādiṣu madhye kāraṇaṃ cakṣuḥ । kuta ityāha bhūyastvād vyākṛtād rūpavattvācca iti । rūpavattvaṃ hi rūpotkarṣo vivakṣitaḥ । anyathā hi taijasatvāduṣṇasparśavattvamapi sambhāvyata iti viśeṣābhidhānamanarthakaṃ syāt । yad vā rūpādiṣu madhye rūpasyaivopalambhānyathānupapattyā jñāyate rūpotkarṣaḥ । kuto bhavatītyāha bhūyastvāduktarūpāditi ।
analyzed: bhūyaḥ tvāt rūpavat tvāt ca rūpa jñāne prakṛtiḥ kāraṇam tejaḥ vai iti  asya ca sūtrasya idam bhāṣyam rūpam jñāyate nena iti rūpa jñānam cakṣuḥ tasmin utpādye prakṛtiḥ kāraṇam tejaḥ bhūyaḥ tvāt nimittāt atas rūpasya eva prakāśakam indriyam ca iti  bhūyaḥ tvam hi bhūyasām tejaḥ vayavānām viśiṣṭa adṛṣṭa upagṛhītānām īṣat itara avayava samparke ca ārambhaka tvam iti  yat vā rūpe jñaptiḥ jñānam tasmin eva rūpa ādiṣu madhye

original: atha mahattvādanekadravyatvāccakṣuṣaḥ kasmādindriyeṇopalambho na bhavati ? pradīpasyeva viśiṣṭarūpābhāvāt, yatra hi rūpavaddravyasya cakṣuḥsparśanābhyāmupalambha iti । <I,086> rūpaviśeṣastu yatkṛtā 〈kva〉cidviṣaye rūpopalabdhiryadabhāvācca mahadanekadravyāśrayasyāpyanupalabdhiḥ sa udbhavasamākhyāno rūpadharmaḥ sahakāriviśeṣa iti । dṛṣṭañca rūpaviśeṣābhāvād vāristhite tejasi mahadanekadravyatve 'pyagrahaṇam । udbhūtarūpasya pradīpasyāndhakāre 'pi grahaṇam । upabhogārthā hi sṛṣṭirbhāvānāmiti rūpasyodbhave cakṣuṣo 'ndhakāre 'pi grahaṇe duṣṭasattvānāmupabhogānutpattiḥ syāditi tadupabhogaprāpakādṛṣṭavaśenānudbhūtarūpaṃ cakṣurjanitaṃ prajāpatinā । tathoṣṇasparśodbhave 'pyanekacakṣuḥsannipātāt prītikare vastuni nartakyādau grīṣmasamaye 'tyuṣṇairmarīcibhiriva dāhaḥ syādityadṛṣṭavaśādevoṣṇasparśasyāpyanudbhavaḥ kalpyata iti ।
analyzed: atha mahat tvāt aneka dravya tvāt cakṣuṣaḥ kasmāt indriyeṇa upalambhaḥ na bhavati pradīpasya iva viśiṣṭa rūpa abhāvāt yatra hi rūpavat dravyasya cakṣuḥ sparśanābhyām upalambhaḥ iti   rūpa viśeṣaḥ tu yad kṛtā kvacid viṣaye rūpa upalabdhiḥ yad abhāvāt ca mahat aneka dravya āśrayasya api anupalabdhiḥ saḥ udbhava samākhyānaḥ rūpa dharmaḥ sahakāri viśeṣaḥ iti dṛṣṭaḥ ca rūpa viśeṣa abhāvāt vāri sthite tejasi mahat aneka dravya tve

original: viṣayasvarūpanirūpaṇārthamāha “viṣayalakṣaṇam”(*) viṣayasvarūpam । “caturvidham”(*) iti । kena rūpeṇetyāha “bhaumaṃ divyamudaryamākarajañca”(*) iti । viṣayalakṣaṇena śarīrendriyād vyāvṛttasya viṣayasyāvāntaravaidharmyametaditi । tatra bhūmau bhavaṃ bhaumam । kāṣṭhānyevendhanāni yasya tebhyaḥ prabhavatyutpadyata iti tatprabhavamitīndhanaviśeṣāditarasmād bhidyate । taccordhvajvalanasvabhāvo yasyetyūrdhvajvalanasvabhāvakamiti । amuṣmādapītarasmād bhidyata eva । yadevārthakriyākāri tadeva paramārthasaditi darśanasya sattāsambandhenāpi sattvābhyupagame 'pyabhyupagamavādena pratiṣedhārtham । kriyānirūpaṇañca pacanasvedanādisamarthamiti । divyamabindhanaviśeṣād viśiṣyata ityāha “abindhanam”(*) iti । āpa indhanaṃ yasya, na tvāpa eveti । tacca sauramiti ādityasambaddham । vidyudādītyādipadenolkā〈pātā〉dergrahaṇamiti । evamudare bhavamudaryam । tacca bhuktasyāhārasya rasādipariṇāmārthamiti rasamaladhātupariṇāmārtham । pariṇāmaśca paramāṇuṣu pūrvarūpādinivṛttāvutpannapākajairdvyaṇukādiprakrameṇa rasādidravyārambha iti vakṣyāmaḥ pākajotpattau । ākarajañceti । ākarājjātaṃ suvarṇādi । ādigrahaṇāt trapusīsaloharajatānāṃ grahaṇam ।
analyzed: viṣaya svarūpa nirūpaṇa artham āha viṣaya lakṣaṇam viṣaya svarūpam caturvidham iti kena rūpeṇa iti āha bhaumam divyam udaryam ākara jat ca iti viṣaya lakṣaṇena śarīra indriyāt vyāvṛttasya viṣayasya avāntara vaidharmyam etat iti tatra bhūmau bhavam bhaumam kāṣṭhāni eva indhanāni yasya tebhyaḥ prabhavati utpadyate iti tat prabhavam iti indhana viśeṣāt itarasmāt bhidyate tat ca ūrdhva jvalana svabhāvaḥ yasya iti ūrdhva jvalana svabhāvakam iti amuṣmāt

original: arthaiteṣāṃ taijasatve kiṃ pramāṇam ? āgamaḥ । tathā ca “agnerapatyaṃ prathamaṃ suvarṇaṃ dyaurvaiṣṇavī sūryasutāśca gāvaḥ” ।
analyzed: artha eteṣām taijasa tve kim pramāṇam āgamaḥ tathā ca agneḥ apatyam prathamam suvarṇam dyauḥ vaiṣṇavī sūrya sutāḥ ca gāvaḥ

original: athāgnerjātamatajjātīyaṃ bhavatītyanekāntādasādhanametat । tathā cāgnerjātaṃ dhūmādi na tajjātīyam । tadasat । apatyavyavahārasya sājātyāpekṣayaiva dṛṣṭatvāt । tathā hi, na kāryamātre 'patyavyavahāro dṛṣṭaḥ । kiṃ tarhi ? samānajātīye । yathā mānuṣāpatyamiti । nanvevaṃ cetaneṣvevāpatyavyavahāropalabdheracetane 'nupapattiḥ ? na । tejo 'dhiṣṭhānasya <I,087> cetanatayā tadapekṣayāsyopapatteḥ । yad vā agnikāryasyānekatve 'pyagnerapatyaṃ suvarṇamiti viśeṣābhidhānāt samānajātīyatvaṃ labhyate । aviśeṣavivakṣāyāntu kāryāntaramapatyamityabhidadhyāt । āgamāntarādvā viśeṣapratipattirityalam । tathā prathamaṃ suvarṇamityabhidhānādagnerapatyaṃ rajatādikamapi labhyate 'nyathā hi prathamamityanarthakaṃ syād viśeṣaṇam । evañca sati gurutvādhikaraṇatvāt pārthivaṃ suvarṇādītyanumānamāgamabādhitatvādapramāṇam । āgamike hi viṣaye 'numānapravṛtteḥ pratiṣedhāt ।
analyzed: atha agneḥ jātam atajjātīyam bhavati iti anekāntāt asādhanam etat tathā ca agneḥ jātam dhūma ādi na tad jātīyam tat asat apatya vyavahārasya sājātya apekṣayā eva dṛṣṭa tvāt tathā hi na kārya mātre patya vyavahāraḥ dṛṣṭaḥ kim tarhi samāna jātīye yathā mānuṣa apatyam iti nanu evam cetaneṣu eva apatya vyavahāra upalabdheḥ acetane nupapattiḥ na tejaḥ dhiṣṭhānasya cetanatayā tad apekṣayā asya upapatteḥ  yat vā agni kāryasya anekatve pi agne

original: athaiteṣāṃ taijasatve rasādyupalabdhistarhi katham ? saṃyuktasamavāyāt । tathā hi, saṃyuktaṃ suvarṇādau pārthivaṃ dravyam, tatra samavetā rasādaya upalabhyanta ityāha “tatra saṃyuktasamavāyād rasādyupalabdhiḥ”(*) iti । atha dravatvamapyevamastu, kimarthaṃ tasya tejoguṇatvamiti cet, na । pārthivādasya viśeṣopalabdheḥ । tathā hi, pārthivaṃ lākṣādyagnisaṃyogād bhasmatāmāpadyamānaṃ dṛṣṭam । suvarṇādau ca bhṛśamapyagnisaṃyogātiśayena dravatvameva । uṣṇasparśānudbhavaścātrādṛṣṭāt ।
analyzed: atha eteṣām taijasa tve rasa ādi upalabdhiḥ tarhi katham saṃyukta samavāyāt tathā hi saṃyuktam suvarṇa ādau pārthivam dravyam tatra samavetāḥ rasa ādayaḥ upalabhyante iti āha tatra saṃyukta samavāyāt rasa ādi upalabdhiḥ iti atha drava tvam api evam astu kimartham tasya tejaḥ guṇa tvam iti ced na pārthivādasya viśeṣa upalabdheḥ tathā hi pārthivam lākṣā ādi agni saṃyogāt bhasma tām āpadyamānam dṛṣṭam suvarṇa ādau ca bhṛśam api agni saṃyoga

original: (“vāyutvābhisambandhād vāyuḥ । sparśasaṃkhyāparimāṇapṛthaktvasaṃyogavibhāgaparatvāparatvasaṃskāravān । sparśo 'syānuṣṇāśītatve satyapākajo guṇaviniveśāt siddhaḥ । “arūpiṣvacākṣuṣa”-vacanāt saptasaṃkhyādayaḥ । “tṛṇakarma”-vacanāt saṃskāraḥ । sa cāyaṃ dvividho 'ṇukāryabhāvāt । tatra kāryalakṣaṇaścaturvidhaḥ । śarīramindriyaṃ viṣayaḥ prāṇa iti । tatra śarīramayonijameva dharmaviśeṣasahitebhyo vāyuparamāṇubhyo jāyate marutāṃ loke, pārthivāvayavopaṣṭambhāccopabhogasamartham । indriyaṃ sarvaprāṇināṃ sparśopalambhakaṃ pṛthivyādyanabhibhūtairvāyvavayavairārabdhaṃ śarīravyāpi tvagindriyam । viṣayastūpalabhyamānasparśādhiṣṭhānabhūtaḥ sparśaśabdadhṛtikampaliṅgastiryaggamanasvabhāvo meghādipreraṇadhāraṇādisamarthaḥ । tasyāpratyakṣasyāpi nānātvaṃ saṃmūrchanenānumīyate । saṃmūrchanaṃ punaḥ samānajavayorviruddhadikkriyayorvāyvoḥ sāvayavinorūrdhvagamanenānumīyate । tadapi tṛṇādīnāmūrdhvagamaneneti । prāṇo 'ntaḥśarīre <I,088> rasamaladhātūnāṃ preraṇādiheturekaḥ san kriyābhedāt prāṇāpānādisaṃjñāṃ labhata iti ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: vāyu tva abhisambandhāt vāyuḥ sparśa saṃkhyā parimāṇa pṛthaktva saṃyoga vibhāga para tva apara tva saṃskāravān sparśaḥ syāt uṣṇa aśīta tve satya pāka jaḥ guṇa viniveśāt siddhaḥ arūpiṣu acākṣuṣa vacanāt sapta saṃkhyā ādayaḥ tṛṇa karma vacanāt saṃskāraḥ sa ca ayam dvividhaḥ ṇu kārya bhāvāt tatra kārya lakṣaṇaḥ caturvidhaḥ śarīram indriyam viṣayaḥ prāṇaḥ iti tatra śarīram ayoni jam eva dharma viśeṣa sahitebhyaḥ

original: idānīṃ vāyoruddeśavato lakṣaṇaparīkṣārthaṃ “vāyutvābhisambandhāt”(*) ityādiprakaraṇam । vāyuriti lakṣyanirdeśo vāyutvābhisambandhāditi lakṣaṇam । vāyutvenābhisambandho vāyutvenopalakṣitaḥ samavāya iti । samavāyo hyativyāpakatvādalakṣaṇaṃ syāditi vāyutvapadam । vāyutvañcāsambaddhamapakṣadharmatayā gamakaṃ na syāditi pakṣadharmatājñāpanārthamabhisambandhapadam । tathā ca vāyutvenetarasmād bhidyate, vāyutvābhisambandhāt, ye tu na bhidyante na te vāyutvenābhisambaddhāḥ yathā kṣityādayaḥ, na ca tathā vāyutvenānabhisambaddho vāyuḥ, tasmāditarasmād bhidyata iti । vyavahāro vā sādhyate । śeṣañca lakṣaṇasya dūṣaṇapratisamādhānaṃ pṛthivyadhikāre jñeyam । tathā vāyuśabdasya sāmānyavānartha iti jñāpanārthamatīndriyaśaktipratiṣedhārthañca pūrvavad vākyaṃ vyākhyeyam ।
analyzed: idānīm vāyoḥ uddeśavataḥ lakṣaṇa parīkṣā artham vāyu tva abhisambandhāt ityādi prakaraṇam vāyuḥ iti lakṣya nirdeśaḥ vāyu tva abhisambandhāt iti lakṣaṇam vāyu tvena abhisambandhaḥ vāyu tvena upalakṣitaḥ samavāyaḥ iti samavāyaḥ hi ativyāpaka tvāt alakṣaṇam syāt iti vāyu tva padam vāyu tvam ca asambaddham apakṣa dharmatayā gamakam na syāt iti pakṣa dharmatā jñāpana artham abhisambandha padam tathā ca vāyu tvena itarasmāt bhidyate vāyu tva

original: samavāyitvaguṇavattvapratipādanārthaṃ sparśādivākyam । sparśādayaḥ saṃskāraparyantā vidyante yasyāsau tadvāniti । sparśasya sādhāraṇatvādanyasmād bhedakatvābhāvādityasādhāraṇatāmāha “sparśo 'syānuṣṇāśītatve satyapākajaḥ”(*) iti । anuṣṇa ityuṣṇasparśavyavacchedaḥ । aśīta iti śītasparśāt । apākaja iti pārthivāt । sa ca guṇaviniveśād dvitīyādhyāye siddhaḥ “vāyuḥ sparśavān” <vai. sū. 2.1.4> ityanena sūtreṇa ।
analyzed: samavāyi tva guṇavat tva pratipādana artham sparśa ādi vākyam sparśa ādayaḥ saṃskāra paryantāḥ vidyante yasya asau tadvān iti sparśasya sādhāraṇa tvāt anyasmāt bhedaka tva abhāvāt iti asādhāraṇatām āha sati apāka jaḥ iti anuṣṇaḥ iti uṣṇa sparśa vyavacchedaḥ aśītaḥ iti śīta sparśāt apāka jaḥ iti pārthivāt sa ca guṇa viniveśāt dvitīya adhyāye siddhaḥ vāyuḥ sparśavān vai iti anena sūtreṇa

original: atra ca sparśavāniti sāmānyaśabdenāpi arthādayaṃ viśeṣo vivakṣito 'nuṣṇāśītatve satyapākajasparśavāniti । “arūpiṣvacākṣuṣatvāt” <vai. sū. 4.1.12> iti । sūtreṇa saṃkhyādayaḥ siddhāḥ ।
analyzed: atra ca sparśavān iti sāmānya śabdena api arthāt ayam viśeṣaḥ vivakṣitaḥ sati a pāka ja sparśavān iti arūpiṣu acākṣuṣa tvāt vai iti sūtreṇa saṃkhyā ādayaḥ siddhāḥ

original: tathā hi, rūpaviśeṣavati dravye cākṣuṣāstadviparīte cācākṣuṣāḥ, ityapareṇāpi sūtreṇa arūpiṣu saṃkhyādīnāṃ sadbhāvo 'bhihita eva । tathā cārūpiṣu samavetāḥ saṃkhyādayaḥ paraṃ cakṣurgrāhyā na bhavantīti pratiṣedhaḥ । tathā “tṛṇakarmavacanāt”(*) iti “vāyusaṃyogāttṛṇe karma” <vai. sū. 5.1.14> iti sūtraṃ darśayati ।
analyzed: tathā hi rūpa viśeṣavati dravye cākṣuṣāḥ tad viparīte ca acākṣuṣāḥ iti apareṇa api sūtreṇa arūpiṣu saṃkhyā ādīnām sadbhāvaḥ bhihitaḥ eva tathā ca arūpiṣu samavetāḥ saṃkhyā ādayaḥ param cakṣuḥ grāhyāḥ na bhavanti iti pratiṣedhaḥ tathā tṛṇa karma vacanāt iti vāyu saṃyogāt tṛṇe karma vai iti sūtram darśayati

original: vāyusaṃyogaśca tṛṇakarmotpattau sāpekṣaḥ kāraṇamiti prayatnāderabhāvād vegāpekṣaḥ kāraṇamiti saṃskāraḥ siddhaḥ ।
analyzed: vāyu saṃyogaḥ ca tṛṇa karma utpattau sāpekṣaḥ kāraṇam iti prayatna ādeḥ abhāvāt vega apekṣaḥ kāraṇam iti saṃskāraḥ siddhaḥ

original: tathā vāyutvasāmānyasya bhedādhiṣṭhānatvāditi tatsamarthenārthāllakṣaṇena lakṣyamāṇasyaikānekatvopalabdhau saṃśaye sati tannirāsārtham, advaitavādipratiṣedhārthaṃ bījasadbhāvapratipādanārthañca “sa cāyaṃ dvividho 'ṇukāryabhāvāt”(*) iti vākyam । tathā hyaṇusvabhāvo nityaḥ kāryasvabhāvastvanitya iti ।
analyzed: tathā vāyu tva sāmānyasya bheda adhiṣṭhāna tvāt iti tad samarthena arthāt lakṣaṇena lakṣyamāṇasya eka aneka tva upalabdhau saṃśaye sati tad nirāsa artham advaita vādi pratiṣedha artham bīja sadbhāva pratipādana artham ca sa ca ayam dvividhaḥ ṇu kārya bhāvāt iti vākyam tathā hi aṇu svabhāvaḥ nityaḥ kārya svabhāvaḥ tu anityaḥ iti

original: avāntaravaidharmyaṃ darśayati “kāryalakṣaṇaḥ”(*) । kāryasvabhāvaḥ । “caturvidhaḥ”(*) iti । kena rūpeṇetyāha “śarīramindriyaṃ viṣayaḥ prāṇaḥ”(*) iti ।
analyzed: avāntara vaidharmyam darśayati kārya lakṣaṇaḥ kārya svabhāvaḥ caturvidhaḥ iti kena rūpeṇa iti āha śarīram indriyam viṣayaḥ prāṇaḥ iti

original: śarīrotpattimāha “śarīramayonijameva”(*) iti । ayonijañca śukraśoṇitasannipātamanapekṣyopajātam । “dharmaviśeṣasahitebhyo vāyuparamāṇubhyaḥ”(*) iti । tathā hi, vāyavīyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ samavāyikāraṇam, tatsaṃyogāścāsamavāyikāraṇam, kṣityādi ca nimittakāraṇamiti । tacca “marutāṃ loke”(*) siddhamāgamāt । atha vāyostiryaggatiśīlatvāt kṣaṇikatvācca tadārabdhaśarīramupabhogājanakaṃ syādityāha “pārthivāvayavopaṣṭambhāccopabhogasamartham”(*) iti ।
analyzed: śarīra utpattim āha śarīram ayoni jam eva iti ayoni jam ca śukra śoṇita sannipātam an apekṣya upajātam dharma viśeṣa sahitebhyaḥ vāyu paramāṇubhyaḥ iti tathā hi vāyavīyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ samavāyi kāraṇam tad saṃyogāḥ ca asamavāyi kāraṇam kṣiti ādi ca nimitta kāraṇam iti tat ca marutām loke siddham āgamāt atha vāyoḥ tiryaggati śīla tvāt kṣaṇika tvāt ca tad ārabdha śarīram upabhoga ajanakam syāt iti āha pārthiva avayava upaṣṭambhāt ca

original: indriyasvarūpanirūpaṇārthamāha “indriyaṃ sarvaprāṇināṃ sparśopalambhakam”(*) iti । tathā hi, sparśopalabdhiḥ, karaṇakāryā, kriyātvād yā yā kriyā sā sā karaṇakāryā, yathā chidikriyā, tathā ceyaṃ kriyā, tasmāt karaṇakāryeti । yad yat sparśopalabdheḥ sampādakaṃ karaṇaṃ tad vāyavīyam, rūpādiṣu madhye niyamena sparśavyañjakatvāt, yad yad rūpādiṣu madhye niyamena sparśavyañjakaṃ tad vāyavīyaṃ dṛṣṭam, yathā vyajanānilaḥ, tathā ca rūpādiṣu madhye niyamena sparśavyañjakaṃ tvagindriyam, tasmād vāyavīyamiti । tvagindriyasya sparśavaddravyādivyañjakatvopalabdherniyamena sparśavyañjakatvamasiddhaṃ syāditi rūpādiṣu madhya iti viśeṣaṇam । vyajanānile tu tadgatasparśavyaktau yadyapi rūpādyasambhavastathāpi śītādisparśavyañjakatvasadbhāvād viśeṣaṇasadbhāvaḥ ।

original: athāstvanuṣṇāśītatve satyapākajasparśasya āśritatvam, apākajatve tu kiṃ pramāṇam ? pākajarūpādiviyogāt । tathā hi, pākajasparśaḥ pākajarūpādisahito dṛṣṭo ghaṭādāviti, asyāpi pākajatve tathābhāvaḥ syāt । atha sadbhāve 'pyanudbhūtatvāt teṣāmanupalambhaḥ ? tanna । anyatrābhāvāt । na hi pākajasparśopalambhe 'pi rūpādīnāmanyatra atyantānupalambho dṛṣṭa iti । na cātra rūpādīnāmastitve pramāṇamastītyanubhavānupapattiḥ । sadbhāve 'nudbhavakalpanopapatteḥ । atha asadbhāve kiṃ pramāṇamiti ced, atyantānupalabdhireva । tathā hi, vivakṣitasparśādhikaraṇaṃ gurutvarahitaṃ sambhavatīti sahacaritā rūpādayo na kadācidupalabhyante pramāṇata ityasantaḥ । tathā pākajasparśasya gurutvasāhacaryopalabdherasyāpi pākajatve tatsadbhāvaḥ syāt । gurutvasambandhe cordhvaṃ parṇādidhāraṇānupapattiḥ, tasyāpi gurutvasambandhitayā tatprasaṅgāt । na ca pākajasparśādhikaraṇaṃ gurutvarahitaṃ sambhavatīti pārthivasparśavilakṣaṇatvānna pṛthivyāṃ vartate, nāpyudakatejasoranuṣṇāśītatvāt । anyatrāsambhava eveti । yatrāyaṃ vartate asau vāyuriti ।
analyzed: atha astu anuṣṇa aśīta tve sati apāka ja sparśasya āśrita tvam apāka ja tve tu kim pramāṇam pāka ja rūpa ādi viyogāt tathā hi pāka ja sparśaḥ pāka ja rūpa ādi sahitaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ ghaṭa ādau iti asya api pāka ja tve tathā bhāvaḥ syāt atha sadbhāve pi anudbhūta tvāt teṣām anupalambhaḥ tat na anyatra abhāvāt na hi pāka ja sparśa upalambhe pi rūpa ādīnām anyatra atyanta anupalambhaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti na ca atra rūpa ādīnām astitve pramāṇam asti

original: tathā ādyaḥ śukaśukāśabdaḥ santatānumitaḥ, sparśavaddravyasambandhakāryaḥ, vibhāgajaśabdajaśabdānyatve sati śabdatvāt, yo yo vibhāgajaśabdajaśabdānyatve sati śabdaḥ sa sparśavaddravyasaṃyogakāryaḥ, yathā bherīdaṇḍasaṃyogajaḥ śabdaḥ, tathā cāyam, tasmād yathoktasādhya iti । nanu vibhāgajaśabdādasya viśeṣānupalabdheḥ sandigdhaṃ tadanyatve satīti viśeṣaṇam । na । rūpādimatāṃ ghanāvayavasanniveśabhājāṃ kāraṇavibhāgapūrvakavibhāgasya śabdārambhakatvopalabdhestadabhāvastu avivādāspada iti vibhāgajatvābhāvāt । tathā vibhāgajatve śukaśukādiśabdasya śākhādiṣu kampasamānakālopalabdhirna syāt । sā tu dṛṣṭā । na cātra śākhādivāyuvibhāgasya śabdārambhakatvaṃ yuktam, kāraṇavibhāgajatvānupapatteratastadanyatve satīti viśeṣaṇamasandigdhameva ।

original: pakṣīṇāṃ <?>〈sannipatitānāṃ〉 mūrchanamityāha “saṃmūrchanaṃ punaḥ samānajavayorvāyvorviruddhadikkriyayoḥ”(*) । sannipāto hi sambandhaḥ । sa ca kayoḥ ? “vāyvoḥ”(*) । kiṃviśiṣṭayorityāha “samānajavayoḥ”(*) । samānastulyo javo vego yayostau samānajavau tayoriti । anyathā hi ekasyālpajavatve balīyasā abhibhavānna saṃmūrchanamiti । tathā hyekadikkriyayorna saṃmūrchanamityāha 〈viruddhadikkriyayoḥ〉 viruddhe dikkriye yayostau viruddhadikkriyāviti । tathā hyekasya prācīnadiggamanamanyasya ca tadabhimukhamāgamanamiti kriyayorvirodhaḥ ।

original: atha vāyorevordhvagamanaṃ kathaṃ pratīyata ityāha “tadapi tṛṇādīnāmūrdhvagamaneneti”(*) । tathā hi, tṛṇādīnāmūrdhvagamanamacetanatvānnopapannaṃ bhavati, nāpi vegāt, kvacinmandagatitvād, ādyakarmotpattau ca tadabhāvāt । anyasya ca sāmarthyānupalabdhervegavaddravyasambandho 'numīyate । na ca tat pārthivam, āpyaṃ vā । tasyāpi gurutvādhikaraṇatayā ūrdhvagamane gurutvarahitaṃ nimittāntaraṃ vācyam । na cātra agnerūrdhvajvalanasvabhāvatayā tatsaṃyogāt tṛṇādīnāmūrdhvagamanam, indhanaviśeṣābhāvena ūrdhvajvalanāsambhavāt, tadanupalabdheśca । na cānyasyātra sāmarthyamiti vāyusambandhāt tṛṇādīnāmūrdhvagamanamiti jñāyate । tasya tiryaggatiśīlatayā nordhvaṃ gamanam, antarāle 'nyathā sambhāvyata iti vāyvantareṇa pratibandhaḥ । tathā hi vāyurbalīyān apareṇa ca balīyasā pratibandhāt sannipātāt svāṃ gatiṃ <I,095> virahayyordhvaṃ gacchati । tatsaṃyogācca tṛṇādīnāmūrdhvagamanamiti siddhaṃ tṛṇādīnāmūrdhvagamanena vāyorūrdhvagamanam । tena ca sannipātaḥ । tasmānnānātvamiti ।
analyzed: atha vāyoḥ eva ūrdhva gamanam katham pratīyate iti āha tat api tṛṇa ādīnām ūrdhva gamanena iti tathā hi tṛṇa ādīnām ūrdhva gamanam acetana tvāt na upapannam bhavati nā api vegāt kvacid manda gati tvāt ādya karma utpattau ca tad abhāvāt anyasya ca sāmarthya anupalabdheḥ vegavat dravya sambandhaḥ numīyate na ca tat pārthivam āpyam vā tasya api guru tva adhikaraṇa tayā ūrdhva gamane guru tva rahitam nimitta antaram vācyam na ca atra agneḥ ūrdhva jvalana svabhāva

original: atha prāṇākhyasya vāyorupalabhyamānasparśādhiṣṭhānatayā viṣayāntarbhāve 'pi prādhānyajñāpanārthaṃ viśiṣṭārthakriyākāritayā pṛthagabhidhānam । tathā tattvajñānino yogābhyāse pravartamānasya prāṇo 'tyantamupakārīti pṛthagucyata ityāha “prāṇo 'ntaḥśarīre rasamaladhātūnāṃ preraṇādihetuḥ”(*) iti । tathā hyantaḥśarīre vartamānatvāt prāṇa ityukte rasādibhirvyabhicāraḥ, tadarthaṃ rasamaladhātūnāṃ preraṇādiheturiti । tathāpi rasādipreraṇahetutvāt prāṇa ityukte 'dṛṣṭādiṣu vyabhicāraḥ, tadartham antaḥśarīre vartamāna iti । na cādṛṣṭādayo 'ntaḥśarīre vartante 'dṛṣṭasya cātmavṛttitvād, īśvarasya cāvṛttimattvāditi । tadevamantaḥśarīre vartamāno rasādipreraṇahetutvād itarasmād bhidyate, prāṇa iti vā vyavahartavyaḥ ।
analyzed: atha prāṇa ākhyasya vāyoḥ upalabhyamāna sparśa adhiṣṭhāna tayā viṣaya antarbhāve pi prādhānya jñāpana artham viśiṣṭa artha kriyā kāritayā pṛthak abhidhānam tathā tattva jñāninaḥ yoga abhyāse pravartamānasya tyantam upakāri iti pṛthak ucyate iti āha prāṇaḥ ntar śarīre rasa mala dhātūnām preraṇa ādi hetuḥ iti tathā hi antar śarīre vartamāna tvāt prāṇaḥ iti ukte rasa ādibhiḥ vyabhicāraḥ tad artham rasa mala dhātūnām preraṇa ādi h

original: athāsau kimeko 'neka ityāha “ekaḥ san kriyābhedād apānādisaṃjñāṃ labhate”(*) iti । atha vāstavabhedaḥ kasmānneṣyate ? bādhakopapatteḥ । tathā hi pañca vāyavaḥ śarīre yadi vyāptyā vartante tadā sambandhādeko vāyurbhavatīti pañcatvanivṛttiḥ । athāvyāptyā, tathāpyekena śarīrasya vyāpanādapareṣāmasambhava iti manyamānaḥ kriyābhedena bhedamāha । sa eva mukhanāsikābhyāṃ niṣkramaṇaśīlo vāyuḥ prāṇākhyaḥ । adhonayanānmalāderapānaḥ । samaṃ nayanāt samānaḥ । ūrdhvaṃ nayanādudānaḥ । vividhamanekaprakāreṇa nayanād vyāna iti ।

original: {sṛṣṭisaṃhāravidhiḥ}
analyzed: sṛṣṭi saṃhāra vidhiḥ

original: athedānīṃ bhūtānāṃ parīkṣāśeṣanivartanadvāreṇeśvaraparīkṣārthaṃ “caturṇām”(*) ityādiprakaraṇam । tathā hi bhūtānāmuddeśānantaraṃ pūrvaprakaraṇeṣu lakṣaṇaparīkṣābhidhāne 'pi sṛṣṭisaṃhāravidhirnoktaḥ । tatheśvara ūrdhvaṃ namaskāravyājenoddiṣṭo lakṣaṇataśca, pradhānatvād dharmaparīkṣāmantareṇa parīkṣituṃ na śakyata iti prakaraṇārambhaḥ । sṛṣṭisaṃhāravidhiśca tulyatayaikasminneva prakaraṇe 'bhidhīyate । pratiprakaraṇābhidhāne tu prakaraṇacatuṣṭayametāvat syāditi saṅgraharūpatāvyāghātaḥ ।
analyzed: atha idānīm bhūtānām parīkṣā śeṣa nivartana dvāreṇa īśvara parīkṣā artham caturṇām ityādi prakaraṇam tathā hi bhūtānām uddeśa anantaram pūrva prakaraṇeṣu lakṣaṇa parīkṣā abhidhāne sṛṣṭi saṃhāra vidhiḥ na uktaḥ tathā īśvaraḥ ūrdhvam namaskāra vyājena uddiṣṭaḥ lakṣaṇataḥ ca pradhāna tvāt dharma parīkṣām antareṇa parīkṣitum na śakyate iti prakaraṇa ārambhaḥ sṛṣṭi saṃhāra vidhiḥ ca tulya tayā ekasmin eva

original: nanvevaṃ vaidharmyāvasare sādharmyapratipādanamanyāyyam ? na । pratyekaṃ bhūteṣu sṛṣṭisaṃhāravidhervailakṣaṇye 'pi ekatrābhidhānāt sādharmyajñānam, na paramārthataḥ । na ca vaidharmye 'bhidhīyamāne yad yat sādharmyaṃ tasya pratiṣedhaḥ । yathā pṛthivyādīnāṃ paramāṇukāryarūpatayā dvaividhyam । kāryañca “śarīrāditrayaṃ parasparavailakṣaṇyād vaidharmye 'pi na sādharmyarūpatāṃ vijahātīti”(*) ।
analyzed: nanu evam vaidharmya avasare sādharmya pratipādanam anyāyyam na pratyekam bhūteṣu sṛṣṭi saṃhāra vidheḥ vailakṣaṇye pi ekatra abhidhānāt sādharmya jñānam na paramārthataḥ na ca vaidharmye bhidhīyamāne yat yat sādharmyam tasya pratiṣedhaḥ yathā pṛthivī ādīnām paramāṇu kārya rūpatayā dvaividhyam kāryam ca śarīra ādi trayam paraspara vailakṣaṇyāt vaidharmye pi na sādharmya rūpatām vijahāti iti

original: atha caturṇām ityukte na jñāyate keṣām ato “mahābhūtānām”(*) iti । mahadgrahaṇam aṇuvyavacchedārtham । nanvevaṃ dvyaṇukasyāpi sṛṣṭisaṃhāravato vyavacchedaḥ syāt ? na । mahadārambhakatvena tasyāpi mahacchabdavācyatvāt । tathā hi, dvyaṇukādiprakrameṇotpattividhānāt saṃhārasya ca paramāṇvantasya dvyaṇuke 'pi sṛṣṭisaṃhāravidhau pratijñā kāryaiva । sā caivaṃ kṛtā syāt । tathāpi mahābhūtānāmityukte na jñāyate kiyatāmiti, tathāpi caturṇāṃ bhūtānāmityukte na jñāyate keṣāmataḥ “pṛthivyādīnām”(*) iti labhyate । na cākāśasya etadvyākhyānāvasarasaṃgatyā astvavasaraḥ । tadevaṃ caturṇāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ sṛṣṭisaṃhārayorvidhiḥ prakārastāvevābhidhīyete aneneti । vidhiḥ pramāṇaṃ tābhyāṃ vā pramāṇabhūtābhyāṃ vidhirvidhātā kartocyata ityāvartyamānam anekārthametadeva vākyam ।
analyzed: atha caturṇām iti ukte na jñāyate keṣām atas mahābhūtānām iti mahat grahaṇam aṇu vyavaccheda artham nanu evam dvyaṇukasya api sṛṣṭi saṃhāravataḥ vyavacchedaḥ syāt na mahat ārambhaka tvena tasya api mahat śabda vācya tvāt tathā hi dvyaṇuka ādi prakrameṇa utpatti vidhānāt saṃhārasya ca paramāṇu antasya dvyaṇuke sṛṣṭi saṃhāra vidhau pratijñā kāryā eva sā ca evam kṛtā syāt tathā api mahābhūtānām iti ukte na jñāyate kiyatām iti tathā

original: tad “brāhmeṇa mānena”(*) ityādinā saṃhāravidhervyākhyānaṃ kramātikrameṇādau saṃsārasyānāditvajñāpanārtham । tathā hi, saṃhārāt pūrvaṃ sṛṣṭirlabhyate tato 'pi saṃhāra ityanāditvam । sa ca saṃhāraḥ kathaṃ bhavatītyāha “maheśvarecchātmāṇusaṃyogajakarmabhyaḥ śarīrendriyakāraṇāṇuvibhāgebhyastatsaṃyoganivṛttau teṣāmāparamāṇvanto vināśaḥ”(*) iti । teṣāṃ śarīrendriyāṇāmārambhakeṣvaṇuṣu dravyārambhakasaṃyoganivṛttau dvyaṇukavināśe tadārabdha<I,098>syāpi nivṛttirityāha maheśvarecchātmāṇusaṃyogajakarmabhyaḥ śarīrendriyakāraṇāṇuvibhāgebhyaḥ, paramāṇuryāvat tāvad vināśa iti । dravyārambhakasaṃyoganivṛttiḥ svakāraṇāṇuvibhāgebhyaḥ te ca maheśvarecchātmāṇusaṃyogajakarmabhyaḥ । tathā hi, maheśvarecchā nimittakāraṇam । ātmanām aṇubhiḥ saṃyogaśca asamavāyikāraṇam । aṇavastu samavāyina ityaṇuṣu karmāṇyutpadyante । kasminnavasara ityāha 〈“sarvātmagatādṛṣṭānām”(*)〉 sarvātmasu gatāśca te 'dṛṣṭāśca teṣām । kiṃviśiṣṭānām ? 〈“śarīrendriyamahābhūtopanibandhakānām”(*)〉 śarīrendriyamahābhūtānyupanibadhyante sampādyante yaisteṣām । vṛttiḥ phaladānasāmarthyam । tasyopabhogād yugapannirodhe vināśe sati । sa ca “sañjihīrṣāsamakālam”(*) । yadā hi sakalabhuvanapatermaheśvarasya saṃhartumicchā sampadyate । sā ca kimartham ? 〈“saṃsārakhinnānām”(*)〉 prāṇināṃ saṃsāre śarīropādānaparityāgadvāreṇa khinnānāṃ niśi rātrāviva viśrāmārtham । yathā hi śarīravyāpārādahani khinnāmāṃ tadabhāvād rātrau viśrāmastathehāpīti ।
analyzed: tat brāhmeṇa mānena ityādinā saṃhāra vidheḥ vyākhyānam krama atikrameṇa ādau saṃsārasya anādi tva jñāpana artham tathā hi saṃhārāt pūrvam sṛṣṭiḥ labhyate saṃhāraḥ iti anādi tvam sa ca saṃhāraḥ katham bhavati iti āha maheśvara icchā ātma aṇu saṃyoga ja karmabhyaḥ śarīra indriya kāraṇa aṇu vibhāgebhyaḥ tad saṃyoga nivṛttau teṣām ā paramāṇu antaḥ vināśaḥ iti teṣām śarīra indriyāṇām ārambhakeṣu aṇuṣu dravya āra

original: kadā ca sañjihīrṣā ? “brahmaṇo 'pavargakāle”(*) । yadā hi adhikārasamāptau brahmā apavṛjyate । sa ca varṣaśatāvasāne vartamānasya brahmaṇo bhavatīti । kena mānenetyāha 〈“brāhmeṇa”(*)〉 । brahmaṇa idaṃ brāhmaṃ teneti । tatpunaḥ
analyzed: kadā ca sañjihīrṣā brahmaṇaḥ upavarga kāle  yadā hi adhikāra samāptau brahmā apavṛjyate sa ca varṣa śata avasāne vartamānasya brahmaṇaḥ bhavati iti  kena mānena iti āha brāhmeṇa  brahmaṇaḥ idam brāhmam tena iti tat punar

original: divyaṃ dvādaśasāhasraṃ kalpaṃ viddhi caturyugam /
analyzed: divyam dvādaśa sāhasram kalpam viddhi caturyugam

original: etat sahasraparyantaṃ tadaharbrāhmamucyate //
analyzed: etat sahasra paryantam tat ahar brāhmam ucyate

original: ityevaṃvidhairdinairmāsādayo 'pi vaktavyā iti mānam ।
analyzed: iti evaṃvidhaiḥ dinaiḥ māsa ādayaḥ vaktavyāḥ iti mānam

original: evaṃ yathā brahmaṇo 'pavargakāle maheśvarasya sañjihīrṣāsamakālaṃ viśiṣṭādṛṣṭānāṃ vṛttinirodhe sati śarīrendriyāṇāṃ vināśastathā “pṛthivyudakajvalanapavanānāmapi mahābhūtānāmanenaiva krameṇa”(*) iti ।
analyzed: evam yathā upavarga kāle maheśvarasya sañjihīrṣā sama kālam viśiṣṭa adṛṣṭānām vṛtti nirodhe sati śarīra indriyāṇām vināśaḥ tathā pṛthivī udaka jvalana pavanānām api mahābhūtānām anena eva krameṇa iti

original: paramāṇuṣu karmotpattau vibhāgebhyaḥ satsaṃyoganivṛttidvāreṇottarasminnuttarasmin sati pūrvasya pūrvasya vināśa ityutpattyapekṣayā । yad yat pūrvamutpannaṃ tattad uttarasminnuttarasmin vidyamāne sati vinaśyatīti । tathā hi, uttarasmin sati pūrvaṃ vāyorvināśastadanantaramudakasyetyādi ।
analyzed: paramāṇuṣu karma utpattau vibhāgebhyaḥ sat saṃyoga nivṛtti dvāreṇa uttarasmin uttarasmin sati pūrvasya pūrvasya vināśaḥ iti utpatti apekṣayā yat yat pūrvam utpannam tat tat uttarasmin uttarasmin vidyamāne sati vinaśyati iti tathā hi uttarasmin sati pūrvam vāyoḥ vināśaḥ tad anantaram udakasya ityādi

original: anye tu etadvākyaṃ pāṭhāpekṣayaiva vivakṣitamiti manyante । tathā hi, yathā śarīrendriyāṇāṃ vināśastathā pṛthivyudakajvalanapavanānāmapi mahābhūtānāṃ vināśo 'nenaiva krameṇeti pāṭhakrameṇa, na kramāntareṇeti । evañca śarīrendriyamahābhūtānāṃ vināśe tadā<I,099>śritānāṃ guṇakarmaṇāmapi vināśaḥ । tataḥ pravibhaktāḥ kāryānādhārāḥ paramāṇavo 'vatiṣṭhante । tathā na paraṃ paramāṇavo dharmādharmasaṃskārairanuviddhāḥ sambaddhā ātmānaścāvatiṣṭhante ।
analyzed: anye tu etat vākyam pāṭha apekṣayā eva vivakṣitam iti manyante tathā hi yathā śarīra indriyāṇām vināśaḥ tathā pṛthivī udaka jvalana pavanānām api mahābhūtānām vināśaḥ nena eva krameṇa iti pāṭha krameṇa na krama antareṇa iti evañca śarīra indriya mahābhūtānām vināśe guṇa karmaṇām api vināśaḥ tatas pravibhaktāḥ kārya anādhārāḥ paramāṇavaḥ vatiṣṭhante tathā na param paramāṇavaḥ dharma adharma saṃskāraiḥ anuviddhāḥ sa

original: athānyeṣāmapi sāmānyādīnāmavasthāne kimarthaṃ viśeṣābhidhānamiti cet, dravyavināśasya paramāṇvantatājñāpanārtham । ātmanāñca dharmādivināśakāraṇa〈tvā〉bhāvād dharmādharmasaṃskārānuviddhānāmavasthānam, na kevalānāmiti । anyathā hi nimittābhāvāt punarutpattirna syāt ।
analyzed: atha anyeṣām api sāmānya ādīnām avasthāne kimartham viśeṣa abhidhānam iti ced dravya vināśasya paramāṇu anta tā jñāpana artham ātmanām ca dharma ādi vināśa kāraṇa tva abhāvāt dharma adharma saṃskāra anuviddhānām avasthānam na kevalānām iti anyathā hi nimitta abhāvāt punarutpattiḥ na syāt

original: atha kiyantaṃ kālamevamavasthānamityāha “tāvantameva kālam”(*) iti । brāhmeṇa mānena varṣaśataṃ yāvaditi ।
analyzed: atha kiyantam kālam evam avasthānam iti āha tāvantam eva kālam iti brāhmeṇa mānena varṣa śatam yāvat iti

original: tataḥ punarvarṣaśatānte 'pi viśrāmaprāpakādṛṣṭanivṛttau prāṇināṃ karmavipākopalambhāt “bhogabhūtaye”(*) bhogabhūtyartham । maheśvarasya “sisṛkṣā”(*) sraṣṭumicchā sampadyate । tadanantaraṃ pavanaparamāṇuṣu samavetāni karmāṇyutpadyante । kebhyaḥ kāraṇebhya ityāha “tatsaṃyogebhyaḥ”(*) । teṣāṃ bhogināṃ saṃyogāḥ paramāṇubhistebhya ityasamavāyikāraṇanirdeśaḥ । te ca karmārambhe sāpekṣā ityāha “sarvātmagatavṛttilabdhādṛṣṭāpekṣebhyaḥ”(*) iti । sarvātmasu bhogiṣu gatāḥ sarvātmagatāste ca te vṛttilabdhādṛṣṭāśceti । vṛttyā sahakārikāraṇena labdhāśca te 'dṛṣṭāśceti tathoktāstānapekṣyanta iti tadapekṣāstebhya iti । na tu vṛttirlabdhā yairiti vyākhyānam, atra niṣṭhāntasya pūrvanipātaprasaṅgāt ।
analyzed: tatas punar varṣa śata ante viśrāma prāpaka adṛṣṭa nivṛttau prāṇinām karma vipāka upalambhāt bhoga bhūtaye bhoga bhūti artham maheśvarasya sisṛkṣā sraṣṭum icchā sampadyate tad anantaram pavana paramāṇuṣu samavetāni karmāṇi utpadyante kebhyaḥ kāraṇebhyaḥ iti āha tad saṃyogebhyaḥ teṣām bhoginām saṃyogāḥ paramāṇubhiḥ tebhyaḥ iti asamavāyi kāraṇa nirdeśaḥ te ca karma ārambhe sa apekṣāḥ iti āha sarva ātma gata vṛtti labdha ad

original: atha kāsau vṛttiradṛṣṭānāṃ sahakārikāraṇam ? viśrāmaprāpakādṛṣṭābhāvopalakṣitaḥ kālaviśeṣaḥ, tatsadbhāve kāryakaraṇāt । tathā hi, brāhmamānenāparipūrṇe varṣaśate viśrāmaprāpakādṛṣṭasya pratibandhakasya bhāvādupabhogaprāpakādṛṣṭasadbhāve 'pi sṛṣṭirna bhavati । paripūrṇe tu varṣaśate viśiṣṭādṛṣṭābhāvādupabhogaprāpakādṛṣṭānāṃ sṛṣṭyai vyāpāra iti pratibandhakābhāvaviśiṣṭaḥ kālo vṛttisteṣāmiti jñāyate । maheśvarasyāpi tatsadbhāva eva sisṛkṣā bhavatīti ।
analyzed: atha kā asau vṛttiḥ adṛṣṭānām sahakāri kāraṇam viśrāma prāpaka adṛṣṭa abhāva upalakṣitaḥ kāla viśeṣaḥ tad sadbhāve kārya karaṇāt tathā hi brāhma mānena aparipūrṇe varṣa śate viśrāma prāpaka adṛṣṭasya pratibandhakasya bhāvāt upabhoga prāpaka adṛṣṭa sadbhāve sṛṣṭiḥ na bhavati paripūrṇe tu varṣa śate viśiṣṭa adṛṣṭa abhāvāt upabhoga prāpaka adṛṣṭānām sṛṣṭyai vyāpāraḥ iti pratibandhaka abhāva vi

original: tadevaṃ pavanaparamāṇuṣu kāryotpattau satyāmanantaraṃ vibhāgaḥ । tasmāt saṃyoganivṛttau teṣāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ parasparasaṃyogebhyo dvyaṇukānyutpannāni tryaṇukānyārabhanta ityādikrameṇa mahān vāyuḥ samutpanno nabhasyākāśe dodhūyamāna ityatiśayena kampamānastiṣṭhati । sa cādāvutpanno 'tiśayavegasambandhād gurutvavatāmapātaheturbhavati । dṛṣṭañca vāyoḥ parṇādi<I,100>〈patana〉pratibandhe sāmarthyam । ayañcātiśayena mahattve sati vegasambandhād udadhisahitāṃ pṛthivīṃ tṛṇamiva dhārayata iti na citram ।
analyzed: tat evam pavana paramāṇuṣu kārya utpattau satyām anantaram vibhāgaḥ tasmāt saṃyoga nivṛttau teṣām paramāṇūnām paraspara saṃyogebhyaḥ dvyaṇukāni utpannāni tryaṇukāni ārabhante ityādi krameṇa mahān vāyuḥ samutpannaḥ nabhasi ākāśe dodhūyamānaḥ iti atiśayena kampamānaḥ tiṣṭhati sa ca ādau utpannaḥ utiśaya vega sambandhāt gurutvavatām apāta hetuḥ bhavati dṛṣṭam ca vāyoḥ sāmarthyam ayam ca atiśayena mahattve sati vega sambandhāt udad

original: “tadanantaram”(*) vāyūtpattyanantaram, “tasminneva”(*) vāyāvadhikaraṇabhūta eveti । “āpyebhyaḥ paramāṇubhyastenaiva krameṇa”(*) iti । karmotpattidvāreṇa vibhāgebhyaḥ saṃyoganivṛttau parasparasaṃyogebhyo dvyaṇukānyutpadyante, tatastryaṇukamiti krameṇa । “mahān salilanidhiḥ”(*) samudraḥ samutpannaḥ, “poplūyamānaḥ”(*) atyarthaṃ plavamānastiṣṭhati ।
analyzed: tad anantaram vāyu utpatti anantaram tasmin eva vāyau adhikaraṇa bhūtaḥ eva iti āpyebhyaḥ paramāṇubhyaḥ tena eva krameṇa iti karma utpatti dvāreṇa vibhāgebhyaḥ saṃyoga nivṛttau paraspara saṃyogebhyaḥ dvyaṇukāni utpadyante tatas tryaṇukam iti krameṇa mahān salilanidhiḥ samudraḥ samutpannaḥ poplūyamānaḥ atyartham plavamānaḥ tiṣṭhati

original: “tadanantaram”(*) salilotpattyanantaram, “tasmin”(*) salilanidhāvadhikaraṇe, “pārthivebhyaḥ paramāṇubhyaḥ”(*) pūrvakrameṇa dvyaṇukatryaṇukotpattiriti । evamādikrameṇa mahāpṛthivī samutpadyate । sā cotpannā “saṃhatāvatiṣṭhate”(*) ।
analyzed: tad anantaram salila utpatti anantaram tasmin salilanidhau adhikaraṇe pārthivebhyaḥ paramāṇubhyaḥ pūrva krameṇa dvyaṇuka tryaṇuka utpattiḥ iti evamādi krameṇa mahā pṛthivī samutpadyate sā ca utpannā saṃhatā avatiṣṭhate

original: “tasminneva mahodadhau”(*) adhikaraṇe taijasebhyaḥ paramāṇubhyaḥ pūrvavad dvyaṇukotpattikrameṇotpadyate mahāṃstejorāśiḥ । sa cotpanno dedīpyamāno 'tyarthaṃ prakāśamānastiṣṭhati । na ca tejaso jalena virodhādādhārādheyabhāvānupapattiriti vācyam । ādhārādheyabhāvasyāpyupalabdheryathā vāḍavavaruṇāviti ।
analyzed: tasmin eva mahā udadhau adhikaraṇe taijasebhyaḥ paramāṇubhyaḥ pūrvavat dvyaṇuka utpatti krameṇa utpadyate mahān tejaḥ rāśiḥ sa ca utpannaḥ dedīpyamānaḥ u tyartham prakāśamānaḥ tiṣṭhati na ca tejasaḥ jalena virodhāt ādhāra ādheya bhāva anupapattiḥ iti vācyam ādhāra ādheya bhāvasya api upalabdheḥ yathā vāḍava varuṇau iti

original: anye tu virodhaparihārārthaṃ tasminneva mahodadhāviti vākyaṃ pṛthivyāṃ sambandhayanti । tadanantaraṃ tasmin pṛthivyutpāde sati taijasebhyaḥ paramāṇubhyo dvyaṇukādiprakrameṇa mahāṃstejorāśiriti ।
analyzed: anye tu virodha parihāra artham tasmin eva mahā udadhau iti vākyam pṛthivyām sambandhayanti tad anantaram tasmin pṛthivī utpāde sati taijasebhyaḥ paramāṇubhyaḥ dvyaṇuka ādi prakrameṇa mahān tejaḥ rāśiḥ iti

original: atha kartuḥ śarīrādimattvopalabdherīśvare 'pi tathābhāvaḥ, kimatra sādhyate yadi śarīrādimattve 'pi kṣityādikartṛtvamabhyupagamyate ? atha śarīrādimattvād asarvajñasya na kṣityādikartṛtvam ? tarhi kāryasya kartṛvyabhicārād aśarīrasyaiva kartṛtvamabhyupeyam । na ca śarīrādimattve pramāṇamasti । atha kartṛtvameva pramāṇam । tad vyāhatameva । kartṛtvena śarīrādimattvaṃ śarīrādimattvācca kṣityādyakartṛtvamiti ।
analyzed: atha kartuḥ śarīra ādimattva upalabdheḥ īśvare pi tathābhāvaḥ kim atra sādhyate yadi śarīra ādimattve pi kṣiti ādi kartṛ tvam abhyupagamyate atha śarīra ādimattvāt asarvajñasya na kṣiti ādi kartṛ tvam tarhi kāryasya kartṛ vyabhicārāt aśarīrasya eva kartṛ tvam abhyupeyam na ca śarīra ādimattve pramāṇam asti atha kartṛ tvam eva pramāṇam tat vyāhatam eva kartṛ tvena śarīra ādimattvam śarīra ādimattvāt ca kṣiti ādi akartṛ tvam iti

original: na cedaṃ svatantrasādhanam, āśrayāsiddhatvāt । tathā hi siddhe kartṛsadbhāve kartṛtvasya śarīrādimattvasya ca pakṣadharmatvaṃ syāt, na caitadabhyupagatam ।
analyzed: na ca idam svatantra sādhanam āśraya asiddha tvāt tathā hi siddhe kartṛ sadbhāve kartṛ tvasya śarīra ādimattvasya ca pakṣa dharma tvam syāt na ca etat abhyupagatam

original: atha pareṇa kṣityādikartā'bhyupagata ityaniṣṭāpādanametat । na yadi pramāṇāyattastadupagamastenaiva bādhyamānatvādanutthānaṃ viparītānumānasya । na caitasyānenaiva bādhaḥ syāt, tanmūlatvāt । atha pramāṇaṃ vinaivābhyupagataḥ pareṇa ? tarhi pramāṇaṃ vinā prameyasyāsiddheḥ kiṃ viparītānumānena, tasyāśrayāsiddhatāprasaṅgāt । samānañcaitadanyeṣvapīśvarapratiṣedhahetuṣviti ।
analyzed: atha pareṇa kṣiti ādi kartā abhyupagataḥ iti aniṣṭa āpādanam etat na yadi pramāṇa āyattaḥ tad upagamaḥ tena eva bādhyamāna tvāt anutthānam viparīta anumānasya  na ca etasya anena eva bādhaḥ syāt tad mūla tvāt atha pramāṇam vinā eva abhyupagataḥ pareṇa tarhi pramāṇam vinā prameyasya asiddheḥ kim viparīta anumānena tasya āśraya asiddha tā prasaṅgāt  samānam ca etat anyeṣu api īśvara pratiṣedha hetuṣu iti

original: tathā śarīrasambandhe sati niyatadeśatayā yugapadaniyatadeśaṃ kāryaṃ na syāt । tattu dṛṣṭam । athaikamaniyatadeśasya kāryasyotpattyā vyāpi śarīraṃ nityamatīndriyañceṣyate ? tanna । dṛṣṭaviparītatvāt । parañcāśarīrasyaiva kartṛtvamabhyupeyamiti । tathā hi, nityaśarīrā sambhavāt । taccharīraṃ tatsampādyameveti kiṃ śarīrāntareṇa (vinā cārabhyate)<?> । śarīrāntarābhyupagame tad anyaśarīrayuktena sampādyata iti śarīraparamparāyāmupakṣīṇatvād bhagavato nānyatkāryaṃ prādurbhavediti । a〈tha〉(thā)<?> śarīrasyaiva śarīrakartṛtvaṃ tatkāryāvasare 'pi <I,105> na bādhyata iti 〈cet〉, tathā 〈sati〉 saṃhārāvasthāyāṃ śarīrasya nāśe punaḥ sargādāvaśarīrasyākartṛtve kāryotpattirna syādityaśarīrasyaiva kartṛtvamabhyu(pagatam)<?>〈peyam〉 ।
analyzed: tathā śarīra sambandhe sati niyata deśa tayā yugapad aniyata deśam kāryam na syāt tat tu dṛṣṭam atha ekam aniyata deśasya kāryasya utpattyā vyāpi śarīram nityam atīndriyam ca iṣyate tat na dṛṣṭa viparīta tvāt param ca aśarīrasya eva kartṛ tvam abhyupeyam iti tathā hi nitya śarīrā sambhavāt tat śarīram tat sampādyam eva iti kim śarīra antareṇa vinā ca ārabhyate śarīra antara abhyupagame tat anya śarīra yuktena sampādyate iti śarīra paramparāyām upak

original: atha prayojanāpekṣitayā kartṝṇāṃ pravṛtterupalambhāt tadabhāvācceśvare pravṛttyabhāva iti cet, tadasat । kāryasadbhāvena kartṛsadabhāvasiddheḥ । tasya ca svayaṃ paripūrṇatvāt parārthā pravṛttirgamyate । yad vā pravṛttiśīlatvād bhagavato nāyaṃ paryanuyoga iti । yathā hi bhāsvān prakāśanaśīlatvāt padārthān prakāśayati, evamitaro 'pi kāryakāraṇarūpatvāt kāryaṃ karotīti ।
analyzed: atha prayojana apekṣi tayā kartṝṇām pravṛtteḥ upalambhāt tad abhāvāt ca īśvare pravṛtti abhāvaḥ iti ced tat asat kārya sadbhāvena kartṛ sadabhāva siddheḥ tasya ca svayam paripūrṇa tvāt parārthā pravṛttiḥ gamyate yat vā pravṛtti śīla tvāt bhagavataḥ na ayam paryanuyogaḥ iti yathā hi bhāsvān prakāśana śīla tvāt padārthān prakāśayati evam itaraḥ pi kārya kāraṇa rūpa tvāt kāryam karoti iti

original: athāśarīrasyecchāmātreṇa kathaṃ prerakatvam ? yathāsmadādyātmanaḥ śarīrādiprerakatvamiti । atha satyeva śarīre preryaprerakatvam ? ihāpi satyeva paramāṇau preryaprerakatvamiti samānam ।
analyzed: atha aśarīrasya icchā mātreṇa katham preraka tvam yathā asmat ādi ātmanaḥ śarīra ādi preraka tvam iti atha sati eva śarīre prerya preraka tvam iha api sati eva paramāṇau prerya preraka tvam iti samānam

analyzed: atha sisṛkṣā sañjihīrṣā vā maheśvarasya yadi nityā satatam kārya utpattiḥ atha anityā sā api īśvara icchām vinā na bhavati iti aparam icchāntaram tat api anitya tvāt īśvara icchā adhīnam iti anavasthāyām tad sampādane eva upakṣīṇa tvāt bhagavataḥ na kārya antare vyāpāraḥ syāt  / atha īśvara icchām vinā api īśvara icchā sampādyate tarhi kārya antare pi evam astu  /

original: atha vidhyaṅgatvādamīṣāṃ prādhānyaṃ na svarūpārthatvāditi cet, tadasat । svārthapratipādakatvena vidhyaṅgatvāt । tathā hi, stuteḥ svārthapratipādakatvenāpravartakatvam, nindāyāśca nivartakatvam । anyathā hi tadarthāparijñāne vihitapratiṣiddheṣvaviśeṣeṇa pravṛttinivṛttī syātām । tathā vidhivākyasyāpi svārthapratipādanadvāreṇaiva puruṣaprerakatvaṃ dṛṣṭam । evaṃ svarūpapareṣvapi vākyeṣu syāt, vākyarūpatayā aviśeṣād viśeṣahetoścābhāvāditi ।
analyzed: atha vidhi aṅga tvāt amīṣām prādhānyam na svarūpa artha tvāt iti ced tat asat svārtha pratipādaka tvena vidhi aṅga tvāt tathā hi stuteḥ svārtha pratipādaka tvena apravartaka tvam nindāyāḥ ca nivartaka tvam anyathā hi tad artha aparijñāne vihita pratiṣiddheṣu aviśeṣeṇa pravṛtti nivṛttī syātām tathā vidhi vākyasya api svārtha pratipādana dvāreṇa eva puruṣa preraka tvam dṛṣṭam evam sva rūpa pareṣu api vākyeṣu syāt vākya rūpatayā aviśeṣāt

original: tathā svarūpārthānāmaprāmāṇye “medhyā āpo darbhāḥ pavitramamedhyaṃ ....... maśuciḥ” ityevaṃrūpāparijñāne vidhyaṅgatāyāmaviśeṣeṇa pravṛttinivṛttiprasaṅgaḥ । na caitadasti । medhyeṣveva pravartante, amedhyeṣu ca nivartanta ityupalambhāt । tadevaṃ svarūpārthebhyo vākyebhyo 'rthasvarūpāvabodhe sati iṣṭe pravṛttidarśanādaniṣṭe ca nivṛttiriti jñāyate, svarūpārthānāṃ pramājanakatvena pravṛttau nivṛttau vā vidhisahakāritvamiti । aparijñānena tu pravṛttāvatiprasaṅgaḥ ।
analyzed: tathā svarūpa arthānām aprāmāṇye medhyāḥ āpaḥ darbhāḥ pavitram amedhyam maśuciḥ iti evaṃrūpa aparijñāne vidhi aṅga tāyām aviśeṣeṇa pravṛtti nivṛtti prasaṅgaḥ na ca etat asti medhyeṣu eva pravartante amedhyeṣu ca nivartante iti upalambhāt tat evam svarūpa arthebhyaḥ vākyebhyaḥ rtha svarūpa avabodhe sati iṣṭe pravṛtti darśanāt aniṣṭe ca nivṛttiḥ iti jñāyate svarūpa arthānām pramā janaka tvena pravṛttau nivṛttau vā vidhi sahakār

original: atha svarūpārthānāṃ prāmāṇye “grāvāṇaḥ plavante” ityādīnāmapi yathārthatā syāt । na । mukhye bādhakopapatteḥ । yatra hi mukhye bādhakaṃ pramāṇamasti tatropacāraḥ kalpyate । tadabhāve tu prāmāṇyameva । na ceśvarasadbhāvapratipādakeṣvasti kiñcid bādhakamiti । tadevaṃ sṛṣṭisaṃhārapratipādakānāmapi vākyānāṃ svarūpe 'rthe prāmāṇyād viparītārthakalpanā anyāyyeti ।
analyzed: atha svarūpa arthānām prāmāṇye grāvāṇaḥ plavante ityādīnām api yathārtha tā syāt na mukhye bādhaka upapatteḥ yatra hi mukhye bādhakam pramāṇam asti tatra upacāraḥ kalpyate tad abhāve tu prāmāṇyam eva na ca īśvara sadbhāva pratipādakeṣu asti kiñcid bādhakam iti tat evam sṛṣṭi saṃhāra pratipādakānām api vākyānām svarūpe rthe prāmāṇyāt viparīta artha kalpanā anyāyyā iti

original: etena śākyapakṣo 'pi pratiṣiddha eva । tathā hi, śākyā api dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayorutkarṣāpakarṣeṇa pratya(dhi)<?>〈va〉tiṣṭhante । tatra coktameva prati(sādha)<?>〈samādhā〉namiti । tacca jātyuttaram । yat kāryaṃ yādṛśakartrā vyāptamupalabdhaṃ yadupalabdheretatkriyādarśinaḥ “kenāpyetat sampāditam” iti buddhirbhavati, tadevopalabhyamānaṃ tādṛśameva kartāraṃ gamayet । taduktam,
analyzed: etena śākya pakṣaḥ pi pratiṣiddhaḥ eva tathā hi śākyāḥ api dṛṣṭānta dārṣṭāntikayoḥ utkarṣa apakarṣeṇa pratyadhivatiṣṭhante tatra ca uktam eva pratisādha samādhānam iti tat ca jāti uttaram yat kāryam yādṛśa kartrā vyāptam upalabdham yad upalabdheḥ etad kriyā darśinaḥ kena api etat sampāditam iti buddhiḥ bhavati tat eva upalabhyamānam tādṛśam eva kartāram gamayet tat uktam

analyzed: katham tarhi idam kṣiti ādi kāryam karma jam iti katham hi karma jam jagatām vaicitryam iti uktam tat ca cetanā mānasam karma iti na vijñānāt artha antaram iti

original: sarvametadasambaddham । sāmānyena kāryatvasya 〈kartṛvyāpyatvaṃ〉, buddhimatā vyāpterupalambhāt kṣitāvapi tatsiddheḥ । sarvañcānumānamanya〈tra 〉sāmānyena vyāptigrahaṇāpekṣaṃ pravartata ityuktam । na kiñcidapyanumānaṃ pakṣe vyāptigrahaṇāpekṣaṃ sambhavatītyadūṣaṇametat । kṣityādikāryaṃ na kartṛvyāptamupalabdhamiti । na cetthambhūtaṃ kāryaṃ ka〈rtṛ〉<?>(rtra)vinābhūtaṃ nopalabdhamityanumānābhāva iti vācyam, sarvānumānocchedaprasaṅgāt । tathā hi, kṛtakatvādanityatvaṃ śabde 'bhyupagatam । atrāpi śakyate vaktuṃ “yat śabde kṛtakatvaṃ tannānyatrānityatvāvinābhāvitayopalabdham” ityanumānābhāvaḥ । atha sāmānyena kṛtakatvānityatvayoranyatra vyāptigrahaṇe satyanumānaṃ na pakṣe iti cet, samānamīśvarānumāne 'pīti । na cātra śabda(sāmānya)<?>〈sāmya〉meva, kāryatvasyobhayatrāvyabhicāriṇaḥ sadbhāvāt । na caivaṃ pāṇḍutvamagnergamakam, tasyāgnimantareṇa sadbhāvena vyabhicāritvāditi । evañca valmīkādāvapi mṛdvikāratvaṃ na kulālapūrvakatve liṅgam, vyabhicārāt । tasya hi prākāreṣṭakādiṣvakulālapūrvakeṣvapi sadbhāvāt ।
analyzed: sarvam etat asambaddham sāmānyena kāryatvasya kartṛ vyāpya tvam buddhimatā vyāpteḥ upalambhāt kṣitau api tad siddheḥ sarvañca anumānam anyatra sāmānyena vyāpti grahaṇa apekṣam pravartate iti uktam na kiñcid api anumānam pakṣe vyāpti grahaṇa apekṣam sambhavati iti adūṣaṇam etat kṣiti ādi kāryam na kartṛ vyāptam upalabdham iti na ca itthambhūtam kāryam na upalabdham iti anumāna abhāvaḥ iti vācyam sarva anumāna uccheda prasaṅgāt tathā hi kṛta anumāna

original: yaccedaṃ karmajaṃ jagatāṃ vaicitryamiti, tadiṣyata eva । yadi nāmācetanatvāt karma cetanādhiṣṭhitaṃ kāryakaraṇe pravartata itīśvarasyāpi sadbhāvaḥ (para)<?>〈kārya〉syāpi sadbhāvaḥ । yadyapi cetanenaiva karma tathāpi nāpi tasya vidādhāratvaṃ cetanatvameva । na ca tasya bodhena tādātmyamātmaguṇatvasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt । nāpīdamekaśākhāprabhavatvānumānena tulyam । tatra hyekaśākhāprabhavatvena hetunā phalāntarāṇāṃ pāke sādhye pratyakṣeṇa bādhodayādaprāmāṇyaṃ yuktam, na caivamīśvarānumāna iti ।
analyzed: yat ca idam karma jam jagatām vaicitryam iti tat iṣyate eva yadi nāma acetana tvāt karma cetanā dhiṣṭhitam kārya karaṇe pravartate iti īśvarasya api sadbhāvaḥ para kāryasya api sadbhāvaḥ yadi api cetanena eva karma tathā api nā api tasya vid ādhāra tvam cetana tvam eva na ca tasya bodhena tādātmyam ātma guṇa tvasya vakṣyamāṇa tvāt nā api idam eka śākhā prabhava tva anumānena tulyam tatra hi eka śākhā prabhava tvena hetunā phala antarāṇām pāke sādhye praty

original: na ca śarīrādimattvena kartṛtvaṃ vyāptamiti sadabhāvāt tasyāpyabhāva iti ca vācyam । kāryānumānasya cāvyabhicāritve kartṛsadbhāvasiddheḥ । na cātra vyāpakānupalabdherbādhakatvam । anumānasthānumānāntareṇa bādhāyogāt । pūrvānumānena ca dharmisadbhāvasiddhāvupakṛtaviṣayatvam, asiddhau vā na pakṣadharmatvam ।
analyzed: na ca śarīra ādimattvena kartṛ tvam vyāptam iti sat abhāvāt tasya api abhāvaḥ iti ca vācyam kārya anumānasya ca avyabhicāri tve kartṛ sadbhāva siddheḥ na ca atra vyāpaka anupalabdheḥ bādhaka tvam anumāna stha anumāna antareṇa bādhā ayogāt pūrva anumānena ca dharmi sadbhāva siddhau upakṛta viṣaya tvam asiddhau vā na pakṣa dharma tvam

original: atha “nityasyāvyatirekitvāt sāmarthyañca duranvayam” <pra. vā. 1.25> ityakartṛkatvameveśvarasya । tanna । kṣaṇikatvapratiṣedhasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt । ayañceśvaravādo 'smadgurubhirvistareṇokta iti neha pratanyate ।
analyzed: atha nityasya avyatireki tvāt sāmarthyam ca duranvayam pra vā iti akartṛkatvam eva īśvarasya tat na kṣaṇikatva pratiṣedhasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt ayaḥ ca īśvara vādaḥ smat gurubhiḥ vistareṇa uktaḥ iti nā iha pratanyate

original: (“ākāśakāladiśāmekaikatvādaparajātyabhāve pāribhāṣikyastisraḥ saṃjñā bhavantyākāśaṃ kālo diniti । tasya guṇāḥ śabdasaṃkhyāparimāṇapṛthaktvasaṃyogavibhāgāḥ । tatra śabdaḥ, pratyakṣatve satyakāraṇaguṇapūrvakatvād ayāvaddravyabhāvitvād āśrayādanyatropalabdheśca na sparśavadviśeṣaguṇaḥ ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: ākāśa kāla diśām eka eka tvāt apara jāti abhāve pāribhāṣikyaḥ tisraḥ saṃjñāḥ bhavanti ākāśam kālaḥ tasya guṇāḥ śabda saṃkhyā parimāṇa pṛthaktva saṃyoga vibhāgāḥ tatra śabdaḥ pratyakṣa tve satya kāraṇa guṇa pūrvaka tvāt ayāvaddravyabhāvi tvāt āśrayāt anyatra upalabdheḥ ca na sparśavat viśeṣa guṇaḥ

original: (“bāhyendriyapratyakṣatvād ātmāntaragrāhyatvād ātmanyasamavāyād ahaṅkāreṇa vibhaktagrahaṇācca nātmaguṇaḥ ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: bāhya indriya pratyakṣa tvāt ātma antara grāhya tvāt ātmani asamavāyāt ahaṅkāreṇa vibhakta grahaṇāt ca na ātma guṇaḥ

original: (“śrotragrāhyatvād viśeṣaguṇabhāvācca na dikkālamanasām ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: śrotra grāhya tvāt viśeṣa guṇa bhāvāt ca na diś kāla manasām

original: (“pāriśeṣyād guṇo bhūtvākāśasyādhigame liṅgam । śabdaliṅgāviśeṣādekatvaṃ siddham । tadanuvidhānāt pṛthaktvam । vibhavavacanāt paramamahatparimāṇam । śabdakāraṇavacanāt saṃyogavibhāgāviti ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: pāriśeṣyāt guṇaḥ bhūtvā ākāśasya adhigame liṅgam śabda liṅga aviśeṣāt eka tvam siddham tad anuvidhānāt pṛthaktvam vibhava vacanāt parama mahat parimāṇam śabda kāraṇa vacanāt saṃyoga vibhāgau iti pdhs

original: (“ato guṇavattvād anāśritatvācca dravyam । samānāsamānajātīyakāraṇāsambhavācca nityam । sarvaprāṇināñca śabdopalabdhau nimittaṃ śrotrabhāvena ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: atas guṇavat tvāt anāśrita tvāt ca dravyam samāna asamāna jātīya kāraṇa asambhavāt ca nityam sarva prāṇinām ca śabda upalabdhau nimittam śrotra bhāvena

original: (“śrotraṃ punaḥ śravaṇavivarasaṃjñako nabhodeśaḥ śabdanimittopabhoga<I,109>prāpakadharmādharmopanibaddhaḥ । tasya ca nityatve satyupanibandhakavaikalyād bādhiryamiti ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: śrotram punar śravaṇa vivara saṃjñakaḥ nabhaḥ deśaḥ    tasya ca nitya tve sati upanibandhaka vaikalyāt bādhiryam iti

original: idānīmākāśasyoddeśavato lakṣaṇaparīkṣārthaṃ prakaraṇam “ākāśakāladiśāmekaikatvādaparajātyabhāve pāribhāṣikyastisraḥ saṃjñā bhavanti”(*) iti । etāśca samuccayaṃ vinā ākāśādīnāṃ lakṣaṇamityāha “ākāśaṃ kālo digiti”(*) yathāsaṃkhyam । tathā hi “iti”śabdasya pratyekamabhisambandhādākāśamiti saṃjñā ākāśe, kāla iti kāle, diksaṃjñā diśi, na tisro 'pyekasminniti ।
analyzed: idānīm ākāśasya uddeśavataḥ lakṣaṇa parīkṣā artham prakaraṇam ākāśa kāla diśām ekaika tvāt apara jāti abhāve pāribhāṣikyaḥ tisraḥ saṃjñāḥ bhavanti iti etāḥ ca samuccayam vinā ākāśa ādīnām lakṣaṇam iti āha ākāśam kālaḥ diś iti yathāsaṃkhyam tathā hi iti śabdasya pratyekam abhisambandhāt ākāśam iti saṃjñā ākāśe kālaḥ iti kāle diś saṃjñā diśi na tisraḥ pi ekasmin iti

original: atha kasmādimāḥ pāribhāṣikyaḥ ? dravyaguṇakarmātmakasya nimittasyābhāvāt । athākāśatvādi sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ nimittaṃ bhaviṣyatītyāha “aparajātyabhāve”(*) iti । aparā hi jātidravyatvāpekṣayākāśatvakālatvadiktvarūpā, sā tu na sambhavatyeva ākāśāderekatvāt, sāmānyasya ca nānādhiṣṭhānatvāditi ।
analyzed: atha kasmāt imāḥ pāribhāṣikyaḥ dravya guṇa karma ātmakasya nimittasya abhāvāt atha ākāśa tva ādi sāmānya lakṣaṇam nimittam bhaviṣyati iti āha apara jāti abhāve iti aparā hi jāti dravya tva apekṣayā ākāśa tva kāla tva diś tva rūpā sā tu na sambhavati eva ākāśa ādeḥ ekatvāt sāmānyasya ca nānā adhiṣṭhāna tvāt iti

original: na cākāśādīnāṃ pāribhāṣikyastisraḥ saṃjñā bhavantīti sādharmyābhidhānaṃ na sambaddham । vaidharmyāvasareṇa saṃjñānāṃ parasparavyāvṛttatayā vaidharmyarūpatvād, ekatrābhidhānañca śāstrasya saṅgraharūpatvāditi । tathā cākāśamiti saṃjñā anādikālapravāhāyātā, nānyatra sambhavatītyasādhāraṇatvāllakṣaṇam । etacca viśeṣaṇamarthāllabhyate । tathā hyākāśam, itarasmād bhidyate, anādikālapravāhāyātākāśaśabdavācyatvāt । yastvitarasmādanākāśāderna bhidyate, na cāsāvevam, yathā kṣityādi na ca tathākāśaḥ, tasmād bhidyata iti ।
analyzed: na ca ākāśa ādīnām pāribhāṣikyaḥ tisraḥ saṃjñāḥ bhavanti iti sādharmya abhidhānam na sambaddham vaidharmya avasareṇa saṃjñānām paraspara vyāvṛtta tayā vaidharmya rūpatvāt ekatra abhidhānam ca śāstrasya saṅgraha rūpatvāt iti tathā ca ākāśam iti saṃjñā anādi kāla pravāha āyātā na anyatra sambhavati iti asādhāraṇa tvāt lakṣaṇam etat ca viśeṣaṇam arthāt labhyate tathā hi ākāśam itarasmāt bhidyate anādi kāla pravāha āyāta ākāśa

original: nanu pāribhāṣikyaḥ saṃjñā na sambhavantyeva nimittacatuṣṭayābhāvasyeva nimittatvād iti cet । tathā hi, yatra dravyaguṇakarmasāmānyātmakaṃ nimittaṃ na sambhavati tatraiva pravartate nānyatreti tadabhāvo nimittam । naitadevam । svānuraktapratyayahetornimittasyātra vivakṣitatvāt । yathā hi dravyaguṇasāmānyānurakto daṇḍītyādivyavahārastathā ca nāyamākāśādivyavahārastadabhāvānurakta iti pāribhāṣikya eva ।
analyzed: nanu pāribhāṣikyaḥ saṃjñāḥ na sambhavanti eva nimitta catuṣṭaya abhāvasya iva nimitta tvāt iti ced tathā hi yatra dravya guṇa karma sāmānya ātmakam nimittam na sambhavati tatra eva pravartate na anyatra iti tad abhāvaḥ nimittam na etat evam sva anurakta pratyaya hetoḥ nimittasya atra vivakṣita tvāt yathā hi dravya guṇa sāmānya anuraktaḥ daṇḍī ityādi vyavahāraḥ tathā ca na ayam ākāśa ādi vyavahāraḥ tad abhāva anuraktaḥ iti pāribhāṣikyaḥ eva

original: pūrvaṃ hi dravyāṇāṃ samavāyitvaṃ guṇatvañcoktam । tatra kairguṇairguṇavat ? keṣāmutpattau samavāyikāraṇam ? kiñca guṇātmakaṃ lakṣaṇamityāha “tasya guṇāḥ śabdasaṃkhyā<I,110>parimāṇapṛthaktvasaṃyogavibhāgāḥ”(*) iti । etairguṇairguṇavat । atra keṣāñcidutpattau samavāyikāraṇam, śabdaścāsādhāraṇatvāllakṣaṇamiti ।
analyzed: pūrvam hi dravyāṇām samavāyi tvam guṇa tvañca uktam tatra kaiḥ guṇaiḥ guṇavat keṣām utpattau samavāyi kāraṇam kiñca guṇa ātmakam lakṣaṇam iti āha tasya guṇāḥ iti etaiḥ guṇaiḥ guṇavat atra keṣāñcid utpattau samavāyi kāraṇam śabdaḥ ca asādhāraṇa tvāt lakṣaṇam iti

original: nanu sarvametadāśrayāsiddham, ākāśasadbhāve pramāṇābhāvāt । na । pratyakṣeṇānupalambhe 'pyanumānena sadbhāvasiddheḥ । kimanumānamityāha “śabdaḥ”(*) iti । tathā hi, śabdaḥ kvacidāśritaḥ, guṇatvād, yo yo guṇaḥ sa sa kvacidāśritaḥ, yathā rūpādiḥ, tathā cāyaṃ guṇaḥ, tasmādāśrita iti ।
analyzed: nanu sarvam etat āśraya asiddham ākāśa sadbhāve pramāṇa abhāvāt na pratyakṣeṇa anupalambhe pi anumānena sadbhāva siddheḥ kim anumānam iti āha śabdaḥ iti tathā hi śabdaḥ kvacid āśritaḥ guṇa tvāt yaḥ yaḥ guṇaḥ sa sa kvacid āśritaḥ yathā rūpa ādiḥ tathā ca ayam guṇaḥ tasmāt āśritaḥ iti

original: atha pṛthivyāderguṇo bhaviṣyatītyāha “na sparśavadviśeṣaguṇaḥ”(*) asmadādipratyakṣatve satyakāraṇaguṇapūrvakatvāt, yo yo 'smadādipratyakṣatve satyakāraṇapūrvakaḥ sa sa sparśavatāṃ viśeṣaguṇo na bhavati, yathā sukhādiḥ, tathā cāyaṃ yathoktasādhanaḥ, tasmāt sparśavatāṃ viśeṣaguṇo na bhavatīti ।
analyzed: atha pṛthivī ādeḥ guṇaḥ bhaviṣyati iti āha na sparśavat viśeṣa guṇaḥ asmat ādi pratyakṣa tve satya kāraṇa guṇa pūrvaka tvāt yaḥ yaḥ smat ādi pratyakṣa tve satya kāraṇa pūrvakaḥ sa sa sparśavatām viśeṣa guṇaḥ na bhavati yathā sukha ādiḥ tathā ca ayam yathā ukta sādhanaḥ tasmāt sparśavatām viśeṣa guṇaḥ na bhavati iti

original: nanu cātra viśeṣaguṇapratiṣedhe sādhye sāmānyaguṇaprāptiḥ viśeṣapratiṣedhasya śeṣābhyanujñāyāṃ sāmarthyopalabdheḥ । atha sāmānyaguṇapratiṣedhastathāpi viśeṣaguṇaprāptiriti । naitadevam । pratiyogyapekṣatvāt pakṣādivyavasthāyāḥ । tathā hi, pareṇa kṣityādiviśeṣaguṇatvaṃ śabdasyābhyupagataṃ tasyaiva pratiṣedhaḥ, sāmānyaguṇatvañca neṣṭameva । śeṣābhyanujñā tu yatrobhayoḥ pramāṇena prasiddhistatraikapratiṣedhe 'nyasyāpratiṣiddhasyāvasthānam । yathā darśanaṃ savyetaracakṣurbhyāṃ saṃpādyaṃ dṛṣṭamityekapratiṣedhe 'nyasyāpratiṣedhādavasthānamiti । na caivaṃ śabdasya kṣityādisāmānyaguṇatvaṃ parasya siddhamityadūṣaṇametat । ata eva yadyapi saṃyogavibhāgāderasmadādipratyakṣatve satyakāraṇaguṇapūrvakatvam, tathāpi sparśavadviśeṣaguṇatvaṃ nāstīti sapakṣe 'ntarbhāvādanaikāntikatvābhāvaḥ । rūpādayaśca vipakṣāste ca kāraṇaguṇapūrvakā iti sādhanaśūnyā eva । tathāpi pārthivaparamāṇurūpādayo 'kāraṇaguṇapūrvakāḥ sparśavatāṃ viśeṣaguṇāśceti vyabhicāraḥ, tadarthamasmadādipratyakṣatve satīti viśeṣaṇam । te tu yogināmeva pratyakṣā iti । asmadādipratipādanāya śāstrasyārambhādasmadādiviśeṣaṇantu labhyate ।
analyzed: nanu ca atra viśeṣa guṇa pratiṣedhe sādhye sāmānya guṇa prāptiḥ viśeṣa pratiṣedhasya śeṣa abhyanujñāyām sāmarthya upalabdheḥ  atha sāmānya guṇa pratiṣedhaḥ tathā api viśeṣa guṇa prāptiḥ iti na etat evam pratiyogi apekṣa tvāt pakṣa ādi vyavasthāyāḥ tathā hi pareṇa kṣiti ādi viśeṣa guṇa tvam śabdasya abhyupagatam tasya eva pratiṣedhaḥ sāmānya guṇa tvañca na iṣṭam eva  / śeṣa abhyanujñā tu yatra ubhayoḥ pramāṇena prasid

original: anye tu saṃyogādibhirvyabhicāraparihārāya śeṣā(bhyanujñā)<?>〈pratijñā〉vākyāduddhṛtya viśeṣapadaṃ hetupadena saha sambandhayanti । tathā hi na sparśavatāṃ guṇaḥ śabdaḥ, asmadādipratyakṣatve viśeṣaguṇatve ca satyakāraṇaguṇapūrvakatvāt, sukhādivat, atra hi sāmānyato viśeṣayogāt sāmānyapratiṣedhād viśeṣapratiṣedho bhavatyeva, brāhmaṇyaniṣedhād <I,111> vājasanādipratiṣedhavaditi । atra ca pratijñāvākye samāsāntargataṃ padaṃ hetupadena kathaṃ sambadhyata iti cintyam ।
analyzed: anye tu saṃyoga ādibhiḥ vyabhicāra parihārāya śeṣa abhyanujñā pratijñā vākyāt uddhṛtya viśeṣa padam hetu padena saha sambandhayanti tathā hi na sparśavatām guṇaḥ śabdaḥ asmat ādi pratyakṣa tve viśeṣa guṇa tve ca satya kāraṇa guṇa pūrvaka tvāt sukha ādi vat atra hi sāmānyatas viśeṣa yogāt sāmānya pratiṣedhāt viśeṣa pratiṣedhaḥ bhavati eva brāhmaṇya niṣedhāt vājasana ādi pratiṣedha vat iti atra ca pratijñā vākye samāsa antargatam

original: nanvakāraṇaguṇapūrvakatvāditi heturasiddhaḥ, paradṛṣṭyā saṃyogād vibhāgācchabdācca kāraṇaguṇācchabdasya niṣpattyabhyupagamāt । tathā hi, śabdasya kāraṇamākāśaṃ tadguṇāśca saṃyogādayaḥ kāraṇaguṇāste kāraṇamasyeti kāraṇaguṇapūrvakatvam । naivam । abhiprāyāparijñānāt । tathā cāyamartho vivakṣitaḥ । samavāyikāraṇeṣu guṇāḥ kāraṇaguṇāste pūrvaṃ kāraṇaṃ yasya guṇasyāsau kāraṇaguṇapūrvakaḥ, yathā paṭarūpādistanturūpādipūrvaka iti । na caivaṃ śabdasya, ākāśasyākāryatvena samavāyikāraṇaguṇābhāvāditi ।
