original: kā punariyaṃ pratyāsattiḥ ? ekārthasamavāyaḥ । sā tu bhidyate kāryaikārthasamavāyalakṣaṇā kāryakāraṇaikārthasamavāyalakṣaṇā ceti । kāryeṇa sahaikasminnarthe samavāyo lakṣaṇaṃ cihnamasyā iti tallakṣaṇā । yathā śabdasya śabdotpattāviti । kāryaśabdo hyākāśe vartate tatraiva kāraṇaśabdo 'pīti kāryaikārthasamavāyo 'sya pratyāsattiriti । tathā buddhyādyutpattāvātmāntaḥkaraṇasaṃyogasya । sa hyātmani vartate buddhyādayo 'pi tatraiveti ।
analyzed: kā punar iyam pratyāsattiḥ eka artha samavāyaḥ sā tu bhidyate kārya eka artha samavāya lakṣaṇā kārya kāraṇa eka artha samavāya lakṣaṇā ca iti kāryeṇa saha ekasmin arthe samavāyaḥ lakṣaṇam cihnam asyāḥ iti tad lakṣaṇā yathā śabdasya śabda utpattau iti kārya śabdaḥ hi ākāśe vartate tatra eva kāraṇa śabdaḥ pi iti kārya eka artha samavāyaḥ pratyāsattiḥ iti tathā buddhi ādi utpattau ātma antaḥkaraṇa saṃyogasya sa hi ātmani vartate buddh

original: nanvevaṃ buddhyādīnāmapi svakāryotpattāvekārthasamavāyitvādasamavāyikāraṇatvameva na nimittatvam ? naiṣa doṣaḥ । saṃyogasyāśeṣakāryotpattau vyāptyā sāmarthyopalabdheḥ, na caivaṃ buddhyāderanyatarasyeti । tasya pratiniyatakāryotpattāveva sāmarthyāvadhāraṇāt । ātmāntaḥkaraṇasaṃyogastvaśeṣabuddhyādyutpattāvupalabdhasāmarthyamiti sa evāsamavāyikāraṇam । na jātucinmanaḥsaṃyogādṛte buddhyādayo bhavantīti । tathā ca suṣuptyavasthāvasāne vijñānādikamutpadyata iti manaḥsaṃyogastatra kāraṇam ।
analyzed: nanu evam buddhi ādīnām api sva kārya utpattau ekārtha samavāyi tvāt asamavāyi kāraṇa tvam eva na nimitta tvam na eṣa doṣaḥ saṃyogasya aśeṣa kārya utpattau vyāptyā sāmarthya upalabdheḥ na ca evam buddhi ādeḥ anyatarasya iti tasya pratiniyata kārya utpattau eva sāmarthya avadhāraṇāt ātma antaḥkaraṇa saṃyogaḥ tu aśeṣa buddhi ādi utpattau upalabdha sāmarthyam iti saḥ eva asamavāyi kāraṇam na jātucit manaḥ saṃyogāt ṛte buddhi ādayaḥ bhavanti i

original: nanvevamapi dharmādharmayoraśeṣabuddhyādyutpattau vyāptyā kāraṇatvādasamavāyitvaṃ syāt ? na । vibhuviśeṣaguṇānāṃ viśiṣṭapratyāsatterupalambhāt । yathā hi, śabdaḥ śabdāntaramārabhamāṇaḥ svāvaruddhanabhodeśasamanantaramevārabhate naikārthasamavāyitvād deśāntare 〈tathā sati〉 brahmabhāṣitasyāpyupalambhaprasaṅgāt । tadvad dharmādharmāvapi svāvaruddhātmapradeśānantaraṃ sukhaduḥkhādikamārabheyātām iti svargādisthāneṣu tadabhāvaḥ syāt, ārabhete tu sthānāntareṣvapi sukhaduḥkhādikamiti nimittakāraṇatvameva । tasmādātmāntaḥkaraṇasaṃyoga eva buddhyādyutpattāvekārthasamavāyitayā asamavāyikāraṇamiti sthitam ।
analyzed: nanu evam api dharma adharmayoḥ aśeṣa buddhi ādi utpattau vyāptyā kāraṇa tvāt asamavāyi tvam syāt na vibhu viśeṣa guṇānām viśiṣṭa pratyāsatteḥ upalambhāt yathā hi śabdaḥ śabda antaram ārabhamāṇaḥ sva avaruddha nabhaḥ deśa samanantaram eva ārabhate na eka artha samavāyi tvāt deśa antare tathā sati brahma bhāṣitasya api upalambha prasaṅgāt tadvat dharma adharmau api sva avaruddha ātma pradeśa anantaram sukha duḥkha ādikam ārabheyātām iti svarga

original: tathā kāryaṃ rūpādi paṭe vartate, paṭaśca tantuṣu, tadgatāśca rūpādayastatraiveti kāryakāraṇaikārthasamavāyasteṣāṃ pratyāsattiriti ।
analyzed: tathā kāryam rūpa ādi paṭe vartate paṭaḥ ca tantuṣu tad gatāḥ ca rūpa ādayaḥ tatra eva iti kārya kāraṇa eka artha samavāyaḥ teṣām pratyāsattiḥ iti

original: nanvevamapi tanturūpaṃ rasādyutpattau pratyāsannam, rasaśca rūpotpattāvityasamavāyitvaṃ syāt ? na । janakatvamiti viśeṣaṇāt । yad yasyotpattau pratyāsannaṃ sajjanakaṃ tadasamavāyikāraṇam । na caivaṃ rūpaṃ rasādyutpattau kāraṇaṃ tadanuvidhānasyādarśanāt । yathā hi śuklād rūpācchuklaṃ pītācca pītamiti kāraṇarūpānuvidhānamasti naivaṃ rasādineti । na hi madhurādamlād vā tacchuklaṃ pītaṃ vā rūpamityanvayo gṛhyate । tasmāt pratyāsattāvapi nāsamavāyitvam kāraṇasya satastadviśeṣanirūpaṇāt ।
analyzed: nanu evam api tantu rūpam rasa ādi utpattau pratyāsannam rasaḥ ca rūpa utpattau iti asamavāyi tvam syāt na janaka tvam iti viśeṣaṇāt yat yasya utpattau pratyāsannam sat janakam tat asamavāyi kāraṇam na ca evam rūpam rasa ādi utpattau kāraṇam tad anuvidhānasya adarśanāt yathā hi śuklāt rūpāt śuklam pītāt ca pītam iti kāraṇa rūpa anuvidhānam asti na evam rasa ādinā iti  na hi madhurāt amlāt vā tat śuklam pītam vā rūpam iti anvayaḥ gṛhyate tasmāt pratyās

original: na caivaṃ samavāyikāraṇe prasaṅgastasyoktapratyāsattyabhāvāt । na hi kāryeṇa tatkāraṇena ca sahaikārthasamavāyastasyāsti, tatraiva tatkāryasya samavāyāt ।
analyzed: na ca evam samavāyi kāraṇe prasaṅgaḥ tasya ukta pratyāsatti abhāvāt na hi kāryeṇa tad kāraṇena ca saha eka artha samavāyaḥ tasya asti tatra eva tad kāryasya samavāyāt

original: tathā hi, rūparasagandhānuṣṇasparśaparimāṇasnehāḥ kāryakāraṇaikārthasamavāyādevāsamavāyikāraṇam । saṃkhyā tu dvitvādikā parimāṇotpattau kāryakāraṇaikārthasamavāyenāsamavāyikāraṇam । tathā kāraṇaikatvam ekapṛthaktvañca kāryaikatvaikapṛthaktvotpattāviti । dvitvadvipṛthaktvādyutpattāvekatvaikapṛthaktvādīnāṃ  kāryaikārthasamavāyenaivāsamavāyikāraṇatvameva । evaṃ śabdasyāpītyuktam ।
analyzed: tathā hi rūpa rasa gandha anuṣṇa sparśa parimāṇa snehāḥ kārya kāraṇa eka artha samavāyāt eva asamavāyi kāraṇam saṃkhyā tu dvi tva ādikā parimāṇa utpattau kārya kāraṇa eka artha samavāyena asamavāyi kāraṇam tathā kāraṇa eka tvam eka pṛthak tvam ca kārya eka tva eka pṛthak tva utpattau iti dvi tva dvi pṛthak tva ādi utpattau ekatva ekapṛthak tva ādīnām kārya eka artha samavāyena eva asamavāyi kāraṇa tvam eva evam śabdasya api iti uktam  /

original: eteṣāmasamavāyikāraṇatvameva, na tveteṣāmeva, anyeṣāmapi sadbhāvāt ।
analyzed: eteṣām asamavāyi kāraṇa tvam eva na tu eteṣām eva anyeṣām api sadbhāvāt

original: atra cānuṣṇagrahaṇamuṣṇasparśavyavacchedārtham, tasyobhayathā kāraṇatvāt ।
analyzed: atra ca anuṣṇa grahaṇam uṣṇa sparśa vyavaccheda artham tasya ubhayathā kāraṇa tvāt

original: buddhyādibhāvanāntānāṃ nimittakāraṇatvam iti । samavāyyasamavāyilakṣaṇarahitasya janakatvam । na cāsiddhaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ pratyāsannasya buddhyāderjanakatvāditi vācyam, pūrvoktanyāyāt । avadhāraṇantveteṣāṃ nimittakāraṇatvameva, na tveteṣāmeva ।
analyzed: buddhi ādi bhāvanā antānām nimitta kāraṇa tvam iti samavāyi asamavāyi lakṣaṇa rahitasya janaka tvam na ca asiddham viśeṣaṇam pratyāsannasya buddhi ādeḥ janaka tvāt iti vācyam pūrva ukta nyāyāt avadhāraṇantu eteṣām nimitta kāraṇa tvam eva na tu eteṣām eva

original: tathā hi buddhirjñānaṃ saṃskārotpattau kāraṇam, sukhamicchāyāḥ, duḥkhaṃ dveṣasya, icchādveṣau prayatnasya, sa ca kriyāyāḥ, dharmādharmau sukhaduḥkhayoḥ, bhāvanā smaraṇasyeti ।
analyzed: tathā hi buddhiḥ jñānam saṃskāra utpattau kāraṇam sukham icchāyāḥ duḥkham dveṣasya icchā dveṣau prayatnasya sa ca kriyāyāḥ dharma adharmau sukha duḥkhayoḥ bhāvanā smaraṇasya iti

original: saṃyogādivegāntānām “ubhayathā kāraṇatvam”(*) iti । asamavāyinimittakāraṇatvamiti । eteṣāmevobhayathā kāraṇatvam, tathaiteṣāmubhayathā kāraṇatvameveti niyamena ।
analyzed: saṃyoga ādi vega antānām ubhayathā kāraṇa tvam iti asamavāyi nimitta kāraṇa tvam iti eteṣām eva ubhayathā kāraṇa tvam tathā eteṣām ubhayathā kāraṇa tvam eva iti niyamena

original: tathā hi, bheryākāśasaṃyogasyāsamavāyikāraṇatvam, bherīdaṇḍasaṃyogasya nimittatvam । evaṃ vaṃśadalākāśavibhāgasyāsamavāyikāraṇatvam, vaṃśadalavibhāgasya nimittatvam । uṣṇasparśasyotpattāvasamavāyikāraṇatvam, pākajeṣu nimittatvam । evaṃ gurutvadravatvavegānāṃ svāśrayakriyotpattāvasamavāyikāraṇatvam, āśrayāntare nimittatvamiti ।
analyzed: tathā hi bherī ākāśa saṃyogasya asamavāyi kāraṇa tvam bherī daṇḍa saṃyogasya nimitta tvam evam vaṃśa dala ākāśa vibhāgasya asamavāyi kāraṇa tvam vaṃśa dala vibhāgasya nimitta tvam uṣṇa sparśasya utpattau asamavāyi kāraṇa tvam pāka jeṣu nimitta tvam evam guru tva drava tva vegānām sva āśraya kriyā utpattau asamavāyi kāraṇa tvam āśraya antare nimitta tvam iti

original: paratvāparatvadvipṛthaktvādīnāmakāraṇatvamityādipadena tripṛthaktvādīnāṃ grahaṇam ।
analyzed: paratva aparatva dvipṛthaktva ādīnām akāraṇa tvam iti ādi padena tripṛthaktva ādīnām grahaṇam

original: nanveteṣāṃ jñānādyutpattāvastyeva kāraṇatvam ? satyam । tadvyatirekeṇānyatrākāraṇatvaṃ vivakṣitamiti । samānajātīyārambhakādivākye 'pīdaṃ viśeṣaṇamūhyam । eteṣāmakāraṇatvameva, na tveteṣāmeva, pārimāṇḍalyāderapyakāraṇatvāt ।
analyzed: nanu eteṣām jñāna ādi utpattau asti eva kāraṇa tvam satyam tad vyatirekeṇa anyatra akāraṇa tvam vivakṣitam iti samāna jātīya ārambhaka ādi vākye pi idam viśeṣaṇam ūhyam eteṣām akāraṇa tvam eva na tu eteṣām eva pārimāṇḍalya ādeḥ api akāraṇa tvāt

original: {avyāpyavṛttiguṇānāṃ yāvaddravyabhāviguṇānāñcoddeśaḥ}
analyzed: avyāpya vṛtti guṇānām yāvaddravyabhāvi guṇānām ca uddeśaḥ

original: (“saṃyogavibhāgaśabdātmaviśeṣaguṇānāṃ pradeśavṛttitvam । śeṣāṇāmāśrayavyāpitvam । apākajarūparasagandhasparśaparimāṇaikatvaikapṛthaktvasāṃsiddhikadravatvagurutvasnehānāṃ yāvaddravyabhāvitvam । <II,014> śeṣāṇāmayāvaddravyabhāvitvañceti ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: saṃyoga vibhāga śabda ātma viśeṣa guṇānām pradeśa vṛtti tvam śeṣāṇām āśraya vyāpi tvam apāka ja rūpa rasa gandha sparśa parimāṇa ekatva ekapṛthaktva sāṃsiddhika drava tva guru tva snehānām yāvaddravyabhāvi tvam    śeṣāṇām ayāvaddravyabhāvi tvam ca iti

original: idānīṃ keṣāṃ pradeśavṛttitvamāśrayavyāpitvañcetyāha “saṃyogavibhāgaśabdātmaviśeṣaguṇānāṃ pradeśavṛttitvam”(*) āśrayāvyāpakatvaṃ vivakṣitam । na tu pradeśe 'vayave vṛttiḥ, niṣpradeśānāṃ tadabhāvaprasaṅgāt । eteṣāmevāśrayāvyāpitvam, eteṣāṃ pradeśavṛttitvameva ।
analyzed: idānīm keṣām pradeśa vṛtti tvam āśraya vyāpi tvam ca iti āha saṃyoga vibhāga śabda ātma viśeṣa guṇānām pradeśa vṛtti tvam āśraya avyāpaka tvam vivakṣitam na tu pradeśe vayave vṛttiḥ niṣpradeśānām tad abhāva prasaṅgāt eteṣām eva āśraya avyāpi tvam eteṣām pradeśa vṛtti tvam eva

original: “śeṣāṇāmāśrayavyāpitvam”(*) iti । uktebhyo 'nye śeṣāsteṣāmāśrayavyāpitvam । kathametat ? āśrayopalambhe sati tajjighṛkṣāyāmavaśyaṃ grahaṇam । yathā paṭopalambhe rūpajighṛkṣāyāmavaśyaṃ tadgrahaṇamiti । yeṣāntvāśrayāvyāpitvaṃ na teṣāmāśrayopalambhe, satyāmapi jighṛkṣāyāmindriyārthasannikarṣe cāvaśyaṃ grahaṇamasti । yathā parvatasyāparabhāgavartināṃ saṃyogo nāvaśyaṃ tadupalambhe 'pyupalabhyata iti ।
analyzed: śeṣāṇām āśraya vyāpi tvam iti uktebhyaḥ nye śeṣāḥ teṣām āśraya vyāpi tvam katham etat āśraya upalambhe sati tad jighṛkṣāyām avaśyam grahaṇam yathā paṭa upalambhe rūpa jighṛkṣāyām avaśyam tat grahaṇam iti yeṣām tu āśraya avyāpi tvam na teṣām āśraya upalambhe satyām api jighṛkṣāyām indriya artha sannikarṣe ca avaśyam grahaṇam asti yathā parvatasya apara bhāga vartinām saṃyogaḥ na avaśyam tad upalambhe pi upalabhyate iti

original: apākajādisnehāntānāṃ “yāvaddravyabhāvitvam”(*) iti । yāvaddravyaṃ bhavanti tacchīlāśceti yāvaddravyabhāvinasteṣāṃ bhāvo yāvaddravyabhāvitvam, āśraye satyavināśitvamiti yāvat ।
analyzed: a pāka ja ādi sneha antānām yāvaddravyabhāvitvam iti yāvaddravyam bhavanti tad śīlāḥ ca iti yāvaddravyabhāvinaḥ teṣām bhāvaḥ yāvaddravyabhāvi tvam āśraye sati avināśi tvam iti yāvat

original: “śeṣāṇāmayāvaddravyabhāvitvam”(*) iti । uktebhyo 'nye śeṣāsteṣāṃ satyapyāśraye vināśa iti ।
analyzed: śeṣāṇām ayāvaddravyabhāvitvam iti uktebhyaḥ nye śeṣāḥ teṣām sati api āśraye vināśaḥ iti

original: <iti guṇasādharmyaprakaraṇam>
analyzed: iti guṇa sādharmya prakaraṇam

original: {guṇavaidharmyaprakaraṇam}
analyzed: guṇa vaidharmya prakaraṇam

original: (“rūpādīnāṃ sarvaguṇānāṃ pratyekamaparasāmānyasambandhād rūpādisaṃjñā bhavanti ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: rūpa ādīnām sarva guṇānām pratyekam apara sāmānya sambandhāt rūpa ādi saṃjñāḥ bhavanti

original: athedānīṃ vaidharmyaṃ pratiniyatamāha “rūpādīnāṃ sarvaguṇānāṃ pratyekamaparasāmānyasambandhād rūpādisaṃjñā bhavanti”(*) ityādi । rūpamādiryeṣāṃ te rūpādayasteṣām । na jñāyate kiyatāmataḥ sarvaguṇānāmiti । sarve ca te guṇāśceti sarvaguṇāste ca rūpādaya evābhipretā nānya iti, teṣām ekamekaṃ prati pratyekam । aparasāmānyasambandhāditi । guṇatvāpekṣayā aparasāmānyaṃ rūpatvādi, tatsambandhād rūpādisaṃjñā bhavanti । rūpatvasambandhād rūpamiti saṃjñā, rasatvasambandhācca rasa iti । evamanyeṣvapīti ।
analyzed: atha idānīm vaidharmyam pratiniyatam āha rūpa ādīnām sarva guṇānām pratyekam apara sāmānya sambandhāt rūpa ādi saṃjñāḥ bhavanti ityādi rūpam ādiḥ yeṣām te rūpa ādayaḥ teṣām na jñāyate kiyatām atas sarva guṇānām iti sarve ca te guṇāḥ ca iti sarva guṇāḥ te ca rūpa ādayaḥ eva abhipretāḥ na anye iti teṣām ekam ekam prati pratyekam apara sāmānya sambandhāt iti guṇa tva apekṣayā apara sāmānyam rūpa tva ādi tad sambandhāt rūpa ādi sa

original: {rūpavaidharmyam}
analyzed: rūpa vaidharmyam

original: (“tatra rūpaṃ cakṣurgrāhyam । pṛthivyudakajvalanavṛtti, dravyādyupalambhakam, nayanasahakāri, śuklādyanekaprakāram, salilādiparamāṇuṣu nityam, pārthivaparamāṇuṣvagnisaṃyogavirodhi, sarvakāryadravyeṣu kāraṇaguṇapūrvakam, āśrayavināśādeva vinaśyatīti ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: tatra rūpam cakṣuḥ grāhyam pṛthivī udaka jvalana vṛtti dravya ādi upalambhakam nayana sahakāri śukla ādi aneka prakāram salila ādi paramāṇuṣu nityam pārthiva paramāṇuṣu agni saṃyoga virodhi sarva kārya dravyeṣu kāraṇa guṇa pūrvakam āśraya vināśāt eva vinaśyati iti

original: tatrādāvuddiṣṭatvād rūpasya sadbhāve pramāṇaṃ lakṣaṇam āśrayam arthakriyābhedaṃ nityatvam utpattivināśakāraṇañca darśayannāha “rūpaṃ cakṣurgrāhyam”(*) ityādinā ।
analyzed: tatra ādau uddiṣṭa tvāt rūpasya sadbhāve pramāṇam lakṣaṇam āśrayam artha kriyā bhedam nitya tvam utpatti vināśa kāraṇam ca darśayan āha rūpam cakṣuḥ grāhyam ityādinā

original: tatra rūpameva cakṣurgrāhyaṃ na rasādi । rūpaṃ cakṣuṣaiva gṛhyate 'nyendriyaparicchedyaṃ na bhavatītyavadhāraṇasya prakramāpekṣitayā na dravyādau cakṣurgrāhyatvapratiṣedhaḥ । tathā hi, dravyādeścakṣurgrāhyatvasiddhau “anekadravyeṇa samavāyāt svagataviśeṣācca rūpaṃ pratyakṣam” <vai. sū. 4.1.8>, “etena rasādiṣu jñānaṃ vyākhyātam” <vai. sū. ?> ityatideśe cakṣurgrāhyatvāśaṅkāyāṃ tadvyavacchedārthamevāvadhāraṇaṃ na dravyādau tadvṛttitvapratiṣedhaparam । abhipretañca samudgīyamānāvadhāraṇaṃ śākyairiti vakṣyāmo laiṅgikajñāne ।
analyzed: tatra rūpam eva cakṣuḥ grāhyam na rasa ādi rūpam cakṣuṣā eva gṛhyate nyendriya paricchedyam na bhavati iti avadhāraṇasya prakrama apekṣi tayā na dravya ādau cakṣuḥ grāhya tva pratiṣedhaḥ tathā hi dravya ādeḥ cakṣuḥ grāhya tva siddhau aneka dravyeṇa samavāyāt svagata viśeṣāt ca rūpam pratyakṣam vai sū etena rasa ādiṣu jñānam vyākhyātam vai sū iti atideśe cakṣuḥ grāhya tva āśaṅkāyām tad vyavaccheda artham eva avadhāraṇam na dravya ād

original: sūtrārthastu, anekaṃ dravyaṃ janakamasyetītyanekadravyaṃ tena saha samavāyāt svagataviśeṣaniyatasadbhāve kvacid rūpopalabdhiryadabhāvāccānupalabdhiḥ sa eva sahakāriviśeṣo 'padiśyate । tasmācca rūpaṃ pratyakṣam । etacca rasanādipratyakṣe samānamiti ।
analyzed: sūtra arthaḥ tu anekam dravyam janakam asya iti iti aneka dravyam tena saha samavāyāt svagata viśeṣa niyata sadbhāve kvacid rūpa upalabdhiḥ yad abhāvāt ca anupalabdhiḥ saḥ eva sahakāri viśeṣaḥ upadiśyate tasmāt ca rūpam pratyakṣam etat ca rasanā ādi pratyakṣe samānam iti

original: “pṛthivyudakajvalanavṛtti”(*) ityāśrayanirūpaṇam, pūrvapadāpekṣaṃ vā lakṣaṇamiti । tathā hi, cakṣurgrāhyatvaṃ dravyatvasyāpyastīti cakṣuṣaiva gṛhyata iti 〈sāvadhāraṇaṃ〉 viśeṣaṇam । tathāpi cakṣuṣaiva gṛhyate rūpatvasāmānyamiti pṛthivyudakajvalanavṛttipadam । pṛthivyādivṛttitvañcānyeṣāmapyastīti niyamagrahaṇam । ato rūpam, itarasmād bhidyate, niyamena pṛthivyudakajvalanavṛttitve sati cakṣuṣaiva gṛhyamāṇatvāt, yastu na bhidyate na cāsāvevam, yathā rasādiriti ।
analyzed: pṛthivī udaka jvalana vṛtti iti āśraya nirūpaṇam pūrva pada apekṣam vā lakṣaṇam iti  / tathā hi cakṣuḥ grāhya tvam dravya tvasya api asti iti cakṣuṣā eva gṛhyate iti sāvadhāraṇam viśeṣaṇam tathā api cakṣuṣā eva gṛhyate rūpa tva sāmānyam iti pṛthivī udaka jvalana vṛtti padam pṛthivī ādi vṛtti tvañca anyeṣām api asti iti niyama grahaṇam atas rūpam itarasmāt bhidyate niyamena pṛthivī udaka jvalana vṛtti tve sati cakṣuṣā eva gṛhy

original: “dravyādyupalambhakam”(*) ityarthakriyākathanam । dravyādīnupalambhayatīti dravyādyupalambhakam, dravyopalabdheḥ kāraṇamiti । tathā “mahattvādanekadravyavattvād rūpaviśeṣācca dravyaṃ pratyakṣam” <vai. sū. 4.1.6> “tatsamavāyācca guṇādayo 'pi pratyakṣāḥ” <vai. sū. ?> ityupalabdhau rūpaviśeṣasya kāraṇatvamuktam । pūrvapadāpekṣametallakṣaṇamabhyūhyam ।
analyzed: dravya ādi upalambhakam iti artha kriyā kathanam dravya ādīn upalambhayati iti dravya ādi upalambhakam dravya upalabdheḥ kāraṇam iti tathā mahat tvāt aneka dravyavat tvāt rūpa viśeṣāt ca dravyam pratyakṣam vai sū tad samavāyāt ca guṇa ādayaḥ pi pratyakṣāḥ vai sū iti upalabdhau rūpa viśeṣasya kāraṇa tvam uktam pūrva pada apekṣam etat lakṣaṇam abhyūhyam

original: “nayanasahakārī”(*) iti svagatarūpotkarṣād bāhyarūpaprakāśakamityupadarśayati । na ca pūrveṇāviśeṣaḥ, karaṇasthasya rūpotkarṣasyābhidhānāt, prāktanena tu karmagatasyeti ।
analyzed: nayana sahakārī iti svagata rūpa utkarṣāt bāhya rūpa prakāśakam iti upadarśayati na ca pūrveṇa aviśeṣaḥ karaṇa sthasya rūpa utkarṣasya abhidhānāt prāktanena tu karma gatasya iti

original: “śuklādyanekaprakāram”(*) iti bhedanirūpaṇam । tadapyasādhāraṇameva । “salilādiparamāṇuṣu nityam”(*), vināśakāraṇābhāvāt । “pārthivaparamāṇuṣvagnisaṃyogavirodhi”(*) iti, agnisaṃyogena virodho vināśo 'syeti । na cānutpattimato vināśaḥ sambhavatītyanyasyotpattivināśakāraṇasyābhāvād agnisaṃyogādevotpadyate । sarvakāryeṣu kāraṇaguṇapūrvaprakrameṇotpattirāśrayavināśādeva vināśa iti vakṣyāmaḥ pākajarūpaparīkṣāyām ।
analyzed: śukla ādi aneka prakāram iti bheda nirūpaṇam tat api asādhāraṇam eva salila ādi paramāṇuṣu nityam vināśa kāraṇa abhāvāt pārthiva paramāṇuṣu agni saṃyoga virodhi iti agni saṃyogena virodhaḥ sya iti na ca anutpattimataḥ vināśaḥ sambhavati iti anyasya utpatti vināśa kāraṇasya abhāvāt agni saṃyogāt eva utpadyate sarva kāryeṣu kāraṇa guṇa pūrva prakrameṇa utpattiḥ āśraya vināśāt eva vināśaḥ iti vakṣyāmaḥ pāka ja rūpa parīkṣāyām

original: {rasavaidharmyam}
analyzed: rasa vaidharmyam

original: (“raso rasanagrāhyaḥ, pṛthivyudakavṛttiḥ, jīvanapuṣṭibalārogyanimittam । <II,017> rasanasahakārī, madhurāmlalavaṇatiktakaṭukaṣāyabhedabhinnaḥ । asyāpi nityānityatvaniṣpattayaḥ pūrvavat ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: rasaḥ rasana grāhyaḥ pṛthivī udaka vṛttiḥ jīvana puṣṭi bala ārogya nimittam   rasana sahakārī madhura amla lavaṇa tikta kaṭu kaṣāya bheda bhinnaḥ asya api nitya anitya tva niṣpattayaḥ pūrvavat

original: “raso rasanagrāhyaḥ”(*) iti sadbhāve pramāṇam । “pṛthivyudakavṛttiḥ”(*) ityāśrayanirūpaṇam, pūrvapadāpekṣaṃ vā lakṣaṇamiti । tathā hi, pṛthivyudakavṛttitvamanyeṣāmapyastīti rasanagrāhyapadam । rasanagrāhyañca rasatvādisāmānyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti pṛthivyudakavṛttipadam । ato rasaḥ, itarasmād bhidyate, pṛthivyudakavṛttitve sati rasanagrāhyatvāt, yastvitarasmādarasāderna bhidyate na cāsāvevam, yathā gandhādiriti ।
analyzed: rasaḥ rasana grāhyaḥ iti sadbhāve pramāṇam pṛthivī udaka vṛttiḥ iti āśraya nirūpaṇam pūrva pada apekṣam vā lakṣaṇam iti  tathā hi pṛthivī udaka vṛtti tvam anyeṣām api asti iti rasana grāhya padam rasana grāhyam ca rasa tva ādi sāmānyam bhaviṣyati iti pṛthivī udaka vṛtti padam atas rasaḥ itarasmāt bhidyate pṛthivī udaka vṛtti tve sati rasana grāhya tvāt yaḥ tu itarasmāt arasa ādeḥ na bhidyate na ca asau evam yathā gandha ādiḥ iti

original: “jīvanapuṣṭibalārogyanimittam”(*) ityarthakriyānirūpaṇam । jīvanantu upabhogadāyakakarmasacivasyātmanaḥ svaśarīrāvaruddhena manasā saṃyogaḥ, tasya tu nimittam śarīrāpyāyananimittatvāt । puṣṭiravayavopacayaḥ । sā ca viśiṣṭarasopayogād bhavatīti । tathā hi, rasopayogādāntareṇa tejasā pūrvadravyanivṛttau svatantreṣu paramāṇuṣu śyāmādinivṛttidvāreṇotpannapākajairdvyaṇukādiprakrameṇa śarīrārambhaḥ pratikṣaṇamāhāropayoge sati draṣṭavyaḥ । na cārabhyārambhakavādaḥ sambhavatītyuktaṃ pṛthivyadhikāre । balamutsāhastasya prāṇasaṃvardhanadvāreṇa nimittam । ārogyaṃ rogābhāvastasyāpi nimittaṃ viśiṣṭarasopayoge sati tacchravaṇāt ।
analyzed: jīvana puṣṭi bala ārogya nimittam iti arthakriyā nirūpaṇam jīvanam tu upabhoga dāyaka karma sacivasya ātmanaḥ sva śarīra avaruddhena manasā saṃyogaḥ tasya tu nimittam śarīra āpyāyana nimitta tvāt puṣṭiḥ avayava upacayaḥ sā ca viśiṣṭa rasa upayogāt bhavati iti tathā hi rasa upayogāt āntareṇa tejasā pūrva dravya nivṛttau svatantreṣu paramāṇuṣu śyāma ādi nivṛtti dvāreṇa utpanna pāka jaiḥ dvyaṇuka ādi prakrameṇa śarīra ārambhaḥ prat

original: “rasanasahakārī”(*) iti । svagatarasotkarṣād bāhyarasasyābhivyañjaka ityuktaṃ pūrvam ।
analyzed: rasana sahakārī iti svagata rasa utkarṣāt bāhya rasasya abhivyañjakaḥ iti uktam pūrvam

original: “madhurāmlalavaṇatiktakaṭukaṣāyabhedabhinnaḥ”(*) iti vibhāgaḥ । so 'pyasādhāraṇatvāllakṣaṇam । “asyāpi nityānityatvaniṣpattayaḥ pūrvavaditi”(*) । salilaparamāṇuṣu nityaṃ pārthiveṣvagnisaṃyogādutpadyate vinaśyati ca । kāryeṣu kāraṇaguṇapūrvaḥ, ādhāravināśādeva vinaśyatītyatideśārthaḥ ।
analyzed: madhura amla lavaṇa tikta kaṭu kaṣāya bheda bhinnaḥ iti vibhāgaḥ saḥ u pi asādhāraṇa tvāt lakṣaṇam asya api nitya anitya tva niṣpattayaḥ pūrvavat iti salila paramāṇuṣu nityam pārthiveṣu agni saṃyogāt utpadyate vinaśyati ca kāryeṣu kāraṇa guṇa pūrvaḥ ādhāra vināśāt eva vinaśyati iti atideśa arthaḥ

original: {gandhavaidharmyam}
(“gandho ghrāṇagrāhyaḥ, pṛthivīvṛttiḥ, ghrāṇasahakārī, surabhirasurabhiśca, asyāpyutpattyādayaḥ pūrvavat ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: gandhaḥ ghrāṇa grāhyaḥ pṛthivī vṛttiḥ ghrāṇa sahakārī surabhiḥ asurabhiḥ ca asya api utpatti ādayaḥ pūrvavat

original: “gandho ghrāṇagrāhyaḥ”(*) iti sadbhāve pramāṇam । “pṛthivīvṛttiḥ”(*) ityā<II,018>śrayanirūpaṇam, pūrvapadāpekṣaṃ vā lakṣaṇam । tathā hi ghrāṇagrāhyatvaṃ gandhatvāderapyastīti pṛthivīvṛttiriti viśeṣaṇam । pṛthivīvṛttitvamanyasyāpyastīti ghrāṇagrāhyapadam । ghrāṇagrāhyatve sati pṛthivīvṛttitvaṃ lakṣaṇamiti ।
analyzed: gandhaḥ ghrāṇa grāhyaḥ iti sadbhāve pramāṇam pṛthivī vṛttiḥ pūrva pada apekṣam vā lakṣaṇam tathā hi ghrāṇa grāhya tvam gandha tva ādeḥ api asti iti pṛthivī vṛttiḥ iti viśeṣaṇam pṛthivī vṛtti tvam anyasya api asti iti ghrāṇa grāhya padam ghrāṇa grāhya tve sati pṛthivī vṛtti tvam lakṣaṇam iti

original: “ghrāṇasahakārī”(*) iti svagatagandhotkarṣād bāhyagandhaprakāśakamityarthakriyānirūpaṇam । punarapi “surabhirasurabhiśca”(*) iti vibhāgaḥ ।
analyzed: ghrāṇa sahakārī iti svagata gandha utkarṣāt bāhya gandha prakāśakam iti arthakriyā nirūpaṇam punar api surabhiḥ asurabhiḥ ca iti vibhāgaḥ

original: “asyāpyutpattyādayaḥ pūrvavat”(*) iti । paramāṇuṣvagnisaṃyogādutpadyate vinaśyati ca । kārye tu kāraṇaguṇapūrvakaḥ, ādhāravināśādeva vinaśyatītyatideśārthaḥ ।
analyzed: asya api utpatti ādayaḥ pūrvavat iti paramāṇuṣu agni saṃyogāt utpadyate vinaśyati ca kārye tu kāraṇa guṇa pūrvakaḥ ādhāra vināśāt eva vinaśyati iti atideśa arthaḥ

original: {sparśavaidharmyam}
analyzed: sparśa vaidharmyam

original: (“sparśastvagindriyagrāhyaḥ, pṛthivyudakajvalanapavanavṛttiḥ, tvaksahakārī, rūpānuvidhāyī, śītoṣṇānuṣṇāśītabhedāt trividhaḥ । asyāpi nityānityatvaniṣpattayaḥ pūrvavat ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: sparśaḥ tvac indriya grāhyaḥ pṛthivī udaka jvalana pavana vṛttiḥ tvac sahakārī rūpa anuvidhāyī śīta uṣṇa anuṣṇa aśīta bhedāt trividhaḥ asya api nitya anitya tva niṣpattayaḥ pūrvavat

original: “sparśastvagindriyagrāhyaḥ”(*) iti pratyakṣaparicchedyatvaṃ darśayati । “pṛthivyudakajvalanapavanavṛttiḥ”(*) ityāśrayanirūpaṇañca caturṇāṃ sparśavattvamityanena na punaruktam । tatra dravyadharmasyābhidhānāt, iha tu sparśadharmasyeti । pūrvapadāpekṣaṃ vā lakṣaṇam । tathā ca pṛthivyādivṛttitvamanyeṣāmapyastīti tvagindriyagrāhyapadam । tadgrāhyañca sparśatvādisāmānyamiti pṛthivyādivṛttipadam ।
analyzed: sparśaḥ tvac indriya grāhyaḥ iti pratyakṣa paricchedya tvam darśayati pṛthivī udaka jvalana pavana vṛttiḥ iti āśraya nirūpaṇam ca caturṇām sparśavat tvam iti anena na punar uktam tatra dravya dharmasya abhidhānāt iha tu sparśa dharmasya iti pūrva pada apekṣam vā lakṣaṇam tathā ca pṛthivī ādi vṛtti tvam anyeṣām api asti iti tvac indriya grāhya padam tad grāhyam ca sparśa tva ādi sāmānyam iti pṛthivī ādi vṛtti padam

original: yadi saṃkhyādīnāmapi tvagindriyagrāhyatve sati pṛthivyādivṛttitvaṃ sambhāvyeta, avadhāraṇaṃ kāryam । ataḥ sparśaḥ, itarasmād bhidyate, tvagindriyagrāhyatve sati niyamena pṛthivyādicaturdravyavṛttitvāt, yastvitarasmād na bhidyate na cāsāvevam, yathā rūpādiriti ।
analyzed: yadi saṃkhyā ādīnām api tvak indriya grāhya tve sati pṛthivī ādi vṛtti tvam sambhāvyeta avadhāraṇam kāryam atas sparśaḥ itarasmāt bhidyate tvak indriya grāhya tve sati niyamena pṛthivī ādi catur dravya vṛtti tvāt yaḥ tu itarasmāt na bhidyate na ca asau evam yathā rūpa ādiḥ iti

original: “tvaksahakārī”(*) iti । svagatasparśotkarṣāt tvagindriyaṃ bāhyasparśaprakāśakamityarthakriyānirūpaṇam ।
analyzed: tvac sahakārī iti svagata sparśa utkarṣāt tvac indriyam bāhya sparśa prakāśakam iti arthakriyā nirūpaṇam

original: atha tvagindriyaṃ sparśasya prakāśakam । kasmāt ? saṃyuktasamavāyāt । tvagindriyeṇa saṃyuktaṃ dravyaṃ tatsamavāyāt sparśo gṛhyata iti । nanvevaṃ saṃyuktasamavāyasyāviśeṣād rūpādiprakāśakamapi syād viśeṣo vā vācyaḥ, tanna, sparśotkarṣavad rūpādyutkarṣasyābhāvāt । tathā hi, rūpādiṣu madhye sparśasyaivo<II,019>palambhānyathānupapattyā jñāyate niyāmakaṃ kāraṇam, niyamahetuṃ vinā niyatasya kāryasyānupapatteḥ । tatra sparśotkarṣo niyāmakaḥ sparśatvaṃ vā viṣayagatam । na caitad rūpādiṣu sambhavatīti sparśatvasya tatrāsambhavāt । rūpādyutkarṣasyāpi tvagindriyeṇa kāryābhāvenaivābhāvaprasiddheḥ । tathā ca sūtrakāreṇāpyuktam “rūpādiṣu spārśanaṃ jñānamiti kasmānna bhavatīti tadabhāvāt” <vai. sū. ?> sparśatvasāmānyasyābhāvāt, yatraiva sparśatvasāmānyaṃ tatraiva spārśanaṃ jñānamiti । vyatireko labhyata eva । sparśatvābhāvastu tvaggrāhyatvābhāvasya jñāpako na kāraka iti । na ca viśiṣṭasannikarṣavyatirekeṇānyā yogyatā sambhāvyate, anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ tasyaiva vyāpāropalabdherityalam ।
analyzed: atha tvac indriyam sparśasya prakāśakam kasmāt saṃyukta samavāyāt tvac indriyeṇa saṃyuktam dravyam tad samavāyāt sparśaḥ gṛhyate iti nanu evam saṃyukta samavāyasya aviśeṣāt rūpa ādi prakāśakam api syāt viśeṣaḥ vā vācyaḥ tat na sparśa utkarṣa vat rūpa ādi utkarṣasya abhāvāt tathā hi rūpa ādiṣu madhye jñāyate niyāmakam kāraṇam niyama hetum vinā niyatasya kāryasya anupapatteḥ tatra sparśa utkarṣaḥ niyāmakaḥ sparśa tvam vā viṣaya gatam

original: “rūpānuvidhāyī”(*) iti sāhacaryaṃ darśayati । rūpamanuvidadhāti tacchīlaśceti tadanuvidhāyī । yatra rūpaṃ tatrāvaśyaṃ sparśa iti । evaṃ rasagandhānuvidhāyitvamapīti । “śītoṣṇānuṣṇāśītabhedāt trividhaḥ”(*) iti vibhāgakathanam । “asyāpi nityānityatvaniṣpattayaḥ pūrvavat”(*) iti । salilādiparamāṇuṣu nityaḥ pārthiveṣvagnisaṃyogavirodhī । kāryeṣu kāraṇaguṇapūrvakastadvināśād vinaśyatītyatideśārthaḥ ।
analyzed: rūpa anuvidhāyī iti sāhacaryam darśayati rūpam anuvidadhāti tad śīlaḥ ca iti tad anuvidhāyī yatra rūpam tatra avaśyam sparśaḥ iti evam rasa gandha anuvidhāyi tvam api iti śīta uṣṇa anuṣṇa aśīta bhedāt trividhaḥ iti vibhāga kathanam asya api nitya anitya tva niṣpattayaḥ pūrvavat iti salila ādi paramāṇuṣu nityaḥ pārthiveṣu agni saṃyoga virodhī kāryeṣu kāraṇa guṇa pūrvakaḥ tad vināśāt vinaśyati iti atideśa arthaḥ

original: {rūpādīnāṃ pākajotpattiprakāraḥ}
analyzed: rūpa ādīnām pāka ja utpatti prakāraḥ

original: (“pārthivaparamāṇurūpādīnāṃ pākajotpattividhānam ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: pārthiva paramāṇu rūpa ādīnām pāka ja utpatti vidhānam

original: athedānīṃ “pārthivaparamāṇurūpādīnām”(*) iti parīkṣāśeṣanivartanāprakaraṇam । tathā hi rūpādīnāṃ pūrvamuddeśalakṣaṇābhidhāne 'pi 〈sparśo ?〉 na parīkṣitaḥ, pratijñātañca tadataḥ parīkṣārthamidamārabhyate । pṛthivyā ime pārthivāḥ ।
analyzed: atha idānīm pārthiva paramāṇu rūpa ādīnām iti parīkṣā śeṣa nivartanā prakaraṇam tathā hi rūpa ādīnām pūrvam uddeśa lakṣaṇa abhidhāne sparśaḥ na parīkṣitaḥ pratijñātam ca tat atas parīkṣā artham idam ārabhyate pṛthivyāḥ ime pārthivāḥ

original: nanu cātra bhedānupapatteḥ kathaṃ ṣaṣṭhī, taddhitapratyayaśceti । tayorbhede satyupalambhāt ? na । kāryarūpāyāḥ pṛthivyā vivakṣitatvāt, tajjanakāśca paramāṇavastato bhinnā eveti pārthivā ityucyante । jātirvā pṛthivīśabdena vivakṣitā, tasyā ime tatsambandhinaḥ pārthivāḥ । te ca te paramāṇavaśca teṣāṃ rūpādaya iti । ādipadena rasagandhasparśā eva gṛhyante, na saṃkhyādayaḥ, tatparīkṣāśeṣaparatvenaiva sambandhāt ।
analyzed: nanu ca atra bheda anupapatteḥ katham ṣaṣṭhī taddhita pratyayaḥ ca iti tayoḥ bhede sati upalambhāt na kārya rūpāyāḥ pṛthivyāḥ vivakṣita tvāt tad janakāḥ ca paramāṇavaḥ tatas bhinnāḥ eva iti pārthivāḥ iti ucyante jātiḥ vā pṛthivī śabdena vivakṣitā tasyāḥ ime tad sambandhinaḥ pārthivāḥ te ca te paramāṇavaḥ ca teṣām rūpa ādayaḥ iti ādi padena rasa gandha sparśāḥ eva gṛhyante na saṃkhyā ādayaḥ tad parīkṣā śeṣa paratv

original: atasteṣāṃ “pākajotpattividhānam”(*) prakāra iti । atha pākājjātāḥ pākajā ityutpattyarthasya janinā pratipāditatvād vyarthamutpattigrahaṇam ? na । uttarapadena sambandhāt । tathā hi, pākajānāmutpattireva vidhīyate 'neneti vidhānaṃ pramāṇamupeyam । pūrvaguṇavilakṣaṇānāṃ rūpādīnāmutpattiḥ kārye saiva pramāṇamiti vakṣyāmaḥ ।
analyzed: atas teṣām pāka ja utpatti vidhānam prakāraḥ iti atha pākāt jātāḥ pāka jāḥ iti utpatti arthasya janinā pratipādita tvāt vyartham utpatti grahaṇam na uttara padena sambandhāt tathā hi pāka jānām utpattiḥ eva vidhīyate nena iti vidhānam pramāṇam upeyam pūrva guṇa vilakṣaṇānām rūpa ādīnām utpattiḥ kārye sā eva pramāṇam iti vakṣyāmaḥ

original: yadvā pacyate 'neneti pākastejodravyam, pacyata iti vā pākaḥ pārthivaparamāṇavaśceti pākau tābhyāṃ jātaḥ pākajaḥ, pārthivaparamāṇvagnisaṃyogastasmādutpattiḥ pārthivaparamāṇurūpādīnāṃ śyāmādivināśaścetyuttaravākyasāmarthyāt ।
analyzed: yat vā pacyate nena iti pākaḥ tejaḥ dravyam pacyate iti vā pākaḥ pārthiva paramāṇavaḥ ca iti pākau tābhyām jātaḥ pāka jaḥ pārthiva paramāṇu agni saṃyogaḥ tasmāt utpattiḥ pārthiva paramāṇu rūpa ādīnām śyāma ādi vināśaḥ ca iti uttara vākya sāmarthyāt

original: anye tu śyāmādivināśo 'dhyāhāreṇa labhyata iti manyamānāḥ pacyate 'neneti pāko 'gnisaṃyogaḥ, tasmājjātaḥ pākajaḥ, śyāmādivināśaḥ । tata eva pākādutpattirviśiṣṭarūpādīnāmiti kaṣṭavyākhyānaṃ kurvate । taccāsat । adhyāhārāderdūṣaṇasyāparihārāt ।
analyzed: anye tu śyāma ādi vināśaḥ dhyāhāreṇa labhyate iti manyamānāḥ pacyate nena iti pākaḥ gni saṃyogaḥ tasmāt jātaḥ pāka jaḥ śyāma ādi vināśaḥ tatas eva pākāt utpattiḥ viśiṣṭa rūpa ādīnām iti kaṣṭa vyākhyānam kurvate tat ca asat adhyāhāra ādeḥ dūṣaṇasya aparihārāt

original: na cābhivyaktinivṛttyarthamutpattigrahaṇamiti vācyam, paramatasyāprasiddhatvāt ।
analyzed: na ca abhivyakti nivṛtti artham utpatti grahaṇam iti vācyam para matasya aprasiddha tvāt

original: {tatra prathamaṃ kāryadravyavināśaprakāraḥ}
analyzed: tatra prathamam kārya dravya vināśa prakāraḥ

original: (“ghaṭāderāmadravyasyāgninā sambaddhasyāgnyabhighātānnodanādvā tadārambhakeṣvaṇuṣu karmāṇyutpadyante । tebhyo vibhāgāḥ; vibhāgebhyaḥ saṃyogavināśāḥ, saṃyogavināśebhyaśca kāryadravyaṃ vinaśyati ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: ghaṭa ādeḥ āma dravyasya agninā sambaddhasya agni abhighātāt nodanāt vā tad ārambhakeṣu aṇuṣu karmāṇi utpadyante tebhyaḥ vibhāgāḥ vibhāgebhyaḥ saṃyoga vināśāḥ saṃyoga vināśebhyaḥ ca kārya dravyam vinaśyati

original: atha kena prakāreṇa pākajā jāyanta ityupadarśayati “ghaṭāderāmadravyasya”(*) ityādinā । ghaṭāderityādipadena śarīrāderapyavarodhaḥ । tatra hi pākajotpattiparijñānāt tadāsaktinivṛttau viraktasya śreyaḥ sampadyata iti । āmadravyasyeti pakvavyavacchedārtham ।
analyzed: atha kena prakāreṇa pāka jāḥ jāyante iti upadarśayati ghaṭa ādeḥ āma dravyasya ityādinā ghaṭa ādeḥ iti ādi padena śarīra ādeḥ api avarodhaḥ tatra hi pāka ja utpatti parijñānāt tad āsakti nivṛttau viraktasya śreyaḥ sampadyate iti āma dravyasya iti pakva vyavaccheda artham

original: yadyapi pārthivaparamāṇuṣvahetukasya rūpāderasambhavāt te 'pi pākādutpannāstathāpi viśiṣṭarūpāpekṣayā śyāmādaya ityucyante । tadāśrayasyāmadravyasya ye ārambhakāḥ pāramparyeṇa paramāṇavasteṣu karmāṇyutpadyante । kutaḥ ? “agnyabhighātānnodanād vā”(*) ।
analyzed: yadi api pārthiva paramāṇuṣu ahetukasya rūpa ādeḥ asambhavāt te pi pākāt utpannāḥ tathā api viśiṣṭa rūpa apekṣayā śyāma ādayaḥ iti ucyante tad āśrayasya āma dravyasya ye ārambhakāḥ pāramparyeṇa paramāṇavaḥ teṣu karmāṇi utpadyante kutas agni abhighātāt nodanāt vā

original: abhighātastu vegāpekṣaḥ parasparavibhāgahetorekasya karmaṇaḥ kāraṇam । nodanantu avibhāgahetoranekasyeti vakṣyāmaḥ karmādhikāre ।
analyzed: abhighātaḥ tu vega apekṣaḥ paraspara vibhāga hetoḥ ekasya karmaṇaḥ kāraṇam avibhāga hetoḥ anekasya iti vakṣyāmaḥ karma adhikāre

original: anye tu ghaṭasyādirdvyaṇukaṃ tadārambhakāḥ paramāṇavaḥ sākṣāditi manyante ।
analyzed: anye tu ghaṭasya ādiḥ dvyaṇukam tad ārambhakāḥ paramāṇavaḥ sākṣāt iti manyante

original: tatra karmotpattāvaṇavaḥ samavāyikāraṇaṃ tatsaṃyogo 'samavāyikāraṇaṃ vegādi nimittakāraṇamiti । tebhyo vibhāgāste tu dravyārambhakasaṃyogapratidvandvinaḥ । tatrāpyasamavāyikāraṇaṃ karma, paramāṇvoḥ samavāyitvaṃ śeṣam nimittakāraṇamiti । “vibhāgebhyaḥ saṃyogavināśāḥ”(*) । teṣāṃ samavāyyādikāraṇānupalabdhernimittādevotpattiḥ । na hyabhāvaḥ samavetaḥ kvacidutpadyamāno dṛṣṭaḥ ।
analyzed: tatra karma utpattau aṇavaḥ samavāyi kāraṇam tad saṃyogaḥ samavāyi kāraṇam vega ādi nimitta kāraṇam iti tebhyaḥ vibhāgāḥ te tu dravya ārambhaka saṃyoga pratidvandvinaḥ tatra api asamavāyi kāraṇam karma paramāṇvoḥ samavāyi tvam śeṣam nimitta kāraṇam iti vibhāgebhyaḥ saṃyoga vināśāḥ teṣām samavāyi ādi kāraṇa anupalabdheḥ nimittāt eva utpattiḥ na hi abhāvaḥ samavetaḥ kvacid utpadyamānaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ  /

original: ata evāsamavāyikāraṇaṃ nāsti, ekārthasamavāyābhāvāt । nimittakāraṇantu anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ vyāpriyamāṇaṃ tadutpattāvupalabdham । saṃyogavināśebhyaḥ kāryadravyaṃ dvyaṇukalakṣaṇaṃ vinaśyatīti । jātyapekṣayaikavacanam ।
analyzed: atas eva asamavāyi kāraṇam na asti ekārtha samavāya abhāvāt nimitta kāraṇam tu anvaya vyatirekābhyām vyāpriyamāṇam tad utpattau upalabdham saṃyoga vināśebhyaḥ kārya dravyam dvyaṇuka lakṣaṇam vinaśyati iti jāti apekṣayā ekavacanam

original: {paramāṇuṣu pūrvarūpanāśānantaraṃ pākajarūpādyutpattiḥ}
(“tasmin vinaṣṭe svatantreṣu paramāṇuṣvagnisaṃyogād auṣṇyāpekṣāt śyāmādīnāṃ vināśaḥ, punaranyasmādagnisaṃyogād auṣṇyāpekṣāt pākajā jāyante ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: tasmin vinaṣṭe svatantreṣu paramāṇuṣu agni saṃyogāt auṣṇya apekṣāt śyāma ādīnām vināśaḥ punar anyasmāt agni saṃyogāt auṣṇya apekṣāt pāka jāḥ jāyante

original: {ghaṭatadrūpādīnāmutpattiḥ}
analyzed: ghaṭa tad rūpa ādīnām utpattiḥ

original: (“tadanantaraṃ bhogināmadṛṣṭāpekṣādātmāṇusaṃyogādutpannapākajeṣu karmotpattau teṣāṃ parasparasaṃyogād dvyaṇukādikrameṇa kāryadravyamutpadyate । tatra ca kāraṇaguṇaprakrameṇa rūpādyutpattiḥ ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: tad anantaram bhoginām adṛṣṭa apekṣāt ātma aṇu saṃyogāt utpanna pāka jeṣu karma utpattau teṣām paraspara saṃyogāt dvi aṇuka ādi krameṇa kārya dravyam utpadyate tatra ca kāraṇa guṇa prakrameṇa rūpa ādi utpattiḥ

original: tasmin vinaṣṭe paramāṇuṣvanyasmādagnisaṃyogāt śyāmādīnāṃ nivṛttiḥ । “punaranyasmādagnisaṃyogād auṣṇyāpekṣyāt pākajā jāyante”(*) tatra paramāṇuḥ samavāyikāraṇam, agnisaṃyogo 'samavāyikāraṇam, uṣṇasparśo nimittakāraṇamiti ।
analyzed: tasmin vinaṣṭe paramāṇuṣu anyasmāt agni saṃyogāt śyāma ādīnām nivṛttiḥ punar anyasmāt agni saṃyogāt auṣṇya āpekṣyāt pāka jāḥ jāyante tatra paramāṇuḥ samavāyi kāraṇam agni saṃyogaḥ samavāyi kāraṇam uṣṇa sparśaḥ nimitta kāraṇam iti

original: “tadanantaram”(*) raktādyutpattikṣaṇānantaram । utpannapākajeṣvaṇuṣu samavetāni kāryāṇi utpadyante । asamavāyikāraṇamāha “ātmāṇusaṃyogāt”(*) adṛṣṭāpekṣāt । adṛṣṭañca keṣāmityāha “bhoginām”(*) iti ।
analyzed: tad anantaram rakta ādi utpatti kṣaṇa anantaram utpanna pāka jeṣu aṇuṣu samavetāni kāryāṇi utpadyante asamavāyi kāraṇam āha ātma aṇu saṃyogāt adṛṣṭa apekṣāt adṛṣṭam ca keṣām iti āha bhoginām iti

original: karmotpattau satyāmanantaraṃ vibhāgāḥ, tebhyaḥ saṃyogavināśāḥ, tataḥ paramāṇūnāṃ paraspareṇa saṃyogād dvyaṇukānyutpadyante । tatra paramāṇvoḥ samavāyitvam, tatsaṃyogasyāsamavāyikāraṇatvam, śeṣaṃ nimittamiti, tadādikrameṇa kāryamutpadyata iti । tribhirdvyaṇukaistryaṇukamārabhyate । tryaṇukaiścāniyamena svakāryamiti tāvad yāvad ghaṭaḥ । sarvatra kāraṇaguṇapūrvaprakrameṇa rūpādyutpattiriti ।
analyzed: karma utpattau satyām anantaram vibhāgāḥ tebhyaḥ saṃyoga vināśāḥ tatas paramāṇūnām paraspareṇa saṃyogāt dvyaṇukāni utpadyante tatra paramāṇvoḥ samavāyi tvam tad saṃyogasya asamavāyi kāraṇa tvam śeṣam nimittam iti tad ādi krameṇa kāryam utpadyate iti tribhiḥ dvyaṇukaiḥ tryaṇukam ārabhyate tryaṇukaiḥ ca aniyamena sva kāryam iti tāvat yāvat ghaṭaḥ sarvatra kāraṇa guṇa pūrva prakrameṇa rūpa ādi utpattiḥ iti

original: nanu sarvametadasambaddham, etasmin krame pramāṇābhāvāt । tathā hi,
analyzed: nanu sarvam etat asambaddham etasmin krame pramāṇa abhāvāt tathā hi

original: <1> paramāṇau kriyāyāḥ sadbhāve pramāṇābhāvāt tatkāryasyāsiddhau taddvyaṇukasya vināśe〈na〉 pramāṇamasti ।
analyzed: paramāṇau kriyāyāḥ sadbhāve pramāṇa abhāvāt tad kāryasya asiddhau tat dvyaṇukasya vināśena pramāṇam asti

original: <2> agnisaṃyogasya nānātve, dravyavināśe, śyāmādinivṛttau, raktādyutpattau, utpannapākajeṣu kriyākrameṇa taddvyaṇukasyaivotpattiriti sarvaṃ pramāṇaśūnyameva ।
analyzed: agni saṃyogasya nānātve dravya vināśe śyāma ādi nivṛttau rakta ādi utpattau utpanna pāka jeṣu kriyā krameṇa tad dvyaṇukasya eva utpattiḥ iti sarvam pramāṇa śūnyam eva

original: <3> bādhakopapatteśca । tathā hyāpākanikṣipteṣu ghaṭādiṣu kulālasya chidrapradeśena nirīkṣamāṇasyākṣajaṃ vijñānam “ghaṭaḥ pacyate” iti । na cedaṃ saṃśayaviparyayasvarūpam, tallakṣaṇālakṣitatvāt, bādhakānupapatteśca ।
analyzed: bādhaka upapatteḥ ca tathā hi āpāka nikṣipteṣu ghaṭa ādiṣu kulālasya chidra pradeśena nirīkṣamāṇasya akṣa jam vijñānam ghaṭaḥ pacyate iti na ca idam saṃśaya viparyaya svarūpam tad lakṣaṇa a lakṣita tvāt bādhaka anupapatteḥ ca

original: <4> tathā pākottarakālaṃ “sa evāyaṃ ghaṭaḥ” ityabādhyamānasya pratyabhijñānasyopalabdheḥ ।
analyzed: tathā pāka uttara kālam saḥ eva ayam ghaṭaḥ iti a bādhyamānasya pratyabhijñānasya upalabdheḥ

original: <5> avasthānam । uparisthāpitānāñca tṛṇakarparādīnāmapātāccāvasthāyitvam । yadi hi paramāṇavaḥ pacyeran ūrdhvasthāpitānāṃ karparādīnām pātaḥ syāt, paramāṇūnāñca dhāraṇasāmarthyābhāvāt ।
analyzed: avasthānam upari sthāpitānām ca tṛṇa karpara ādīnām apātāt ca avasthāyi tvam yadi hi paramāṇavaḥ pacyeran ūrdhva sthāpitānām karpara ādīnām pātaḥ syāt paramāṇūnām ca dhāraṇa sāmarthya abhāvāt

original: <6> taddeśatvatatparimāṇatvatatsaṃkhyātvopalabdheśca । yadi cotpannapākajāḥ paramāṇavo dvyaṇukādiprakrameṇa ghaṭādikamārabheran taddeśaṃ, tāvat parimāṇam, tatsaṃkhyā ca na syāt, niyamahetorabhāvāt । dṛṣṭaścāyaṃ niyamastasminneva deśe, tāvatparimāṇam, tatsaṃkhyā ca । evaṃ ghaṭādīnāmavasthāyitvam ।
analyzed: tad deśa tva tad parimāṇa tva tad saṃkhyā tva upalabdheḥ ca  yadi ca utpanna pāka jāḥ paramāṇavaḥ dvyaṇuka ādi prakrameṇa ghaṭa ādikam ārabheran tad deśam tāvat parimāṇam tad saṃkhyā ca na syāt niyama hetoḥ abhāvāt dṛṣṭaḥ ca ayam niyamaḥ tasmin eva deśe tāvat parimāṇam tad saṃkhyā ca  / evam ghaṭa ādīnām avasthāyi tvam

original: <7> na ca ghaṭādervināśe kartrādibhirvinā punarutpattiryuktā । atheśvarādeḥ sadbhāvād yuktamiti cet । tathā hīśvaraḥ kartā kāraṇam, adṛṣṭādiparamāṇavaḥ karmeti । naitad yuktam । kṣityādikāryeṣvivāsmadādisambandhāditaḥ kāryānapekṣasya ghaṭādisampādane 'pi sāmarthyānivṛtteḥ kulālavyāpāravaiyarthyameva syāt ।
analyzed: na ca ghaṭa ādeḥ vināśe kartṛ ādibhiḥ vinā punarutpattiḥ yuktā atha īśvara ādeḥ sadbhāvāt yuktam iti ced tathā hi īśvaraḥ kartā kāraṇam adṛṣṭa ādi paramāṇavaḥ karma iti na etat yuktam kṣiti ādi kāryeṣu iva asmat ādi sambandhāt itas kārya anapekṣasya ghaṭa ādi sampādane pi sāmarthya anivṛtteḥ kulāla vyāpāra vaiyarthyam eva syāt

original: <8> āvaraṇābhāvaśca । tathā hi, vegādagnisambandhādavayavakriyākrameṇa ghaṭādervināśastathāvegācca cakṣuḥsambandhāt kācābhrasphaṭikādeḥ kriyākrameṇa vināśe tadvyavahitena sambaddhasya cakṣuṣaḥ prakāśakatvamityāvaraṇābhāvaḥ syāt । atha svacchatayā sphaṭikādidravyamindriyavyavadhāyakaṃ na bhavatītyupapannamevāvṛtasyāpi grahaṇam । tarhi ghaṭādidravyamapi tathāsvabhāvatayā tejodravyavyavadhāyakaṃ na bhavatītyaṇupraveśādantardeśe 'pyupapadyata evaṃ pākaḥ । anyathā hyāvṛtānāvṛtayostulyopalabdhiḥ syāt, āvaraṇābhāvasyobhayatrāviśeṣāt ।

original: atha “dravyāṇi dravyāntaramārabhante” <vai. sū. 1.1.10> “saṃyogānāṃ dravyam” <vai. sū. 1.1.27> iti ca sūtravyāghātaḥ ? na । dvivacanabahuvacanābhyāṃ vigrahāśrayatvāt । tathā hi, dravye ca dravyāṇītyekaśeṣaḥ । kāryadravyā<II,027>pekṣayā tu bahuvacanam । bahūni kāryadravyāṇyeva dravyamārabhante । dvitvasaṃkhyopetānyeva ca nityāni, na tu nityānyeva, kāryadravye 'pi sadbhāvāt ।
analyzed: atha dravyāṇi dravya antaram ārabhante vai sū saṃyogānām dravyam vai sū iti ca sūtra vyāghātaḥ na dvivacana bahuvacanābhyām vigraha āśraya tvāt tathā hi dravye ca dravyāṇi iti ekaśeṣaḥ tu bahuvacanam bahūni kārya dravyāṇi eva dravyam ārabhante dvitva saṃkhyā upetāni eva ca nityāni na tu nityāni eva kārya dravye sadbhāvāt

original: na caikasya kramayaugapadyābhyāmārambhakatvam, ekasvabhāvatvāt । tathā hyekaḥ paramāṇurna krameṇa kāryaṃ karoti, samarthasya kṣepāyogāt, yugapat kṛtvā punarakaraṇe hetvabhāvaḥ ।
analyzed: na ca ekasya krama yaugapadyābhyām ārambhaka tvam eka svabhāva tvāt  tathā hi ekaḥ paramāṇuḥ na krameṇa kāryam karoti samarthasya kṣepa ayogāt yugapad kṛtvā punar akaraṇe hetu abhāvaḥ

original: na ca samānaparimāṇatāyāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ, kṣaṇabhaṅgapratiṣedhāt, kāraṇavibhāgābhāvādavināśitvaṃ kāryadravyasya ca prasajyate ।
analyzed: na ca samāna parimāṇa tāyām kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅga pratiṣedhāt kāraṇa vibhāga abhāvāt avināśi tvam kārya dravyasya ca prasajyate

original: tathā saṃyogaśca saṃyogau ca saṃyogāśceti saṃyogāḥ । teṣāṃ dravyaṃ kāryamiti nityāpekṣayā saṃyogasyaiva kāryadravye cāniyama ityavirodhaḥ ।
analyzed: tathā saṃyogaḥ ca saṃyogau ca saṃyogāḥ ca iti saṃyogāḥ teṣām dravyam kāryam iti nitya apekṣayā saṃyogasya eva kārya dravye ca aniyamaḥ iti avirodhaḥ

original: tadevaṃ dvitvasaṃkhyopetāḥ paramāṇavaḥ kāryadravyamārabhante, ekatvabahutvapakṣe bādhakapramāṇasadbhāve satyārambhakatvāt । dvitvantu dvyaṇukārambhakaḥ, tantudvitayavat । na hi bahubhistantubhirdvitantukamārabhyate, nāpyekeneti saviśeṣaṇasya hetorasadbhāvaḥ ।
analyzed: tat evam dvi tva saṃkhyā upetāḥ paramāṇavaḥ kārya dravyam ārabhante ekatva bahu tva pakṣe bādhaka pramāṇa sadbhāve sati ārambhaka tvāt dvi tvam tu dvi aṇuka ārambhakaḥ tantu dvitaya vat na hi bahubhiḥ tantubhiḥ dvi tantukam ārabhyate na api ekena iti sa viśeṣaṇasya hetoḥ asadbhāvaḥ

original: atha dvyaṇukāni dvitvādisaṃkhyopetāni aniyamena kimiti kāryaṃ nārabhante ? bādhakopapatteḥ । tathā hi dvayordvyaṇukayorārambhakatve 'ṇuparimāṇotpattāveva kāraṇatvamastīti vyarthārambhaprasaṅgaḥ ।
analyzed: atha dvyaṇukāni dvi tva ādi saṃkhyā upetāni aniyamena kim iti kāryam na ārabhante bādhaka upapatteḥ tathā hi dvayoḥ dvyaṇukayoḥ ārambhaka tve ṇu parimāṇa utpattau eva kāraṇa tvam asti iti vyartha ārambha prasaṅgaḥ

original: na ca dvyaṇukadvayasya kāraṇaparamāṇvapekṣayā bahutvaṃ sambhavatīti vācyam । (kāraṇaṃ <?>) na, kāraṇāvṛttibahutvasya parimāṇotpattāvakāraṇatvāt । kāraṇavṛtti ca bahutvaṃ mahattvotpattau kāraṇamiti dṛṣṭam । anyathā hi dvyaṇuke 'pi mahattvaṃ syāt akāraṇāpekṣitayā bahutvasya tatrāpi sambhavāt । tathā (dvyaṇuka)<?>〈dvyaṇukasyāpi 〉bahutvasaṃkhyopetasyaiva mahadārambhakatvamiti । paraṃ dvyaṇukasyaitat kalpanīyamiti । ekasya cārambhakatvaṃ pratiṣiddham ।
analyzed: na ca dvyaṇuka dvayasya kāraṇa paramāṇu apekṣayā bahu tvam sambhavati iti vācyam kāraṇam na kāraṇa āvṛtti bahu tvasya parimāṇa utpattau akāraṇa tvāt kāraṇa vṛtti ca bahu tvam mahat tva utpattau kāraṇam iti dṛṣṭam anyathā hi dvyaṇuke mahat tvam syāt akāraṇa apekṣi tayā bahu tvasya tatra api sambhavāt tathā dvyaṇuka dvyaṇukasya api bahu tva saṃkhyā upetasya eva mahat ārambhaka tvam iti param dvyaṇukasya etat kalpanīyam iti ekasya ca ārambhaka

original: atha catuṣṭvādisaṃkhyopetānāmaniyamenārambhakatvamiti neṣyate, sākṣādghaṭādyārambhakatvaprasaṅgāt । tadbhaṅge ca avāntarakāryasyānupalabdhirevānutpannatvāt । na ca bahutvaṃ vinā mahattvaṃ sambhāvyata iti tritvasaṃkhyopetānāmevārambhakatvam । tathā hi, dvyaṇukāni, tritvasaṃkhyopetānyeva dravyamārabhante, dvitvacatuṣṭvādipakṣe bādhakapramāṇasadbhāve sati ārambhakatvāt, tritantukārambhe tantutritayavat ।
analyzed: atha catuṣṭva ādi saṃkhyā upetānām aniyamena ārambhaka tvam iti nā iṣyate sākṣāt ghaṭa ādi ārambhaka tva prasaṅgāt tad bhaṅge ca avāntara kāryasya anupalabdhiḥ eva anutpanna tvāt  na ca bahu tvam vinā mahat tvam sambhāvyate iti tritva saṃkhyā upetānām eva ārambhaka tvam tathā hi dvyaṇukāni tritva saṃkhyā upetāni eva dravyam ārabhante dvitva catuṣṭva ādi pakṣe bādhaka pramāṇa sadbhāve sati ārambhaka tvāt tri tantuka ārambhe tantu tritaya vat

original: atra tu kiyatā kālena dvyaṇuke rūpādyutpattiriti kriyā nirūpyate ।
analyzed: atra tu kiyatā kālena dvyaṇuke rūpa ādi utpattiḥ iti kriyā nirūpyate

original: <1> tatra svakāraṇād dvyaṇukasya vināśaḥ, tatkāryasya vinaśyattā, śyāmādyucchedakāgnisaṃyogasyotpādaḥ, śyāmādīnāṃ vinaśyattā, raktādyutpādakāgnisaṃyogasyotpadyamānatā, vibhāgajavibhāgasyotpādaḥ, paramāṇvorākāśādideśena saṃyogasya vinaśyattetyeṣāmekaḥ kālaḥ ।
analyzed: tatra sva kāraṇāt dvyaṇukasya vināśaḥ tad kāryasya vinaśyat tā śyāma ādi ucchedaka agni saṃyogasya utpādaḥ śyāma ādīnām vinaśyat tā rakta ādi utpādaka agni saṃyogasya utpadyamāna tā vibhāga ja vibhāgasya utpādaḥ paramāṇvoḥ ākāśa ādi deśena saṃyogasya vinaśyat tā iti eṣām ekaḥ kālaḥ

original: <2> tatastryaṇukasya vināśaḥ, tatkāryasya vinaśyattā, śyāmādīnāṃ vināśaḥ, śyāmādyucchedakāgnisaṃyogasya vinaśyattā, raktādyutpādakāgnisaṃyogasyotpādaḥ, raktādīnāmutpadyamānatā, ākāśadvyaṇukasaṃyogasya vināśaḥ, uttarasaṃyogasyotpadyamānatetyeṣāmekaḥ kālaḥ ।
analyzed: tatas tryaṇukasya vināśaḥ tad kāryasya vinaśyat tā śyāma ādīnām vināśaḥ śyāma ādi ucchedaka agni saṃyogasya vinaśyat tā rakta ādi utpādaka agni saṃyogasya utpādaḥ rakta ādīnām utpadyamāna tā ākāśa dvyaṇuka saṃyogasya vināśaḥ uttara saṃyogasya utpadyamāna tā iti eṣām ekaḥ kālaḥ

original: <3> tatastatkāryasya vināśāt tatkāryasya vinaśyattā, śyāmādyucchedakāgnisaṃyogasya vināśaḥ, raktādīnāmutpādaḥ, raktādyutpādakāgnisaṃyogasya vinaśyattā, tathottarasaṃyogasyotpādaḥ, vibhāgavibhāgajavibhāgakarmaṇāṃ vinaśyattā, kriyāyā utpadyamānatetyeṣāmekaḥ kālaḥ ।
analyzed: tatas tad kāryasya vināśāt tad kāryasya vinaśyat tā śyāma ādi ucchedaka agni saṃyogasya vināśaḥ rakta ādīnām utpādaḥ rakta ādi utpādaka agni saṃyogasya vinaśyat tā tathā uttara saṃyogasya utpādaḥ vibhāga vibhāga ja vibhāga karmaṇām vinaśyat tā kriyāyāḥ utpadyamāna tā iti eṣām ekaḥ kālaḥ

original: <4> tatastatkāryavināśaḥ, tatkāryasya vinaśyattā, vibhāgavibhāgajavibhāgakarmaṇāṃ vināśaḥ, raktādyutpādakāgnisaṃyogasya vināśaḥ, kriyāyā utpādaḥ, vibhāgasyotpadyamānatetyeṣāmekaḥ kālaḥ ।
analyzed: tatas tad kārya vināśaḥ tad kāryasya vinaśyat tā vibhāga vibhāga ja vibhāga karmaṇām vināśaḥ rakta ādi utpādaka agni saṃyogasya vināśaḥ kriyāyāḥ utpādaḥ vibhāgasya utpadyamāna tā iti eṣām ekaḥ kālaḥ

original: <5> tatastatkāryavināśāt tatkāryasya vinaśyattā, vibhāgasyotpādaḥ, saṃyogasya vinaśyattetyeṣāmekaḥ kālaḥ ।
analyzed: tatas tad kārya vināśāt tad kāryasya vinaśyat tā vibhāgasya utpādaḥ saṃyogasya vinaśyat tā iti eṣām ekaḥ kālaḥ

original: <6> tatastatkāryavināśāt tatkāryasya vinaśyattā, saṃyogasya vināśaḥ, uttarasaṃyogasyotpadyamānatetyekaḥ kālaḥ ।
analyzed: tatas tad kārya vināśāt tad kāryasya vinaśyat tā saṃyogasya vināśaḥ uttara saṃyogasya utpadyamāna tā iti ekaḥ kālaḥ

original: <7> tatastatkāryavināśāt tatkāryasya vinaśyattā, uttarasaṃyogasyotpādaḥ, dvyaṇukasyotpadyamānatā, vibhāgakarmaṇorvinaśyattetyeṣāmekaḥ kālaḥ ।
analyzed: tatas tad kārya vināśāt tad kāryasya vinaśyat tā uttara saṃyogasya utpādaḥ dvyaṇukasya utpadyamāna tā vibhāga karmaṇoḥ vinaśyat tā iti eṣām ekaḥ kālaḥ

original: <8> tatastatkāryasya vināśāt tatkāryasya vinaśyattā, dvyaṇukasyotpādaḥ, rūpādīnāmutpadyamānatā, vibhāgakarmaṇorvināśa ityeṣāmekaḥ kālaḥ ।
analyzed: tatas tad kāryasya vināśāt tad kāryasya vinaśyat tā dvyaṇukasya utpādaḥ rūpa ādīnām utpadyamāna tā vibhāga karmaṇoḥ vināśaḥ iti eṣām ekaḥ kālaḥ

original: <9> tata utpanne dvyaṇuke kāraṇaguṇapūrvaprakrameṇa navame kṣaṇe rūpādyutpattiriti ।
analyzed: tatas utpanne dvyaṇuke kāraṇa guṇa pūrva prakrameṇa navame kṣaṇe rūpa ādi utpattiḥ iti

original: yadā tu kāryavināśaviśiṣṭaṃ 〈kālam〉 apekṣyetyasya dravyanāśaviśiṣṭaṃ <II,029> 〈kālam〉 apekṣya kāraṇayorvartamāno vibhāgaḥ kāryasaṃyuktākāśadeśena vibhāgamārabhata iti vyākhyātam, tadā śyāmādinivṛttisamakālaṃ vibhāgajavibhāgasañcintanāt daśame kṣaṇe dvyaṇuke rūpādyutpattiriti cintanīyam ।
analyzed: yadā tu kārya vināśa viśiṣṭam kālam apekṣya iti asya dravya nāśa viśiṣṭam kālam apekṣya kāraṇayoḥ vartamānaḥ vibhāgaḥ kārya saṃyukta ākāśa deśena vibhāgam ārabhate iti vyākhyātam tadā śyāma ādini vṛtti sama kālam vibhāga ja vibhāga sañcintanāt daśame kṣaṇe dvyaṇuke rūpa ādi utpattiḥ iti cintanīyam

original: tathā ca dvyaṇukavināśe śyāmādinivṛttiḥ, tato raktādyutpattiḥ, uttarasaṃyogaḥ, kriyāvibhāgasaṃyogavināśaḥ, paramāṇūnāñca saṃyogād dvyaṇukotpattau kāraṇaguṇapūrvaprakrameṇa rūpādyutpattiriti । śeṣaṃ pūrvavaditi । idamekasmin paramāṇau dravyotpādikā 〈tadvināśiketi ca〉 kriyādvayamadhikṛtyoktam ।
analyzed: tathā ca dvyaṇuka vināśe śyāma ādi nivṛttiḥ tatas rakta ādi utpattiḥ uttara saṃyogaḥ kriyā vibhāga saṃyoga vināśaḥ paramāṇūnām ca saṃyogāt dvyaṇuka utpattau kāraṇa guṇa pūrva prakrameṇa rūpa ādi utpattiḥ iti śeṣam pūrvavat iti idam ekasmin paramāṇau dravya utpādikā tad vināśikā iti ca kriyā dvayam adhikṛtya uktam

original: yadā tvekasmin paramāṇau dravyavināśikānyasmiṃśca dravyotpādikeṣyate tadā katham ?
analyzed: yadā tu ekasmin paramāṇau dravya vināśikā anyasmin ca dravya utpādikā iṣyate tadā katham

original: <1> tatra dravyārambhakasaṃyogavināśasamakālaṃ dvitīyaparamāṇau dravyārambhakaṃ karma, tato dravyārambhakasaṃyogavināśād dvyaṇukasya vināśaḥ, tatkāryasya vinaśyattā, śyāmādyucchedakāgnisaṃyogasyotpādaḥ, śyāmādīnāmucchidyamānatā, raktādyutpādakāgnisaṃyogasyotpadyamānatā, vibhāgajavibhāgasyotpādaḥ, paramāṇorākāśādideśena saṃyogasya vinaśyattā, dvitīyaparamāṇau vibhāgasyotpādaḥ 〈prāktanasaṃyogasya〉 vinaśyattetyeṣāmekaḥ kālaḥ ।
analyzed: tatra dravya ārambhaka saṃyoga vināśa sama kālam dvitīya paramāṇau dravya ārambhakam karma tatas dravya ārambhaka saṃyoga vināśāt dvyaṇukasya vināśaḥ tad kāryasya vinaśyat tā śyāma ādi ucchedaka agni saṃyogasya utpādaḥ śyāma ādīnām ucchidyamāna tā rakta ādi utpādaka agni saṃyogasya utpadyamāna tā vibhāga ja vibhāgasya utpādaḥ paramāṇoḥ ākāśa ādi deśena saṃyogasya vinaśyat tā dvitīya paramāṇau vibhāgasya utpādaḥ prāktana saṃyogasya

original: <2> tatastryaṇukasya vināśaḥ, tatkāryasya vinaśyattā, śyāmādīnāṃ vināśaḥ, taducchedakāgnisaṃyogasya vinaśyattā, raktādyutpādakāgnisaṃyogasyotpādaḥ, raktādīnāmutpadyamānatā, ākāśadvyaṇukasaṃyogasya vināśaḥ, tasya paramāṇorākāśādideśena saṃyogasyotpadyamānatā, dvitīyaparamāṇau prāktanasaṃyogavināśaḥ, paramāṇunā ca saṃyogasyotpadyamānatetyeṣāmekaḥ kālaḥ ।
analyzed: tatas tryaṇukasya vināśaḥ tad kāryasya vinaśyat tā śyāma ādīnām vināśaḥ tad ucchedaka agni saṃyogasya vinaśyat tā rakta ādi utpādaka agni saṃyogasya utpādaḥ rakta ādīnām utpadyamāna tā ākāśa dvyaṇuka saṃyogasya vināśaḥ tasya paramāṇoḥ ākāśa ādi deśena saṃyogasya utpadyamāna tā dvitīya paramāṇau prāktana saṃyoga vināśaḥ paramāṇunā ca saṃyogasya utpadyamāna tā iti eṣām ekaḥ kālaḥ

original: <3> tatastatkāryavināśāt tatkāryasya vinaśyattā, śyāmādyucchedakāgnisaṃyogasya vināśaḥ, raktādīnāmutpādaḥ, paramāṇorākāśādideśena saṃyogasyotpādaḥ, vibhāgajavibhāgakarmaṇorvinaśyattā, dvitīyasya paramāṇoḥ paramāṇvantareṇa saṃyogasyotpādaḥ, tadvibhāgakarmaṇorvinaśyattā, dvyaṇukasyotpadyamānatetyeṣāmekaḥ kālaḥ ।
analyzed: tatas tad kārya vināśāt tad kāryasya vinaśyat tā śyāma ādi ucchedaka agni saṃyogasya vināśaḥ rakta ādīnām utpādaḥ paramāṇoḥ ākāśa ādi deśena saṃyogasya utpādaḥ vibhāga ja vibhāga karmaṇoḥ vinaśyat tā dvitīyasya paramāṇoḥ paramāṇu antareṇa saṃyogasya utpādaḥ tad vibhāga karmaṇoḥ vinaśyat tā dvyaṇukasya utpadyamāna tā iti eṣām ekaḥ kālaḥ

original: <4> tatastatkāryavināśāt tatkāryasya vinaśyattā, vibhāgajavibhāgakarmaṇāṃ vināśaḥ, dvitīyaparamāṇāvapi vibhāgakarmaṇorvināśaḥ, dvyaṇu<II,030>kasyotpādaḥ, raktādīnāmutpadyamānatetyeṣāmekaḥ kālaḥ ।
analyzed: tatas tad kārya vināśāt tad kāryasya vinaśyat tā vibhāga ja vibhāga karmaṇām vināśaḥ dvitīya paramāṇau api vibhāga karmaṇoḥ vināśaḥ rakta ādīnām utpadyamāna tā iti eṣām ekaḥ kālaḥ

original: <5> tato dvyaṇukotpattyanantaraṃ pañcame kṣaṇe kāraṇaguṇapūrvaprakrameṇa rūpādyutpattiriti ।
analyzed: tatas dvi aṇuka utpatti anantaram pañcame kṣaṇe kāraṇa guṇa pūrva prakrameṇa rūpa ādi utpattiḥ iti

original: tathā dvyaṇukavināśasamakālaṃ dvitīyaparamāṇau karmasañcintanāt ṣaṭkṣaṇā pākajotpattiḥ । tathā śyāmādinivṛttisamakālaṃ karmacintāyāṃ saptakṣaṇā । raktādyutpattisamakālaṃ 〈karmacintanāt〉 aṣṭakṣaṇā । tadanantarañca 〈karmacintāyāṃ〉 navakṣaṇā ityādi cintyam ।
analyzed: tathā dvyaṇuka vināśa sama kālam dvitīya paramāṇau karma sañcintanāt ṣaṣ kṣaṇā pāka ja utpattiḥ tathā śyāma ādi nivṛtti sama kālam karma cintāyām sapta kṣaṇā rakta ādi utpatti sama kālam karma cintanāt aṣṭa kṣaṇā tad anantaram ca karma cintāyām nava kṣaṇā ityādi cintyam

original: tatrādau dvyaṇukāni pakvāpakvairapi paramāṇubhirārabhyanta iti pakvāpakvānyutpadyante । tatastaistryaṇukamityādiprakrameṇa ghaṭasya pakvāpakvasyotpādaḥ ।
analyzed: tatra ādau dvyaṇukāni pakva apakvaiḥ api paramāṇubhiḥ ārabhyante iti pakva apakvāni utpadyante tatas taiḥ tryaṇukam ityādi prakrameṇa ghaṭasya pakva apakvasya utpādaḥ

original: tataḥ punaranutpannapākajeṣu kriyādikrameṇa dravyavināśe svatantreṣu paramāṇuṣu raktādyutpattiḥ । tataḥ punaḥ kriyākrameṇa uttarasaṃyogotpattau dvyaṇukānyutpadyante । tatra ca kāraṇaguṇapūrvaprakrameṇa pakveṣveva rūpādyutpadyate । taistryaṇukaṃ pakvamevārabhyate । punardvyaṇukāntareṣvapyevameva krameṇa rūpādyutpattiḥ, tatastryaṇukāderiti vācyam, yāvad ghaṭe viśiṣṭarūpādyutpattiriti ।
analyzed: tatas punar anutpanna pāka jeṣu kriyā ādi krameṇa dravya vināśe svatantreṣu paramāṇuṣu rakta ādi utpattiḥ tatas punar kriyā krameṇa uttara saṃyoga utpattau dvyaṇukāni utpadyante tatra ca kāraṇa guṇa pūrva prakrameṇa pakveṣu eva rūpa ādi utpadyate taiḥ tryaṇukam pakvam eva ārabhyate punar dvyaṇuka antareṣu api evam eva krameṇa rūpa ādi utpattiḥ tatas tryaṇuka ādeḥ iti vācyam yāvat ghaṭe viśiṣṭa rūpa ādi utpattiḥ iti

original: athedānīmuddeśakrameṇāvasaraprāptāyāḥ saṃkhyāyā lakṣaṇaparīkṣārtham “ekatvādivyavahārahetuḥ saṃkhyā”(*) ityādiprakaraṇam । vyavahṛtirvyavahāro jñānam, vyavahriyate 'neneti vyavahāro 'bhidhānam tayorhetuḥ saṃkhyetyucyamāne sarve 'pi padārthāstathā bhavantītyekādigrahaṇam । tathāpyekādirūpasya vyavahārahetutvamākāśātmanorvidyata iti viśeṣaṇatve satīti viśeṣaṇamūhyam । tathāpyekatvādisāmānyam evaṃ bhavatīti dravyaviśeṣaṇatve sati iti padam 〈ūhyam〉 । tathā hi, saṃkhyā, itarebhyo bhidyate, dravyaviśeṣaṇatve satyekādivyavahārahetutvāt, yastu na bhidyate na cāsāvevam, yathā rūpādiriti । vyavahāro vā sādhyaḥ ।
analyzed: atha idānīm uddeśa krameṇa avasara prāptāyāḥ saṃkhyāyāḥ lakṣaṇa parīkṣā artham ekatva ādi vyavahāra hetuḥ saṃkhyā iti ādi prakaraṇam vyavahṛtiḥ vyavahāraḥ jñānam vyavahriyate nena iti vyavahāraḥ bhidhānam tayoḥ hetuḥ saṃkhyā iti ucyamāne sarve pi padārthāḥ tathā bhavanti iti eka ādi grahaṇam tathā api eka ādi rūpasya vyavahāra hetu tvam ākāśa ātmanoḥ vidyate iti viśeṣaṇa tve sati iti viśeṣaṇam ūhyam tathā api ekatva ādi s

original: tatra saṃkhyāyāstvāśrayadvāreṇa bhedanirūpaṇārthaṃ lakṣaṇena lakṣyamāṇasyaikānekatvopalabdhau saṃśaye sati tannirāsārthañca “sā punarekadravyā cānekadravyā ca”(*) iti vākyam । ekameva dravyamāśrayo 'syā ityekadravyā । anekameva 〈dravyam〉 (atrāpi naśyadrūpāyāḥ<?>) āśrayo 'syā ityanekadravyā “tatraikadravyāyāḥ salilādiparamāṇurūpādīnāmiva nityānityatvaniṣpattayaḥ”(*) ityatideśaṃ karoti ।
analyzed: tatra saṃkhyāyāḥ tu āśraya dvāreṇa bheda nirūpaṇa artham lakṣaṇena lakṣyamāṇasya eka aneka tva upalabdhau saṃśaye sati tad nirāsa artham ca sā punar eka dravyā ca aneka dravyā ca iti vākyam ekam eva dravyam āśrayā syāḥ iti eka dravyā anekam eva dravyam atra api naśyat rūpāyāḥ āśrayā syāḥ iti aneka dravyā tatra eka dravyāyāḥ salila ādi paramāṇu rūpa ādīnām iva nitya anitya tva niṣpattayaḥ iti atideśam karoti

original: nanu cātra nityatve sādhye heturnāsti, anityatve tu dṛṣṭāntābhāva iti nyūnaṃ vākyam ? na । vyatirekamukhena hetorlābhāt, vigrahabhedena dṛṣṭāntasyeti । tathā hi, niṣpadyamānatvād anityatvamityukte sāmarthyād gamyata evāniṣpadyamānatvena nityatvamiti । dṛṣṭānto 'pi salilamādau yasyāsau salilādistasya paramāṇavaḥ, tadrūpādīnāmiva nityatvam । yathā hi, salilādiparamāṇuṣu ani<II,032>ṣpadyamānatvād rūpādayo nityāstadvad ekatvaṃ nityeṣvaniṣpadyamānatvenaiva nityamiti ।
analyzed: nanu ca atra nitya tve sādhye hetuḥ na asti anitya tve tu dṛṣṭānta abhāvaḥ iti nyūnam vākyam na vyatireka mukhena hetoḥ lābhāt vigraha bhedena dṛṣṭāntasya iti  tathā hi niṣpadyamāna tvāt anitya tvam iti ukte sāmarthyāt gamyate eva aniṣpadyamāna tvena nitya tvam iti  /

original: (“tasyāḥ khalvekatvebhyo 'nekaviṣayabuddhisahitebhyo niṣpattirapekṣābuddhivināśād vināśa iti । katham ? yadā boddhuścakṣuṣā samānāsamānajātīyayordravyayoḥ sannikarṣe sati tatsaṃyuktasamavetasamavetaikatvasāmānye jñānotpattāvekatvasāmānyatatsambandhatajjñānebhya ekatvaguṇayoranekaviṣayiṇī ekā buddhirutpadyate ekatvasāmānyabuddheśca vinaśyattā, tatastāmapekṣyaikatvābhyāṃ svāśrayayordvitvamārabhyate ।”)<PDhS>

original: evañca saṃkṣepeṇotpattivināśakāraṇe prajñāpite viśeṣākāṅkṣitayā ajñasya praśnaḥ kathamiti । kena rūpeṇa utpattiśca vināśaśca bhavatītyāha “yadā boddhuḥ”(*) ityādi । tathā hi, budhyata iti boddhā, tasya boddhurātmanaścakṣuṣā saha samānāsamānajātīyayordravyayoḥ sannikarṣe satītyaniyamaṃ darśayati “samānāsamāna”(*) iti samānajātīyayorasamānajātīyayośca dravyayoḥ sannikarṣe satīti । “tatsaṃyuktasamavetasamavetaikatvasāmānye”(*) jñānamutpadyata iti । tena cakṣuṣā saṃyuktaṃ dravyaṃ, tatsamavetamekatvaguṇam, tatsamavetañca tadekatvasāmānyam, tasmin jñānamutpadyate pūrvaṃ, viśeṣaṇatvāt । tathā hi, viśeṣaṇajñānamādau, kāraṇatvāt, viśeṣyajñānantu paścāt, kāryatvāt ।
analyzed: evam ca saṃkṣepeṇa utpatti vināśa kāraṇe prajñāpite viśeṣa ākāṅkṣi tayā ajñasya praśnaḥ katham iti kena rūpeṇa utpattiḥ ca vināśaḥ ca bhavati iti āha yadā boddhuḥ ityādi tathā hi budhyate iti boddhā tasya boddhuḥ ātmanaḥ cakṣuṣā saha samāna asamāna jātīyayoḥ dravyayoḥ sannikarṣe sati iti aniyamam darśayati samāna asamānaḥ iti samāna jātīyayoḥ asamāna jātīyayoḥ ca dravyayoḥ sannikarṣe sati iti tad saṃyukta samaveta samaveta

original: ata eva ekatvasāmānyajñānotpattau satyām, ekatvasāmānyañca tatsambandhaśca, tajjñānañceti ekatvasāmānyatatsambandhatajjñānāni, tebhyo 'nekaviṣayiṇyekā buddhirutpadyate । anekaścāsau viṣayaścetyanekaviṣayaḥ, so 'syā vidyate ityanekaviṣayiṇī । ekā ca na viṣayabhede 'pi bhidyate ।
