analyzed: kaḥ ca asau anekaḥ viṣayaḥ iti āha ekatva guṇayoḥ iti ekatva guṇaḥ ca ekatva guṇaḥ ca iti ekatva guṇayoḥ viṣaya bhūtayoḥ yathā uktā buddhiḥ utpadyate ekatva sāmānya buddheḥ ca vinaśyat tā tatas tām apekṣya ekatvābhyām sva āśrayayoḥ dvi tvam ārabhyate atra ca sva āśrayayoḥ iti samavāyi kāraṇa nirdeśaḥ tathā ekatvābhyām iti asamavāyi kāraṇasya tām apekṣya iti apekṣā buddheḥ nimitta kāraṇa tvam ekatva sāmānya jñānasya ca vinā

original: (“tataḥ punastasmin dvitvasāmānyajñānamutpadyate । tataḥ punardvitvasā<II,034>mānyajñānād apekṣābuddhervinaśyattā, dvitvasāmānyatatsambandhatajjñānebhyo dvitvaguṇabuddherutpattirityekaḥ kālaḥ ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: tatas punar tasmin dvi tva sāmānya jñānam utpadyate tatas apekṣā buddheḥ vinaśyat tā dvi tva sāmānya tad sambandha tad jñānebhyaḥ dvi tva guṇa buddheḥ utpattiḥ iti ekaḥ kālaḥ

original: tataḥ samutpanne dvitve tatsaṃyuktasamavetasamavāyād dvitvasāmānye jñānamutpadyate pūrvam, viśeṣaṇatvāt । tasmāt sāmānyajñānād apekṣābuddhervinaśyattā vināśakāraṇasānnidhyam । jñānasya jñānāntaravirodhitvāt । dvitvasāmānyatajjñānatatsambandhebhyo dvitvaguṇabuddherutpadyamānateti । dvitvasāmānyād, dvitvasāmānyajñānād dvitvasāmānyaguṇasambandhād dvitvaguṇabuddherutpadyamānatā utpattikāraṇasānnidhyam ityeṣāmekaḥ kālaḥ ।
analyzed: tatas samutpanne dvi tve tad saṃyukta samaveta samavāyāt dvi tva sāmānye jñānam utpadyate pūrvam viśeṣaṇa tvāt tasmāt sāmānya jñānāt apekṣā buddheḥ vinaśyat tā vināśa kāraṇa sānnidhyam jñānasya jñāna antara virodhi tvāt dvi tva sāmānya tad jñāna tad sambandhebhyaḥ dvi tva guṇa buddheḥ utpadyamāna tā iti dvi tva sāmānyāt dvi tva sāmānya jñānāt dvi tva sāmānya guṇa sambandhāt dvi tva guṇa buddheḥ utpadyamāna tā utpatti kāraṇa sānnidhya

original: {dvitvavināśaprakāraḥ}
analyzed: dvitva vināśa prakāraḥ

original: (“tata idānīmapekṣābuddhivināśād dvitvaguṇasya vinaśyattā, dvitvaguṇabuddhitaḥ sāmānyabuddhervinaśyattā, dvitvaguṇatajjñānatatsambandhebhyo dve dravye iti dravyabuddherutpadyamānatetyekaḥ kālaḥ ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: tatas idānīm apekṣā buddhi vināśāt dvi tva guṇasya vinaśyat tā dvi tva guṇa buddhitaḥ sāmānya buddheḥ vinaśyat tā dvi tva guṇa tad jñāna tad sambandhebhyaḥ dve dravye iti dravya buddheḥ utpadyamāna tā iti ekaḥ kālaḥ

original: tata idānīmapekṣābuddhervināśaḥ । tadvināśād dvitvaguṇasya vinaśyattā dvitvaguṇabuddherutpādastatsāmānyabuddherapi vinaśyattā । “dvitvaguṇatajjñānatatsambandhebhyaḥ”(*) iti । dvitvaguṇaśca tajjñānañca tatsambandhaśceti tathoktāstebhyo nimittebhyaḥ “dve dravye” iti dravyabuddherutpadyamānatetyekaḥ kālaḥ ।
analyzed: tatas idānīm apekṣā buddheḥ vināśaḥ tad vināśāt dvitva guṇasya vinaśyat tā dvitva guṇa buddheḥ utpādaḥ tad sāmānya buddheḥ api vinaśyat tā dvitva guṇa tad jñāna tad sambandhebhyaḥ iti dvitva guṇaḥ ca tad jñānam ca tad sambandhaḥ ca iti tathā uktāḥ tebhyaḥ nimittebhyaḥ dve dravye iti dravya buddheḥ utpadyamāna tā iti ekaḥ kālaḥ

original: (“tadanantaraṃ “dve dravye” iti jñānotpādaḥ, dvitvasya vināśaḥ, dvitvaguṇabuddhervinaśyattā, dravyajñānāt saṃskārasyotpadyamānatetyekaḥ kālaḥ ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: tad anantaram dve dravye iti jñāna utpādaḥ dvi tvasya vināśaḥ dvi tva guṇa buddheḥ vinaśyat tā dravya jñānāt saṃskārasya utpadyamāna tā iti ekaḥ kālaḥ

original: tadanantaraṃ dravyajñānasyotpādaḥ, tasmād dvitvaguṇabuddhervinaśyattā, sāmānyabuddhervināśo 'pekṣābuddhivināśād guṇasya vināśaḥ, saṃskārasyotpadyamānatetyeṣāmekaḥ kālaḥ ।
analyzed: tad anantaram dravya jñānasya utpādaḥ tasmāt dvi tva guṇa buddheḥ vinaśyat tā sāmānya buddheḥ vināśaḥ upekṣā buddhi vināśāt guṇasya vināśaḥ saṃskārasya utpadyamāna tā iti eṣām ekaḥ kālaḥ

original: (“tadanantaraṃ dravya(sāmānyāt)<?>〈jñānād〉 dvitvaguṇabuddhervināśaḥ, dravyabuddherapi saṃskārāditi ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: tad anantaram dravya sāmānyāt jñānāt dvi tva guṇa buddheḥ vināśaḥ dravya buddheḥ api saṃskārāt iti

original: tataḥ saṃskārotpāde sati dravyabuddheḥ (vinaśyattā <?>) guṇabuddhervināśaḥ, tato dravyabuddherapi saṃskārād vināśa iti ।
analyzed: tatas saṃskāra utpāde sati dravya buddheḥ vinaśyat tā guṇa buddheḥ vināśaḥ tatas dravya buddheḥ api saṃskārāt vināśaḥ iti

original: nanu sarvametadasambaddham, saṃkhyāsadbhāve pramāṇābhāvāt । athaikaṃ dve trīṇi ityādivyavahāraḥ pramāṇam । tanna । asya kalpanājñānatvāt । na ca kalpanājñānamarthavyavasthāpanāyālam, tadabhāve 'pi bhāvāt । tathā hi, nimittanirvikalpakajñānakrameṇa smaraṇānantaraṃ savikalpakaṃ jñānamutpadyate, na cārthasyāvasthānam, kṣaṇikatvād iti nirviṣayatvam ।
analyzed: nanu sarvam etat asambaddham saṃkhyā sadbhāve pramāṇa abhāvāt atha ekam dve trīṇi ityādi vyavahāraḥ pramāṇam  / tat na asya kalpanā jñāna tvāt na ca kalpanā jñānam artha vyavasthāpanāya alam tad abhāve pi bhāvāt tathā hi nimitta nirvikalpaka jñāna krameṇa smaraṇa anantaram savikalpakam jñānam utpadyate na ca arthasya avasthānam kṣaṇika tvāt iti nirviṣaya tvam

original: bādhakopapatteśca । tathā hyutpadyamānaṃ dvitvādi na dravyotpatteḥ pūrvamutpadyate, tadabhāvāt । na samakālam, kāryakāraṇabhāvānupapattiprasaṅgāt । athottarakālam ? tatrāpi kiṃ tat svabhāvād viparītād veti । tatsvābhāvye kiṃ dvitvādinā, dravyasyaiva tatsvarūpatvāt । viparyaye tu, kathaṃ tatsvabhāvāt tasyotpattiḥ, ekasmād bahubhyaśca dvitvotpattiprasaṅgāt, tatsvabhāvatāyāḥ sarvatrāviśeṣāt ।
analyzed: bādhaka upapatteḥ ca tathā hi utpadyamānam dvi tva ādi na dravya utpatteḥ pūrvam utpadyate tad abhāvāt na sama kālam kārya kāraṇa bhāva anupapatti prasaṅgāt atha uttara kālam tatra api kim tat svabhāvāt viparītāt vā iti tad svābhāvye kim dvi tva ādinā dravyasya eva tad svarūpa tvāt viparyaye tu katham tad svabhāvāt tasya utpattiḥ ekasmāt bahubhyaḥ ca dvi tva utpatti prasaṅgāt tad svabhāva tāyāḥ sarvatra aviśeṣāt

original: tathā vṛttyanupapatteśca । dvitvamanekasmin vartamānamekadeśena sarvātmanā vā vartate ? naikadeśena, tadabhāvāt । na sarvātmanā, ubhayavṛttitvābhāvaprasaṅgāt । na ca yenaiva svarūpeṇaikavṛttistenaiva dravyāntare 'pi, tayorekatāprasaṅgād iti vṛttyanupapatterasattvam ।
analyzed: tathā vṛtti anupapatteḥ ca dvi tvam anekasmin vartamānam eka deśena sarva ātmanā vā vartate na eka deśena tad abhāvāt na sarva ātmanā ubhaya vṛtti tva abhāva prasaṅgāt na ca yena eva svarūpeṇa eka vṛttiḥ tena eva dravya antare pi tayoḥ ekatā prasaṅgāt iti vṛtti anupapatteḥ asattvam

original: tathopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya sarvairagrahaṇāt । yadi hi dvitvādeḥ sattvam, upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatvād rūpādivat sarvapuruṣairgṛhyeta, na tūpalabhyate, tasmānnāstīti ।
analyzed: tathā upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya sarvaiḥ agrahaṇāt yadi hi dvi tva ādeḥ sattvam upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta tvāt rūpa ādi vat sarva puruṣaiḥ gṛhyeta na tu upalabhyate tasmāt na asti iti

original: samānendriyagrāhyatvācca । yenendriyeṇa dravyamupalabhyate tenaiva saṃkhyāpīti na tato 'rthāntaram । bhede tu rūpādīnāmiva asamānendriyagrāhyatvamapi syāt ।
analyzed: samāna indriya grāhya tvāt ca  yena indriyeṇa dravyam upalabhyate tena eva saṃkhyā api iti na tatas rtha antaram bhede tu rūpa ādīnām iva asamāna indriya grāhya tvam api syāt

original: ito 'pyasattvaṃ deśabhedenānupalabdheḥ, tadagrahe tadbuddhyabhāvācca, tathā grahaṇānupapatteśca । tathā hi, dvitvamanekatra vartamānaṃ kathamindriyeṇa paricchidyeta, yugapat sannikarṣadvayasya manasānadhiṣṭhitatvāt । atha cakṣuradhiṣṭhīyate, tathāpyanekapadārthagrahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ, tasya mano'dhiṣṭhitasyānekapadārthaiḥ sambandhāt ।
analyzed: itas pi asattvam deśa bhedena anupalabdheḥ tad agrahe tad buddhi abhāvāt ca tathā grahaṇa anupapatteḥ ca  tathā hi dvi tvam anekatra vartamānam katham indriyeṇa paricchidyeta yugapad sannikarṣa dvayasya manasā anadhiṣṭhita tvāt  atha cakṣuḥ adhiṣṭhīyate tathā api aneka padārtha grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ tasya manaḥ dhiṣṭhitasya aneka padārthaiḥ sambandhāt

original: yathā ca saṃkhyāsambandhād dravyeṣvekādivyavahārastathaikatvādiguṇeṣvapyekādivyavahāre nimittāntarakalpanāyāṃ tatrāpyekādivyavahārasya sambhavādana<II,036>vasthāprasaṅgaḥ । athaikatvādāvekādivyavahārastatsvarūpatayā ? dravye 'pi tathābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ । athaikatvādisāmānye tatsāmānyānupapatterekādivyavahāraḥ ? 〈tacca〉 kalpanājñānamiti ।
analyzed: yathā ca saṃkhyā sambandhāt dravyeṣu eka ādi vyavahāraḥ tathā eka tva ādi guṇeṣu api eka ādi vyavahāre nimitta antara kalpanāyām tatra api eka ādi vyavahārasya    atha eka tva ādau eka ādi vyavahāraḥ tad svarūpa tayā dravye pi tathā bhāva prasaṅgaḥ atha eka tva ādi sāmānye tad sāmānya anupapatteḥ eka ādi vyavahāraḥ tat ca kalpanā jñānam iti

original: tadetat sarvamasāmpratam । ekādivyavahārasya bādhakāsambhavena prāmāṇyāt । tathā hyekādijñānamarthānvayavyatirekānuvidhānānnīlādijñānavadarthajam । na cārthādhīnatayā nirvikalpakajñānotpattisamakālameva tasyotpattiḥ, saṅketasmaraṇasya sahakāriṇo 'bhāvāt । nāpi smṛtijameva, arthasyāpi tatra vyāpāropalabdheḥ । na ca smṛteratiśayādhāyakatvamanatiśayanivartakatvaṃ vā, kintu arthasadbhāve sati jñānajanakatvameva ।
analyzed: tat etat sarvam asāmpratam eka ādi vyavahārasya bādhaka asambhavena prāmāṇyāt tathā hi eka ādi jñānam artha anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānāt nīla ādi jñāna vat artha jam na ca artha adhīna tayā nirvikalpaka jñāna utpatti sama kālam eva tasya utpattiḥ saṅketa smaraṇasya sahakāriṇaḥ bhāvāt nā api smṛti jam eva arthasya api tatra vyāpāra upalabdheḥ na ca smṛteḥ atiśaya ādhāyaka tvam anatiśaya nivartaka tvam vā kintu artha sadbhāve sati jñāna janaka tvam eva

original: na cārthasyendriyāṇāṃ vā avicārakatvāt prāgiva paścādapyajanakatvamiti dūṣaṇam । tathā vṛttyanupapatteḥ, deśabhedenāgrahaṇāt, tadagrahe tadbuddhyabhāvācceti, pūrvamevāvayavisamarthanāvasare pratiṣedhāt ।
analyzed: na ca arthasya indriyāṇām vā avicāraka tvāt prāk iva paścāt api ajanaka tvam iti dūṣaṇam tathā vṛtti anupapatteḥ deśa bhedena agrahaṇāt tad agrahe tad buddhi abhāvāt ca iti pūrvam eva avayavi samarthana avasare pratiṣedhāt

original: na cābādhyamānamapi ekādijñānam apramāṇamiti nyāyyam, nīlādijñānasyāpyapramāṇatāprasaṅgāt । atha nīlaṃ vinā tajjñāne na syānnīlākāratā ? tadekatvādijñāne 'pi samānam ।
analyzed: na ca ābādhyamānam api eka ādi jñānam apramāṇam iti nyāyyam nīla ādi jñānasya api apramāṇa tā prasaṅgāt atha nīlam vinā tad jñāne na syāt nīla ākāra tā tad eka tva ādi jñāne samānam

original: athaikatvādijñānaṃ śabdākāram, na cārthe tadrūpatāstīti nirviṣayatvam, na । nīlajñānasyāpi śabdākāratayā nirviṣayatāprasaṅgāt ।
analyzed: atha eka tva ādi jñānam śabda ākāram na ca arthe tad rūpa tā asti iti nirviṣaya tvam na nīla jñānasya api śabda ākāra tayā nirviṣaya tā prasaṅgāt

original: athādyaṃ nīlajñānaṃ nirvikalpakamarthajam, uttarantu savikalpakamanekakṣaṇavyavadhānād arthāpāye 'pyutpadyate, arthasya kṣaṇikatvācchabdākārātāyāśca tatrāsambhavāditi nirviṣayatvamiṣyata eva ।
analyzed: atha ādyam nīla jñānam nirvikalpakam artha jam uttarantu sa vikalpakam aneka kṣaṇa vyavadhānāt artha apāye pi utpadyate arthasya kṣaṇika tvāt śabda ākāra atāyāḥ ca tatra asambhavāt iti nirviṣaya tvam iṣyate eva

original: tadasat । kṣaṇikatvasya pūrvameva pratiṣedhāt । nirvikalpakajñānotpattāvivārthasya savikalpakajñānotpattāvanvayavyatirekābhyāmindriyeṇa saṅketasmaraṇena ca sahakṛtasya vyāpāropalabdheḥ । tathā hi, idantayā jñānotpattestatrendriyasya vyāpāro niścīyate, aṅgulyā vyapadiśyamānatvād arthasya ceti । anyathā hīndriyārthayorekādijñānotpattau vyāpāramantareṇa idantayopalabdhiraṅgulyādinā ca vyapadeśo na syāt । athendriyajñānaṃ manovijñānakrameṇa <II,037> savikalpakajñānotpattau kāraṇamiti, idantayopalabdhiraṅgulyādinā vyapadeśo nārthajāviti cet, na । etasmin krame pramāṇābhāvāt ।
analyzed: tat asat kṣaṇika tvasya pūrvam eva pratiṣedhāt nirvikalpaka jñāna utpattau iva arthasya savikalpaka jñāna utpattau anvaya vyatirekābhyām indriyeṇa saṅketa smaraṇena ca sahakṛtasya vyāpāra upalabdheḥ tathā hi idantayā jñāna utpatteḥ tatra indriyasya vyāpāraḥ niścīyate aṅgulyā vyapadiśyamāna tvāt arthasya ca iti anyathā hi indriya arthayoḥ eka ādi jñāna utpattau vyāpāram antareṇa idantayā upalabdhiḥ aṅguli ādinā ca vyapadeśaḥ na syāt atha indri

original: atha saṅkalpāt sadbhāvasiddheranyathā ekādivyavahāro na syādityeṣā kalpanā kriyate, tadasat, vṛttivikalpāderbādhakasya pūrvameva pratiṣedhāt । saṃkhyāsadbhāvasiddhāvekādivyavahārasya sākṣādarthajatvopapatteḥ ।
analyzed: atha saṅkalpāt sadbhāva siddheḥ anyathā eka ādi vyavahāraḥ na syāt iti eṣā kalpanā kriyate tat asat vṛtti vikalpa ādeḥ bādhakasya pūrvam eva pratiṣedhāt saṃkhyā sadbhāva siddhau eka ādi vyavahārasya sākṣāt artha ja tva upapatteḥ

original: śabdākāratā tu savikalpakajñāne na sambhavatyeva, sākāravādapratiṣedhasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt । kevalantu smṛtijanitatvāt savikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ śabdollekhenotpadyate, nirvikalpakantu ullekhaśūnyam, saṅketasmṛteravyāpārāt ।
analyzed: śabda ākāra tā tu sa vikalpaka jñāne na sambhavati eva sa ākāra vāda pratiṣedhasya vakṣyamāṇa tvāt kevalam tu smṛti janita tvāt sa vikalpakam jñānam śabda ullekhena utpadyate nirvikalpakam tu ullekha śūnyam saṅketa smṛteḥ avyāpārāt

original: na ca vāsanāprabhavatvam, vāsanāyāḥ pūrvameva pratiṣedhāt । tathā hi, bodhavyatirekeṇānyā vāsanā na sambhavatītyuktameva avayavisamarthanāvasare । yā tu vaiśeṣikopagatā smṛtyanumeyā vāsanā sā na kāraṇamekādivyavahāre, tasyāḥ parokṣakāraṇatayā smṛtivilakṣaṇatvāt । tathā hi, ekādijñānam aparokṣam indriyavyāpāreṇa idantayotpadyate, na ca smṛteretadrūpa〈tva〉mastīti, na vāsanāprabhavam । tathā itthambhūtavāsanāprabhavatve 'pi paramparayārthavyavasthāpakatvam, arthānubhavapūrvakatvād vāsanāyāḥ । yā tu ekatvādiśabdebhyo vikalpād vāsanā sāpi arthaṃ vyavasthāpayatyeva, śabdasyānubhavapūrvakatvenābhyupagamāt, “dṛṣṭe dṛṣṭavāditvam” ityanena ।
analyzed: na ca vāsanā prabhava tvam vāsanāyāḥ pūrvam eva pratiṣedhāt tathā hi bodha vyatirekeṇa anyā vāsanā na sambhavati iti uktam eva avayavi samarthana avasare yā tu vaiśeṣika upagatā smṛti anumeyā vāsanā sā na kāraṇam eka ādi vyavahāre tasyāḥ parokṣa kāraṇa tayā smṛti vilakṣaṇa tvāt tathā hi eka ādi jñānam aparokṣam indriya vyāpāreṇa idantayā utpadyate na ca smṛteḥ etad rūpa tvam asti iti na vāsanā prabhavam tathā ittham bhūta vāsanā prabhav

original: yattu utpattivikalpanād ekatvāderasattvamityuktam, tadasat, uttarakālaṃ tadutpattyabhyupagamāt । atha kiṃ tat svabhāvād viparītād vetyuktam, tatra yadi tatsvābhāvyaṃ tadutpādanasāmarthyaṃ vivakṣitam, tadiṣyata eva । athaikatvādyāśrayatvaṃ tannāsti, utpatteḥ pūrvaṃ tadabhāvāt । siddhe ca saṃkhyāsadbhāve pramāṇatastasyāḥ kāryadravye kṛtakatvād avaśyamutpattikāraṇaṃ vācyam । tatra ca ekatvadvitvādyāśrayasya tajjanakatve tadabhāvaḥ syāt, dṛṣṭā cotpattiḥ, tasmāt dravyamitarakārakopacitam teṣāṃ kāraṇamiti utpattivikalpānupapattiḥ ।
analyzed: yat tu utpatti vikalpanāt ekatva ādeḥ asattvam iti uktam tat asat uttarakālam tad utpatti abhyupagamāt  / atha kim tat svabhāvāt viparītāt vā iti uktam tatra yadi tat svābhāvyam tad utpādana sāmarthyam vivakṣitam tat iṣyate eva atha ekatva ādi āśraya tvam tat na asti utpatteḥ pūrvam tad abhāvāt siddhe ca saṃkhyā sadbhāve pramāṇataḥ tasyāḥ kārya dravye kṛtaka tvāt avaśyam utpatti kāraṇam vācyam tatra ca ekatva dvitva ādi āśrayasya tad janaka tve tad abhāva

original: yaccedam, upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdherdvitvāderasattvamiti, tanna, asiddhatvāt । tathā ca yadīyayā apekṣābuddhyā sampāditaṃ dvitvādi tasyaivopa<II,038>labdhilakṣaṇaprāptam, na puruṣāntarasya, tasyaiva tadupalambhāt । yatropalambhastatraiva rūpidravye samavāyikāraṇatvamiṣṭaṃ na tadabhāve 'pīti । tasmānna sakalapuruṣāpekṣayā tadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptamityasiddho hetuḥ ।
analyzed: yat ca idam upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya anupalabdheḥ dvi tva ādeḥ asattvam iti tat na asiddha tvāt tathā ca yadīyayā apekṣā buddhyā sampāditam dvi tva ādi na puruṣa antarasya tasya eva tad upalambhāt yatra upalambhaḥ tatra eva rūpi dravye samavāyi kāraṇa tvam iṣṭam na tad abhāve pi iti tasmāt na sakala puruṣa apekṣayā tat upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam iti asiddhaḥ hetuḥ

original: yaccedam, ekatvāderna dravyavyatirekeṇāstitvaṃ samānendriyagrāhyatvāditi । tatra pratijñāvākye padayorvyāghātaḥ, yathā idañca nāsti ceti । na caikatvādeḥ pakṣīkaraṇaṃ yuktam, aprasiddhatvāt । prasiddhañca pakṣīkriyamāṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śabdādi, na ca parasyaikatvādi prasiddhamiti ।
analyzed: yat ca idam ekatva ādeḥ na dravya vyatirekeṇa astitvam samāna indriya grāhya tvāt iti tatra pratijñā vākye padayoḥ vyāghātaḥ yathā idam ca na asti ca iti na ca ekatva ādeḥ pakṣīkaraṇam yuktam aprasiddha tvāt prasiddham ca pakṣīkriyamāṇam dṛṣṭam śabda ādi na ca parasya ekatva ādi prasiddham iti

original: atha paravyāptyā parasyāniṣṭāpādanaṃ prasaṅgasādhanamiti cet, tatra yadi pramāṇapūrvikā paraprasiddhistayaiva bādhyamānatvādanutthānaṃ viparītānumānasya । athāpramāṇapūrvikā, tarhi pramāṇaṃ vinā prameyasyāprasiddherek(ā)〈atvā〉dīnāṃ pakṣīkaraṇamayuktam ।
analyzed: atha para vyāptyā parasya aniṣṭa āpādanam prasaṅga sādhanam iti ced tatra yadi pramāṇa pūrvikā para prasiddhiḥ tayā eva bādhyamāna tvāt anutthānam viparīta anumānasya atha apramāṇa pūrvikā tarhi pramāṇam vinā prameyasya aprasiddheḥ eka a a tva ādīnām pakṣīkaraṇam ayuktam

original: tathā samānendriyagrāhyatvāditi । yenendriyeṇa dravyamupalabhyate tenaiva saṃkhyāpīti sādhanasya rūpādibhedairanaikāntikatvam । tathā hi, yenaivendriyeṇa śuklarūpasya grahaṇaṃ tenaiva pītādeḥ, na ca tasya tasmād bhedo 'sattvaṃ veti । na ca parasya dravyaṃ prasiddhamiti kathaṃ tasmādabhedaḥ sādhyate ? atha rūpameva dravyam ? na tarhi samānendriyagrāhyatvam rūpasyaikendriyagrāhyatvāt, saṃkhyāyāstu dvīndriyaparicchedyatvāditi ।
analyzed: tathā samāna indriya grāhya tvāt iti yena indriyeṇa dravyam upalabhyate tena eva saṃkhyā api iti sādhanasya rūpa ādi bhedaiḥ anaikāntika tvam tathā hi yena eva indriyeṇa śukla rūpasya grahaṇam tena eva pīta ādeḥ na ca tasya tasmāt sattvam vā iti na ca parasya dravyam prasiddham iti katham tasmāt abhedaḥ sādhyate atha rūpam eva dravyam na tarhi samāna indriya grāhya tvam rūpasya eka indriya grāhya tvāt saṃkhyāyāḥ tu dvi indriya paricchedya tvāt iti

original: atha rūpādisamudāyo dravyam, tathāpi samānendriyagrāhyatvamasiddham, rūpādeḥ pratiniyatendriyagrāhyatvāt । na ca rūpādīnāṃ pratiniyatendriyagrāhyatvād bhedaḥ, śuklādibhedānāmekatāprasaṅgāt । kiṃ tarhi ? pratibhāsabhedāt, sa cehāpyastyeva । tathā hyekatra dravyapratibhāso 'nyatra caikatvādipratibhāsa iti । atha saṃkhyādravyayoḥ pratyakṣeṇa bhedaprasiddherekatāsādhanaṃ pratyakṣeṇa bādhyamānatvāt kālātyayāpadiṣṭaṃ bhavatīti ।
analyzed: atha rūpa ādi samudāyaḥ dravyam tathā api samāna indriya grāhya tvam asiddham rūpa ādeḥ pratiniyata indriya grāhya tvāt  na ca rūpa ādīnām pratiniyata indriya grāhya tvāt bhedaḥ śukla ādi bhedānām ekatā prasaṅgāt kim tarhi pratibhāsa bhedāt sa ca iha api asti eva tathā hi ekatra dravya pratibhāsaḥ nyatra ca ekatva ādi pratibhāsaḥ iti atha saṃkhyā dravyayoḥ pratyakṣeṇa bheda prasiddheḥ ekatā sādhanam pratyakṣeṇa bādhyamāna tvāt kāla atyaya apadi

original: yaccedam, utpannasya dvitvādergrahaṇānupapatterasattvam, tadasat, indriyavyāpāreṇāsya dvitvāderaparokṣasya dṛṣṭatvāt । na ca manasānadhiṣṭhitasyendriyasya paricchedakatvaṃ yugapajjñānotpattiprasaṅgāt । ataścakṣurmanasādhiṣṭhīyate । na sambandhasteṣām, aṇuparimāṇasambandhitayā na yugapadadhiṣṭhāyakaṃ mana iti dvitvāderagrahaṇameva syāt । asti ca grahaṇamataścakṣureva manasādhiṣṭhīyate । <II,039> nanvevamapyanekapadārthasambandhād yugapadanekajñānotpādakaṃ syāt ? na । karaṇasyaikapratyayanirvṛttau sāmarthyāt । tathā hyekaṃ karaṇamekasmin kāle 'nekāṃ kriyāṃ na karotīti, tasmād yugapat prakāśanameva ghaṭādīnāṃ na grahaṇānītyuktapūrvam ।
analyzed: yat ca idam utpannasya dvi tva ādeḥ grahaṇa anupapatteḥ asattvam tat asat indriya vyāpāreṇa asya dvi tva ādeḥ aparokṣasya dṛṣṭa tvāt na ca manasā anadhiṣṭhitasya indriyasya paricchedaka tvam yugapad jñāna utpatti prasaṅgāt atas cakṣuḥ manasā adhiṣṭhīyate na sambandhaḥ teṣām aṇu parimāṇa sambandhi tayā na yugapad adhiṣṭhāyakam manaḥ iti dvi tva ādeḥ agrahaṇam eva syāt asti ca grahaṇam atas cakṣuḥ eva manasā adhiṣṭhīyate     nanu

original: yaccedam, ekādivyavahāro guṇāntarāt svabhāvād vetyuktam, tatraikatvasāmānyavaśāditi brūmaḥ । tathā hi, dravye guṇasambandhād ekādivyavahāro guṇe ca sāmānyasambandhād sāmānye 'pi guṇasambandhāt । na ca grahaṇaparamparā, viśeṣaṇajñānasya niyamena jñānapūrvakatvānabhyupagamāt । atha saṃyuktasamavetasamavāyād ekatvasāmānye jñānamutpadyate, viśeṣaṇatvādityuktam । anekaguṇaviṣayasya viśeṣyajñānasyaivāsaṃvedanāt । na । dvitvasyotpattyanyathānupapattyā tatsadbhāvasiddheḥ । tathā hi, yadi kāraṇaguṇapūrvaprakrameṇa rūpādivadutpadyate dvitvaṃ prathamākṣasannipātavelāyāmeva grahaṇaṃ syāt, cirotpannatvāt, gaṇanāvaiyarthyañca । na caitat । tasmādanekaguṇaviṣayasya jñānasyātmavartino 'pi dvitvotpattau kāraṇatvaṃ niścīyate, tadvināśācca vināśaḥ । anyathā hi samavāyyasamavāyikāraṇayorvināśād vināśābhyupagame tayoranekakālamavasthānāt sthāyitvameva syāt, kvacinnityatvañca । tayoravināśādanyasya ca virodhiguṇasyāsambhavāt । tasmānnimittakāraṇādeva vināśaḥ kalpyate ।
analyzed: yat ca idam eka ādi vyavahāraḥ guṇa antarāt svabhāvāt vā iti uktam tatra eka tva sāmānya vaśāt iti brūmaḥ tathā hi dravye guṇa sambandhāt eka ādi vyavahāraḥ guṇe ca sāmānya sambandhāt sāmānye pi guṇa sambandhāt  / na ca grahaṇa paramparā viśeṣaṇa jñānasya niyamena jñāna pūrvaka tva anabhyupagamāt  atha saṃyukta samaveta samavāyāt eka tva sāmānye jñānam utpadyate viśeṣaṇa tvāt iti uktam aneka guṇa viṣayasya viśeṣya jñānasya eva asaṃve

original: na caivaṃ ghaṭādernimittakāraṇavināśād vināśaprasaṅgaḥ, adarśanāt । atra tu samavāyyasamavāyikāraṇayoravasthāne 'pi dvitvādervināśasya dṛṣṭatvād apekṣābuddhivināśād vināśaḥ kalpyate । anyathā hi rūpādivadavasthāne prathamākṣasannipātakāla eva grahaṇaṃ syādityuktam । athāvasthitasyāpi dvitvādervyañjakābhāvāt 〈anupalambhaḥ〉, upalambhastu idānīmutpannasyāpi ghaṭata ityapekṣābuddhyāderjanakatvameva nyāyyam । tasmād dvitvādivyavahārottarakālaṃ tadabhāvasya saṃvedanāt tadutpattau kāraṇāntarasyāsambhave sati apekṣābuddhivināśasya kāraṇatvamuktam ।
analyzed: na ca evam ghaṭa ādeḥ nimitta kāraṇa vināśāt vināśa prasaṅgaḥ adarśanāt atra tu samavāyi asamavāyi kāraṇayoḥ avasthāne dvi tva ādeḥ vināśasya dṛṣṭa tvāt apekṣā buddhi vināśāt vināśaḥ kalpyate anyathā hi rūpa ādi vat avasthāne prathama akṣa sannipāta kāle eva grahaṇam syāt iti uktam atha avasthitasya api dvi tva ādeḥ vyañjaka abhāvāt anupalambhaḥ upalambhaḥ tu idānīm utpannasya api ghaṭate iti apekṣā buddhi ādeḥ janaka tvam eva

original: atha pūrvaṃ dvitvasāmānyajñānamanantaraṃ guṇajñānaṃ dravyajñānañceti kalpanāyāṃ kiṃ pramāṇam ? viśeṣaṇatvamiti cet, na । viśeṣaṇe 'pi viśeṣaṇāntarakalpanāyāmanavasthāprasaṅgāt । tathā hi “dve dravye” iti dravyajñānotpattau guṇasya viśeṣaṇa<II,040>tvād yuktamādau tajjñānaṃ guṇasya ca viśeṣaṇatvānna tatsāmānyajñānaṃ yuktam । abhyupagame vā, tasyāpyanyad viśeṣaṇamityanavasthā syāt ? na । niyamānabhyupagamāt । tathā hi, viśeṣaṇe 'vaśyaṃ viśeṣaṇāntarakalpaneti niyamaḥ pratiṣidhyate 'navasthābhayāt । na punarviśeṣaṇe viśeṣaṇameva nāstīti । vivakṣitañcaitad bhāṣyakartuḥ, dravyaviśeṣaṇasyāpi guṇasya sāmānyaviśeṣaṇābhidhānāditi ।
analyzed: atha pūrvam dvi tva sāmānya jñānam anantaram guṇa jñānam dravya jñānam ca iti kalpanāyām kim pramāṇam viśeṣaṇa tvam iti ced na viśeṣaṇe viśeṣaṇa antara kalpanāyām anavasthā prasaṅgāt tathā hi dve dravye iti dravya jñāna utpattau guṇasya yuktam ādau tat jñānam guṇasya ca viśeṣaṇa tvāt na tat sāmānya jñānam yuktam abhyupagame vā tasya api anyat viśeṣaṇam iti anavasthā syāt na niyama anabhyupagamāt tathā hi viśeṣaṇe vaśyam viśeṣaṇa

original: atha saṃskārād dravyabuddhervināśa ityatra kiṃ pramāṇam ? kāryasyākasmikasyānupalabdheḥ, dravyajñānavināśasya pratyakṣeṇa saṃvedanāt saṃskārasya kāraṇatvaṃ niścīyate । tasya ca smṛtyā sadbhāvasiddhiriti vakṣyāmaḥ ।
analyzed: atha saṃskārāt dravya buddheḥ vināśaḥ iti atra kim pramāṇam kāryasya ākasmikasya anupalabdheḥ dravya jñāna vināśasya pratyakṣeṇa saṃvedanāt saṃskārasya kāraṇa tvam niścīyate tasya ca smṛtyā sadbhāva siddhiḥ iti vakṣyāmaḥ

original: {tritvādyutpattivināśaprakāraḥ}
(“etena tritvādyutpattirapi vyākhyātā । ekatvebhyo 'nekaviṣayabuddhisahitebhyo tritvādiniṣpattirapekṣābuddhivināśād vināśa iti ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: etena tri tva ādi utpattiḥ api vyākhyātā eka tvebhyaḥ tri tva ādi niṣpattiḥ apekṣā buddhi vināśāt vināśaḥ iti pdhs

original: tadevaṃ dvitvasyotpattivināśakāraṇe prajñāpite sati “etena tritvādyutpattirvyākhyātā”(*) ityatideśaṃ karoti । yathā hi, dvitvamekatvābhyāmanekabuddhiviṣayasahitābhyāmārabhyate tathā tritvāderapyekatvebhyo 'nekabuddhiviṣayasahitebhyo niṣpattiriti ।
analyzed: tat evam dvi tvasya utpatti vināśa kāraṇe prajñāpite sati etena tri tva ādi utpattiḥ vyākhyātā iti atideśam karoti yathā hi dvi tvam eka tvābhyām aneka buddhi viṣaya sahitābhyām ārabhyate tathā tri tva ādeḥ api eka tvebhyaḥ neka buddhi viṣaya sahitebhyaḥ niṣpattiḥ iti

original: <1> utpanne ca tritvādau tatsāmānyajñānam, tato 'pekṣābuddhervinaśyattā, sāmānyatajjñānatatsambandhebhyo guṇabuddherutpadyamānatetyekaḥ kālaḥ ।
analyzed: utpanne ca tri tva ādau tad sāmānya jñānam tatas upekṣā buddheḥ vinaśyat tā sāmānya tad jñāna tad sambandhebhyaḥ guṇa buddheḥ utpadyamāna tā iti ekaḥ kālaḥ

original: <2> tatastritvādiguṇabuddherutpādaḥ, guṇatajjñānatatsambandhebhyo dravyabuddherutpadyamānatā, apekṣābuddhervināśaḥ, sāmānyajñānasya vinaśyattā, guṇasya vinaśyattetyeṣāmekaḥ kālaḥ ।
analyzed: tatas tri tva ādi guṇa buddheḥ utpādaḥ guṇa tad jñāna tad sambandhebhyaḥ dravya buddheḥ utpadyamāna tā apekṣā buddheḥ vināśaḥ sāmānya jñānasya vinaśyat tā guṇasya vinaśyat tā iti eṣām ekaḥ kālaḥ

original: <3> tato dravyajñānasyotpādaḥ, saṃskārasyotpadyamānatā, guṇajñānasya vinaśyattā, sāmānyajñānasya vināśaḥ, apekṣābuddhivināśācca guṇasyāpi nāśa ityekaḥ kālaḥ ।
analyzed: tatas dravya jñānasya utpādaḥ saṃskārasya utpadyamāna tā guṇa jñānasya vinaśyat tā sāmānya jñānasya vināśaḥ apekṣā buddhi vināśāt ca guṇasya api nāśaḥ iti ekaḥ kālaḥ

original: <4> tataḥ saṃskārād dravyajñānasyāpītyatideśārthaḥ ।
analyzed: tatas saṃskārāt dravya jñānasya api iti atideśa arthaḥ

original: ādipadena tu śatasaṃkhyāderavarodhastatra ca dvitvotpattyatideśo na sambhavatyeva । tathā hi, dravyaśatasya yugapadindriyeṇa sambandhābhāvāt tadgataikaguṇā<II,041>nāmagrahaṇe 'pekṣākāraṇābhāvāt kathaṃ śatasaṃkhyotpattiriti । na cendriyeṇaikatvasāmānyasya ekasmin dravye saṃyuktasamavetasamavāyalakṣaṇasya sambandhasyotpattestasyaikatāyā dravyāntaraguṇeṣvapi sadbhāvāt tadākṛṣṭānāmekaikaguṇānāṃ yugapadgrahaṇācchatasaṃkhyotpattiriti vācyam । sarvatra tathābhāvena śatasaṃkhyādyutpattiprasaṅgāt । tathā hi, indriyasyaikatvasāmānyena saṃyuktasamavetasamavāyalakṣaṇasya sambandhasyāviśeṣāt tadupagrahādekaikaguṇānāṃ grahaṇābhyupagame sarvasmin dravye śatasaṃkhyādyutpattiḥ syāt । na caitat । tasmādapekṣākāraṇābhāvādanutpattiriti । na cāpekṣābuddhiṃ vinaivotpattiḥ, gaṇanāvaiyarthyaprasaṅgādityuktanyāyāt ।
analyzed: ādi padena tu śata saṃkhyā ādeḥ avarodhaḥ tatra ca dvi tva utpatti atideśaḥ na sambhavati eva tathā hi dravya śatasya yugapad indriyeṇa sambandha abhāvāt pekṣā kāraṇa abhāvāt katham śata saṃkhyā utpattiḥ iti na ca indriyeṇa eka tva sāmānyasya ekasmin dravye saṃyukta samaveta samavāya lakṣaṇasya sambandhasya utpatteḥ tasya ekatāyāḥ dravya antara guṇeṣu api sadbhāvāt tad ākṛṣṭānām ekaika guṇānām yugapad grahaṇāt śata saṃkhyā utpatti

original: tadetat sarvamasat, saṃkhyāvyavahārasya vāstavatvāt । śatasaṃkhyādisadbhāvasiddhau tasyāḥ kṛtakatvād avaśyamutpattikāraṇaṃ vācyamiti anyasyāsambhavād vilakṣaṇaivāpekṣābuddhiḥ kalpyata iti ।
analyzed: tat etat sarvam asat saṃkhyā vyavahārasya vāstava tvāt śata saṃkhyā ādi sadbhāva siddhau tasyāḥ kṛtaka tvāt avaśyam utpatti kāraṇam vācyam iti anyasya asambhavāt vilakṣaṇā eva apekṣā buddhiḥ kalpyate iti

original: <1> tathā caikasmin ekaguṇe jñānotpattau satyāṃ saṃskārasyotpāde dvitīyaikaguṇajñānasyotpadyamānatā, pūrvajñānasya vinaśyattetyekaḥ kālaḥ ।
analyzed: tathā ca ekasmin ekaguṇe jñāna utpattau satyām saṃskārasya utpāde dvitīya ekaguṇa jñānasya utpadyamāna tā pūrva jñānasya vinaśyat tā iti ekaḥ kālaḥ

original: <2> tato dvitīyaikaguṇajñānasyotpādaḥ, pūrvaguṇasmaraṇasyotpadyamānatā, prāktanasaṃskārasahakāriṇā ca jñānena saṃskārasyotpadyamānatā, prāktanajñānasya vināśa ityekaḥ kālaḥ ।
analyzed: tatas dvitīya eka guṇa jñānasya utpādaḥ pūrva guṇa smaraṇasya utpadyamāna tā prāktana saṃskāra sahakāriṇā ca jñānena saṃskārasya utpadyamāna tā prāktana jñānasya vināśaḥ iti ekaḥ kālaḥ

original: “śobhanametadvidhānam”(*) ityādinā parapakṣapratiṣedhadvāreṇa svapakṣamupasaṃharati । śobhanaṃ yuktametad dvitvādyutpattividhānam । kasmin pakṣe ? ityāha “vadhyaghātakapakṣe”(*) yadā hi ekasya jñānasyotpādo 'nyasya vinaśyattā ।

original: “sahānavasthānalakṣaṇe tu virodhe dravyajñānānutpattiprasaṅgaḥ”(*) ityaśobhanam । tathā hi, sahānavasthānalakṣaṇe virodhe dvitvasāmānyajñānasamakālam apekṣābuddhivināśāt guṇabuddhisamakālaṃ dvitvavināśe tadapekṣasya “dve dravye” itijñānasyānutpattiprasaṅgaḥ, tathā nirhetukatā ca vināśasya । yadaiva dvitvasāmānyajñānasyotpādastadaiva apekṣābuddhervināśa ityekakālatvānna sāmānyajñānakāryo 'pekṣābuddhivināśaḥ । na cānyat kāraṇamastīti nirhetukatvaṃ prasajyeta । na caitat sambhavatītyuktameva ।
analyzed: saha anavasthāna lakṣaṇe tu virodhe dravya jñāna anutpatti prasaṅgaḥ iti aśobhanam tathā hi saha anavasthāna lakṣaṇe virodhe dvi tva sāmānya jñāna sama kālam apekṣā buddhi vināśāt guṇa buddhi sama kālam dvi tva vināśe tad apekṣasya dve dravye iti jñānasya anutpatti prasaṅgaḥ tathā nirhetuka tā ca vināśasya yadā eva dvi tva sāmānya jñānasya utpādaḥ tadā eva apekṣā buddheḥ vināśaḥ iti eka kāla tvāt na sāmānya jñāna kārya upekṣā buddhi

original: (“laiṅgikavajjñānamātrāditi cet, syānmatam । yathā “abhūtaṃ bhūtasya” ityatra liṅgābhāve 'pi jñānamātrādanumānam tathā guṇavināśe 'pi guṇabuddhimātrād “dve dravye” iti pratyayaḥ syāditi ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: laiṅgika vat jñāna mātrāt iti ced syāt matam yathā abhūtam bhūtasya iti atra liṅga abhāve pi jñāna mātrāt anumānam tathā guṇa vināśe pi guṇa buddhi mātrāt dve dravye iti pratyayaḥ syāt iti

original: atha yadyapi guṇabuddhisamakālamapekṣābuddhivināśāt guṇasya vināśaḥ, tathāpi laiṅgikajñānavajjñānamātrād “dve dravye” itijñānaṃ bhaviṣyatīti paramatamāśaṅkate “laiṅgikavajjñānamātrāditi cet”(*) matamabhipretaṃ syāt । yathā <II,046> abhūtamavidyamānaṃ liṅgaṃ bhūtasya vidyamānasya liṅgino gamakamityatra sūtre liṅgābhāve 'pi jñānamātrādanumānamiṣṭam ।
analyzed: atha yadi api guṇa buddhi sama kālam apekṣā buddhi vināśāt guṇasya vināśaḥ tathā api laiṅgika jñāna vat jñāna mātrāt dve dravye iti jñānam bhaviṣyati iti para matam āśaṅkate laiṅgika vat jñāna mātrāt iti ced matam abhipretam syāt yathā abhūtam avidyamānam liṅgam bhūtasya vidyamānasya liṅginaḥ gamakam iti atra sūtre liṅga abhāve pi jñāna mātrāt anumānam iṣṭam

original: tathā hi, jñānena jñānamanumīyata iti jñānasya liṅgatvādavaśyaṃ grahaṇam, tatastasya vinaśyattā, avinābhāvasambandhasmaraṇasyotpadyamānatā, tadanantaramavinābhāvasambandhasmaraṇasyotpādaḥ, liṅgabhūtasya jñānasya vināśaḥ. tajjñānasya vinaśyattā, parāmarśajñānasyotpadyamānatā, tataḥ parāmarśajñānasyotpādaḥ. avinābhāvasambandhasmaraṇasya vinaśyattā, liṅgajñānasyāpi vināśa iti nirviṣayāt parāmarśajñānamātrādeva jñātari pratipattirbhavatīti dṛṣṭam । tathā guṇavināśe guṇajñānamātrād dravyapratyayaḥ syāditi ।
analyzed: tathā hi jñānena jñānam anumīyate iti jñānasya liṅga tvāt avaśyam grahaṇam tatas tasya vinaśyat tā avinābhāva sambandha smaraṇasya utpadyamāna tā tad anantaram avinābhāva sambandha smaraṇasya utpādaḥ liṅga bhūtasya jñānasya vināśaḥ tad jñānasya vinaśyat tā parāmarśa jñānasya utpadyamāna tā tatas parāmarśa jñānasya utpādaḥ avinābhāva sambandha smaraṇasya vinaśyat tā liṅga jñānasya api vināśaḥ iti nirviṣayāt parāmarśa jñāna mātrāt

original: anye tu, yathā abhūtamavidyamānaṃ varṣakarma bhūtasya vidyamānasya vāyvabhrasaṃyogasya liṅgam, tathā guṇavināśe 'pi tajjñānamātrād dravyajñānamiti manyante । na caitad yuktam । tathā hi na avidyamānaṃ varṣakarma vidyamānasya vāyvabhrasaṃyogasya sadbhāve liṅgam । kiṃ tarhi ? varṣakarmānutpādo vyabhicārī । sa ca svarūpeṇāstyeveti kathamavidyamānam ? atha bhāvarūpatayā tasyāsattvam, tarhi bhāvasyāpyabhāvarūpeṇāsattvamiti sarvasyāsattvameva syāt । tasmād varṣakarmānutpādo vidyamāna eva liṅgamityudāharaṇāntarameva nyāyyam ।
analyzed: anye tu yathā abhūtam avidyamānam varṣa karma bhūtasya vidyamānasya vāyu abhra saṃyogasya liṅgam tathā guṇa vināśe tad jñāna mātrāt dravya jñānam iti manyante na ca etat yuktam tathā hi na avidyamānam varṣa karma vidyamānasya vāyu abhra saṃyogasya sadbhāve liṅgam kim tarhi varṣa karma anutpādaḥ vyabhicārī sa ca sva rūpeṇa asti eva iti katham avidyamānam atha bhāva rūpatayā tasya asattvam tarhi bhāvasya api abhāva rūpeṇa asattvam iti sarvasya asattvam eva

original: (“na viśeṣyajñānatvāt । na hi viśeṣyajñānaṃ sārūpyād viśeṣaṇasambandhamantareṇa bhavitumarhati । tathāha sūtrakāraḥ “samavāyinaḥ śvaityācchavaityabuddheḥ śvete buddhiste kāryakāraṇabhūte” iti ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: na viśeṣya jñāna tvāt  na hi viśeṣya jñānam sārūpyāt viśeṣaṇa sambandham antareṇa bhavitum arhati tathā āha sūtrakāraḥ samavāyinaḥ śvaityāt śavaitya buddheḥ śvete buddhiḥ te kārya kāraṇa bhūte iti pdhs

original: pratisamādhānamāha yaduktaṃ laiṅgikajñānavat dve dravye itijñānaṃ bhaviṣyatītyetat “na viśeṣyajñānatvāt”(*) tathā hi, dvitvānurāgeṇotpadyamānatvāt “dve dravye” itiviśeṣyajñānamato vidyamānasyaiva guṇasyātra vyāpāraḥ kalpanīyaḥ । tathā hi, yasmānna viśeṣyajñānaṃ “viśeṣaṇasambandhamantareṇa”(*) viśeṣaṇasambandhaṃ vinā “bhavitumarhati”(*) iti tadutpattau viśeṣaṇatajjñānatatsambandhānāṃ kāraṇatvam । anyathā hi sakalakāraṇānāṃ viśeṣyajñānotpattau (viśeṣa<?>)vyāpārāviśeṣeṇa niyatasyaiva viśeṣaṇatvaṃ na syāt । ato viśeṣaṇatajjñānatatsambandhānāṃ kāraṇatvam ।
analyzed: pratisamādhānam āha yat uktam laiṅgika jñāna vat dve dravye iti jñānam bhaviṣyati iti etat na viśeṣya jñāna tvāt tathā hi dvi tva anurāgeṇa utpadyamāna tvāt dve dravye iti viśeṣya jñānam atas vidyamānasya eva guṇasya atra vyāpāraḥ kalpanīyaḥ tathā hi yasmāt na viśeṣya jñānam viśeṣaṇa sambandham antareṇa viśeṣaṇa sambandham vinā bhavitum arhati iti tad utpattau viśeṣaṇa tad jñāna tad sambandhānām kāraṇa tvam anyathā hi sakala kāraṇān

original: tathā cāha sūtrakāraḥ “samavāyinaḥ śvaityācchvaityabuddheḥ śvete buddhiste kāryakāraṇabhūte” <vai. sū. 8.1.8> ityanena sūtrakārasyāpyayamartho 'bhipreta iti darśayati । tathā hi śvetaṃ dravyam tasya bhāvaḥ śvaityam, śvetaguṇastasmāt । kiṃ viśiṣṭāt ? samavāyinaḥ samavāyena sambandhāt । śvaityabuddheriti śvetaguṇabuddheḥ । etasmāt kāraṇatrayāt śvetabuddhirviśeṣyajñānaṃ “śvetaṃ dravyam” utpadyate । te punarviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabuddhī kāryakāraṇabhūte kāryakāraṇasvabhāve iti ।
analyzed: tathā ca āha sūtrakāraḥ samavāyinaḥ śvaityāt śvaitya buddheḥ śvete buddhiḥ te kārya kāraṇa bhūte vai iti anena sūtrakārasya api ayam arthaḥ bhipretaḥ iti darśayati tathā hi śvetam dravyam tasya bhāvaḥ śvaityam śveta guṇaḥ tasmāt kim viśiṣṭāt samavāyinaḥ samavāyena sambandhāt śvaitya buddheḥ iti śveta guṇa buddheḥ etasmāt kāraṇa trayāt śveta buddhiḥ viśeṣya jñānam śvetam dravyam utpadyate te punar viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya buddhī kār

original: (“na tu laiṅgikaṃ jñānamabhedenotpadyata iti । tasmād viṣamo 'yamupanyāsaḥ ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: na tu laiṅgikam jñānam abhedena utpadyate iti tasmāt viṣamaḥ yam upanyāsaḥ

original: na ca laiṅgikaṃ jñānaṃ liṅgānuraktamiti liṅgābhāve 'pyutpadyata ityāha “na tu laiṅgikaṃ jñānamabhedena”(*) liṅgānurāgeṇotpadyate । “tasmād viṣamo 'yamupanyāsaḥ”(*) iti । yo 'yaṃ laiṅgikajñānavad “dve dravye” iti bhaviṣyatītyupanyāsaḥ sa viṣamaḥ samo na bhavatīti । tathā hi, viśeṣyajñāne viśeṣaṇānurāga iti, laiṅgike tu anurāgābhāva iti vaiṣamyam ।
analyzed: na ca laiṅgikam jñānam liṅga anuraktam iti liṅga abhāve pi utpadyate iti āha na tu laiṅgikam jñānam abhedena liṅga anurāgeṇa utpadyate tasmāt viṣamaḥ yam upanyāsaḥ iti yaḥ yam laiṅgika jñāna vat dve dravye iti bhaviṣyati iti upanyāsaḥ sa viṣamaḥ samaḥ na bhavati iti tathā hi viśeṣya jñāne viśeṣaṇa anurāgaḥ iti laiṅgike tu anurāga abhāvaḥ iti vaiṣamyam

original: yad vā viṣamo 'yamupanyāsaḥ, upanyasyate sādhyasādhanayorasmin vyāptirityupanyāsaḥ । laiṅgikavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ । sa ca viṣamaḥ, liṅgānurāgaśūnyatayā tasya aviśeṣyajñānatvāditi ।
analyzed: yat vā viṣamaḥ yam upanyāsaḥ upanyasyate sādhya sādhanayoḥ asmin vyāptiḥ iti upanyāsaḥ laiṅgika vat iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa ca viṣamaḥ liṅga anurāga śūnyatayā tasya a viśeṣya jñāna tvāt iti

original: anye tu te viśeṣaṇatajjñāne kāryasya viśeṣyajñānasya kāraṇabhūte । tasmād guṇaṃ vinā na dravyajñānamiti manyante ।
analyzed: anye tu te viśeṣaṇa tad jñāne kāryasya viśeṣya jñānasya kāraṇa bhūte tasmāt guṇam vinā na dravya jñānam iti manyante

original: te ca viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabuddhī kāryakāraṇabhūte । na punaḥ sarvaṃ vijñānaṃ tathābhūtam, pramāṇābhāvāt ।
analyzed: te ca viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya buddhī kārya kāraṇa bhūte na punar sarvam vijñānam tathābhūtam pramāṇa abhāvāt

original: etena saṅkalanājñānaṃ nirastam, viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyajñānavyatirekeṇa jñānāntare pramāṇābhāvādityalam ।
analyzed: etena saṅkalanā jñānam nirastam viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya jñāna vyatirekeṇa jñāna antare pramāṇa abhāvāt iti alam

original: (“na । āśūtpatteḥ, yathā śabdavadākāśamiti । atra trīṇi jñānānyāśūtpadyante tathā dvitvādijñānotpattāvityadoṣaḥ ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: na āśu utpatteḥ yathā śabdavat ākāśam iti atra trīṇi jñānāni āśu utpadyante tathā dvi tva ādi jñāna utpattau iti adoṣaḥ pdhs

original: nanu dvitvotpatteḥ prāk jñānadvayam, ekatvasāmānyajñānamapekṣājñānañca; utpanne tu dvitve tatsāmānyajñānam, guṇajñānam, dravyajñānañceti jñānapañcakaṃ yadi krameṇotpadyate sa kasmānnopalabhyate ? anupalambhānnāstīti paraḥ, tanni<II,048>ṣedhārthamāha “na āśūtpatteḥ”(*) iti । yaduktaṃ kramasyāsattvamityetanna, āśubhāvitvena vidyamānasyāpi kramasyāsaṃvedanāt ।
analyzed: nanu dvi tva utpatteḥ prāk jñāna dvayam eka tva sāmānya jñānam apekṣā jñānam ca utpanne tu dvi tve tad sāmānya jñānam guṇa jñānam dravya jñānam ca iti jñāna pañcakam yadi krameṇa utpadyate sa kasmāt na upalabhyate anupalambhāt na asti iti paraḥ na āśu utpatteḥ iti yat uktam kramasya asattvam iti etat na āśu bhāvi tvena vidyamānasya api kramasya asaṃvedanāt

original: atha āśūtpatteḥ kramasyāgrahaṇaṃ kasminnupalabdhamityāha “yathā śabdavadākāśamiti”(*) ityatra śabdajñānamākāśajñānaṃ śabdākāśasambandhajñānañceti trīṇi jñānānyāśūtpadyante iti kramasyāgrahaṇam, tathā dvitvādijñānotpattau āśubhāvitvenaiva kramāgrahaṇamityadoṣaḥ ।
analyzed: atha āśu utpatteḥ kramasya agrahaṇam kasmin upalabdham iti āha yathā śabdavat ākāśam iti iti atra śabda jñānam ākāśa jñānam śabda ākāśa sambandha jñānam ca iti trīṇi jñānāni āśu utpadyante iti kramasya agrahaṇam tathā dvi tva ādi jñāna utpattau āśu bhāvi tvena eva krama agrahaṇam iti adoṣaḥ

original: na ca jñānānāṃ sahānavasthānalakṣaṇa eva virodhe jñānānāmāśubhāvitvenotpatteḥ, avinaṣṭe hi guṇe dravyajñānaṃ bhaviṣyatīti pratisamādhānametaditi vācyam, śīghraṃ kāraṇasadbhāvena kāryasyāpi tathābhāvāt । avaśyaṃ guṇabuddhisamakālaṃ guṇavināśe tadāyattasya dravyajñānasyānutpattiriti dūṣaṇasyāpyāvṛtteḥ । yadi jñānayoḥ sahāvirodhenāvasthānaṃ nāstīti sahānavasthānaṃ vivakṣitamavivāda eva ।
analyzed: na ca jñānānām saha anavasthāna lakṣaṇaḥ eva virodhe jñānānām āśu bhāvi tvena utpatteḥ a vinaṣṭe hi guṇe dravya jñānam bhaviṣyati iti pratisamādhānam etat iti vācyam śīghram kāraṇa sadbhāvena kāryasya api tathābhāvāt avaśyam guṇa buddhi sama kālam guṇa vināśe tad āyattasya dravya jñānasya anutpattiḥ iti dūṣaṇasya api āvṛtteḥ  / yadi jñānayoḥ saha avirodhena avasthānam na asti iti saha anavasthānam vivakṣitam avivādaḥ eva

original: (“vadhyaghātakapakṣe 'pi samāno doṣa iti cet, syānmatam । nanu vadhyaghātakapakṣe 'pi tarhi dravyajñānānutpattiprasaṅgaḥ । katham ? dvitvasāmānyabuddhisamakālaṃ saṃskārādapekṣābuddhivināśāditi । na । samūhajñānasya saṃskārahetutvāt । samūhajñānameva saṃskārakāraṇaṃ nālocanajñānamitya doṣaḥ ।”)<PDhS>

original: yathā hi, apekṣābuddhirdvitvaṃ janayati evaṃ saṃskāramapīti । tatastasyā vinaśyattā, dvitvasāmānyajñānasyotpadyamānatā, tato dvitvasāmānyajñānasyotpādaḥ, guṇajñānasyotpadyamānatā, apekṣābuddhervināśaḥ, guṇasya vinaśyattā, <II,049> tato guṇajñānasyotpādaḥ, apekṣābuddhivināśād guṇasya vināśa iti tadapekṣatvād dravyajñānasyānutpattireva । na । samūhajñānasya saṃskārahetutvād iti pratisamādhānam । tathā hi, yaduktam, apekṣābuddheḥ saṃskārād vināśa iti, tanna । samūhajñānasya paṭvabhyāsādarapratyayasya saṃskārahetutvāditi ।

original: saṅgrahoktervivaraṇamāha “samūhajñānameva saṃskārakāraṇam, na ālocanajñānam”(*) apekṣājñānamiti । tasmādadoṣaḥ । kimatra pramāṇamiti cet, smaraṇānutpattirdravyajñānotpattiśca । tathā hi, yatra smaraṇaṃ tatraiva saṃskārakalpanā kriyate, na cātra tadastīti । abhyupagame dravyajñānameva na syāt । tad dṛṣṭam । atastadanyathānupapattyā apekṣābuddheḥ saṃskārājanakatvaṃ niścīyate, prakārāntarābhāvāt ।
analyzed: saṅgraha ukteḥ vivaraṇam āha samūha jñānam eva saṃskāra kāraṇam na ālocana jñānam apekṣā jñānam iti tasmāt adoṣaḥ kim atra pramāṇam iti ced smaraṇa anutpattiḥ dravya jñāna utpattiḥ ca tathā hi yatra smaraṇam tatra eva saṃskāra kalpanā kriyate na ca atra tat asti iti abhyupagame dravya jñānam eva na syāt tat dṛṣṭam atas tad anyathā anupapattyā apekṣā buddheḥ saṃskāra ajanaka tvam niścīyate prakāra antara abhāvāt

original: (“jñānayaugapadyaprasaṅga iti cet, syānmatam । nanu jñānānāṃ vadhyaghātakavirodhe jñānayaugapadyaprasaṅga iti, na । avinaśyatoravasthānapratiṣedhāt । jñānāyaugapadyavacanena jñānayoryugapadutpattiravinaśyatośca yugapadavasthānaṃ pratiṣidhyate । na hi vadhyaghātakavirodhe jñānayoryugapadutpattiravinaśyatośca yugapadavasthānamastīti ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: jñāna yaugapadya prasaṅgaḥ iti ced syāt matam nanu jñānānām vadhya ghātaka virodhe jñāna yaugapadya prasaṅgaḥ iti na avinaśyatoḥ avasthāna pratiṣedhāt jñāna ayaugapadya vacanena jñānayoḥ yugapad utpattiḥ avinaśyatoḥ ca yugapad avasthānam pratiṣidhyate  / na hi vadhya ghātaka virodhe jñānayoḥ yugapad utpattiḥ avinaśyatoḥ ca yugapad avasthānam asti iti pdhs

original: athedānīṃ vadhyaghātakapakṣe 'pi parāśayamāśaṅkate “jñānayaugapadyaprasaṅga iti cet syānmatam”(*) iti । saṅgrahoktervivaraṇam “nanu jñānānāṃ vadhyaghātakavirodhe jñānayaugapadyaprasaṅga”(*) iti । tathā ca yadi jñānānāṃ vadhyaghātakalakṣaṇo virodhastadā ekasyāvasthāne dvitīyasyotpādājjñānayaugapadyaṃ prasajyata ityaniṣṭāpādanam ।
analyzed: atha idānīm vadhya ghātaka pakṣe para āśayam āśaṅkate jñāna yaugapadya prasaṅgaḥ iti ced syāt matam iti saṅgraha ukteḥ vivaraṇam nanu jñānānām vadhya ghātaka virodhe jñāna yaugapadya prasaṅgaḥ iti tathā ca yadi jñānānām vadhya ghātaka lakṣaṇaḥ virodhaḥ tadā ekasya avasthāne dvitīyasya utpādāt jñāna yaugapadyam prasajyate iti aniṣṭa āpādanam

original: tannāniṣṭam । “avinaśyatoravasthānapratiṣedhāt”(*) । tathā hi, “jñānāyaugapadyavacanena prayatnāyaugapadyācca pratiśarīramekaṃ manaḥ” <vai. sū. 3.2.3> iti sūtreṇa yugapadutpattiḥ, avinaśyatośca jñānayoḥ parasparāvirodhenāvasthānaṃ pratiṣidhyate । vadhyaghātakavirodhe tu ubhayamapi nāstītyāha “na hi vadhyaghātakavirodhe jñānayoryugapadutpattiravinaśyatośca yugapadavasthānamastīti”(*) adūṣaṇametat ।
analyzed: tat na aniṣṭam avinaśyatoḥ avasthāna pratiṣedhāt tathā hi jñāna ayaugapadya vacanena prayatna ayaugapadyāt ca pratiśarīram ekam manaḥ vai iti sūtreṇa yugapad utpattiḥ avinaśyatoḥ ca jñānayoḥ paraspara avirodhena avasthānam pratiṣidhyate vadhya ghātaka virodhe tu ubhayam api na asti iti āha na hi vadhya ghātaka virodhe jñānayoḥ yugapad utpattiḥ avinaśyatoḥ ca yugapad avasthānam asti iti adūṣaṇam etat

original: {parimāṇavaidharmyam}
analyzed: parimāṇa vaidharmyam

original: (“parimāṇaṃ mānavyavahārakāraṇam । taccaturvidham, aṇumahaddīrghaṃ hrasvañceti । tatra mahad dvividhaṃ nityamanityañca । nityamākāśakāladigātmasu paramamahattvam । anityaṃ tryaṇukādāveva । tathā ca aṇvapi dvividhaṃ nityamanityañca । nityaṃ paramāṇumanaḥsu । tattu pārimāṇḍalyam । anityaṃ dvyaṇuka eva ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: parimāṇam māna vyavahāra kāraṇam tat caturvidham aṇu mahat dīrgham hrasvam ca iti tatra mahat dvividham nityam anityam ca nityam ākāśa kāla diś ātmasu parama mahat tvam anityam tryaṇuka ādau eva tathā ca aṇu api dvividham nityam anityam ca nityam paramāṇu manaḥsu tat tu pārimāṇḍalyam anityam dvyaṇuke eva pdhs

original: idānīmuddeśakrameṇāvasaraprāptasya parimāṇasya lakṣaṇaparīkṣārthaṃ “parimāṇaṃ mānavyavahārakāraṇam”(*) ityādi prakaraṇam । vyavahṛtirvyavahāro jñānam, vyavahriyate 'neneti vyavahāro 'bhidhānam tayorhetuḥ parimāṇamityukte 'tiprasaṅgastadarthaṃ mānapadam । tathāpi mānavyavahārahetutvamākāśātmanorvidyata iti viśeṣaṇatve satīti viśeṣaṇam । tathāpi parimāṇatvasāmānyena vyabhicāraparihārārthaṃ dravyaviśeṣaṇatve satīti viśeṣaṇamabhyūhyam । tathā hi, parimāṇam, itarasmād bhidyate, dravyaviśeṣaṇatve sati mānavyavahārakāraṇatvāt, yastu itarasmādaparimāṇānna bhidyate na cāsāvevam, yathā rūpādiriti । vyavahāro vā sādhyaḥ ।
analyzed: idānīm uddeśa krameṇa avasara prāptasya parimāṇasya lakṣaṇa parīkṣā artham parimāṇam māna vyavahāra kāraṇam ityādi prakaraṇam vyavahṛtiḥ vyavahāraḥ jñānam vyavahriyate nena iti vyavahāraḥ bhidhānam tayoḥ hetuḥ parimāṇam iti ukte tiprasaṅgaḥ tad artham māna padam tathā api māna vyavahāra hetu tvam ākāśa ātmanoḥ vidyate iti viśeṣaṇa tve sati iti viśeṣaṇam tathā api parimāṇa tva sāmānyena vyabhicāra parihāra artham dravya viśeṣ

original: tathā āvartyamānamidameva vākyamanekārthamiti parīkṣāparatvena sambadhyate । tathā hi, mānavyavahāro viśeṣyajñānatvād viśeṣaṇamapekṣate daṇḍyādijñānavat । na ca rūpādīnāmanyatamastadviśeṣaṇaṃ tadvyavahāravilakṣaṇatvāditi vilakṣaṇenaiva nimittena bhavitavyam । na cedaṃ kalpanājñānaṃ vāsanāprabhavam, tasyāḥ pūrvameva pratiṣedhāt ।
analyzed: tathā āvartyamānam idam eva vākyam aneka artham iti parīkṣā paratvena sambadhyate tathā hi māna vyavahāraḥ viśeṣya jñāna tvāt viśeṣaṇam apekṣate daṇḍi ādi jñāna vat  na ca rūpa ādīnām anyatamaḥ tad viśeṣaṇam tad vyavahāra vilakṣaṇa tvāt iti vilakṣaṇena eva nimittena bhavitavyam na ca idam kalpanā jñānam vāsanā prabhavam tasyāḥ pūrvam eva pratiṣedhāt

original: “taccaturvidham”(*) iti vibhāgaḥ । kena rūpeṇetyāha “aṇumahaddīrghaṃ hrasvañceti”(*) ।
analyzed: tat caturvidham iti vibhāgaḥ kena rūpeṇa iti āha aṇu mahat dīrgham hrasvat ca iti

original: nanu cāyuktaṃ cāturvidhyaṃ caturasrādibhedasyāpi sambhavāt, tanna, mahatvasyaiva avayavaracanāviśeṣopalambhasahakāriṇaḥ caturasrādivyavahārasampādakatvāt । tathā hi, avayavaracanāviśeṣopalambhe sati caturasraṃ tryasraṃ parimaṇḍalamiti vyavahāraḥ, tadabhāve ca neti na parimāṇāntarasiddhiḥ ।
analyzed: nanu ca ayuktam cāturvidhyam catur asra ādi bhedasya api sambhavāt tat na mahatvasya eva avayava racanā viśeṣa upalambha sahakāriṇaḥ catur asra ādi vyavahāra sampādaka tvāt tathā hi avayava racanā viśeṣa upalambhe sati catur asram tri asram parimaṇḍalam iti vyavahāraḥ tad abhāve ca na iti na parimāṇa antara siddhiḥ

original: nanvevaṃ dīrghatvahrasvatvavyavahāro 'pyavayavasaṃyogaviśeṣopalambhādeva bhaviṣyatītyalaṃ dīrghatvahrasvatvaparikalpanayā ? na, tadanupalabdhāvapi dīrghatvopalabdheḥ । tathā hi, mandamandaprakāśe satyantareṇāpyavayavaracanopalambhaṃ sthāṇvādau dīrghapratibhāso dṛṣṭaḥ । na caivaṃ caturasrapratibhāsa ityanvayavyatirekābhyāmityūhyam ।
analyzed: nanu evam dīrgha tva hrasva tva vyavahāraḥ pi avayava saṃyoga viśeṣa upalambhāt eva bhaviṣyati iti alam dīrgha tva hrasva tva parikalpanayā na tad anupalabdhau api dīrgha tva upalabdheḥ tathā hi manda manda prakāśe sati antareṇa api avayava racanā upalambham sthāṇu ādau dīrgha pratibhāsaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ na ca evam catur asra pratibhāsaḥ iti anvaya vyatirekābhyām iti ūhyam

original: tatra mahattvāṇutvayorapyavāntarabhedāt ṣaḍvidhamapi parimāṇamityāha “mahad dvividhaṃ nityamanityañca”(*) iti । “nityamākāśakāladigātmasu”(*) vartate । tacca “paramamahattvam”(*) na tasmādūrdhvaṃ mahattvamastīti । “anityaṃ tryaṇukādāveva”(*) iti । tryaṇukamādau yasya tattathoktam, tat tasminneva, tatra hi utpattikāraṇasadbhāvāt ।
analyzed: tatra mahat tva aṇu tvayoḥ api avāntarabhedāt ṣaḍvidham api parimāṇam iti āha mahat dvividham nityam anityam ca iti nityam ākāśa kāla diś ātmasu vartate tat ca parama mahat tvam na tasmāt ūrdhvam mahat tvam asti iti anityam tryaṇuka ādau eva iti tryaṇukam ādau yasya tat tathā uktam tat tasmin eva tatra hi utpatti kāraṇa sadbhāvāt

original: tathā na paraṃ mahad “aṇvapi dvividhaṃ nityamanityañca”(*) । keṣvityāha 〈“paramāṇumanaḥsu”(*)〉 paramāṇavaśca manaśceti paramāṇumanāṃsi teṣu vartate । “pārimāṇḍalyam”(*) iti tasya nāma । tathā hi parimaṇḍalāni paramāṇumanāṃsi teṣāṃ bhāvaḥ pārimāṇḍalyam, tat parimāṇameva । tattu nityam, utpattivināśakāraṇānupalabdheḥ । tathā hi, paramāṇūnāṃ kāraṇāsambhavānna tatparimāṇakāraṇam anekatvasaṃkhyā pracayo vāstīti । etāvattu kāraṇaṃ parimāṇasya । na ca nityatvādaṇūnāṃ vināśaḥ sambhavatīti tatparimāṇasya nityatvameva । “anityaṃ dvyaṇuka eva”(*) ityāśrayāntaravyudāsaḥ ।
analyzed: tathā na param mahat aṇu api dvividham nityam anityam ca  / keṣu iti āha paramāṇu manaḥsu paramāṇavaḥ ca manaḥ ca iti paramāṇu manāṃsi teṣu vartate pārimāṇḍalyam iti tasya nāma tathā hi parimaṇḍalāni paramāṇu manāṃsi teṣām bhāvaḥ pārimāṇḍalyam tat parimāṇam eva tat tu nityam utpatti vināśa kāraṇa anupalabdheḥ tathā hi paramāṇūnām kāraṇa asambhavāt na tat parimāṇa kāraṇam aneka tva saṃkhyā pracayaḥ vā asti iti etāvat t

original: (“kuvalayāmalakabilvādiṣu mahatsvapi tatprakarṣabhāvābhāvamapekṣya bhākto 'ṇutvavyavahāraḥ । dīrghatvahrasvatve ca utpādyamahadaṇutvaikārthasamavete । samidikṣuvaṃśādiṣvañjasā dīrgheṣvapi tatprakarṣabhāvābhāvamapekṣya bhākto hrasvatvavyavahāraḥ ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: kuvalaya āmalaka bilva ādiṣu mahatsu api tad prakarṣa bhāva abhāvam apekṣya bhāktaḥ ṇu tva vyavahāraḥ dīrgha tva hrasva tve ca utpādya mahat aṇu tva ekārtha samavete samidh ikṣu vaṃśa ādiṣu añjasā dīrgheṣu api tad prakarṣa bhāva abhāvam apekṣya bhāktaḥ hrasva tva vyavahāraḥ

original: nanu cāyuktametad, anyatrāpyaṇuvyavahāropalabdheḥ, na, tatra mukhyāsambhavena upacārābhyupagamāt ityāha “kuvalayāmalakabilvādiṣu mahatsvapi tatprakarṣabhāvābhāvamapekṣya”(*) parimāṇātiśayaḥ । kuvalayādyapekṣayā tasmād vā prakarṣaḥ, tasya bhāvo vidyamānatā bilvādau, tadabhāvamapekṣyāmalake 'ṇuvyavahāraḥ । tathā tatprakarṣaḥ kuvalayāpekṣayā parimāṇātiśayaḥ, tasya bhāvo vidyamānatā <II,052> āmalake, tadabhāvamapekṣya kuvalaye 'ṇuvyavahāraḥ । yatra hi vāstavamaṇutvaṃ tatra parimāṇātiśayasyābhāvo draṣṭavyaḥ । tasyānyatrāpyupalambhād upacāraḥ pravartata eva ।
analyzed: nanu ca ayuktam etat anyatra api aṇu vyavahāra upalabdheḥ na tatra mukhya asambhavena upacāra abhyupagamāt iti āha kuvalaya āmalaka bilva ādiṣu mahatsu api tad prakarṣa bhāva abhāvam apekṣya parimāṇa atiśayaḥ kuvalaya ādi apekṣayā tasmāt vā prakarṣaḥ tasya bhāvaḥ vidyamāna tā bilva ādau tad abhāvam apekṣya āmalake ṇu vyavahāraḥ tathā tad prakarṣaḥ kuvalaya apekṣayā parimāṇa atiśayaḥ tasya bhāvaḥ vidyamāna tā āmalake tad abhāvam apekṣya

original: yad vā mukhyāsadbhāve kiṃ pramāṇamityāha “bhākto 'ṇuvyavahāraḥ”(*) । yathā hi māṇavake siṃhavyavahāro mukhyāpekṣaḥ, tadvadayamaṇuvyavahāro 'pyupacaritatvānmukhyapūrva ityaṇutvasiddhiḥ । tathā ca kuvalayādiṣu aṇuvyavahāro mukhyapūrvako bhāktavyavahāratvāt, māṇavake siṃhavyavahāravat ।
analyzed: yat vā mukhya asadbhāve kim pramāṇam iti āha bhāktaḥ ṇu vyavahāraḥ yathā hi māṇavake siṃha vyavahāraḥ mukhya apekṣaḥ tadvat ayam aṇu vyavahāraḥ upi upacarita tvāt mukhya pūrvaḥ iti aṇu tva siddhiḥ tathā ca kuvalaya ādiṣu aṇu vyavahāraḥ mukhya pūrvakaḥ bhākta vyavahāra tvāt māṇavake siṃha vyavahāra vat

original: yathā ca mahattvāṇutvayornityānityabhedo naivaṃ dīrghatvahrasvatvayoḥ, āśrayāntarānupapatteḥ । kva vā tayorvṛttirityāśaṅkāyāmāha 〈“dīrghatvahrasvatve ca”(*)〉 dīrghatvañca hrasvatvañceti dīrghatvahrasvatve । te tu “utpādyamahadaṇutvaikārthasamavete”(*) utpādye ca te mahadaṇutve ca utpādyamahadaṇutve; tābhyāṃ sahaikasminnarthe samavete । tathā hi, tryaṇukādāvutpādyaṃ mahattvaṃ tatraiva dīrghatvam । dvyaṇuke cāṇutvaṃ tatraiva hrasvatvamiti । paramāṇūnāṃ parimaṇḍalatvāna hrasvatvam, ākāśādervyāpakatvācca na dīrghatvam, tadviparīteṣu tadvyavahāradarśanāt ।
analyzed: yathā ca mahat tva aṇu tvayoḥ nitya anitya bhedaḥ na evam dīrgha tva hrasva tvayoḥ āśraya antara anupapatteḥ kva vā tayoḥ vṛttiḥ iti āśaṅkāyām āha dīrgha tva hrasva tve ca dīrgha tvam ca hrasva tvam ca iti dīrgha tva hrasva tve te tu utpādya mahat aṇu tva eka artha samavete utpādye ca te mahat aṇu tve ca utpādya mahat aṇu tve tābhyām saha ekasmin arthe samavete tathā hi tryaṇuka ādau utpādyam mahat tvam tatra eva dīrgha tvam dvyaṇuke ca aṇu tvam tatra eva

original: atha dvyaṇukeṣveva 〈kathaṃ〉 hrasvatvamityuktamanyatrāpi tadvyavahāropalabdheḥ ? tanna, bādhakasadbhāvena anyatropacārābhyupagamādityāha “samidikṣuvaṃśādiṣvañjasā dīrgheṣvapi tatprakarṣabhāvābhāvamapekṣya bhākto hrasvatvavyavahāraḥ”(*) iti । tathā hi, samidādiṣu dīrghatvotpattau kāraṇasadbhāvādañjasā mukhyayā vṛttyā dīrghatvam । dīrdheṣvapi hrasvatvavyavahāro dṛṣṭa iti mukhyāsambhavāt upacāraḥ kalpyate । tatra ca tatprakarṣabhāvābhāvo nimittam । tasya vaṃśādeḥ prakarṣaḥ samidādyapekṣayā dīrghatvātiśayaḥ, tasya bhāvo vidyamānatā vaṃśādau, tadabhāvamapekṣya ikṣau hrasvatvavyavahāraḥ । samidhamapekṣya ikṣau dīrghatvātiśayaḥ, tatra tadabhāvamapekṣya samidhi hrasvavyavahāraḥ ।

original: pracayasya kāraṇatvamāha “pracayaśca tūlapiṇḍayorvataṃmānaḥ piṇḍārambhakāvayava〈pra〉śithilasaṃyogāpekṣaḥ, itaretarapiṇḍāvayavasaṃyogāpekṣo vā dvitūlake mahattvamārabhate”(*) iti ।
