original: tūlapiṇḍaśca tūlapiṇḍaśca tūlapiṇḍau, tayorvartamānaḥ saṃyogaḥ pracayaḥ । kiṃviśiṣṭaḥ ? piṇḍārambhakapraśithilasaṃyogāpekṣa iti । piṇḍārambhakāśca <II,057> praśithilasaṃyogāśca tānapekṣata iti tadapekṣaḥ । itaretarapiṇḍāvayavasaṃyogāpekṣaśceti । vā samuccaye, na tū vikalpe, apekṣākāraṇatvenābhyupagatayorubhayorapyatra sadbhāvāt । itarasya piṇḍasyetarapiṇḍāvayavaiḥ saṃyogastathā itarasyetarāvayavairiti । itaretarapiṇḍayorvā ye 'vayavāsteṣāṃ saṃyogāstānapekṣata iti tadapekṣaḥ । sa ca dvābhyāṃ tūlakābhyāmārabdhe 'pi tūlake mahattvamārabhata iti । tritūlakādāvapyetat samānam । pratyāsattistu mahatī dvitūlakaparimāṇe dvitūlake vartate, dvitūlake tu tūlapiṇḍayoḥ saṃyogo 'pi । tatraiva bahutvamahattvayoḥ sadbhāve 'pi kāraṇatvapratiṣedha ityāha “na bahutvamahattvāni”(*) dvitūlakādau mahattvamārabhante । kutaḥ ? “samānasaṃkhyāpalaparimāṇairārabdhe 'tiśayadarśanāt”(*) ।
analyzed: tūla piṇḍaḥ ca tūla piṇḍaḥ ca tūla piṇḍau tayoḥ vartamānaḥ saṃyogaḥ pracayaḥ kiṃviśiṣṭaḥ piṇḍa ārambhaka praśithila saṃyoga apekṣaḥ iti piṇḍa ārambhakāḥ ca praśithila saṃyogāḥ ca tān apekṣate iti tad apekṣaḥ itaretara piṇḍa avayava saṃyoga apekṣaḥ ca iti vā samuccaye na vikalpe apekṣā kāraṇa tvena abhyupagatayoḥ ubhayoḥ api atra sadbhāvāt itarasya piṇḍasya itara piṇḍa avayavaiḥ saṃyogaḥ tathā itara

original: tathā hi, tribhistūlapiṇḍaiḥ pañcapalaiḥ praśithilāvayavasaṃyogairārabdhamekam, anyacca tadviparītaiḥ । tatra yat praśithilāvayavasaṃyogairārabdhaṃ tatra parimāṇātiśayo dṛṣṭa iti pracayasyaiva kāraṇatvam, na saṃkhyāpalaparimāṇānām, tatkāraṇatve cobhayatrāviśeṣaḥ syāt ।
analyzed: tathā hi tribhiḥ tūla piṇḍaiḥ pañca palaiḥ praśithila avayava saṃyogaiḥ ārabdham ekam anyat ca tad viparītaiḥ tatra yat praśithila avayava saṃyogaiḥ ārabdham tatra parimāṇa atiśayaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti pracayasya eva kāraṇa tvam na saṃkhyā pala parimāṇānām tad kāraṇa tve ca ubhayatra aviśeṣaḥ syāt

original: atha palasya sarvatra parimāṇākāraṇatvāt prasaktyabhāve na yuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ । tathā hi, pāṣāṇādau palātiśayasadbhāve 'pi parimāṇasyātiśayābhāvaḥ । tulapiṇḍādau ca tadabhāve 'pi atiśayopalabdherna palasya gurutvaviśeṣatvāt kāraṇatvam । kimarthastatra pratiṣedhaḥ ? vyāmohapratiṣedhārthaḥ । tathā ca pare vyāmohād yadyevaṃvidhasyāpi palasya kāraṇatvaṃ pratipadyeraṃstadapi nāsti, samānapalairārabdhe 'tiśayādarśanāt ।
analyzed: atha palasya sarvatra parimāṇa akāraṇa tvāt prasakti abhāve na yuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ tathā hi pāṣāṇa ādau pala atiśaya sadbhāve pi parimāṇasya atiśaya abhāvaḥ tula piṇḍa ādau ca tad abhāve pi atiśaya upalabdheḥ na palasya guru tva viśeṣa tvāt kāraṇa tvam kimarthaḥ tatra pratiṣedhaḥ vyāmoha pratiṣedha arthaḥ tathā ca pare vyāmohāt yadi evaṃvidhasya api palasya kāraṇa tvam pratipadyeran tat api nā asti samāna palaiḥ ārabdhe tiśaya adarśan

original: anye tu asyaiva doṣasya parihārārthaṃ palaśabdasya samānaśabdaparyāyatāṃ bruvate । samānasaṃkhyāpalaparimāṇairiti samānasaṃkhyaiḥ samānaparimāṇairityarthaḥ ।
analyzed: anye tu asya eva doṣasya parihāra artham pala śabdasya samāna śabda paryāyatām bruvate samāna saṃkhyā pala parimāṇaiḥ iti samāna saṃkhyaiḥ samāna parimāṇaiḥ iti arthaḥ

original: nanu cāyuktamavadhāraṇaṃ pracayasyaiva kāraṇatvamiti, bahutvamahattvayorapyanyatra sāmarthyāvadhāraṇe satīha pratyāsannatvāt । na ca samānasaṃkhyāpalaparimāṇarārabdhe 'pi ekatrātiśayadarśanaṃ bahutvamahattvayoḥ kāraṇatvapratiṣedhe hetuḥ, anyāpekṣayānatiśayasadbhāve pracayasyāpyakāraṇatvaprasaṅgāt । tathā hi, samānasaṃkhyāpalaparimāṇaiḥ praśithilāvayavasaṃyogaiścaturbhirārabdhamekam anyacca tathāvidhai<II,058>stribhiriti । caturbhirārabdhe 'tiśayadarśanāt saṃkhyāpi kāraṇam । tathā sthūlaiścaturbhiḥ praśithilāvayavasaṃyogairārabdhamekam anyacca sthūlatamaistathāvidhairevetyatra kāraṇaparimāṇātiśayena kāryaparimāṇasyātiśayopalabdheḥ parimāṇasyāpi kāraṇatvam । yatra tu samānasaṃkhyāparimāṇaiḥ praśithilāvayavasaṃyogārabdhairmahattvamārabhyate tatrāviśeṣeṇa tritayasyāpi kāraṇatvam, anyatra sāmarthyāvadhāraṇe satīha pratyāsannatvāt । vākyasya tu vyākhyānaṃ pūrvavat ।
analyzed: nanu ca ayuktam avadhāraṇam pracayasya eva kāraṇa tvam iti bahutva mahattvayoḥ api anyatra sāmarthya avadhāraṇe sati iha pratyāsanna tvāt na ca ekatra atiśaya darśanam bahu tva mahat tvayoḥ kāraṇa tva pratiṣedhe hetuḥ anya apekṣayā anatiśaya sadbhāve pracayasya api akāraṇa tva prasaṅgāt tathā hi samāna saṃkhyā pala parimāṇaiḥ praśithila avayava saṃyogaiḥ caturbhiḥ ārabdham ekam anyat ca caturbhiḥ ārabdhe tiśaya darśanāt saṃkhyā api kāraṇa tv

original: (“dvitvasaṃkhyā cāṇvorvartamānā dvyaṇuke 'ṇutvamārabhate ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: dvi tva saṃkhyā ca aṇvoḥ vartamānā dvi aṇuke ṇu tvam ārabhate

original: aṇutvotpattau kāraṇamāha “dvitvasaṃkhyā cāṇvorvartamānā dvyaṇuke 'ṇutvamārabhate”(*) iti । dvyaṇukāṇuparimāṇaṃ kāryam । tasya hi samavāyikāraṇaṃ dvyaṇukamityanyenāsamavāyikāraṇena bhavitavyam । paramāṇuparimāṇasya cārambhakatvapratiṣedhe 'nyasya cāsambhavād dvitvasaṃkhyaivāṇvorvartamānā kāryakāraṇaikārthasamavāyena dvyaṇukāṇuparimāṇotpattāvasamavāyikāraṇamiti । aṇuśabdaśca sāmānyaśabdatvāt paramāṇāvapi vartata eva, aṇutve sati parama iti viśeṣaṇāt । vināśastu dvitvasaṃkhyāyāḥ pūrvavadvyākhyeyaḥ ।
analyzed: aṇu tva utpattau kāraṇam āha dvi tva saṃkhyā ca aṇvoḥ vartamānā dvyaṇuke ṇu tvam ārabhate iti dvi aṇuka aṇu parimāṇam kāryam tasya hi samavāyi kāraṇam dvyaṇukam iti anyena asamavāyi kāraṇena bhavitavyam paramāṇu parimāṇasya ca ārambhaka tva pratiṣedhe nyasya ca asambhavāt dvi tva saṃkhyā eva aṇvoḥ vartamānā kārya kāraṇa eka artha samavāyena dvi aṇuka aṇu parimāṇa utpattau asamavāyi kāraṇam iti  /

original: (“mahattvavat tryaṇukādau kāraṇabahutvamahattvasamānajātīyapracayebhyo dīrghatvasyotpattiḥ । aṇutvavad dvyaṇuke dvitvasaṃkhyāto hrasvatvasyospattiḥ ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: mahat tva vat tryaṇuka ādau kāraṇa bahu tva mahat tva samāna jātīya pracayebhyaḥ dīrgha tvasya utpattiḥ aṇu tva vat dvyaṇuke dvi tva saṃkhyātaḥ hrasva tvasya uspattiḥ

original: dīrghatvotpattau kāraṇamāha “mahattvavat tryaṇukādau kāraṇabahutvamahattvasamānajātīyapracayebhyo dīrghatvasyotpattiḥ”(*) iti । yathā hi mahattvaṃ kāraṇabahutva〈mahattva〉samānajātīyapracayebhyo bhavati evaṃ dīrghatvamapīti । tryaṇuke kāraṇabahutvādeva dīrghatvam, dvitantuke kāraṇadīrghatvādeveti । tritantukādau bahutvadīrghatvapracayairdīrghatvamārabhyate ityatideśārthaḥ । tathā “aṇutvavad 〈dvyaṇuke〉 dvitvasaṃkhyāto hrasvatvasyotpattiḥ”(*) iti । yathā kāraṇāntarāsambhavād dvitvasaṃkhyā aṇutvasyotpattāvasamavāyikāraṇam evaṃ hrasvatvasyāpīti ।
analyzed: dīrgha tva utpattau kāraṇam āha mahat tva vat tryaṇuka ādau kāraṇa bahu tva mahat tva samāna jātīya pracayebhyaḥ dīrgha tvasya utpattiḥ iti yathā hi mahat tvam kāraṇa bahu tva mahat tva samāna jātīya pracayebhyaḥ bhavati evam dīrgha tvam api iti tryaṇuke kāraṇa bahu tvāt eva dīrgha tvam dvitantuke kāraṇa dīrgha tvāt eva iti tritantuka ādau bahu tva dīrgha tva pracayaiḥ dīrgha tvam ārabhyate iti atideśa arthaḥ tathā aṇu tva vat dvyaṇuke dvi tva saṃkhy

original: (“atha tryaṇukādiṣu vartamānayormahattvadīrghatvayoḥ parasparataḥ ko viśeṣaḥ, dvyaṇukeṣu cāṇutvahrasvatvayoriti ? tatrāsti mahattvadīrghatvayoḥ <II,059> parasparato viśeṣaḥ, mahatsu dīrghamānīyatāṃ, dīrgheṣu ca mahadānīyatāmiti viśiṣṭavyavahāradarśanāditi । aṇutvahrasvatvayostu parasparato viśeṣastaddarśināṃ pratyakṣa iti ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: atha tryaṇuka ādiṣu vartamānayoḥ mahat tva dīrgha tvayoḥ parasparataḥ kaḥ viśeṣaḥ dvyaṇukeṣu ca aṇu tva hrasva tvayoḥ iti tatra asti mahat tva dīrgha tvayoḥ parasparataḥ viśeṣaḥ mahatsu dīrgham ānīyatām dīrgheṣu ca mahat ānīyatām iti viśiṣṭa vyavahāra darśanāt iti aṇu tva hrasva tvayoḥ tu parasparataḥ viśeṣaḥ tad darśinām pratyakṣaḥ iti pdhs

original: (“etaccaturvidhamapi parimāṇamutpādyamāśrayavināśādeva vinaśyatīti ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: etat caturvidham api parimāṇam utpādyam āśraya vināśāt eva vinaśyati iti

original: atha samānajātīyakāraṇajanyatvāt “tryaṇukādiṣu vartamānayormahattvadīrghatvayoḥ parasparataḥ ko viśeṣaḥ, dvyaṇuke〈ṣu〉 cāṇutvahrasvatvayoḥ”(*) iti । yataḥ kāraṇabhedāt bhidyante padārthā mahattvadīrghatvādau tadabhāva iti । tanna । 〈pratibhā〉sabhedena mahattvadīrghatvayorbhedasadbhāve sati tajjanakayoḥ kāraṇasāmagryorbhedopatteḥ ।
analyzed: atha samāna jātīya kāraṇa janya tvāt tryaṇuka ādiṣu vartamānayoḥ mahat tva dīrgha tvayoḥ parasparataḥ kaḥ viśeṣaḥ dvyaṇukeṣu ca aṇu tva hrasva tvayoḥ iti yatas kāraṇa bhedāt bhidyante padārthāḥ mahat tva dīrgha tva ādau tad abhāve iti tat na pratibhāsa bhedena mahat tva dīrgha tvayoḥ bheda sadbhāve sati tad janakayoḥ kāraṇa sāmagryoḥ bheda upatteḥ

original: tathā hi, kāryabhedena sāmagrībhedo jñāyate । sa cehāstyeva pratibhāsabhedādityāha “tatrāsti mahattvadīrghatvayoḥ parasparato viśeṣaḥ”(*) । kutaḥ ? “mahatsu dīrghamānīyatāṃ dīrgheṣu 〈ca〉 maha(diti )<?>〈dānīyatāmiti viśiṣṭa〉vyavahāradarśanāt”(*) । anyathā hi mahattv(a)〈ā〉viśeṣāt tato dīrghatvenātiśayyānayanaṃ dīrgheṣu ca mahattveneti na syāt । dṛṣṭañcaitat । tasmād dīrghatvaṃ mahattvād bhedena pratipannaṃ mahattvañca dīrghatvāditi pratibhāsabhedād rūpādīnāmiva bhedaḥ ।
analyzed: tathā hi kārya bhedena sāmagrī bhedaḥ jñāyate sa ca iha asti eva pratibhāsa bhedāt iti āha tatra asti mahat tva dīrgha tvayoḥ parasparataḥ viśeṣaḥ kutas mahatsu dīrgham ānīyatām dīrgheṣu ca mahat iti dānīyatām iti viśiṣṭa vyavahāra darśanāt anyathā hi mahat tva āviśeṣāt tatas dīrgha tvena atiśayya ānayanam dīrgheṣu ca mahat tvena iti na syāt dṛṣṭam ca etat tasmāt dīrgha tvam mahat tvāt bhedena pratipannam mahat tvam ca dīrgha tvāt iti pratibhā

original: samānakāraṇajanyatvañca samavāyyasamavāyinimittāpekṣayā । (vi<?>)pākajairvyabhicaratīti nābhede hetuḥ । sāmagryapekṣayā tu samānakāraṇatvamasiddham, kāryabhedena tadbhedopapatteḥ । “aṇutvahrasvatvayostu (vyavahāra<?>)parasparato viśeṣastaddarśinām”(*) iti । yogināṃ pratyakṣasteṣāmatīndriyārthadarśitvāt । hrasvatvasadbhāvastu bhāktavyavahāreṇa pūrvaṃ vyavasthāpita iti vidyamānatvād yogināmavaśyamitarapadārthavyāvṛttatayā grahaṇamityalam ।
analyzed: samāna kāraṇa janya tvañca samavāyi asamavāyi nimitta apekṣayā vipāka jaiḥ vyabhicarati iti na abhede hetuḥ sāmagrī apekṣayā tu samāna kāraṇa tvam asiddham kārya bhedena tad bheda upapatteḥ aṇu tva hrasva tvayoḥ tu vyavahāra parasparataḥ viśeṣaḥ tad darśinām iti yoginām pratyakṣaḥ teṣām atīndriya artha darśi tvāt hrasva tva sadbhāvaḥ tu bhākta vyavahāreṇa pūrvam vyavasthāpitaḥ iti vidyamāna tvāt yoginām avaśyam itara padārtha vyāvṛtta t

original: “etaccaturvidhamapi parimāṇamutpādyamāśrayavināśādeva vinaśyatīti”(*) । kāraṇāntarapratiṣedhārthamavadhāraṇam । utpādyagrahaṇantu nityaparimāṇavyavacchedārthamiti ।
analyzed: etat caturvidham api parimāṇam utpādyam āśraya vināśāt eva vinaśyati iti kāraṇa antara pratiṣedha artham avadhāraṇam utpādya grahaṇam tu nitya parimāṇa vyavaccheda artham iti

original: {pṛthaktvavaidharmyam}
(“pṛthaktvamapoddhāravyavahārakāraṇam । tatpunarekadravyamanekadravyañca । tasya tu nityānityatvaniṣpattayaḥ saṃkhyayā vyākhyātāḥ ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: pṛthaktvam apoddhāra vyavahāra kāraṇam tat punar eka dravyam aneka dravyam ca tasya tu nitya anitya tva niṣpattayaḥ saṃkhyayā vyākhyātāḥ pdhs

original: (“etāvāṃstu viśeṣaḥ, ekatvādivadekapṛthaktvādiṣvaparasāmānyābhāvaḥ saṃkhyayā tu viśiṣyate, tadviśiṣṭavyavahāradarśanāditi ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: etāvān tu viśeṣaḥ ekatva ādi vat ekapṛthaktva ādiṣu apara sāmānya abhāvaḥ saṃkhyayā tu viśiṣyate tad viśiṣṭa vyavahāra darśanāt iti

original: idānīmuddeśakrameṇāvasaraprāptasya pṛthaktvasya lakṣaṇaparīkṣārthaṃ “pṛthaktvamapoddhāravyavahārakāraṇam”(*) ityādiprakaraṇam । vyavahṛtirvyavahāro jñānam, vyavahriyate 'neneti vyavahāro 'bhidhānaṃ tayorhetuḥ pṛthaktvamityukte 'tiprasaṅgastadarthamapoddhāragrahaṇam । apoddharaṇamapoddhāraḥ pṛthakkaraṇam । tathāpyapoddhāravyavahārahetutvamākāśātmanorna vyāvṛttamiti viśeṣaṇatve satīti padamūhyam । pṛthaktvatvasāmānyavyavacchedārthañca dravya〈padamapī〉ti । pṛthaktvamitarebhyo bhidyate, dravyaviśeṣaṇatve sati apoddhāravyavahārakāraṇatvāt, yastvitarebhyo na bhidyate na cāsāvevam, yathā rūpādiriti । vyavahāro vā sādhyaḥ ।
analyzed: idānīm uddeśa krameṇa avasara prāptasya pṛthaktvasya lakṣaṇa parīkṣā artham pṛthaktvam apoddhāra vyavahāra kāraṇam ityādi prakaraṇam vyavahṛtiḥ vyavahāraḥ jñānam vyavahriyate nena iti vyavahāraḥ bhidhānam tayoḥ hetuḥ pṛthaktvam iti ukte tiprasaṅgaḥ tad artham apoddhāra grahaṇam apoddharaṇam apoddhāraḥ pṛthakkaraṇam tathā api apoddhāra vyavahāra hetu tvam ākāśa ātmanoḥ na vyāvṛttam iti viśeṣaṇa tve sati iti padam ūhyam pṛthaktv

original: tathā parīkṣāparañca vākyam । apoddhāravyavahāro hi viśiṣṭavyavahāraḥ । sa ca narte viśeṣaṇād bhavatīti rūpādivyavahāravilakṣaṇatvād vilakṣaṇenaiva nimittena bhavitavyam, tathā rūpādyanupalabdhau pṛthagiti vyavahāradarśanācca ।
analyzed: tathā parīkṣā param ca vākyam apoddhāra vyavahāraḥ hi viśiṣṭa vyavahāraḥ sa ca na ṛte viśeṣaṇāt bhavati iti rūpa ādi vyavahāra vilakṣaṇa tvāt vilakṣaṇena eva nimittena bhavitavyam tathā rūpa ādi anupalabdhau pṛthak iti vyavahāra darśanāt ca

original: na cedam asmātpṛthagiti vyavahāro viśeṣasambandhād bhaviṣyatīti vācyam, anityeṣu nityaviśeṣāṇāmabhāvāt । athānityeṣvasādhāraṇadharmasambandhaḥ pṛthagiti vyavahāre nimittam ? tanna, tadviśiṣṭatānupalabdheḥ । na hi pṛthagiti vyavahāre dravyarūpādikarmasāmānyātmikā asādhāraṇadharmaviśiṣṭatā pratibhāti ।
analyzed: na ca idam asmāt pṛthak iti vyavahāraḥ viśeṣa sambandhāt bhaviṣyati iti vācyam anityeṣu nitya viśeṣāṇām abhāvāt  atha anityeṣu asādhāraṇa dharma sambandhaḥ pṛthak iti vyavahāre nimittam tat na tad viśiṣṭa tā anupalabdheḥ na hi pṛthak iti vyavahāre dravya rūpa ādi karma sāmānya ātmikā asādhāraṇa dharma viśiṣṭa tā pratibhāti

original: yaccābhihitaṃ tebhyo 'rthāntaraṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ na pṛthaktvam । athetaretarābhāvastarhi nimittam । tathā hi, “idamidaṃ na bhavati”, “idamasmād vyāvṛttam, pṛthag, arthāntaram, vilakṣaṇam” iti pratyayāḥ sarvatra tannimittā eveti ? na, padārthāntarāvadhiṃ vinā ekatvādisaṃkhyāviśiṣṭasya pṛthagiti vyavahārasya tato 'rthāntaratvāt । tathā hi, itaretarābhāvaviśiṣṭo vyavahāraḥ padārthāntarāvadhitvena pravartate na caikatvādisaṃkhyānuraktaḥ । tadvilakṣaṇaścāyamityarthāntaranimittaḥ ।
analyzed: yat ca abhihitam tebhyaḥ rtha antaram viśeṣaṇam na pṛthaktvam atha itaretarābhāvaḥ tarhi nimittam tathā hi idam idam na bhavati idam asmāt vyāvṛttam pṛthak artha antaram vilakṣaṇam iti pratyayāḥ sarvatra tad nimittāḥ eva iti na padārtha antara avadhim vinā ekatva ādi saṃkhyā viśiṣṭasya pṛthak iti vyavahārasya tatas rtha antara tvāt tathā hi itaretarābhāva viśiṣṭaḥ vyavahāraḥ padārtha antara avadhi tvena pravartate na ca ekatva ādi saṃkhyā anura

original: anye tu itaretarābhāvasya pratiṣedhārthaṃ ........ nānāpratyayajanakamiti । na । anityadravyeṣu nityasya guṇasyānupalabdherāśrayavināśena tadvināśe <II,061> sarvatrānupalabdhireva syāt । anityatāyāntvaśeṣadravyāśritasyotpattikāraṇābhāvaḥ, teṣāṃ krameṇotpādāt । na cānyatra samavetamupajātamanyatra samavaitīti adarśanāt । ekasya ca nityasyānekavṛttau (dravyatva<?>)sāmānyarūpatā syāt । na ca dravyaṃ dravyamiti pratyayavat pṛthak pṛthagiti padārthāntarāvadhiṃ vinā pratyayo dṛṣṭaḥ । sāvadhikastu pratyayo guṇādiṣvapītaretarābhāvanimitto na sāmānyanibandhanaḥ । tadvilaṇaścāyamityuktam ।
analyzed: anye tu itaretara abhāvasya pratiṣedha artham nānā pratyaya janakam iti  na anitya dravyeṣu nityasya guṇasya anupalabdheḥ āśraya vināśena tad vināśe sarvatra anupalabdhiḥ eva syāt anitya tāyān tu aśeṣa dravya āśritasya utpatti kāraṇa abhāvaḥ teṣām krameṇa utpādāt na ca anyatra samavetam upajātam anyatra samavaiti iti adarśanāt ekasya ca nityasya aneka vṛttau dravya tva sāmānya rūpa tā syāt na ca dravyam dravyam iti pratyaya vat pṛthak pṛthak iti padārt

original: atha pṛthaktvapratyayā vibhinnasvabhāvāḥ saṃkhyayā viśiṣyanta iti । atha pūrvaṃ dvitvāderutpādo 'pekṣābuddhivināśena vināśopapatterna dvipṛthaktvādikāle 'vasthānam, dvipṛthaktvādeśca pūrvamutpāde dravyajñānasamakālaṃ vināśāt dvitvotpattisamakāle nāvasthānam, ato viśeṣyajñānotpattau vyāpārānupapatterdvitvāderna viśeṣaṇatvamiti ।
analyzed: atha pṛthaktva pratyayāḥ vibhinna svabhāvāḥ saṃkhyayā viśiṣyante iti atha pūrvam dvi tva ādeḥ utpādaḥ upekṣā buddhi vināśena vināśa upapatteḥ na dvi pṛthaktva ādi kāle dvi pṛthaktva ādeḥ ca pūrvam utpāde dravya jñāna sama kālam vināśāt dvi tva utpatti sama kāle na avasthānam atas viśeṣya jñāna utpattau vyāpāra anupapatteḥ dvi tva ādeḥ na viśeṣaṇa tvam iti

original: athaikasminneva kāle vibhinnapuruṣayorapekṣābuddhidvāreṇa ubhayorutpattisambhavād yuktaṃ dvitvāderviśeṣaṇatvamiti cenna । puruṣāntarabuddhisampāditasya dvitvādeḥ puruṣāntareṇāgrahaṇāt । gṛhītañca viśeṣaṇamiti, naiṣa doṣaḥ, smaryamāṇasyopalakṣaṇatvābhyupagamāt ।
analyzed: atha ekasmin eva kāle vibhinna puruṣayoḥ apekṣā buddhi dvāreṇa ubhayoḥ utpatti sambhavāt yuktam dvi tva ādeḥ viśeṣaṇa tvam iti ced na puruṣa antara buddhi sampāditasya dvi tva ādeḥ puruṣa antareṇa agrahaṇāt gṛhītam ca viśeṣaṇam iti na eṣa doṣaḥ smaryamāṇasya upalakṣaṇa tva abhyupagamāt

original: tathā hi, dvipṛthaktvotpādikāyāḥ svakāraṇāt apekṣābuddherutpattiḥ, dvitvasmaraṇasyotpadyamānatā, dvipṛthaktvasyotpadyamānatā, tato dvitvasmaraṇasyotpādaḥ, dvipṛthaktvasyotpādaḥ, apekṣābuddhervinaśyattā, dvipṛthaktvaguṇabuddherutpadyamānatetyekaḥ kālaḥ ।
analyzed: tathā hi dvi pṛthaktva utpādikāyāḥ sva kāraṇāt apekṣā buddheḥ utpattiḥ dvitva smaraṇasya utpadyamāna tā dvi pṛthaktvasya utpadyamāna tā tatas dvi tva smaraṇasya utpādaḥ dvi pṛthaktvasya utpādaḥ apekṣā buddheḥ vinaśyat tā dvi pṛthaktva guṇa buddheḥ utpadyamāna tā iti ekaḥ kālaḥ

original: tato dvitvasmaraṇasya dvipṛthaktvajñānajanakatvameveti manyamānā guṇādiṣvapi “etasmādayaṃ vyāvṛtto vilakṣaṇaḥ” ityādivyavahāraḥ pṛthaktvanimittaḥ, sa ca nirguṇatvād guṇādīnāmupacāra iti manyante । na ca pṛthagiti jñānaṃ nirviṣayaṃ vāsanāprabhavam, tasyāḥ pūrvameva pratiṣedhāt ।
analyzed: tatas dvi tva smaraṇasya dvi pṛthaktva jñāna janaka tvam eva iti manyamānāḥ guṇa ādiṣu api etasmāt ayam vyāvṛttaḥ vilakṣaṇaḥ ityādi vyavahāraḥ pṛthaktva nimittaḥ sa ca nirguṇa tvāt guṇa ādīnām upacāraḥ iti manyante na ca pṛthak iti jñānam nirviṣayam vāsanā prabhavam tasyāḥ pūrvam eva pratiṣedhāt

original: lakṣaṇena lakṣyamāṇasyaikānekatvopalabdhau saṃśaye sati tannirāsārthaṃ vibhāgamāha “tatpunarekadravyamanekadravyañca”(*) iti । ekameva dravyamāśrayo 'syetyekadravyam । anekameva ca dravyamāśrayo 'syāvinaśyada〈vastha〉dravyasyetyanekadravyam । <II,062> “tasya tu dvividhasyāpi nityānityatvaniṣpattayaḥ saṃkhyayā vyākhyātāḥ”(*) ityatideśaḥ । tathā hi, ekapṛthaktvaṃ nityeṣvaniṣpadyamānatvānnityam । kāryeṣu ca kāraṇaguṇapūrvakamāśrayavināśādāśu vinaśyatītyatideśārthaḥ । dvipṛthaktvāderdvitvādivadapekṣābuddhita utpattirvināśastu tadvināśāt । kvacidāśrayavināśācca । śatapṛthaktvādyutpattistu śatasaṃkhyotpattinyāyenetyatideśaḥ ।
analyzed: lakṣaṇena lakṣyamāṇasya eka aneka tva upalabdhau saṃśaye sati tad nirāsa artham vibhāgam āha tat punar eka dravyam aneka dravyam ca iti ekam eva dravyam āśrayaḥ sya iti eka dravyam anekam eva ca dravyam āśrayaḥ sya a vinaśyat avastha dravyasya iti aneka dravyam  / tasya tu dvividhasya api nitya anitya tva niṣpattayaḥ saṃkhyayā vyākhyātāḥ iti atideśaḥ tathā hi eka pṛthaktvam nityeṣu aniṣpadyamāna tvāt nityam kāryeṣu ca kāraṇa guṇa pūrvakam āśraya vi

original: nanvevaṃ tarhi śatasaṃkhyāto na viśeṣaḥ syādityāśaṅkyāha “etāvāṃstu viśeṣaḥ, ekatvādivadekapṛthaktvādiṣvaparasāmānyābhāvaḥ”(*) iti । yathā hi, saṃkhyātvavyatirekeṇāparamekatvādisāmānyamasti naivam ekapṛthaktvādīti ।
analyzed: nanu evam tarhi śata saṃkhyātaḥ na viśeṣaḥ syāt iti āśaṅkya āha etāvān tu viśeṣaḥ ekatva ādi vat ekapṛthaktva ādiṣu apara sāmānya abhāvaḥ iti yathā hi saṃkhyā tva vyatirekeṇa aparam ekatva ādi sāmānyam asti na evam ekapṛthaktva ādi iti

original: athānugatajñānādayuktametat, na, anyathā tadupapatteḥ । tathā hi, dravyaguṇakarmanimittamabādhyamānamanugataṃ jñānaṃ sāmānyasattāṃ darśayati । pṛthaktve ca ekatvādisaṃkhyāvaśādanugatajñānaṃ ghaṭata ityāha “saṃkhyayā tu viśiṣyate”(*) । kutaḥ ? “tadviśiṣṭavyavahāradarśanāt”(*) । idamekaṃ pṛthak, dve pṛthak, trīṇi pṛthagityādi ।
analyzed: atha anugata jñānāt ayuktam etat na anyathā tad upapatteḥ tathā hi dravya guṇa karma nimittam abādhyamānam anugatam jñānam sāmānya sattām darśayati pṛthaktve ca ekatva ādi saṃkhyā vaśāt anugata jñānam ghaṭate iti āha saṃkhyayā tu viśiṣyate kutas tad viśiṣṭa vyavahāra darśanāt idam ekam pṛthak dve pṛthak trīṇi pṛthak ityādi

original: athāśeṣadravyeṣvekamevāstu pṛthaktvaṃ saṃkhyāvad viśeṣaṇajñānatvād viśeṣaṇamapekṣate । na ca rūpādīnāmanyatamaṃ nimittaṃ, tadvyavahāravilakṣaṇatvāditi nimittāntareṇa bhavitavyamiti ।
analyzed: atha aśeṣa dravyeṣu ekam eva astu pṛthaktvam saṃkhyāvat viśeṣaṇa jñāna tvāt viśeṣaṇam apekṣate na ca rūpa ādīnām anyatamam nimittam tad vyavahāra vilakṣaṇa tvāt iti nimitta antareṇa bhavitavyam iti

original: <itaḥprabhṛti pṛthaktvaprakaraṇāntaḥ pāṭhaḥ saṃyogaprakaraṇe ādarśapustake āsīt kintu dvipṛthaktvotpādakaprakriyānirūpakatvādayaṃ granthastatrāsaṅgato dṛśyate 'to 'tra niveśito 'pi sthānabhraṣṭatvāt pāṭhabhraṣṭatvācca saṅgatirnaiva dṛśyate । sa ca vidvadbhiḥ svayaṃ yojanīyaḥ ।>
analyzed: itas prabhṛti pṛthaktva prakaraṇa antaḥ pāṭhaḥ saṃyoga prakaraṇe ādarśa pustake āsīt kintu dvi pṛthaktva utpādaka prakriyā nirūpaka tvāt ayam granthaḥ tatra asaṅgataḥ dṛśyate sthāna bhraṣṭa tvāt pāṭha bhraṣṭa tvāt ca saṅgatiḥ na eva dṛśyate sa ca vidvadbhiḥ svayam yojanīyaḥ

original: tatkriyayā guṇabuddherutpādo, dravyabuddherutpadyamānatā, dvitvasmaraṇasya vinaśyattā, apekṣābuddhervināśaḥ, dvipṛthaktvaguṇasya vinaśyattā, tato dve pṛthagiti dravyabuddherutpādaḥ, guṇabuddhervinaśyattā, dvitvasmaraṇasya vināśaḥ, apekṣābuddhivināśāt guṇasya vināśaḥ, saṃskārasyotpadyamānatā, tataḥ saṃskārād dravyabuddhervināśa iti ।
analyzed: tad kriyayā guṇa buddheḥ utpādaḥ dravya buddheḥ utpadyamāna tā dvi tva smaraṇasya vinaśyat tā apekṣā buddheḥ vināśaḥ dvi pṛthaktva guṇasya vinaśyat tā tatas dve pṛthak iti dravya buddheḥ utpādaḥ guṇa buddheḥ vinaśyat tā dvi tva smaraṇasya vināśaḥ apekṣā buddhi vināśāt guṇasya vināśaḥ saṃskārasya utpadyamāna tā tatas saṃskārāt dravya buddheḥ vināśaḥ iti

original: yad vā dvitvotpādikāyā apekṣābuddherutpādaḥ, dvitvasyotpadyamānatā, dvipṛthaktvotpādikāyāścāpekṣābuddherutpadyamānatā, tato dvitvasmaraṇasyotpādaḥ <II,063> tadbuddherutpadyamānatā, dvipṛthaktvotpādikāyāścāpekṣābuddherutpādaḥ, dvipṛthaktvasyotpadyamānatā, dvitvotpādikāyā apekṣābuddhervinaśyattā, tato dvipṛthaktvasyotpādaḥ, dvitvaguṇabuddherutpādaḥ, dvitvaguṇāttajjñānāt tadekārthasamavāyācca dvipṛthaktvaguṇabuddherutpadyamānatā, apekṣābuddhervināśaḥ, dvitvasya vinaśyattā, dvipṛthaktvotpādikāyāścāpekṣābuddhervinaśyattetyekaḥ kālaḥ ।
analyzed: yat vā dvi tva utpādikāyāḥ apekṣā buddheḥ utpādaḥ dvi tvasya utpadyamāna tā dvipṛthaktva utpādikāyāḥ ca apekṣā buddheḥ utpadyamāna tā tatas dvi tva smaraṇasya utpādaḥ tad buddheḥ utpadyamāna tā dvi pṛthaktva utpādikāyāḥ ca apekṣā buddheḥ utpādaḥ dvi pṛthaktvasya utpadyamāna tā dvi tva utpādikāyāḥ apekṣā buddheḥ vinaśyat tā tatas dvi pṛthaktvasya utpādaḥ dvi tva guṇa buddheḥ utpādaḥ dvi tva guṇāt tad jñānāt tad ekārtha

original: tato dvipṛthaktvaguṇabuddherutpādaḥ, dravyabuddherutpadyamānatā, dvitvaguṇasya vināśaḥ, tadbuddhervinaśyattā, dvipṛthaktvotpādikāyāścāpekṣābuddhervināśaḥ, dvipṛthaktvaguṇasya vinaśyattetyekaḥ kālaḥ ।
analyzed: tatas dvi pṛthaktva guṇa buddheḥ utpādaḥ dravya buddheḥ utpadyamānatā dvitva guṇasya vināśaḥ tad buddheḥ vinaśyat tā dvi pṛthaktva utpādikāyāḥ ca apekṣā buddheḥ vināśaḥ dvi pṛthaktva guṇasya vinaśyat tā iti ekaḥ kālaḥ

original: tato dve pṛthagiti dravyabuddherutpādaḥ, guṇabuddhervinaśyattā, dvipṛthaktvaguṇasya vināśaḥ, dvitvaguṇabuddheśca vināśaḥ, saṃskārasyotpadyamānatā, tataḥ saṃskārād dravyabuddhervināśa iti । atra tu vidyamānasya dvitvaguṇasya svānubhavasahakāriṇo dvipṛthaktvaguṇajñānotpattau vyāpāra iti viśeṣaḥ ।
analyzed: tatas dve pṛthak iti dravya buddheḥ utpādaḥ guṇa buddheḥ vinaśyat tā dvi pṛthaktva guṇasya vināśaḥ dvitva guṇa buddheḥ ca vināśaḥ saṃskārasya utpadyamāna tā tatas saṃskārāt dravya buddheḥ vināśaḥ iti atra tu vidyamānasya dvi tva guṇasya sva anubhava sahakāriṇaḥ dvi pṛthaktva guṇa jñāna utpattau vyāpāraḥ iti viśeṣaḥ

original: anye tvekaikaguṇālambanakā buddhirutpadyate, dvitvadvipṛthaktvayorutpadyamānateti manyante । tato dvitvadvipṛthaktvayorutpādaḥ, dvitvaguṇajñānasyotpadyamānatā, tato dvitvaguṇajñānasyotpādaḥ, dvipṛktvajñānasyotpadyamānatā, apekṣābuddhervinaśyattā, tato dvipṛthaktvaguṇajñānasyotpādaḥ, dravyajñānasyotpadyamānatā, dvitvaguṇajñānasya vinaśyattā, apekṣābuddhervināśaḥ, dvitvadvipṛthaktvayorvinaśyattā, tato dravyajñānasyotpādaḥ, dvipṛthaktvaguṇajñānasya vināśaḥ, dvitvadvipṛthaktvayorvināśaḥ, saṃskārasyotpadyamānatā, tataḥ saṃskārād dravyabuddhervināśa ityatra tu vidyamānasya dvitvaguṇasya dve pṛthagiti dravyajñānasyotpattāvapi vyāpāra iti viśeṣaḥ ।
analyzed: anye tu ekaika guṇa ālambanakā buddhiḥ utpadyate dvi tva dvi pṛthaktvayoḥ utpadyamāna tā iti manyante tatas dvi tva dvi pṛthaktvayoḥ utpādaḥ dvi tva guṇa jñānasya utpadyamāna tā tatas dvi tva guṇa jñānasya utpādaḥ dvi pṛktva jñānasya utpadyamāna tā apekṣā buddheḥ vinaśyat tā tatas dvi pṛthaktva guṇa jñānasya utpādaḥ dravya jñānasya utpadyamāna tā dvi tva guṇa jñānasya vinaśyat tā apekṣā buddheḥ vināśaḥ dvi tva dvi pṛthaktvayoḥ vin

original: atha samavetānāmeva guṇakarmasāmānyānāṃ viśeṣaṇatopalabdheḥ kathaṃ dvipṛthaktvādāvavartamānaṃ dvitvādi viśeṣaṇamiti cet, bādhakopapatterupacāreṇetyuktaṃ padārthasaṅkare । tathā ca sūtraṃ 'guṇakarmasu guṇakarmābhāvāt guṇakarmāpekṣa na vidyate <vai. sū.> iti, guṇakarmasu samavetānāṃ guṇakarmaṇāmabhāvāt tadapekṣaṃ mukhyajñānaṃ nāstīti ।
analyzed: atha samavetānām eva guṇa karma sāmānyānām viśeṣaṇatā upalabdheḥ katham dvi pṛthaktva ādau avartamānam dvi tva ādi viśeṣaṇam iti ced bādhaka upapatteḥ upacāreṇa iti uktam padārtha saṅkare tathā ca sūtram guṇa karmasu guṇa karma abhāvāt guṇa karma apekṣa na vidyate vai iti guṇa karmasu samavetānām guṇa karmaṇām abhāvāt tad apekṣam mukhya jñānam na asti iti

original: {saṃyogavaidharmyam}
analyzed: saṃyoga vaidharmyam

original: (“saṃyogaḥ saṃyuktapratyayanimittam । sa ca dravyaguṇakarmahetuḥ, dravyārambhe nirapekṣastathā bhavatīti, sāpekṣebhyo nirapekṣebhyaśceti vacanāt । guṇakarmārambhe tu sāpekṣaḥ, saṃyuktasamavāyādagnervaiśeṣikamiti vacanāt ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: saṃyogaḥ saṃyukta pratyaya nimittam sa ca dravya guṇa karma hetuḥ dravya ārambhe nirapekṣaḥ tathā bhavati iti sāpekṣebhyaḥ nirapekṣebhyaḥ ca iti vacanāt guṇa karma ārambhe tu sāpekṣaḥ saṃyukta samavāyāt agneḥ vaiśeṣikam iti vacanāt

original: idānīmuddeśavataḥ saṃyogasya lakṣaṇaparīkṣārthaṃ “saṃyogaḥ saṃyuktapratyayanimittam”(*) ityādi prakaraṇam । pratītiḥ pratyayo jñānam, pratīyate 'neneti pratyayo 'bhidhānam, tayornimittaṃ sarve 'pi padārthā iti saṃyuktagrahaṇam । tathāpi saṃyuktapratyayanimittatvamākāśātmanorvidyata iti viśeṣaṇatve satīti kāryam । ataḥ saṃyoga itarebhyo bhidyate, viśeṣaṇatve sati saṃyuktapratyayanimittatvāt, yastvitarasmādasaṃyogānna bhidyate na cāsāvevam, yathā rupādiriti । parīkṣāparatvenāpi sambadhyate saṃyogaḥ saṃyuktapratyayanimittamiti vākyam ।
analyzed: idānīm uddeśavataḥ saṃyogasya lakṣaṇa parīkṣā artham saṃyogaḥ saṃyukta pratyaya nimittam ityādi prakaraṇam pratītiḥ pratyayaḥ jñānam pratīyate nena iti pratyayaḥ bhidhānam tayoḥ nimittam sarve pi padārthāḥ iti saṃyukta grahaṇam tathā api saṃyukta pratyaya nimitta tvam ākāśa ātmanoḥ vidyate iti viśeṣaṇa tve sati iti kāryam atas saṃyogaḥ itarebhyaḥ bhidyate viśeṣaṇa tve sati saṃyukta pratyaya nimitta tvāt yaḥ tu itarasmāt asaṃyog

original: atha viśiṣṭotpādād dravyameva saṃyuktavyavahāranimittam । tathā hi, viśleṣakṣaṇāt saṃśleṣakṣaṇotpāde saṃyuktavyavahāro dṛṣṭo nānyatheti । tadasat, viśiṣṭatāyā vyatirekānabhyupagame tasyā dravyarūpatayā sarvatrāviśeṣāt dravyamātre saṃyuktapratyayaḥ syāt । vyatireke tu yena satā rūpādivilakṣaṇena saṃyukta iti vyavahāraḥ sa eva saṃyoga iti na kiñcid bādhyate, saṃśleṣasyātra saṃyogarūpatvāditi । na cāyaṃ vyavahāro vāsanānimittastasyāḥ pūrvameva pratiṣedhāt ।
analyzed: atha viśiṣṭa utpādāt dravyam eva saṃyukta vyavahāra nimittam tathā hi viśleṣa kṣaṇāt saṃśleṣa kṣaṇa utpāde saṃyukta vyavahāraḥ dṛṣṭaḥ na anyathā iti tat asat viśiṣṭa tāyāḥ vyatireka anabhyupagame tasyāḥ dravya rūpa tayā sarvatra aviśeṣāt dravya mātre saṃyukta pratyayaḥ syāt vyatireke tu yena satā rūpa ādi vilakṣaṇena saṃyuktaḥ iti vyavahāraḥ saḥ eva saṃyogaḥ iti na kiñcid bādhyate saṃśleṣasya atra saṃyoga rūpa

original: arthakriyāmāha “sa ca dravyaguṇakarmahetuḥ”(*) iti । 〈saṃyoga〉sadbhāve pramāṇañcedamiti । na hi tantusaṃyogādṛte paṭasyotpattiḥ, bherīdaṇḍasaṃyogañca vinā śabdasya, hastatomarādisaṃyogābhāve ca tomarakarmaṇa iti dṛṣṭañca ato saṃyogo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ ।
analyzed: arthakriyām āha sa ca dravya guṇa karma hetuḥ iti saṃyoga sadbhāve pramāṇam ca idam iti na hi tantu saṃyogāt ṛte paṭasya utpattiḥ bherī daṇḍa saṃyogam ca vinā śabdasya hasta tomara ādi saṃyoga abhāve ca tomara karmaṇaḥ iti dṛṣṭam ca saṃyogaḥ bhyupagantavyaḥ

original: kathaṃ punardravyārambhakatvamasyetyāha “dravyārambhe nirapekṣaḥ”(*) iti । yadyapi samavāyyādikāraṇamapekṣate tathāpyanapekṣaḥ paścādbhāvikāraṇānapekṣaṇāt । yathā ca vyākhyātametat “tathā bhavati”(*) nānyatheti । kuto jñātamiti cet ? “sāpekṣebhyo nirapekṣebhyaśceti”(*) <vai. sū.> vacanāt । asya ca sūtrasyāyamarthaḥ । pūrvamantyatantusaṃyogotpatteḥ sāpekṣāstantavaḥ paṭaṃ nārabhante । tajjātīyānāntu <II,065> paṭāntare sāmarthyāvadhāraṇādantyatantusaṃyogasampādanāyopādīyante । tadutpattau cānapekṣāstadanantaramevārabhanta iti dravyārambhe nirapekṣaḥ saṃyogaḥ । ata evāntyasaṃyogavyatirekeṇa nānyā śaktiḥ, tasyāścaramasahakārirūpatvādityuktaṃ pṛthivyadhikāre ।
analyzed: katham punar dravya ārambhaka tvam asya iti āha dravya ārambhe nirapekṣaḥ iti yadi api samavāyi ādi kāraṇam apekṣate tathā api anapekṣaḥ paścāt bhāvi kāraṇa anapekṣaṇāt yathā ca vyākhyātam etat tathā bhavati na anyathā iti kutas jñātam iti ced sāpekṣebhyaḥ nirapekṣebhyaḥ ca iti vai vacanāt  asya ca sūtrasya ayam arthaḥ pūrvam antya tantu saṃyoga utpatteḥ sāpekṣāḥ tantavaḥ paṭam na ārabhante tad jātīyānām tu paṭa antare sāmarthya avadh

original: na ca pūrvasya viraladeśakṣaṇasya vinivṛttāvaviraladeśakṣaṇasya viśiṣṭasyotpāde paṭavyavahārādalaṃ saṃyogakalpanayeti vācyam, kṣaṇabhaṅgasya pratiṣedhāt । avayavavyatiriktasya cāvayavino vyavasthāpanāditi ।
analyzed: na ca pūrvasya virala deśa kṣaṇasya vinivṛttau avirala deśa kṣaṇasya viśiṣṭasya utpāde paṭa vyavahārāt alam saṃyoga kalpanayā iti vācyam kṣaṇa bhaṅgasya pratiṣedhāt avayava vyatiriktasya ca avayavinaḥ vyavasthāpanāt iti

original: “guṇakarmārambhe tu sāpekṣaḥ”(*) paścādbhāvinimittāpekṣatvāditi । kathaṃ jñāyata ityāha ““saṃyuktasamavāyādagnervaiśeṣikam” <vai. sū.> iti vacanāt”(*) asyārthaḥ, saṃyuktaḥ pārthivena paramāṇunāgnistatra samavāyādagneḥ sambandhinaṃ vaiśeṣikaguṇamuṣṇasparśamapekṣamāṇaḥ pārthivaparamāṇvagnisaṃyogaḥ pākajānārabhate । agneḥ sambandhinamuṣṇasparśamapekṣamāṇo vaiśeṣikaṃ rūpādikamārabhate ।
analyzed: guṇa karma ārambhe tu sāpekṣaḥ paścāt bhāvi nimitta apekṣa tvāt iti katham jñāyate iti āha saṃyukta samavāyāt agneḥ vaiśeṣikam vai iti vacanāt asya arthaḥ saṃyuktaḥ pārthivena paramāṇunā agniḥ tatra samavāyāt agneḥ sambandhinam vaiśeṣika guṇam uṣṇa sparśam apekṣamāṇaḥ pārthiva paramāṇu agni saṃyogaḥ pāka jān ārabhate agneḥ sambandhinam uṣṇa sparśam apekṣamāṇaḥ vaiśeṣikam rūpa ādikam ārabhate  /

original: nanūṣṇasparśasya cirotpādānna paścādbhāvitvamasti, pūrvotpannakārakāpekṣitvaṃ dravyārambhe saṃyogasyeṣyata evetyaviśeṣaḥ syāt ? na, śyāmādinivṛttiviśiṣṭasya paścādbhāvāt । tathā hastātmasaṃyogaḥ paścādbhāvinaṃ prayatnamapekṣamāṇo haste karmārabhate ।
analyzed: nanu uṣṇa sparśasya cira utpādāt na paścādbhāvi tvam asti pūrva utpanna kāraka apekṣi tvam dravya ārambhe saṃyogasya iṣyate eva iti aviśeṣaḥ syāt na śyāma ādini vṛtti viśiṣṭasya paścādbhāvāt tathā hasta ātma saṃyogaḥ paścādbhāvinam prayatnam apekṣamāṇaḥ haste karma ārabhate

original: nanvevamapi ātmamanaḥsaṃyogasya buddhyādyutpattau na paścādbhāvinimittamasti, śarīrasambandha iti cet, na, tasya paścādbhāvānupapatteḥ । yadyapi saṃhārāvasthāyāmātmamanaḥsambandhasadbhāve 'pi na jñānam, śarīrasambandhe tu bhavati । tathāpi śukraśoṇitasambandhasamakālaṃ manaḥsambandhābhyupagamādavaśyaṃ prāktanasaṃyogasya nivṛttiriti na tadapekṣayā śarīrasambandhaścaramabhāvī । pariniṣpaṇṇe 'pi ca śarīre manasaḥ kriyādvāreṇa sambandhāt tathā śarīrasyāpi bhavatīti na tatra pūrvāparabhāve pramāṇamastīti ।
analyzed: nanu evam api ātma manaḥ saṃyogasya buddhi ādi utpattau na paścāt bhāvi nimittam asti śarīra sambandhaḥ iti ced na tasya paścādbhāva anupapatteḥ  yadi api saṃhāra avasthāyām ātma manaḥ sambandha sadbhāve pi na jñānam śarīra sambandhe tu bhavati tathā api śukra śoṇita sambandha sama kālam manaḥ sambandha abhyupagamāt avaśyam prāktana saṃyogasya nivṛttiḥ iti na tad apekṣayā śarīra sambandhaḥ carama bhāvī pariniṣpaṇṇe ca śarīre manasaḥ kriyā

original: na caivamātmamanaḥsambandhasyānapekṣitvameva, sukhaduḥkhādīnāṃ nimittakāraṇānāṃ taduttarakāle bhāvāt । tathā hi, icchotpattāvātmamanaḥsambandhasya sukhaṃ smaraṇaṃ vā paścādbhāvitvādapekṣākāraṇam, evaṃ dveṣādyutpattāvapi duḥkhādeḥ <II,066> kāraṇatvamabhyūhyam । śarīrasambandhasya tu niyamena paścādbhāvitvaṃ niṣidhyate, na kāraṇatvamiti । evaṃ karmotpattāvapi saṃyogasya na sarvatra caramabhāvinimi(ttaṃ)<?>〈ttatvaṃ〉 sambhavatīti । tathā śākhādāvupari pāṣāṇādisaṃyogād gurutvāpekṣādadhogamanam, nadīsrotasi ca dravatvāpekṣāt tṛṇodakasaṃyogāt tṛṇādau gamanañca gurutvadravatvayoḥ paścādbhāvitvamastīti ।
analyzed: na ca evam ātma manaḥ sambandhasya anapekṣi tvam eva sukha duḥkha ādīnām nimitta kāraṇānām tad uttarakāle bhāvāt tathā hi icchā utpattau ātma manaḥ sambandhasya sukham smaraṇam vā paścādbhāvi tvāt apekṣā kāraṇam evam dveṣa ādi utpattau api duḥkha ādeḥ kāraṇa tvam abhyūhyam śarīra sambandhasya tu niyamena paścādbhāvi tvam niṣidhyate na kāraṇa tvam iti evam karma utpattau api saṃyogasya na sarvatra carama bhāvi nimittaṃtta tvam sambhavati iti tat

original: nanvevaṃ tarhi “guṇakarmārambhe sāpekṣaḥ” ityayuktaṃ vākyam ? na, ayogavyavacchedānabhyupagamāt । tathā ca guṇakarmārambha eva sāpekṣo na tu sāpekṣa eva, anapekṣitatvasyāpyupalabdheḥ ।
analyzed: nanu evam tarhi guṇa karma ārambhe sāpekṣaḥ iti ayuktam vākyam na ayoga vyavaccheda anabhyupagamāt tathā ca guṇa karma ārambhaḥ eva sāpekṣaḥ na tu sāpekṣaḥ eva anapekṣita tvasya api upalabdheḥ

original: (“atha kathaṃlakṣaṇaḥ katividhaśceti ? aprāptayoḥ prāptiḥ saṃyogaḥ । sa ca trividhaḥ । anyatarakarmajaḥ, ubhayakarmajaḥ, saṃyogajaśca । tatrānyatarakarmajaḥ kriyāvatā niṣkriyasya, yathā sthāṇoḥ śyenena, vibhūnāñca mūrtaiḥ । ubhayakarmajo viruddhadikkriyayoḥ sannipātaḥ, yathā mallayormeṣayorvā । saṃyogajastu utpannamātrasya cirotpannasya vā akriyasya kāraṇasaṃyogibhirakāraṇaiḥ kāraṇākāraṇasaṃyogapūrvakaḥ kāryākāryagataḥ saṃyogaḥ । sa caikasmād dvābhyāṃ bahubhyaśca bhavati । ekasmāt tāvat tantuvīraṇasaṃyogāt dvitantukavīraṇasaṃyogaḥ dvābhyāṃ tantvākāśasaṃyogābhyāmeko dvitantukākāśasaṃyogaḥ । bahubhyaśca tantuturīsaṃyogebhya ekaḥ paṭaturīsaṃyogaḥ ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: atha kathaṃlakṣaṇaḥ katividhaḥ ca iti aprāptayoḥ prāptiḥ saṃyogaḥ sa ca trividhaḥ anyatara karma jaḥ ubhaya karma jaḥ saṃyoga jaḥ ca  tatra anyatara karma jaḥ kriyāvatā niṣkriyasya yathā sthāṇoḥ śyenena mūrtaiḥ ubhaya karma jaḥ viruddha diś kriyayoḥ sannipātaḥ yathā mallayoḥ meṣayoḥ vā saṃyoga jaḥ tu utpanna mātrasya cira utpannasya vā akriyasya kāraṇa saṃyogibhiḥ akāraṇaiḥ kāraṇa akāraṇa saṃyoga pūrvakaḥ kārya akā

original: “atha kathaṃlakṣaṇaḥ katividhaśceti”(*) vākyaṃ lakṣaṇasya nirṇītatvād vyartham ? na, lakṣaṇāntarābhidhitsayā asyopapatteḥ । yadyapyupasarjanasya prāk lakṣaṇamuktam, tathāpi svātantryeṇa kathamasya lakṣaṇamityāśaṅkā bhavatyeva । parīkṣāparameva tadvākyamiti anye । yad vā viparyasto 'yaṃ kathaṃlakṣaṇamasyeti, na sambhavatyeva saṃyogasya lakṣaṇamiti manyante ।
analyzed: atha kathaṃlakṣaṇaḥ katividhaḥ ca iti vākyam lakṣaṇasya nirṇīta tvāt vyartham na lakṣaṇa antara abhidhitsayā asya upapatteḥ yadi api upasarjanasya prāk lakṣaṇam uktam tathā api svātantryeṇa katham asya lakṣaṇam iti āśaṅkā bhavati eva parīkṣā param eva tat vākyam iti anye yat vā viparyastaḥ yam kathaṃlakṣaṇam asya iti na sambhavati eva saṃyogasya lakṣaṇam iti manyante

original: katividhaśceti bhedārthaṃ praśnaḥ । tatra lakṣaṇamāha “aprāptayoḥ prāptiḥ saṃyogaḥ”(*) iti । prāptiḥ samavāyo 'pi bhavatītyaprāptayoriti padam । paryāyaśabdasya ca lakṣaṇa〈tva〉miṣṭameva । sa ca pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyata iti na saṃyogasyāsambhavena lakṣaṇasyāśrayāsiddhatvamiti ।
analyzed: katividhaḥ ca iti bheda artham praśnaḥ tatra lakṣaṇam āha aprāptayoḥ prāptiḥ saṃyogaḥ iti prāptiḥ samavāyaḥ u pi bhavati iti aprāptayoḥ iti padam paryāya śabdasya ca lakṣaṇa tvam iṣṭam eva sa ca pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyate iti na saṃyogasya asambhavena lakṣaṇasya āśraya asiddha tvam iti

original: “sa ca trividhaḥ”(*) iti bhedapratipādanaṃ sāmānyalakṣṇasyāsambhavitvaparihārārtham । kena rūpeṇa traividhyamityāha “anyatarakarmaja ubhayakarmajaḥ saṃyogajaśca”(*) saṃyoga iti । tatrānyatarasmin karma tasmājjāto 'nyatarakarmajaḥ । “yathā sthāṇoḥ śyenena”(*) iti । “vibhūnāñca mūrtaiḥ”(*) ityudāharaṇadvayamavāntaraviśeṣavivakṣayā । tathā hi, śyenasthāṇusaṃyogaḥ karmaṇā saṃyogena ca janyate । vibhūnāntu paramāṇubhiḥ saṃyogaḥ karmaṇaiveti । saṃyogakarmaṇośca vyāpārāviśeṣe 'pi karmaṇaiva vyapadeśaḥ saṃgrahārtham । anyatarakarmajatvamubhayatrāpyastītyavabodha(ḥ)〈<?>nāya〉 ।
analyzed: sa ca trividhaḥ iti bheda pratipādanam sāmānya lakṣṇasya asambhavi tva parihāra artham kena rūpeṇa traividhyam iti āha anyatara karma jaḥ ubhaya karma jaḥ saṃyoga jaḥ ca saṃyogaḥ iti tatra anyatarasmin karma tasmāt jātaḥ nyatara karma jaḥ yathā sthāṇoḥ śyenena iti vibhūnām ca mūrtaiḥ iti udāharaṇa dvayam avāntara viśeṣa vivakṣayā tathā hi śyena sthāṇu saṃyogaḥ karmaṇā saṃyogena ca janyate    tu paramāṇubhiḥ saṃyogaḥ karmaṇā eva

original: nanvevaṃ saṃyogajaḥ karmajaśceti vācyam, tadviśeṣatvādanyeṣāmiti । satyam । tathāpi karmajasyaitāvāneva bheda iti parisaṃkhyārthamanyatarādigrahaṇam, na saṃyogasya kāraṇatvapratiṣedhārthaparam । tathā ca prayatnāpekṣācchyenacaraṇasaṃyogāccaraṇakriyāyā utpādaḥ, vibhāgasyotpadyamānatā, śyenāvayavinyasvakāraṇāt kriyāyā utpadyamānatā, tataḥ śyenacaraṇavibhāgasyotpādaḥ, saṃyogasya vinaśyattā, śyenāvayavikarmaṇo 'pyutpādaḥ, vibhāgasyotpadyamānatā, tataḥ śyenacaraṇasaṃyogasya vināśaḥ, uttarasaṃyogasyotpadyamānatā, śyenāvayavivibhāgasyotpādaḥ, śyenāvayavikarmaṇā ca śyenasthāṇusaṃyogo janyate, pratyāsannatve satyubhayoḥ sāmarthyāvadhāraṇāt । ataḥ śyenasthāṇvoḥ samavāyikāraṇatvam, śyenakriyāyāstaccaraṇasthāṇusaṃyogasya cāsamavāyikāraṇatvam । pratyāsattistu śyenacaraṇasaṃyogasya mahatyapi sambhavatītyanyatarāvarodhe na viśeṣaheturastīti vakṣyāmaḥ ।
analyzed: nanu evam saṃyoga jaḥ karma jaḥ ca iti vācyam tad viśeṣa tvāt anyeṣām iti satyam tathā api karma jasya etāvān eva bhedaḥ iti parisaṃkhyā artham anyatara ādi grahaṇam na saṃyogasya kāraṇa tva pratiṣedha artha param tathā ca prayatna apekṣāt śyena caraṇa saṃyogāt caraṇa kriyāyāḥ utpādaḥ vibhāgasya utpadyamāna tā śyena avayavinī a sva kāraṇāt kriyāyāḥ utpadyamāna tā tatas śyena caraṇa vibhāgasya utpādaḥ saṃyogasya vinaśyat tā śyena

original: ubhayakarmajo 'pyubhayoḥ karmaṇī tābhyāṃ jātaḥ । “yathā mallayormeṣayorvā”(*) । atrāpyavayavakarmabhyāṃ vibhāgasamakālamavayavinaḥ karmābhyupagame saṃyogairavayavikarmabhyāñca saṃyogo janyata iti cintyam । yathā hyavayavakarma avayavāntareṇa saṃyogaṃ karoti, evaṃ tadavayavināpi itarāvayavakarmāpi, itarāvayavakarmasaṃyogavat tadavayavināpīti, saṃyogatritayam । tacca pratyāsannatve sati sāmarthyāvadhāraṇāt kāraṇamiti । meṣayoḥ samavāyikāraṇatvam । <atraiva dvipṛthaktvotpādakaprakriyāpāṭho mātṛkāyāmāsīt> saṃyuktapratyaye hi <II,068> viśeṣyāvayavāvayavisaṃyogasya cāsamavāyikāraṇatvam, śeṣaṃ nimittakāraṇamiti । kevalobhayakarmajatvañca paramāṇudvayasaṃyogasya draṣṭavyam ।
analyzed: ubhaya karma jaḥ upi ubhayoḥ karmaṇī tābhyām jātaḥ yathā mallayoḥ meṣayoḥ vā atra api avayava karmabhyām vibhāga sama kālam avayavinaḥ karma abhyupagame saṃyogaiḥ avayavi karmabhyām ca saṃyogaḥ janyate iti cintyam yathā hi avayava karma avayava antareṇa saṃyogam karoti evam tad avayavinā api itara avayava karma api itara avayava karma saṃyoga vat tad avayavinā api iti saṃyoga tritayam tat ca pratyāsanna tve sati sāmarthya avadhāraṇāt kāraṇam iti meṣay

original: anye tu ubhayapadasya luptavibhaktikasya pūrvottareṇa sambandhāt saṃyogakarmajabhedasyāpi grahaṇaṃ bhaviṣyatyeveti manyante । tathā hi, saṃyogakāraṇatvenobhayorupalambhāt karmaṇaḥ svaśabdenopādāne anyataraḥ saṃyogo labhyata eva । anyataraśca karma cānyatarakarmaṇī tābhyāṃ jāto 'nyatarakarmajaḥ । sa cobhaya ekena karmaṇā saṅgatya dvitīyena janyate । dvābhyāñca saṃyogaḥ sadvitīyābhyāmiti । tathobhayaḥ kevalakarmajo 'pyekena karmaṇā janyate dvābhyāñceti । “saṃyogajastu utpannamātrasya cirotpannasya vā”(*) ityubhayaḥ । tasya lakṣaṇamāha “akriyasya”(*) ityādi ।
analyzed: anye tu ubhaya padasya lupta vibhaktikasya pūrvottareṇa sambandhāt saṃyoga karma ja bhedasya api grahaṇam bhaviṣyati eva iti manyante tathā hi saṃyoga kāraṇa tvena ubhayoḥ upalambhāt karmaṇaḥ sva śabdena upādāne anyataraḥ saṃyogaḥ labhyate eva anyataraḥ ca karma ca anyatara karmaṇī tābhyām jātaḥ nyatara karma jaḥ sa ca ubhayaḥ ekena karmaṇā saṅgatya dvitīyena janyate dvābhyām ca saṃyogaḥ sa dvitīyābhyām iti tathā ubhayaḥ kevala karma jaḥ pi

original: akriyasyetyayaṃ niyamaḥ । kaiḥ sahetyāha “akāraṇaiḥ”(*) । kiṃviśiṣṭaiḥ ? “kāraṇasaṃyogibhiḥ”(*) iti । kāraṇena saṃyogāste yeṣāṃ tāni tathoktāni, taiḥ kāraṇasaṃyogibhirakāraṇaiḥ saha akriyasya yaḥ saṃyogaḥ sa saṃyogajo 'nyasya kāraṇa〈syā〉bhāvāt ।
analyzed: akriyasya iti ayam niyamaḥ kaiḥ saha iti āha akāraṇaiḥ kiṃviśiṣṭaiḥ kāraṇa saṃyogibhiḥ iti kāraṇena saṃyogāḥ te yeṣām tāni tathā uktāni taiḥ kāraṇa saṃyogibhiḥ akāraṇaiḥ saha akriyasya yaḥ saṃyogaḥ sa saṃyoga jaḥ nyasya kāraṇasya abhāvāt

original: saṃgrahoktervivaraṇamāha “kāraṇākāraṇasaṃyogapūrvakaḥ kāryākāryagataḥ saṃyogaḥ”(*) iti । kāraṇamatra samavāyikāraṇam, svakāryasya tadapekṣayānyadakāraṇam । tayoryaḥ saṃyogastatpūrvakaḥ kāryākāryagataḥ saṃyogaḥ । prakṛtasya kāraṇasya yat kāryaṃ tatsaṃyuktañcānyadakāryaṃ tayoḥ saṃyogaja iti । tatra cirotpannasyodāharaṇaṃ vibhāgajavibhāgāvasare vakṣyamāṇamityutpannamātrasya vibhāgadvāreṇodāharaṇamāha “sa caikasmāt”(*) ityādi । sa ca saṃyogajasaṃyogaḥ, “ekasmād dvābhyāṃ bahubhyaśca”(*) । “ca” śabdādekasmād dvau iti vibhāgaḥ ।
analyzed: saṃgraha ukteḥ vivaraṇam āha kāraṇa akāraṇa saṃyoga pūrvakaḥ kārya akārya gataḥ saṃyogaḥ iti kāraṇam atra samavāyi kāraṇam sva kāryasya tad apekṣayā anyat akāraṇam tayoḥ yaḥ saṃyogaḥ tad pūrvakaḥ kārya akārya gataḥ saṃyogaḥ prakṛtasya kāraṇasya yat kāryam tat saṃyuktam ca anyat akāryam tayoḥ saṃyoga jaḥ iti tatra cira utpannasya udāharaṇam vibhāga ja vibhāga avasare vakṣyamāṇam iti utpanna mātrasya vibhāga dvāreṇa udā

original: “ekasmāttāvat tantuvīraṇasaṃyogāt dvitantukavīraṇasaṃyogaḥ”(*) iti । tathā hi, tantorvīraṇena saṃsṛṣṭasya tantvantareṇābhisambandhe sati dvitantukamutpadyate । tasya ca rūpādyutpattisamakālaṃ vīraṇena saṃyogo janyata iti tadutpattāvasamavāyikāraṇamanveṣaṇīyam । na cātra kriyā sambhavati, ubhayorniṣkriyatvāt । rūpādīnāñca svakāryotpattāveva sāmarthyāvadhāraṇāt । <II,069> asamavāyikāraṇañca vinā vastubhūtasya kāryasyotpattirnopalabdheti tantuvīraṇasaṃyoga eva samānajātīyatve sati pratyāsannatvādasamavāyikāraṇamiti । pratyāsattistu kāryaikārthasamavāyaḥ kāraṇaikārthasamavāyaścetyubhayarūpā na sambhavatyeveti, kāryaikārthasamavāyasyaiva grahaṇaṃ kāraṇenāvyavadhānāditi kecit । mahatī tu yatra kāraṇavṛttīnāmeva kārye guṇārambhakatvaṃ tatraiva grāhyeti ।
analyzed: ekasmāt tāvat tantu vīraṇa saṃyogāt dvi tantuka vīraṇa saṃyogaḥ iti tathā hi tantoḥ vīraṇena saṃsṛṣṭasya tantu antareṇa abhisambandhe sati dvi tantukam utpadyate tasya ca rūpa ādi utpatti sama kālam vīraṇena saṃyogaḥ janyate iti tad utpattau asamavāyi kāraṇam anveṣaṇīyam na ca atra kriyā sambhavati ubhayoḥ niṣkriya tvāt rūpa ādīnām ca sva kārya utpattau eva sāmarthya avadhāraṇāt    asamavāyi kāraṇam ca vinā vastu bhūtasya kāryasya utp

original: na caikasyārambhakatve “guṇāśca guṇāntaramārabhante” <vai. sū. ...> iti sūtravirodhaḥ । kāraṇavṛttīnāṃ samānajātyārambhakatvameva niyamāt । tathā hi, ye kāraṇavṛttayaḥ samānajātīyamevārabhante teṣāmanekatvasaṃkhyāyuktānāmevārambhakatvamiti niyamaḥ । tadevaṃ dvitantukavīraṇayoḥ samavāyikāraṇatvam, tantuvīraṇasaṃyogasyāsamavāyikāraṇatvam । śeṣaṃ nimittakāraṇamiti ।
analyzed: na ca ekasya ārambhaka tve guṇāḥ ca guṇa antaram ārabhante vai iti sūtra virodhaḥ kāraṇa vṛttīnām samāna jāti ārambhaka tvam eva niyamāt tathā hi ye kāraṇa vṛttayaḥ samāna jātīyam eva ārabhante teṣām aneka tva saṃkhyā yuktānām eva ārambhaka tvam iti niyamaḥ tat evam dvi tantuka vīraṇayoḥ samavāyi kāraṇa tvam tantu vīraṇa saṃyogasya asamavāyi kāraṇa tvam śeṣam nimitta kāraṇam iti

original: dvitantukavīraṇasaṃyogasyotpattiḥ “dvābhyāṃ tantvākāśasaṃyogābhyā〈meko〉 dvitantukākāśasaṃyogaḥ”(*) iti । tantorākāśasambaddhasya tantvantareṇābhisambandhe sati dvitantukamutpadyate । tantukriyā ca tantvantareṇeva cākāśadeśenāpi saṃyogaṃ karoti, pratibandhakābhāvāt । utpanne tu dvitantuke rūpādyutpattisamakālamākāśenāpi saṃyogo bhavatyeva । kimatra pramāṇamiti cet, anumānam ।
analyzed: dvi tantuka vīraṇa saṃyogasya utpattiḥ dvābhyām tantu ākāśa saṃyogābhyām ekaḥ dvi tantuka ākāśa saṃyogaḥ iti tantoḥ ākāśa sambaddhasya tantu antareṇa abhisambandhe sati dvi tantukam utpadyate tantu kriyā ca tantu antareṇa iva ca ākāśa deśena api saṃyogam karoti pratibandhaka abhāvāt utpanne tu dvi tantuke rūpa ādi utpatti sama kālam ākāśena api saṃyogaḥ bhavati eva  kim atra pramāṇam iti ced anumānam

original: tathā hi, dvitantukaṃ svakāraṇasaṃyoginā saṃyujyate, tatsaṃyuktakāraṇakāryatvāt, vīraṇasaṃyuktadvitantukavat । ākāśaṃ vā, svasaṃyuktakāraṇakāryeṇa saṃyujyate, tatkāraṇasaṃyogitvāt, dvitantukasaṃyuktavīraṇavat । siddhe ca saṃyoge tasya kāryatvādutpattikāraṇaṃ cintyam । tatra dvitantukākāśayoḥ samavāyikāraṇatvamiti anyenāsamavāyikāraṇena bhavitavyam । na ca rūpādyutpattisamakālaṃ dvitantuke kriyā sambhavatīti tantvākāśasaṃyogayoḥ samānajātīyatve sati pratyāsannatvādasamavāyikāraṇatvamiti । pratyāsattistūbhayarūpāpi sambhavatīti pūrvavad grāhyā ।
analyzed: tathā hi dvi tantukam sva kāraṇa saṃyoginā saṃyujyate tat saṃyukta kāraṇa kārya tvāt vīraṇa saṃyukta dvi tantuka vat  / ākāśam vā sva saṃyukta kāraṇa kāryeṇa saṃyujyate tat kāraṇa saṃyogi tvāt dvi tantuka saṃyukta vīraṇa vat  / siddhe ca saṃyoge tasya kārya tvāt utpatti kāraṇam cintyam tatra dvi tantuka ākāśayoḥ samavāyi kāraṇa tvam iti anyena asamavāyi kāraṇena bhavitavyam na ca rūpa ādi utpatti sama kālam dvi tantuke kriyā sambhavati i

original: “bahubhyaśca tantuturīsaṃyogebhya ekaḥ paṭaturīsaṃyogaḥ”(*) tantūnāṃ turyā saha saṃyoge sati antyatantusaṃyogānantaraṃ paṭa utpadyate । tasya tatpaṭādyutpattisamakālaṃ turyā saha saṃyogo gṛhyate ityutpattikāraṇaṃ vācyam । tatra paṭaturyoḥ <II,070> samavāyikāraṇatvamanyasyāsamavāyikāraṇasyānupalabdhestantuturīsaṃyogānāmasamavāyikāraṇatvam । pratyāsattistu pūrvavad vācyeti ।
analyzed: bahubhyaḥ ca tantu turī saṃyogebhyaḥ ekaḥ paṭa turī saṃyogaḥ tantūnām turyā saha saṃyoge sati antya tantu saṃyoga anantaram paṭaḥ utpadyate tasya tad paṭa ādi utpatti samakālam turyā saha saṃyogaḥ gṛhyate iti utpatti kāraṇam vācyam tatra paṭa turyoḥ samavāyi kāraṇa tvam anyasya asamavāyi kāraṇasya anupalabdheḥ tantu turī saṃyogānām asamavāyi kāraṇa tvam pratyāsattiḥ tu pūrvavat vācyā iti

original: nanu cāyuktametat, tantūnāṃ paṭotpattāvakāraṇatvāt । kāraṇākāraṇasaṃyogapūrvakaśca kāryākāryagataḥ saṃyogaḥ saṃyogaja iti tantostantvantareṇābhisambandhe sati dvitantukamutpadyate । punastantvantareṇābhisambandhe 'nyat kāryam ityanekakāryavyavadhānena paṭotpatteḥ kathaṃ tantūnāṃ paṭotpattau kāraṇatvam ? na, ārabdhakāryasyaiva sahakāryantaraprāptāvārambhakatve sati ārabhyārambhakavādaḥ syāt, tatra ca mūrtānāṃ samānāsamānadeśatvam । tathā hi, tantubhyāmārabdhaṃ tantvorvartate । punaranyasahitābhyāmārabdhaṃ tayostatra cetyevamuttarottareṣvapyūhyam ।
analyzed: nanu ca ayuktam etat tantūnām paṭa utpattau akāraṇa tvāt kāraṇa akāraṇa saṃyoga pūrvakaḥ ca kārya akārya gataḥ saṃyogaḥ saṃyoga jaḥ iti tantoḥ tantu antareṇa abhisambandhe sati dvi tantukam utpadyate punar tantu antareṇa abhisambandhe kāryam iti aneka kārya vyavadhānena paṭa utpatteḥ katham tantūnām paṭa utpattau kāraṇa tvam na ārabdha kāryasya eva sahakāri antara prāptau ārambhaka tve sati ārabhya ārambhaka vādaḥ syāt tatra ca mūrtānām samā

original: athānyasahitābhyāmārabdhamekasminneva vartata ityekadravyavṛttitvaṃ syāt, “iha tantuṣu paṭaḥ” iti pratyayābhāvaśca । tadvināśe cāvāntarakāryānupalambhaḥ, śeṣañca ārabhyārambhakavāde dūṣaṇaṃ pṛthivyadhikāre jñeyam । tasmād vyomādisambandhādavayavakriyādvāreṇāvāntarakāryavināśe tantvantarābhisambandhakālamavasthitasaṃyogāstantavaḥ punaḥ kāryāntaramārabhanta ityeṣa nyāyastāvad yāvadantyatantusaṃyogāt paṭotpattiriti ।
analyzed: atha anya sahitābhyām ārabdham ekasmin eva vartate iti eka dravya vṛtti tvam syāt iha tantuṣu paṭaḥ iti pratyaya abhāvaḥ ca tad vināśe ca avāntara kārya anupalambhaḥ śeṣaḥ ca ārabhya ārambhaka vāde dūṣaṇam pṛthivī adhikāre jñeyam tasmāt vyoma ādi sambandhāt avayava kriyā dvāreṇa avāntara kārya vināśe tantu antara abhisambandha kālam avasthita saṃyogāḥ tantavaḥ punar kārya antaram ārabhante iti eṣa nyāyaḥ tāvat yāvat antya tantu saṃyogāt

original: na cāvāntarakāryotpattivaiyarthyam, tadantareṇābhipretakāryānutpatteḥ । yathā hi, viśiṣṭasthānaprāptirnāvāntarasthānaprāptiṃ vinā sampadyata ityakāraṇatve 'pi tatsadbhāvaḥ, tadvadavāntarakāryaṃ vinābhipretakāryaṃ na sampadyata iti, tasmāt tatsadbhāvo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ । kāraṇatvantu niṣidhyate tadapāye 'pyutpatterityalam ।
analyzed: na ca avāntara kārya utpatti vaiyarthyam tad antareṇa abhipreta kārya anutpatteḥ yathā hi viśiṣṭa sthāna prāptiḥ na avāntara sthāna prāptim vinā sampadyate iti akāraṇa tve pi tad sadbhāvaḥ tadvat avāntara kāryam vinā abhipreta kāryam na sampadyate iti tasmāt tad sadbhāvaḥ bhyupagantavyaḥ kāraṇa tvantu niṣidhyate tad apāye pi utpatteḥ iti alam

original: (“ekasmācca dvayorutpattiḥ । katham ? yadā pārthivāpyayoraṇvoḥ saṃyoge satyanyena pārthivena pārthivasya anyenāpyena cāpyasya yugapat saṃyogau bhavatastadā tābhyāṃ saṃyogābhyāṃ pārthivāpye dvyaṇuke yugapadārabhyete । tato yasmin kāle dvyaṇukayoḥ kāraṇaguṇapūrvakrameṇa rūpādyutpattistasminneva kāle itaretarakāraṇākāraṇagatāt saṃyogāditaretarakāryākāryagatau <II,071> saṃyogau yugapadutpadyete । kiṃ kāraṇam ? kāraṇasaṃyoginā hi akāraṇena kāryamavaśyaṃ saṃyujyata iti nyāyaḥ । ataḥ pārthivadvyaṇukaṃ kāraṇasaṃyoginā āpyenāṇunā sambadhyate । āpyamapi dvyaṇukaṃ kāraṇasaṃyoginā pārthiveneti । atha dvyaṇukayoritaretarakāraṇākāraṇasambaddhayoḥ kathaṃ parasparataḥ sambandha iti ? tayorapi saṃyogajābhyāṃ saṃyogābhyāṃ sambandha iti ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: ekasmāt ca dvayoḥ utpattiḥ katham yadā pārthiva āpyayoḥ aṇvoḥ saṃyoge sati anyena pārthivena pārthivasya anyena āpyena ca apyasya yugapad saṃyogau bhavataḥ tadā tābhyām saṃyogābhyām pārthiva āpye dvyaṇuke yugapad ārabhyete tatas yasmin kāle dvyaṇukayoḥ kāraṇa guṇa pūrva krameṇa rūpa ādi utpattiḥ tasmin eva kāle itaretara kāraṇa akāraṇa gatāt saṃyogāt itaretara kārya akārya gatau saṃyogau yugapad utpadyete  / kim kāraṇam kāraṇa saṃyo

original: athaikasmāt saṃyogād dvayoḥ saṃyogayorutpattiḥ kathamityāha “yadā pārthivāpyayoraṇvoḥ saṃyoge satyanyena pārthivena paramāṇunā saha pārthivasya, 〈anyena〉 āpyena cāpyasya yugapat saṃyogau bhavatastadā”(*) tābhyāṃ samānajātīyadravyasambandhāt “pārthivāpye dvyaṇuke yugapadārabhyete”(*) । tato dvyaṇukotpādānantaraṃ yasminneva kāle kāraṇaguṇapūrvaprakrameṇa dvyaṇukayo rūpādyutpattiḥ “tasminneva kāle itaretarakāraṇākāraṇagatāt saṃyogāditaretarakāryākāryagatau saṃyogau yugapadutpadyete”(*) । itaraḥ paramāṇuḥ kāraṇaṃ svakāryasya, itaro 'kāraṇaṃ tadapekṣayā । evamanyo 'pīti । tadgatāt tatsamavetāt saṃyogāditaretarakāryākāryagatau, itarat pārthivaṃ dvyaṇukaṃ kāryaṃ svakāraṇasya, itaraścāpyaparamāṇurakāryaḥ, tathetaradāpyaṃ dvyaṇukaṃ kāryamitaraśca pārthivaparamāṇurakāryaḥ, tadgatau saṃyogau yugapadutpadyete । tatra ca dvyaṇukaparamāṇvoḥ samavāyikāraṇatvamiti anyadasamavāyikāraṇaṃ cintyam । na cātra kriyā sambhavati, ubhayorniṣkriyatvāditi paramāṇvoḥ saṃyogaḥ pratyāsannatve sati sāmarthyāvadhāraṇāt kāraṇamiti ।
analyzed: atha ekasmāt saṃyogāt dvayoḥ saṃyogayoḥ utpattiḥ katham iti āha yadā pārthiva āpyayoḥ aṇvoḥ saṃyoge sati anyena pārthivena paramāṇunā saha pārthivasya anyena āpyena ca apyasya yugapad saṃyogau bhavataḥ tadā tābhyām samāna jātīya dravya sambandhāt pārthiva āpye dvyaṇuke yugapad ārabhyete tatas dvyaṇuka utpāda anantaram yasmin eva kāle kāraṇa guṇa pūrva prakrameṇa dvyaṇukayoḥ rūpa ādi utpattiḥ tasmin eva kāle itaretara kāraṇa akāraṇa g

original: atha pārthivadvyaṇukasya āpyenāṇunā saṃyogaḥ, tathā āpyasya pāthiveneti kiṃ kāraṇam, kiṃ pramāṇamityāha “kāraṇasaṃyoginā hi akāraṇena kāryamavaśyaṃ saṃyujyata iti nyāyaḥ”(*) pramāṇam । tathā hi, pārthivadvyaṇukaṃ svakāraṇasaṃyoginā saṃyujyate, tatsaṃyuktakāraṇakāryatvāt, vīraṇasaṃyuktadvitantukavat । āpyo vā paramāṇuḥ svasaṃyuktakāraṇakāryeṇa saṃyujyate, tatkāraṇasaṃyogitvāt, dvitantukasaṃyuktavīraṇavat । evamitaratrāpi vācyam । yata evamataḥ pārthivadvyaṇukaṃ svakāraṇasaṃyoginā āpyenāṇunā sambadhyate, āpyamapi dvyaṇukaṃ pārthiveneti ।
analyzed: atha pārthiva dvyaṇukasya āpyena aṇunā saṃyogaḥ tathā āpyasya pāthivena iti kim kāraṇam kim pramāṇam iti āha kāraṇa saṃyoginā hi akāraṇena kāryam avaśyam saṃyujyate iti nyāyaḥ pramāṇam tathā hi pārthiva dvyaṇukam sva kāraṇa saṃyoginā saṃyujyate tat saṃyukta kāraṇa kārya tvāt vīraṇa saṃyukta dvi tantuka vat  āpyaḥ vā paramāṇuḥ sva saṃyukta kāraṇa kāryeṇa saṃyujyate tat kāraṇa saṃyogi tvāt dvi tantuka saṃyukta vīraṇ

original: “atha dvyaṇukayoritaretarakāraṇākāraṇasambaddhayoḥ”(*) iti । itarasya pārthivadvyaṇukasya yat kāraṇam taditarasyākāraṇam, evamāpyadvyaṇukasya kāraṇamitarasya pārthivadvyaṇukasyākāraṇam । tatsambaddhayordvyaṇukayoḥ parasparataḥ kathaṃ sambandha ityāha “tayorapi saṃyogajābhyāṃ saṃyogābhyāṃ sambandhaḥ”(*) iti । yau tau kāryākāryagatau saṃyogāvekasmāt saṃyogādutpannau tābhyām । dvyaṇukayoḥ samavāyikāraṇatvam, kāryākāryasaṃyogayoścāsamavāyikāraṇatvam । pratyāsasattistu ubhayarūpāpi sambhavatīti pūrvavad grāhyā । adṛṣṭādiśca nimittakāraṇamiti ।
analyzed: atha dvyaṇukayoḥ itaretara kāraṇa akāraṇa sambaddhayoḥ iti itarasya pārthiva dvyaṇukasya yat kāraṇam tat itarasya akāraṇam evam āpya dvyaṇukasya kāraṇam itarasya pārthiva dvyaṇukasya akāraṇam tad sambaddhayoḥ dvyaṇukayoḥ parasparataḥ katham sambandhaḥ iti āha tayoḥ api saṃyoga jābhyām saṃyogābhyām sambandhaḥ iti yau tau kārya akārya gatau saṃyogau ekasmāt saṃyogāt utpannau tābhyām dvyaṇukayoḥ samavāyi kāraṇa tvam kārya akārya saṃ

original: na ca dvyaṇukasya svakāraṇasaṃyoginā paramāṇvantareṇa dvyaṇukāntareṇāpi rūpādyutpattisamakālamekasmādeva kāraṇākāraṇasaṃyogāt saṃyogo bhaviṣyatīti vācyam । tasmin kāle dvyaṇukasya kāraṇasaṃyogitvābhāvāt । kāraṇasaṃyoginā cāpyakāryeṇa saṃyogaḥ saṃyogaja iti । tasmādāpyadvyaṇukasya pārthivena paramāṇunā saṃyogaḥ pārthivasya cāpyeneti pūrvamevābhidheyam । yena kāraṇasaṃyogitvād dvyaṇukayorapi saṃyogaḥ saṃyogajo bhavatīti ।
analyzed: na ca dvyaṇukasya sva kāraṇa saṃyoginā paramāṇu antareṇa dvyaṇuka antareṇa api rūpa ādi utpatti sama kālam ekasmāt eva kāraṇa akāraṇa saṃyogāt saṃyogaḥ bhaviṣyati iti vācyam tasmin kāle dvyaṇukasya kāraṇa saṃyogi tva abhāvāt kāraṇa saṃyoginā ca api akāryeṇa saṃyogaḥ saṃyoga jaḥ iti tasmāt āpya dvyaṇukasya pārthivena paramāṇunā saṃyogaḥ pārthivasya ca apyena iti pūrvam eva abhidheyam yena kāraṇa saṃyogi tvāt dvyaṇukayoḥ

original: (“nājaḥ saṃyoge 'sti, nityaparimaṇḍalavat pṛthaganabhidhānāt । yathā caturvidhaṃ parimāṇamutpādyamuktvā āha “nityaṃ pārimāṇḍalyam” ityevamanyatarakarmajādisaṃyogamutpādyamuktvā pṛthaṅ nityaṃ brūyān na tvevamabravīt, tasmānnāstyajaḥ saṃyogaḥ । paramāṇubhirākāśādīnāṃ pradeśavṛttiranyatarakarmajaḥ saṃyogaḥ । vibhūnāntu parasparataḥ saṃyogo nāsti yutasiddhyabhāvāt । sā punardvayoranyatarasya vā pṛthaggatimattvaṃ yutāśrayasamavāyitvañceti ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: na ajaḥ saṃyoge sti nitya parimaṇḍala vat pṛthak anabhidhānāt yathā caturvidham parimāṇam utpādyam uktvā āha nityam pārimāṇḍalyam iti evam anyatara karma ja ādi saṃyogam utpādyam uktvā pṛthak nityam brūyāt na tu evam abravīt tasmāt na asti ajaḥ saṃyogaḥ paramāṇubhiḥ ākāśa ādīnām pradeśa vṛttiḥ anyatara karma jaḥ saṃyogaḥ  / vibhūnām tu parasparataḥ saṃyogaḥ na asti yuta siddhi abhāvāt sā punar dvayoḥ anyatarasya vā pṛthak gatim

original: idānīṃ vibhāgasūtre 'jasaṃyogānabhidhānānnyūnatvamityāśaṅkya parihārārthamāha “nājaḥ saṃyogo 'sti nityaparimaṇḍalavat pṛthaganabhidhānāt”(*) । yathā bhagavānṛṣiḥ sakalārthadarśī “caturvidhaṃ parimāṇamutpādyamuktvā āha nityaṃ pārimāṇḍalyam”(*) paramāṇuparimāṇamastīti “evamanyatarakarmajādisaṃyogam”(*) trividham । “utpādyamuktvā pṛthaṅ nityam”(*) saṃyogam । “brūyāt, na tvevama<II,073>bravīt, tasmānnāstyajaḥ saṃyogaḥ”(*) । pratijñātañca maharṣiṇā yadbhāvarūpaṃ tatsarvamabhidhāsyāmīti ।
analyzed: idānīm vibhāga sūtre ja saṃyoga anabhidhānāt nyūnatvam iti āśaṅkya parihāra artham āha na ajaḥ saṃyogaḥ sti nitya parimaṇḍala vat pṛthak anabhidhānāt yathā bhagavān ṛṣiḥ sakala artha darśī caturvidham parimāṇam utpādyam uktvā āha nityam pārimāṇḍalyam paramāṇu parimāṇam asti iti evam anyatara karma ja ādi saṃyogam trividham utpādyam uktvā pṛthak nityam saṃyogam brūyāt na tasmāt na asti ajaḥ saṃyogaḥ pratijñātam ca mahā ṛṣiṇ

original: nanu cātra ajaḥ saṃyogo nāstīti pratijñāvākye padayorvyāghātaḥ, yathedañca nāsti ceti । na । anyathā pratijñānāt । tathā hi, paramāṇubhirākāśādīnāṃ saṃyogo nityatvenābhyupagataḥ pareṇa, tasyājatvameva niṣidhyate, na sadbhāvaḥ । paramāṇubhirākāśādīnāṃ saṃyogo 'jo na bhavati, sarvajñena maharṣiṇā ajātatvena pṛthagapratipādyamānatvāt । yacca ajaṃ tadajatvena pṛthagupadiṣṭaṃ yathā “nityaṃ pārimāṇḍalyam” iti ।
analyzed: nanu ca atra ajaḥ saṃyogaḥ na asti iti pratijñā vākye padayoḥ vyāghātaḥ yathā idam ca na asti ca iti na anyathā pratijñānāt tathā hi paramāṇubhiḥ ākāśa ādīnām saṃyogaḥ nitya tvena abhyupagataḥ pareṇa tasya aja tvam eva niṣidhyate na sadbhāvaḥ paramāṇubhiḥ ākāśa ādīnām saṃyogaḥ jaḥ na bhavati sarvajñena mahā ṛṣiṇā ajāta tvena pṛthak apratipādyamāna tvāt yat ca ajam tat aja tvena pṛthak upadiṣṭam yathā nityam pārimāṇḍal

original: atha saṃyogasyāprāptivirodhitvam, tattu na sambhavatyeva, ākāśādervibhutvena tatparityāgānupapatteḥ । na cāśrayavināśād vināśo 'tra, āśrayasyāpi nityatvāt । na cānyad vināśakāraṇamastītyajatvameva । avacanantu vyāmohādapi sambhavatītyanyathāsiddham । asya pratiṣedhārthamāha “paramāṇubhirākāśādīnāṃ pradeśavṛttiranyatarakarmajaḥ saṃyogaḥ”(*) iti । kathamākāśāparityāgena paramāṇoḥ saṃyogā vibhāgāśca bhavantīti cet ? yathā vṛkṣāparityāgena devadattasya । tathā hi, mūlapradeśādūrdhvapradeśamārohataḥ puruṣasya vṛkṣāparityāgenaiva saṃyogā vibhāgāścopalabhyante, “mūlapradeśe vṛkṣeṇa saṃyuktaḥ, madhyapradeśe, agrapradeśe” ceti । na ca pradeśasyaiva te saṃyogāḥ, “vṛkṣeṇa saṃyuktaḥ” iti pratyayopalambhāt । pradeśenaiva saṃyoge “pradeśena saṃyukto na vṛkṣeṇa” iti jñānaṃ syāt । na caitadasti । “vṛkṣeṇa saṃyuktaḥ” iti jñānasya sarvasyāmavasthāyāmupalabdheḥ ।
analyzed: atha saṃyogasya aprāpti virodhi tvam tat tu na sambhavati eva ākāśa ādeḥ vibhu tvena tad parityāga anupapatteḥ na ca āśraya vināśāt āśrayasya api nitya tvāt na ca anyat vināśa kāraṇam asti iti ajatvam eva avacanam tu vyāmohāt api sambhavati iti anyathāsiddham asya pratiṣedha artham āha paramāṇubhiḥ ākāśa ādīnām pradeśa vṛttiḥ anyatara karma jaḥ saṃyogaḥ iti katham ākāśa aparityāgena paramāṇoḥ saṃyogāḥ vibhāgāḥ ca bhavanti iti ced yathā

original: yadi ca saṃyogasya pradeśavṛttitvāt pradeśenaiva saṃyogo na vṛkṣeṇeti, tarhi te 'pi pradeśāḥ svāvayavāpekṣayā avayavina iti tatpradeśānāṃ saṃyogaḥ, teṣāmapyavayavitvāt pradeśānāmiti tāvad yāvannirdeśāḥ paramāṇavaḥ । teṣāñca niṣpradeśatvāt saṃyogābhāvena dvyaṇukādiprakrameṇa kāryamiti kṣityāderasambhava eva ।
analyzed: yadi ca saṃyogasya pradeśa vṛtti tvāt pradeśena eva saṃyogaḥ na vṛkṣeṇa iti tarhi te pi pradeśāḥ sva avayava apekṣayā avayavinaḥ iti tad pradeśānām saṃyogaḥ teṣām api avayavi tvāt pradeśānām iti tāvat yāvat nirdeśāḥ paramāṇavaḥ teṣām ca niṣpradeśa tvāt saṃyoga abhāvena dvi aṇuka ādi prakrameṇa kāryam iti kṣiti ādeḥ asambhavaḥ eva

original: atha niṣpradeśatve 'pi sati paramāṇūnāṃ pradeśatvād iṣyata eva saṃyogastarhi dvyaṇukānāṃ saṃyogābhāve na tryaṇukamiti dūṣaṇaṃ tadavasthameva । na ca paramāṇuṣu vartamānaḥ saṃyogo dvyaṇukādisamavetaṃ dravyamārabhate, vyadhikaraṇasyārambhakatve<II,074>'tiprasaṅgāt । tasmāt saṃyogasya pradeśavṛttitvamāśrayāvyāpakatvamityavayavenāvayavinā ca saṃyogo ghaṭata eva ।
analyzed: atha niṣpradeśa tve sati paramāṇūnām pradeśa tvāt iṣyate eva saṃyogaḥ tarhi dvyaṇukānām saṃyoga abhāve na tryaṇukam iti dūṣaṇam tad avastham eva na ca paramāṇuṣu vartamānaḥ saṃyogaḥ dvyaṇuka ādi samavetam dravyam ārabhate    tasmāt saṃyogasya pradeśa vṛtti tvam āśraya avyāpaka tvam iti avayavena avayavinā ca saṃyogaḥ ghaṭate eva

original: na ca prāktanasya mūlapradeśe vṛkṣeṇa saṃyogasyāvasthāne satyuttarasaṃyogena śakyaṃ bhavitumiti tadvināśako vibhāgo 'pi siddhaḥ । yathā cātra vṛkṣāparityāgenaiva puruṣasyānyatarakarmajāḥ saṃyogā vibhāgāśca bhavanti tadvadākāśāparityāgenaiva paramāṇoḥ saṃyogā vibhāgāśca bhaviṣyantīti vyāpakatvamatantram ।
analyzed: na ca prāktanasya mūla pradeśe vṛkṣeṇa saṃyogasya avasthāne sati uttara saṃyogena śakyam bhavitum iti tad vināśakaḥ siddhaḥ yathā ca atra vṛkṣa a parityāgena eva puruṣasya anyatara karma jāḥ saṃyogāḥ vibhāgāḥ ca bhavanti tadvat ākāśa a parityāgena eva paramāṇoḥ saṃyogāḥ vibhāgāḥ ca bhaviṣyanti iti vyāpaka tvam atantram

original: tadevaṃ paramāṇvākāśādisaṃyogasyotpattivināśakāraṇopapatternājatvamiti । yacca sūtrakārasyāvacanaṃ vyāmohādapi sambhavatītyuktam, tadasat, tadabhihitānāṃ padārthānāṃ pramāṇāntareṇāpi tathābhāvopalabdheḥ samyagjñānasiddhau tadviruddhasya mithyājñānasya nivṛtteḥ ।
analyzed: tat evam paramāṇu ākāśa ādi saṃyogasya utpatti vināśa kāraṇa upapatteḥ na aja tvam iti  yat ca sūtrakārasya avacanam vyāmohāt api sambhavati iti uktam tat asat tad abhihitānām padārthānām pramāṇa antareṇa api tathā bhāva upalabdheḥ samyak jñāna siddhau tad viruddhasya mithyājñānasya nivṛtteḥ

original: atha vibhūnāṃ parasparataḥ saṃyogo bhaviṣyatīti । tathā hyākāśam ātmādinā saṃyujyate, mūrtasaṃyogitvāt, ghaṭavat । asya pratiṣedhārthamāha “vibhūnāntu parasparataḥ saṃyogo nāsti, yutasiddhyabhāvāt”(*) । yatra yatra saṃyogastatra tatra yutasiddhirupalabdhā । sā ca saṃyogasya vyāpikā vyāvartamānā svavyāptaṃ saṃyogaṃ gṛhītvā vyāvartata ityanyathāsiddhaṃ sādhanam ।
analyzed: atha vibhūnām parasparataḥ saṃyogaḥ bhaviṣyati iti tathā hi ākāśam ātma ādinā saṃyujyate mūrta saṃyogi tvāt ghaṭa vat asya pratiṣedha artham āha vibhūnām tu parasparataḥ saṃyogaḥ na asti yuta siddhi abhāvāt yatra yatra saṃyogaḥ tatra tatra yuta siddhiḥ upalabdhā sā ca saṃyogasya vyāpikā vyāvartamānā sva vyāptam saṃyogam gṛhītvā vyāvartate iti anyathāsiddham sādhanam

original: “sā punaḥ”(*) yutasiddhiḥ । “dvayoranyatarasya vā pṛthaggatimattvaṃ yutāśrayasamavāyitvañceti”(*) । dvayoḥ pṛthaggatimattvamanyatarasya veti, iyaṃ nityānāṃ yutasiddhiḥ । dvayoryutāśrayasamavāyitvamanyatarasya veti, anityānām । asyāstu vistareṇa vicāro vibhāgāvasare draṣṭavyaḥ । na ca vibhūnāṃ pṛthaggatimattvamamūrtatvāt । yutāśrayasamavāyitvamapi na sambhavatyevākāryatvāditi ।
analyzed: sā punar yuta siddhiḥ dvayoḥ anyatarasya vā pṛthak gatimat tvam yuta āśraya samavāyi tvam ca iti  dvayoḥ pṛthak gatimat tvam anyatarasya vā iti iyam nityānām yuta siddhiḥ dvayoḥ yuta āśraya samavāyi tvam anyatarasya vā iti anityānām asyāḥ tu vistareṇa vicāraḥ vibhāga avasare draṣṭavyaḥ na ca vibhūnām pṛthak gatimat tvam amūrta tvāt yuta āśraya samavāyi tvam api na sambhavati eva akārya tvāt iti

original: {saṃyogavināśaprakāraḥ}
analyzed: saṃyoga vināśa prakāraḥ

original: (“vināśastu sarvasya saṃyogasyaikārthasamavetād vibhāgāt, kvacid āśrayavināśādapi । katham ? yadā tantvoḥ saṃyoge satyanyataratantvārambhake 'ṃśau karmotpadyate, tena karmaṇā aṃśvantarād vibhāgaḥ kriyate, vibhāgācca tantvārambhakasaṃyogavināśaḥ, saṃyogavināśāt tantuvināśaḥ, tadvināśe tadāśritasya tantvantarasaṃyogasya vināśa iti ।”)<PDhS>

original: tathā hi, dravyārambhakasaṃyogavināśād vinaṣṭe samavāyikāraṇe tadāśritasya kāryadravyasya vināśo ghaṭata eva । tasmād yatra dravyavināśastatra avayavakarma ākāśadeśena vibhāgaṃ nārabhata iti । prayogastu, svatantrāvayavakarma, avayavāntareṇa dravyārambhakasaṃyogavirodhivibhāgasamakālamākāśadeśena vibhāgaṃ nārabhate, avayavakarmatvāt, padmapatrakarmavat । tathā, svatantrāvayavaḥ, avayavāntareṇa viśiṣṭavibhāgasamakālaṃ nākāśadeśena vibhajate, avayavatvāt, padmapatravat । evaṃ vibhāgāderapi pakṣīkaraṇenānumānamūhyam ।
analyzed: tathā hi dravya ārambhaka saṃyoga vināśāt vinaṣṭe samavāyi kāraṇe tad āśritasya kārya dravyasya vināśaḥ ghaṭate eva tasmāt yatra dravya vināśaḥ tatra avayava karma ākāśa deśena vibhāgam na ārabhate iti prayogaḥ tu svatantra avayava karma avayava antareṇa dravya ārambhaka saṃyoga virodhi vibhāga sama kālam ākāśa deśena vibhāgam na ārabhate avayava karma tvāt padma patra karma vat tathā svatantra avayavaḥ avayava antareṇa viśiṣṭa vibhāga sama kāl

original: viśiṣṭavibhāgānāmutpattiścātra dravyāvināśenaiva niścīyata iti sapakṣadharmatvam padmāvayavakarmādeḥ । na ca viśiṣṭavibhāgasamakālamākāśadeśena vibhāgamārabhamāṇaṃ kiñcidupalabdhamiti vipakṣābhāvādanvayāvyabhicāreṇaiva gamakatvaṃ jñeyam । sāmānyena tu avayavavibhāgasamakālamākāśadeśena vibhāgajanakatvapratiṣedhe sādhye vyatirekāvyabhicāreṇāpi gamakatvamiti ।
analyzed: viśiṣṭa vibhāgānām utpattiḥ ca atra dravya avināśena eva niścīyate iti sapakṣa dharma tvam padma avayava karma ādeḥ na ca viśiṣṭa vibhāga sama kālam ākāśa deśena vibhāgam ārabhamāṇam kiñcid upalabdham iti vipakṣa abhāvāt anvaya avyabhicāreṇa eva gamaka tvam jñeyam sāmānyena tu avayava vibhāga sama kālam ākāśa deśena vibhāga janaka tva pratiṣedhe sādhye vyatireka avyabhicāreṇa api gamaka tvam iti

original: tathā hi, svatantrāvayavakarma, avayavāntaravibhāgasamakālamākāśadeśena vibhāgaṃ nārabhate, svatantrāvayavakarmatvāt, yattvārabhate na tat svatantrāvayavakarma, yathā padmapatrakarmeti । tathā svatantrāvayavaḥ, avayavāntaravibhāgasamakālaṃ nākāśadeśena vibhajate, svatantrāvayavatvāt, yastu vibhajate na cāsau svatantrāvayavaḥ, yathā padmapatramiti । svātantryantu kriyākrameṇa dravyavināśe bhavatīti pūrvamevoktam । na caitat padmāvayavasaṅkocādikriyāyāṃ sambhavati, dravyavināśādarśanāt ।
analyzed: tathā hi svatantra avayava karma avayava antara vibhāga sama kālam ākāśa deśena vibhāgam na ārabhate svatantra avayava karma tvāt yat tu ārabhate na tat svatantra avayava karma yathā padma patra karma iti tathā svatantra avayavaḥ avayava antara vibhāga sama kālam na ākāśa deśena vibhajate svatantra avayava tvāt yaḥ tu vibhajate na ca asau svatantra avayavaḥ yathā padma patram iti svātantryam tu kriyā krameṇa dravya vināśe bhavati iti pūrvam eva uktam na ca etat padma avaya

analyzed: atha padma avayava karma api avayava vibhāga sama kālam ākāśa deśena vibhāgam ārabhate iti atīndriya tvāt anumānam pramāṇam vācyam pramāṇam vinā prameya asiddheḥ    tatra yadi asvatantra avayava karma tvam vyatireka avyabhicāreṇa gamakam itaretara āśraya tvam syāt eka aprasiddhau itara aprasiddheḥ iti

analyzed: na etat evam ākāśa deśena asvatantra avayava karmaṇaḥ vibhāga janaka tve bādhaka abhāvāt tathā hi svatantra avayava karmaṇaḥ dravya ārambhaka saṃyoga virodhi utpādaka tvam ākāśa deśena vibhāga janaka tve bādhakam asti na evam atra iti

original: tathā hi, padmāvayavakarma, ākāśadeśena vibhāgamārabhate tadārambhakabādhakānutpattau karmatvāt, yad yadevaṃ tattadākāśādideśena vibhāgamārabhate, yathā anārabdhakāryaṃ paramāṇukarmeti । avaśyañca paramāṇorākāśādideśena sambaddhasyotpannaṃ karma tatsaṃyoganivartakaṃ vibhāgamārabhate, tadantareṇa pūrvasaṃyogāvasthānāduttarasaṃyogānutpattau dvyaṇukādiprakrameṇa kāryānutpattiprasaṅgāt ।
analyzed: tathā hi padma avayava karma ākāśa deśena vibhāgam ārabhate tad ārambhaka bādhaka anutpattau karma tvāt yat yat evam tat tat ākāśa ādi deśena vibhāgam ārabhate yathā anārabdha kāryam paramāṇu karma iti avaśyam ca paramāṇoḥ ākāśa ādi deśena sambaddhasya utpannam karma tad saṃyoga nivartakam vibhāgam ārabhate tad antareṇa pūrva saṃyoga avasthānāt uttara saṃyoga anutpattau dvyaṇuka ādi prakrameṇa kārya anutpatti prasaṅgāt

original: anye tu asvatantrāvayavakarmaṇo yathā avayavāntaravibhāgasamakālam akāraṇena tṛṇādinā vibhāgajanakatvam, evamākāśādīnāmapīti manyante । tṛṇādivibhāgaśca padmāvayavasya pratyakṣa ityudāharaṇam । na caivaṃ svatantrāvayavakarmaṇo 'pi akāraṇena vibhāgajanakatvaṃ pratyakṣasiddhamasti (vivādopapatterityalam <?>) । nāpīdamasaduttaram । prasaṅgasamāpekṣāyāmudāharaṇe 'pi kvacidanumānopanyāsābhyupagamāt ।

original: ataḥ svatantrāvayavakarma “avayavāntarādeva vibhāgamārabhate, vibhāgācca dravyārambhakasaṃyogavināśaḥ, tasmin vinaṣṭe kāraṇābhāvāt kāryābhāva ityavayavivināśaḥ”(*) । tataḥ svatantrāvayavasyākāśadeśena vibhāgo vācyaḥ । tadantareṇa pūrvasaṃyogasyāvasthānāduttarasaṃyogānutpattau karmaṇaḥ kālāntarāvasthāyitvaṃ nityadravyasamavetasya ca nityatvaṃ syāt । na caitadasti, karmaṇaḥ kṣaṇikatvopalabdheḥ । na ca vināśahetuṃ vinā asya vināśaḥ 〈tādṛśavināśasya〉 pratiṣedhāt । ato 'nyasya vināśahetorabhāvāduttarasaṃyogasyaivānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ karmavināśe sāmarthyāvadhāraṇāt kāraṇatvamiti ।
analyzed: atas svatantra avayava karma avayava antarāt eva vibhāgam ārabhate vibhāgāt ca dravya ārambhaka saṃyoga vināśaḥ tasmin vinaṣṭe kāraṇa abhāvāt kārya abhāvaḥ iti avayavi vināśaḥ tatas svatantra avayavasya ākāśa deśena vibhāgaḥ vācyaḥ tad antareṇa pūrva saṃyogasya avasthānāt uttara saṃyoga anutpattau karmaṇaḥ kāla antara avasthāyi tvam nitya dravya samavetasya ca nitya tvam syāt na ca etat asti karmaṇaḥ kṣaṇika tva upalabdheḥ na ca vināśa hetu

original: na cottarasaṃyogaḥ pūrvasyākāśadeśena saṃyogasya pratibandhakasyāvasthāne bhavatīti tadvināśaheturvibhāgo niścīyate । na cāsau kriyātaḥ sambhavatyukta<II,081>nyāyāt । asamavāyikāraṇaṃ vinā ca vibhāgasyotpattirnopalabdheti anyasyāsamavāyikāraṇasyābhāvāt kāraṇayorvartamāno vibhāgaḥ pratyāsannatve sati samānajātīyatvādasamavāyikāraṇamiti । yatra hi samānajātīyaṃ nāsti tatra vijātīyamevāsamvāyikāraṇamiti kalpyate । kriyā tu vidyamānāpyatra bādhakasadbhāvādakāraṇameva । tasmāt “kāraṇayorvartamāno vibhāgaḥ”(*) kāryasaṃyuktāt kāryasaṃyogopalakṣitāt “ākāśādideśād vibhāgamārabhata”(*) iti । ādipadenātmāderavarodhaḥ ।
analyzed: na ca uttara saṃyogaḥ pūrvasya ākāśa deśena saṃyogasya pratibandhakasya avasthāne bhavati iti tad vināśa hetuḥ vibhāgaḥ niścīyate na ca asau kriyātaḥ asamavāyi kāraṇam vinā ca vibhāgasya utpattiḥ na upalabdhā iti anyasya asamavāyi kāraṇasya abhāvāt kāraṇayoḥ vartamānaḥ vibhāgaḥ pratyāsanna tve sati samāna jātīya tvāt asamavāyi kāraṇam iti yatra hi samāna jātīyam na asti tatra vijātīyam eva asamvāyi kāraṇam iti kalpyate kriyā tu vidyamān

original: kimapekṣya ityāha “kāryavināśaviśiṣṭaṃ kālam”(*) iti । kāryavināśo dravyavināśaḥ, tadviśiṣṭaṃ kālam । tadvināśāt svatantro 'vayavastaṃ ca apekṣyārabhata iti ।
analyzed: kim apekṣya iti āha kārya vināśa viśiṣṭam kālam iti kārya vināśaḥ dravya vināśaḥ tad viśiṣṭam kālam tad vināśāt svatantraḥ vayavaḥ tam ca apekṣya ārabhate iti

original: anye tu kāryavināśaviśiṣṭaṃ kālamiti sāmānyābhidhānāt saṃyogavināśaviśiṣṭamapekṣya dravyavināśasamakālamārabhata iti bruvate । “svatantraṃ vā avayavamapekṣya”(*) iti । dravyavināśādūrdhvaṃ svātantryamasyeti upacāreṇa pūrvamevocyate । svatantramīśvaraṃ vā, avayavaṃ vā, apekṣyeti । ।
analyzed: anye tu kārya vināśa viśiṣṭam kālam iti sāmānya abhidhānāt saṃyoga vināśa viśiṣṭam apekṣya dravya vināśa sama kālam ārabhate iti bruvate svatantram vā avayavam apekṣya iti dravya vināśāt ūrdhvam svātantryam asya iti upacāreṇa pūrvam eva ucyate svatantram īśvaram vā avayavam vā apekṣya iti  /

original: kasyetyāha “sakriyasyaiva”(*) iti । atha kāraṇavibhāgasyobhayavṛttitvāviśeṣāt sakriyasyākāśādideśena vibhāgaḥ, “na niskriyasya”(*) iti kimatra niyāmakam ? uttarasaṃyogotpattiriti । tathā hi, vibhāgāt saṃyogavināśe sati karma uttarasaṃyogaṃ karoti, tasmād vibhāgaḥ karma ca vyāvartate । niṣkriye tūtpanno vibhāgaḥ kathamuttarasaṃyogānutpattau vyāvarteta na ca vibhāgāt pūrvaṃ saṃyoganivṛttāvuttarasaṃyogotpattiryuktā, kāraṇasya karmaṇo 'bhāvāt । asaṃyuktasya cākāśādibhiravasthāne teṣāmasarvagatatvaṃ syāt । na cānyakarmasampāditaḥ saṃyogo 'nyakriyājanyasya vibhāgasya nivartako dṛṣṭaḥ । tasmāt svakāraṇakarmakāryā uttarasaṃyogād vibhāgasya nivṛttirdṛṣṭeti । “uttarasaṃyogānutpattāvanupabhogyatva prasaṅgaḥ”(*) iti । niṣprayojanatvasya prasaṅgaḥ, vināśitvaprasaṅgaśceti । tasya hi pūrvasaṃyoganivartanād uttarasaṃyogotpattau saprayojanatvaṃ vināśitvañca ghaṭate ।

original: yad vā niṣkriyasyākāśādideśena vibhāgābhyupagame sakriyasyottarasaṃyogānutpattiḥ, kāraṇābhāvāt, na tu niṣkriyasya vibhāgajavibhāgapratiṣedhe kāraṇābhāvo hetuḥ, samavāyyādikāraṇānāṃ sambhavāt । tathā hi, niṣkriyāvayavākāśādeḥ samavāyikāraṇatvam, vibhāgasyāsamavāyikāraṇatvam, śeṣaṃ nimittakāraṇamityasti kāraṇasadbhāvaḥ । tasmāduttarasaṃyogapratiṣedhe kāraṇābhāvo hetuḥ । tathā hi, sakriyasyākāśādideśena vibhāgānabhyupagame prāktanasaṃyogasya pratibandhakasyāvasthānād uttarasaṃyogānutpattiḥ, tadanutpattāvanupabhogyatvaṃ niṣprayojanatvaṃ vibhāgakarmaṇoriti ।
