original: pratyakṣaviṣaye tāvad viparyayamāha 〈“prasiddhānekaviśeṣayoḥ”(*)〉 prasiddhā anekā viśeṣā yayostau tathoktau tayoriti viṣayanirūpaṇam । 〈“pittakaphānilopahatendriyasya”(*) iti〉 pittañca kaphaścānilaśceti pittakaphānilāstairupahatānīndriyāṇi yasyāsau sa tathoktastasya viparyayo bhavati । kebhya ityāha “ayathārthālocanāt”(*) ityādi । ayathārthamālocyate 'nenetyayathārthālocanaṃ sādṛśyajñānam ।
analyzed: pratyakṣa viṣaye tāvat viparyayam āha prasiddha aneka viśeṣayoḥ prasiddhāḥ anekāḥ viśeṣāḥ yayoḥ tau tathā uktau tayoḥ iti viṣaya nirūpaṇam pitta kapha anila upahata indriyasya iti pittam ca kaphaḥ ca anilaḥ ca iti pitta kapha anilāḥ taiḥ upahatāni indriyāṇi yasya asau sa tathā uktaḥ tasya viparyayaḥ bhavati kebhyaḥ iti āha ayathārtha ālocanāt ityādi ayathārtham ālocyate nena iti ayathārtha ālocanam sādṛśya jñānam

original: yadvā ālocitirālocanam, ayathārthañca tadālocanañcetyupacāreṇa sādṛśyajñānamayathārthālocanahetutvād vivakṣitam, tasmāt । asannihitaścāsau viṣayaśceti tathoktastasmin jñānam, tasmājjāto 'sannihitaviṣayajñānajaḥ, sa cāsau saṃskāraśceti । saṃskārakāryatvāt smṛtiḥ saṃskārapadena vivakṣitā । tatsaṃskāramapekṣata ityātmamanaḥsaṃyogastadapekṣaḥ । tasmādasamavāyikāraṇād adharmācca viparyayaḥ । sa ca kiṃ svarūpaḥ ? “atasmiṃstaditi pratyayaḥ”(*) iti । tathāhi, atasmiṃstaditi pratyayaḥ, itarasmād bhidyate, viparyaya iti vā vyavahartavyaḥ, ayathārthālocanādibhya utpadyamānatvāditi । yastvevaṃ na bhavati na cāsāvuktakāraṇebhyo niṣpadyate (tasmiṃstaditi pratyayaśca)<?> yathā saṃśayādiriti । tasyodāharaṇaṃ “yathā gavyevāśva iti”(*) । yathāhi, dūrād viṣāṇādiviśeṣamanupalabhamānasyāśvasādṛśyaviśeṣitapiṇḍopalambhād aśvānusmaraṇācca gavyevāśvo 'yamiti jñānamutpadyate, tathā marīciṣūdakajñānam, śuktikāyāṃ rajatajñānamiti ।
analyzed: yat vā ālocitiḥ ālocanam ayathārtham ca tat ālocanam ca iti upacāreṇa sādṛśya jñānam ayathārtha ālocana hetu tvāt vivakṣitam tasmāt asannihitaḥ ca asau viṣayaḥ ca iti tathā uktaḥ tasmin jñānam tasmāt jātaḥ sannihita viṣaya jñāna jaḥ sa ca asau saṃskāraḥ ca iti saṃskāra kārya tvāt smṛtiḥ saṃskāra padena vivakṣitā tad saṃskāram apekṣate iti ātma manaḥ saṃyogaḥ tad apekṣaḥ tasmāt asamavāyi kāraṇāt adharmāt ca viparyayaḥ sa

original: nanu cāyuktametat, viparyayajñānasampādakasya kārakasyaivāsambhavāt । tathāhi, indriyāṇi samyajjñānasampādanāyotpannāni tasmiṃstaditi rūpatvāt, kathaṃ mithyājñānaṃ kuryuriti । na ca kācakāmalādidoṣavaśād viparītajñānajanakatvam, duṣṭasya kārakasya kāryājanakatvāt । yathā hi, śālibījasya tailādinābhyaktasya <II,123> śālyaṅkurājanakatvam, na punaryavāṅkurasampādakatvam । evamindriyāṇāṃ samyajjñānasampādakatvameva syāt, na viparītajñānotpādakatvamiti । na ca rajatādijñānasya śuktikādyālambanatve pramāṇamasti । tasmāt sādṛśyajñānānantaraṃ svākāraparibhraṣṭaṃ smaraṇamutpadyate idaṃ rajatamiti । tathāhi, idamiti sādṛśyajñānaṃ rajatamiti smaraṇaṃ tadityākāraśūnyam ।
analyzed: nanu ca ayuktam etat viparyaya jñāna sampādakasya kārakasya eva asambhavāt tathā hi indriyāṇi samyak jñāna sampādanāya utpannāni tasmin tat iti rūpa tvāt katham mithyājñānam kuryuḥ iti na ca kāca kāmalā ādi doṣa vaśāt viparīta jñāna janaka tvam duṣṭasya kārakasya kārya ajanaka tvāt yathā hi śāli bījasya taila ādinā abhyaktasya śāli aṅkura ajanaka tvam na punar yava aṅkura sampādaka tvam evam indriyāṇām samyak jñāna sampādaka tvam eva syāt na vipar

original: naitadyuktam, rajatārthinaḥ pravṛttinivṛttyorabhāvaprasaṅgāt । atha jñānayorbhade 'pi idameva rajatamiti sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ manyamānaḥ pravartate ? tarhīdameva vyadhikaraṇayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyajñānaṃ mithyājñānamiti । atha idamiti sādṛśyaṃ tatra rajatamiti bhedāpratibhāse sati pravṛttirveṣyate ? tanna, pratipattyabhāvasyāpravartakatvāt । tathāhi, rajatārthī idameva. rajatamiti manyamānaḥ pravartate, netarathā । idamiti jñānasyāparokṣatānirdeśo na jñānāntaram । anyathā hi idaṃ rūpam ayaṃ rasa ityādāvapi smṛtipramoṣaḥ syāt ।
analyzed: na etat yuktam rajata arthinaḥ pravṛtti nivṛttyoḥ abhāva prasaṅgāt atha jñānayoḥ bhade pi idam eva rajatam iti sāmānādhikaraṇyam manyamānaḥ pravartate tarhi idam eva vyadhikaraṇayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya jñānam mithyājñānam iti  atha idam iti sādṛśyam tatra rajatam iti bheda apratibhāse sati pravṛttiḥ vā iṣyate tat na pratipatti abhāvasya apravartaka tvāt tathā hi rajata arthī idam eva rajatam iti manyamānaḥ pravartate na itarathā idam iti jñānasya apa

original: yaccedaṃ rajatamiti jñānasya śuktikādyālambanatve pramāṇābhāva ityuktam, tadasat, pratyabhijñānādeḥ sambhavāt । tathāhi, iyaṃ śuktikā mama rajatamiti pratibhātā । tathā nedaṃ rajatamiti jñānasya śuktikāviṣayatvād rajatamiti jñānasya tadviṣayatvam । anyathā hi rajatamiti jñānasya śuktikāviṣayatāmantareṇa nedaṃ rajatamiti pratiṣedho na syāt prasaktyabhāvāt । aprasaktasya ca niṣedhe nāyaṃ ghaṭādirityapi syāt । tathā ca sati sarvatra pratiṣedhaparamparāprasaṅgaḥ । na caitadasti । tasmājjñānadvāreṇa rajataṃ tatra prasaktamiti niṣidhyate ।
analyzed: yat ca idam rajatam iti jñānasya śuktikā ādi ālambana tve pramāṇa abhāvaḥ iti uktam tat asat pratyabhijñāna ādeḥ sambhavāt tathā hi iyam śuktikā mama rajatam iti pratibhātā tathā na idam rajatam iti jñānasya śuktikā viṣaya tvāt rajatam iti jñānasya tad viṣaya tvam anyathā hi rajatam iti jñānasya śuktikā viṣaya tām antareṇa na idam rajatam iti pratiṣedhaḥ na syāt prasakti abhāvāt aprasaktasya ca niṣedhe na ayam ghaṭa ādiḥ iti api syāt tathā ca sat

original: yaccedam utpattikāraṇābhāvādityuktam, tadasat, doṣānugṛhītasyendriyāderjñānajanakatvāt । yathāhi, doṣābhāve satīndriyaṃ bhāvavyatirekābhyāṃ samyajjñānasya janakamupalabdhaṃ tathā doṣasadbhāve sati mithyājñānasyāpītyubhayarūpasya kāryasyendriyavyāpāreṇopalabdherubhayārthamindriyāṇāṃ sargo niścīyate । mithyātvañcāsya svaviṣayaparityāgena viṣayāntaropasarpaṇāt ।
analyzed: yat ca idam utpatti kāraṇa abhāvāt iti uktam tat asat doṣa anugṛhītasya indriya ādeḥ jñāna janaka tvāt yathā hi doṣa abhāve sati indriyam bhāva vyatirekābhyām samyak jñānasya janakam upalabdham tathā doṣa sadbhāve sati mithyājñānasya api iti ubhaya rūpasya kāryasya indriya vyāpāreṇa upalabdheḥ ubhaya artham indriyāṇām sargaḥ niścīyate mithyātvam ca asya sva viṣaya parityāgena viṣaya antara upasarpaṇāt

original: athālaukikaṃ rajatamevāsya viṣayamiti viṣayāntaropasarpaṇamasiddham ? tanna, alaukikarajatādhyavasāye sati pravṛttinivṛttyorabhāvaprasaṅgāt । athā<II,124>laukikasyāpi laukikatāṃ manyamānaḥ pravartate । kathaṃ tarhi mithyājñānasya sambhava iti ? na caitasmin pakṣe mithyedaṃ mamotpannaṃ jñānamiti bādhakaṃ jñānaṃ syāt, pratyabhijñānādyasambhavaśca । asti pratyabhijñānaṃ śuktikādau, mamātra rajatajñānamutpannam, mithyātvapratipattiśceti kathaṃ mithyājñānasyāsambhavaḥ ?
analyzed: atha alaukikam rajatam eva asya viṣayam iti viṣaya antara upasarpaṇam asiddham tat na alaukika rajata adhyavasāye sati pravṛtti nivṛttyoḥ abhāva prasaṅgāt   laukika tām manyamānaḥ pravartate katham tarhi mithyājñānasya sambhavaḥ iti  na ca etasmin pakṣe mithyā idam mama utpannam jñānam iti bādhakam jñānam syāt pratyabhijñāna ādi asambhavaḥ ca  asti pratyabhijñānam śuktikā ādau mama atra rajata jñānam utpannam mithyātva pratipattiḥ ca iti katham mithyājñā

original: yadi cedaṃ rajatamiti jñānaṃ rajatālambanameva syāt, tasyopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatvāt samīpavartinaḥ kathamagrahaṇam ? yad vastūpalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ dūrasthenāpyupalabhyate tadavaśyaṃ samīpavartinā gṛhyata eva, indriyādestādavasthyāt । na caitadasti । tasmād rajatādijñānaṃ śuktikādāvutpannamiti ।
analyzed: yadi ca idam rajatam iti jñānam rajata ālambanam eva syāt tasya upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta tvāt samīpa vartinaḥ katham agrahaṇam yat vastu upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam dūra sthena api upalabhyate tat avaśyam samīpa vartinā gṛhyate eva indriya ādeḥ tādavasthyāt na ca etat asti tasmāt rajata ādi jñānam śuktikā ādau utpannam iti

original: anye tu yadeva rajatamanyadeśakālaviśeṣitamupalabdhaṃ tadevānyadeśādiviśeṣitamupalabhyata iti mithyātvaṃ bruvate । tadasat, tasyātrāvidyamānatayā viṣayatvāsambhavāt । tasmādindriyavyāpāraviṣayo 'ṅgulyādinā vyapadiśyamānaśca śuktikādireva viṣayaḥ । anyathā viṣayāntarotpannaṃ rajatajñānaṃ kathaṃ śuktikājñānena bādhyeta ? vibhinnaviṣayatve bādhyabādhakabhāvasyaivāsambhavāt । ato rajatajñānaṃ śuktikāyāmupajātaṃ śuktikājñānena svaviṣayasahakāriṇā bādhyate mithyātvaviśiṣṭatayā jñāpyate, viṣayāntaropasarpaṇāt । rajatajñānasya tu rajataṃ viṣayaḥ sarvajanapratītastattyāgena śuktikāyāmutpadyamānatvād vyabhicāritvam । etena nirviṣayaṃ kalpanājñānametad ityapāstam, viṣayasya śuktikādeḥ pramāṇato vyavasthāpanāt ।
analyzed: anye tu yat eva rajatam anya deśa kāla viśeṣitam upalabdham tat eva anya deśa ādi viśeṣitam upalabhyate iti mithyātvam bruvate tat asat tasya atra avidyamāna tayā viṣaya tva asambhavāt tasmāt indriya vyāpāra viṣayaḥ ṅguli ādinā vyapadiśyamānaḥ ca śuktikā ādiḥ eva viṣayaḥ anyathā viṣaya antara utpannam rajata jñānam katham śuktikā jñānena bādhyeta vibhinna viṣaya tve bādhya bādhaka bhāvasya eva asambhavāt  atas rajata jñānam śuktikāyām upajātam

original: “asatyapi pratyakṣe pratyakṣābhimānaḥ”(*) ityādinā nirviṣayaṃ viparyayamāheti kecit ।
analyzed: asati api pratyakṣe pratyakṣa abhimānaḥ ityādinā nirviṣayam viparyayam āha iti kecid

original: udāharaṇantu “yathā vyapagataghanapaṭalam, acalajalanidhisadṛśavapuḥ, ambaram, añjanacūrṇapuñjaśyāmaṃ śārvaraṃ tamaḥ”(*) iti । vyapagatāni ghanānāṃ paṭalāni yasmin ambare tat tathoktam । tathā na calo 'calaḥ, sa cāsau jalanidhiśca tena sadṛśaṃ tulyaṃ vapuḥ svarūpamasyeti । tacca jalanidhisadṛśavapurambaramiti jñānam ambarasyātīndriyatvāt uktarūpasyāpi na jalanidhinā sādṛśyagrahaṇaṃ sambhavatīti nirviṣayaḥ pratyakṣābhimānaḥ । tathā śarvaryāṃ bhavaṃ śārvaraṃ tamaḥ । kiṃviśiṣṭam ? añjanacūrṇapūñjaśyāmamiti । na cābhāvarūpasya <II,125> tamasaḥ śyāmarūpasambandhitvamastīti nirviṣayatvam । saviṣayatvābhyupagame 'pi deśakālaviśeṣitasya tejaso 'bhāvasyālambanatvādadoṣaḥ ।
analyzed: udāharaṇam tu yathā vyapagata ghana paṭalam acala jalanidhi sadṛśa vapuḥ ambaram añjana cūrṇa puñja śyāmam śārvaram tamaḥ iti vyapagatāni ghanānām paṭalāni yasmin ambare tat tathā uktam tathā na calaḥ sa ca asau jalanidhiḥ ca tena sadṛśam tulyam vapuḥ svarūpam asya iti tat ca jalanidhi sadṛśa vapuḥ ambaram iti jñānam ambarasya atīndriya tvāt ukta rūpasya api na jalanidhinā sādṛśya grahaṇam sambhavati iti nirviṣayaḥ pratyakṣa abhimānaḥ tathā

original: tathā svāśrayād vinivṛttāścakṣuraśmayaḥ svātmīyaṃ golakarūpaṃ yathoktena jalanidhinā sadṛśavapurambaramityupalambhaṃ janayanti । ādarśāt pratiskhalitānāṃ svamukhagrahaṇavaditi । yathā hi, ādarśāt pratiskhalitāścakṣuraśmayaḥ svamukhe viparyayamutpādayanti ādarśamukhamiti tadvad ihāpi dūrād vinivṛttāḥ svagolakamevāmbaramityupadarśayanti ।
analyzed: tathā sva āśrayāt vinivṛttāḥ cakṣu raśmayaḥ svātmīyam golaka rūpam yathā uktena jalanidhinā sadṛśa vapuḥ ambaram iti upalambham janayanti ādarśāt pratiskhalitānām sva mukha grahaṇa vat iti yathā hi ādarśāt pratiskhalitāḥ cakṣu raśmayaḥ sva mukhe viparyayam utpādayanti ādarśa mukham iti tadvat iha api dūrāt vinivṛttāḥ sva golakam eva ambaram iti upadarśayanti

original: (“anumānaviṣaye 'pi vāṣpādibhirdhūmābhimatairvahnyanumānam, gavayaviṣāṇadarśanācca gauriti ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: anumāna viṣaye vāṣpa ādibhiḥ dhūma abhimataiḥ vahni anumānam gavaya viṣāṇa darśanāt ca gauḥ iti

original: anumānaviṣaye 'pi viparyayamāha “vāṣpādibhiḥ”(*) ityādinā । atrādipadena nīhāramaśakāvartādigrahaṇam । taiḥ kimbhūtaiḥ “dhūmābhimataiḥ”(*) dhūmarūpatayā jñātairagnyanumānamiti । tathā “gavayaviṣāṇadarśanācca gauriti”(*) jñānaṃ viparyayaḥ । atra tu liṅge viparyayajñānamindriyajam, tadvyāpārajañcānumānikam ।
analyzed: anumāna viṣaye viparyayam āha vāṣpa ādibhiḥ ityādinā atra ādi padena nīhāra maśaka āvarta ādi grahaṇam taiḥ kimbhūtaiḥ dhūma abhimataiḥ dhūma rūpa tayā jñātaiḥ agni anumānam iti tathā gavaya viṣāṇa darśanāt ca gauḥ iti jñānam viparyayaḥ atra tu liṅge viparyaya jñānam indriya jam tad vyāpāra jañca ānumānikam

original: (“trayīdarśanaviparīteṣu śākyādidarśaneṣu idaṃ śreya iti mithyāpratyayo viparyayaḥ । śarīrendriyamanaḥsu ātmābhimānaḥ, kṛtakeṣu nityatvadarśanam, kāraṇavaikalye kāryotpattijñānam, hitamupadiśatsu ahitamiti jñānam, ahitamupadiśatsu hitamiti jñānam ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: trayī darśana viparīteṣu śākya ādi darśaneṣu idam śreyaḥ iti mithyā pratyayaḥ viparyayaḥ śarīra indriya manaḥsu ātma abhimānaḥ kṛtakeṣu nitya tva darśanam kāraṇa vaikalye kārya utpatti jñānam hitam upadiśatsu ahitam iti jñānam ahitam upadiśatsu hitam iti jñānam pdhs

original: idānīmasaddarśanābhyāsād viparyayamāha “trayīdarśanaviparīteṣu śākyādidarśaneṣu idaṃ śreya iti mithyāpratyayaḥ”(*) ityādinā । trayāṇāṃ samāhārastrayī rūḍhivaśād ṛgyajuḥsāmalakṣaṇā gṛhyate । trayyeva darśanam, tadviparītāni śākyādidarśanānītyādi padena (naiśanā)<?>〈jainā〉didarśanasyāvarodhaḥ । teṣu “idaṃ śreyaḥ”(*) iti । sarvaṃ kṣaṇika〈miti 〉jñānam, śūnyaṃ nirātmakamiti jñānaṃ śreyaḥsādhakatvācchreya iti śākyadarśanābhyāsād viparyayaḥ । kṣaṇikādipakṣe bādhakasyoktatvāt । eṣvartheṣvanekāntajñānena darśane viparyayaḥ । tathetareṣvapyūhyaḥ । na ca śākyādidarśanaviparītatvāt trayyāmapi viparyaya iti <II,126> vācyam, pradhānārtheṣvātmādiṣu artheṣu bādhakānupapatteḥ । śākyādidarśaneṣu kṣaṇikatvādipadārtheṣūktaṃ bādhakamabādhyamānamiti ।
analyzed: idānīm asat darśana abhyāsāt viparyayam āha trayī darśana viparīteṣu śākya ādi darśaneṣu idam śreyaḥ iti mithyā pratyayaḥ ityādinā trayāṇām samāhāraḥ trayī rūḍhi vaśāt ṛk yajuḥ sāma lakṣaṇā gṛhyate trayī eva darśanam tad viparītāni śākya ādi darśanāni ityādi padena naiśana ajaina ādi darśanasya avarodhaḥ teṣu idam śreyaḥ iti sarvam kṣaṇikam iti jñānam śūnyam nirātmakam iti jñānam śreyaḥ sādhaka tvāt śreyaḥ iti śākya

original: anye tu trayāṇāṃ pratyakṣānumānāgamānāṃ samāhārastrayī, tadeva dṛśyate 'neneti darśanam, tadviparītāni śākyādidarśanāni, tairbādhopapatteḥ । tadupalakṣitaṃ vā vaiśeṣikadarśanam, tadviparītāni śākyādidarśanāni, bādhyamānatvādityuktam ।
analyzed: anye tu trayāṇām pratyakṣa anumāna āgamānām samāhāraḥ trayī tat eva dṛśyate nena iti darśanam tad viparītāni śākya ādi darśanāni taiḥ bādhā upapatteḥ tad upalakṣitam vā vaiśeṣika darśanam tad viparītāni śākya ādi darśanāni bādhyamāna tvāt iti uktam

original: tathā “śarīrendriyamanaḥsu ātmābhimānaḥ”(*) viparyayaḥ । śarīramevātmeti viparyayo laukāyatikānām । indriyāṇyevātmeti indriyacaitanyavādinām । manaścaitanyavādināṃ mana eveti ।

original: yadā tu na paramaśivādeḥ sadbhāva iti vaiyātyād vadanti vaiśeṣikāstadā nedaṃ paramārthato hitamiti hitamupadiśatsu vaiśeṣikeṣu ahitamevedamiti jñānaṃ viparyayasteṣām ।

analyzed: atha asti anvaya parimāṇa śakti pravṛtti upakārya upakāraka bhāva vaiśvarūpyebhyaḥ pradhānam tathā hi sarvam idam śarīra ādi kāryam sukha duḥkha moha anvitam upalabhyate yat ca anvitam tat ekasmāt kāraṇāt utpadyamānam dṛṣṭam yathā ekasmāt mṛd piṇḍāt mṛd anvitam aneka ghaṭa ādi tathā ca anumānam bhuvana ādi kāryam ekasmāt kāraṇāt utpadyate anvita tvāt ghaṭa ādi vat  / tathā ca asya pakṣa dharma tvam sukha duḥkha ādi samanvayasya sarveṣu śa

original: sarvametadasat, anvayādergamakatvānupapatteḥ । tathāhi, śarīrāderekakāraṇapūrvakatve sādhye 'nvitatvamahetuḥ sandigdhatvāt । atha sukhaduḥkhādisamanvitatvaṃ hetuḥ, tanna, svarūpāsiddhatvāt । tathāhi, sukhaduḥkhādīnāṃ pūrvamevātmaguṇatvena pratipāditatvāt śarīrādiguṇatvamasiddham । ghaṭādidṛṣṭānto 'pi sādhanavikalaḥ । tatrānvitasyaikakāraṇapūrvakatvena vyāptasyānupalambhāt । atha mṛdanvitatvaṃ ghaṭādāvasti, taccāsiddham, pakṣe pratyakṣeṇa ca śarīrāderupādānaṃ pratiniyatajātīyamanekamupalabhyata iti, kālātyayāpadiṣṭañca sādhanam ।

original: evaṃ parimitatvamiyattāvadhāraṇaviṣayatvamasiddham, avāntarabhedena śarīrāderānantyāt । atha vargāpekṣayā parimitatvam, tathāpyanaikāntikatvam, paradṛṣṭyā nityeṣvapi bhāvāt । sattvarajastamāṃsi ca parimitāni na caikakāraṇapūrvakānīti, pradhānasyaiva tadrūpatvāt । tathā ekakāraṇapūrvakatvābhāve 'pi paramāṇvādīni vargāpekṣayā parimitānīti । aṅkurāderapi bhaumānalasambandhād bījāvayavakriyākrameṇa pūrvadravyavināśe sati dvyaṇukādiprakrameṇotpādād ekakāraṇapūrvakatvamasiddham ।

original: yaccedaṃ śaktānāṃ kāraṇānāṃ kāryotpattau vyāpārācchaktirūpatayā kāryasyāvasthānamityuktam, tadasat, śakteścaramasahakārirūpatayā kāryādarthāntaratvāt । na ca kāryakāraṇayorekatvam, vibhinnapratibhāsaviṣayatvāt । pratibhāsabhedaśca padārthānāṃ bhedavyavahāre hetuḥ । tatsadbhāve 'pyekatvābhyupagame sarveṣāmekatāprasaṅgānna caturviṃśatitattvānīti syāt । tathā svarūpabhedo 'rthakriyābhedaśca kāryakāraṇayoḥ । sūkṣmamanekañca samavāyikāraṇam, adhikamekañca kāryamiti, tasya pūrvaṃ kāraṇeṣvasattvam, anupalambhāt । athānabhivyakteranupalambhaḥ ? sadbhāve kiṃ pramāṇam ? utpatteriti cet, na, vidyamānasyotpatterayogāt । atha avidyamānasyotpattau kharaviṣāṇādīnāmutpattiḥ syāt ? 〈na,〉 kāraṇābhāvāt । yeṣāṃ hi kāraṇamasti janakaṃ teṣāmevotpattirna kharaviṣāṇādiṣvetadasti, kāryābhāvenaiva kāraṇābhāvapratīteḥ । evaṃ tantuṣu ghaṭādermṛtpiṇḍe ca paṭāderanutpattirvācyā, pratiniyatasāmagryāḥ pratiniyatakāryajanakatvāt । tantūpalakṣitā hi sāmagrī paṭasyaiva janikopalabdhā, anyā tu anyasyetyupādāneṣu kāryaniyamo, na sattvāditi । yaccotpadyate tadutpatteḥ pūrvamasat, na punaryad yadasat tadutpadyata iti vyāptiḥ ।
analyzed: yat ca idam śaktānām kāraṇānām kārya utpattau vyāpārāt śakti rūpatayā kāryasya avasthānam iti uktam tat asat śakteḥ carama sahakāri rūpatayā kāryāt artha antara tvāt na ca kārya kāraṇayoḥ ekatvam vibhinna pratibhāsa viṣaya tvāt pratibhāsa bhedaḥ ca padārthānām bheda vyavahāre hetuḥ tad sadbhāve pi ekatva abhyupagame sarveṣām ekatā prasaṅgāt na caturviṃśati tattvāni iti syāt tathā svarūpa bhedaḥ rthakriyā bhedaḥ ca kārya kāraṇayoḥ sūk

original: yaccotpadyamānatvena hetunā sattvam, tadasat, tasyāsādhāraṇatvenāgamakatvāt । tathāhi, sati ākāśādau, asati ca kharaviṣāṇādau, utpadyamānatvaṃ nāstīti ।

original: yaccāyaṃ vyapadeśo 'ṅkuro jāyate, ghaṭaṃ kurviti ayamapi mukhya bādhakapramāṇasadbhāvād bhākto draṣṭavyaḥ । tathāhi, yadi vidyamānasyaiva ghaṭasya karmatvamaṅkurasya ca kartṛtvamiṣyetotpattirvyāhatā syāt, vidyamānatvādeva kārakavyāpāravaiyarthyañca । athābhivyaktyarthaṃ vyāpāraḥ, tadasat, abhivyakterapi vidyamānatvāt । athābhivyaktiravidyamānaiva kriyate ? tarhi sadutpadyata iti vyāhatam । abhivyaktestu svarūpopalambhasya avidyamānasyaivotpatteḥ । na cāvaraṇavyapagamo 'bhivyaktiḥ, āvaraṇasyaivānupalabdheḥ । tasmād vidyamānasya utpattyarthāsambhavād upacaritamaṅkurādeḥ svajanikartṛtvaṃ karmatvañceti vyapadeśasyānyathāsiddhatvam ।

analyzed: yat ca idam upakārya upakāraka bhāva āpanna tvāt eka kāraṇa pūrvakatvam iti uktam tat api asat yadi paraspara apekṣāṇām eka kārya janaka tvam upakārya upakāraka bhāvaḥ vivakṣitaḥ sa ca nityeṣu asti iti vyabhicārī sādhya vikalaḥ ca dṛṣṭāntaḥ vibhinna kāraka janya tvāt āsandika aṅgānām

original: tathā dadhyādivaiśvarūpyamapyuktakāraṇapūrvakaṃ na bhavati, svāvayavakāryatvāt । tathāhi, svāvayavebhyo dadhyutpadyate, na kṣīrāt । bhaumānalasambandhādavayavakriyānyāyena vinaṣṭe hi kṣīre punaḥ utpannapākajairdvyaṇukādikrameṇa dadhyāderutpattirityato vaiśvarūpyasyaikakāraṇapūrvakatvābhāvaḥ । pratyakṣeṇa ca pakṣe pratiniyatajātīyamanekaṃ kāraṇamupalabdhamiti kālātyayāpadiṣṭañca vaiśvarūpyamiti ।
analyzed: tathā dadhi ādi vaiśvarūpyam api ukta kāraṇa pūrvakam na bhavati sva avayava kāryatvāt tathā hi sva avayavebhyaḥ dadhi utpadyate na kṣīrāt bhauma anala sambandhāt avayava kriyā nyāyena vinaṣṭe hi kṣīre punar utpanna pāka jaiḥ dvyaṇuka ādi krameṇa dadhi ādeḥ utpattiḥ iti atas vaiśvarūpyasya eka kāraṇa pūrvaka tva abhāvaḥ pratyakṣeṇa ca pakṣe pratiniyata jātīyam anekam kāraṇam upalabdham iti kāla atyaya apadiṣṭam ca vaiśvarūpyam iti

original: na ca kiñcitkāryamekasmādeva kāraṇādutpadyamānamupalabdhamiti avidyamānasapakṣasya anvayādervipakṣe sadbhāvaḥ । tadevamanvayādīnāmagamakatvāt pradhānāsiddhau buddhyāderasambhava eva । pratihataśca pradhānavādo 'smadgurubhirvistareṇeti neha pratanyate । ataḥ sāṃkhyānāmayaṃ viparyayaḥ pradhānapūrvakam jagaditi ।
analyzed: na ca kiñcid kāryam ekasmāt eva kāraṇāt utpadyamānam upalabdham iti avidyamāna sapakṣasya anvaya ādeḥ vipakṣe sadbhāvaḥ tat evam anvaya ādīnām agamaka tvāt pradhāna asiddhau buddhi ādeḥ asambhavaḥ eva pratihataḥ ca pradhāna vādaḥ smat gurubhiḥ vistareṇa iti na iha pratanyate atas sāṃkhyānām ayam viparyayaḥ pradhāna pūrvakam jagat iti

original: tathā śarīrasya parimāṇabhedena bhedopapatteḥ śarīramevātmetyabhyupagame pratisandhānaṃ na syādityātmanaḥ śarīrādivyatirekeṇa nityatvaṃ pratipattavyamiti hitamupadiśatsu vaiśeṣikeṣvahitajñānaṃ viparyayo laukāyatikānām । samānañcaitat saugatajainānām । tathāhi, saṅkocavikāsadharmakatvādātmanaḥ sapariṇāmatve 'nyatvena bhedopapatteḥ smaraṇaṃ na syāt । bodhācca bodharūpateti pratibandhapratiṣedhād bodhamātre 'pyātmani smaraṇānutpattau śreyobuddherabhāva ityalaṃ vistareṇeti ।
analyzed: tathā śarīrasya parimāṇa bhedena bheda upapatteḥ śarīram eva ātmā iti abhyupagame pratisandhānam na syāt iti ātmanaḥ śarīra ādi vyatirekeṇa nitya tvam pratipattavyam iti hitam upadiśatsu vaiśeṣikeṣu ahita jñānam viparyayaḥ laukāyatikānām samānam ca etat saugata jainānām tathā hi saṅkoca vikāsa dharmaka tvāt ātmanaḥ sa pariṇāma tve nya tvena bheda upapatteḥ smaraṇam na syāt bodhāt ca bodha rūpa tā iti pratibandha pratiṣedhāt bodha mātre pi ātmani

original: {anadhyavasāyavaidharmyam}

(“anadhyavasāyo 'pi pratyakṣānumānaviṣaye (eva) sañjāyate । tatra pratyakṣaviṣaye tāvat prasiddhārtheṣvaprasiddhārtheṣu vā vyāsaṅgāda〈na〉rthitvād vā kimityālocanamātramanadhyavasāyaḥ । yathā bāhīkasya panasādiṣvanadhyavasāyo bhavati । tatra sattādravyatvapṛthivītvavṛkṣatva(rūpādiḥ) śākhādyapekṣo 'dhyavasāyo bhavati । panasatvamapi panaseṣvanuvṛttamāmrādibhyo vyāvṛttaṃ pratyakṣameva, kevalantūpadeśābhāvād viśeṣasaṃjñāpratipattirna bhavati ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: pratyakṣa anumāna viṣaye eva sañjāyate tatra pratyakṣa viṣaye tāvat prasiddha artheṣu aprasiddha artheṣu vā vyāsaṅgāt anarthi tvāt vā kim iti ālocana mātram anadhyavasāyaḥ yathā bāhīkasya panasa ādiṣu anadhyavasāyaḥ bhavati tatra sattā dravya tva pṛthivī tva vṛkṣa tva rūpa ādiḥ śākhā ādi apekṣaḥ dhyavasāyaḥ bhavati panasa tvam api panaseṣu anuvṛttam āmra ādibhyaḥ vyāvṛttam pratyakṣam eva kevala ntu upadeśa abhāvāt viśeṣa saṃj

original: idānīmanadhyavasāyasya kāraṇasvarūpaviṣayavibhāganirūpaṇārthaṃ na paraṃ viparyayaḥ “anadhyavasāyo 'pi pratyakṣānumānaviṣaye sañjāyate”(*) ityādi prakaraṇam । anadhyavasitiranadhyavasāyaḥ, jñānamaniścayātmakam । tacca saṃśayādibhyo 'rthāntaram, kāraṇabhedād, viṣayabhedācceti ॥
analyzed: idānīm anadhyavasāyasya kāraṇa svarūpa viṣaya vibhāga nirūpaṇa artham na param viparyayaḥ pratyakṣa anumāna viṣaye sañjāyate ityādi prakaraṇam anadhyavasitiḥ anadhyavasāyaḥ jñānam aniścaya ātmakam tat ca saṃśaya ādibhyaḥ rtha antaram kāraṇa bhedāt viṣaya bhedāt ca iti

original: “〈tatra〉 pratyakṣaviṣaye tāvat”(*) vyākhyāyate । “prasiddhārtheṣvaprasiddhārtheṣu”(*) ca viṣayeṣu bhavatītyataḥ saṃśayād bhidyate । saṃśayo hi prasiddhārtheṣveva bhavatīti । atha prasiddhārtheṣu kutaḥ kāraṇādanadhyavasāya ityāha “vyāsaṅgāda〈na〉rthitvād vā”(*) iti । yathā 〈vyāsaṅgāt〉 iṣukārasya iṣāvāsaktamanaso mahati gate 'pi rājani “kinnāmāyaṃ gataḥ” ityanadhyavasāyaḥ । a〈na〉rthitvāt svānuṣṭhānaniratasya tapasvino mahatyapi rājanyanadhyavasāyaḥ “kinnāmāyaṃ gataḥ” iti ।
analyzed: tatra pratyakṣa viṣaye tāvat vyākhyāyate prasiddha artheṣu aprasiddha artheṣu ca viṣayeṣu bhavati iti atas saṃśayāt bhidyate saṃśayaḥ hi prasiddha artheṣu eva bhavati iti atha prasiddha artheṣu kutas kāraṇāt anadhyavasāyaḥ iti āha vyāsaṅgāt anarthi tvāt vā iti yathā vyāsaṅgāt iṣukārasya iṣau āsakta manasaḥ mahati gate rājani kinnāmā ayam gataḥ iti anadhyavasāyaḥ anarthi tvāt sva anuṣṭhāna niratasya tapasvinaḥ mahati api rājani anadhyav

original: na cāyaṃ saṃśayaḥ, tasyobhayollekhitvāt, sāmānyopalambhādibhyaścotpadyamānatvācca । ityato 'nadhyavasāya itarasmād bhidyate yathoktakāraṇajanyatvāt । yathoktaṃ vā jñānam anadhyavasāya iti vyavahartavyam uktakāraṇebhyo niṣpadyamānatvāt । yastu na bhidyate na caivaṃ vyavahriyate, na cāsāvuktakāraṇebhyo niṣpadyate । yathā saṃśayādiriti ।
analyzed: na ca ayam saṃśayaḥ tasya ubhaya ullekhi tvāt sāmānya upalambha ādibhyaḥ ca utpadyamāna tvāt ca iti atas itarasmāt bhidyate yathā ukta kāraṇa janya tvāt yathā uktam vā jñānam anadhyavasāyaḥ iti vyavahartavyam ukta kāraṇebhyaḥ niṣpadyamāna tvāt yaḥ tu na bhidyate na ca evam vyavahriyate na ca asau ukta kāraṇebhyaḥ niṣpadyate yathā saṃśaya ādiḥ iti

original: tasya svarūpamāha “kimityālocanamātram”(*) kiṃ nāmeti jñānaṃ viśeṣasaṃjñollekhaśūnyamanadhyavasāya iti ।
analyzed: tasya svarūpam āha kim iti ālocana mātram kim nāma iti jñānam viśeṣa saṃjñā ullekha śūnyam anadhyavasāyaḥ iti

original: aprasiddhārtheṣu “yathā bāhīkasya panasādiṣvanadhyavasāyo bhavati”(*) bāhīko (hiṭhakaḥ)<?>〈hiraṭhakaḥ〉 tasya panasādiṣu saṅketābhāvād viśeṣasaṃjñollekhaśūnyaṃ “kinnāmāyam” iti jñānamutpadyate । tatra hi “sattādravyatvapṛthivītvavṛkṣatvarūpādiśākhādyapekṣo 'dhyavasāyaḥ”(*) eva । tathāhi, sannayam iti niścayajñānam । tathā dravyaṃ pṛthivī vṛkṣo rūpādimāṃśchākhādimāṃśceti adhyavasāya eva । tathā panasatvamapi nirvikalpakabodhe “panaseṣvanuvṛttamāmrādibhyo vyāvṛttaṃ pratyakṣameva”(*) ।
analyzed: aprasiddha artheṣu yathā bāhīkasya panasa ādiṣu anadhyavasāyaḥ bhavati bāhīkaḥ hiṭhakaḥ hiraṭhakaḥ tasya panasa ādiṣu saṅketa abhāvāt viśeṣa saṃjñā ullekha śūnyam kim nāma ayam iti jñānam utpadyate tatra hi sattā dravya tva pṛthivī tva vṛkṣa tva rūpa ādi śākhā ādi apekṣaḥ dhyavasāyaḥ eva tathā hi san ayam iti niścaya jñānam tathā dravyam pṛthivī vṛkṣaḥ rūpa ādimān śākhā ādimān ca iti adhyavasāyaḥ eva tathā panasa tvam

original: nanvevaṃ tarhi kva viṣaye 'nadhyavasāya ityāha “kevalantūpadeśābhāvāt”(*) saṅketābhāvād viśeṣasaṃjñollekhinī panaso 'yamiti “pratipattirna bhavati”(*) iti । <II,132> nanvevaṃ tarhi pratipattyabhāvo 'nadhyavasāyaḥ syāt, tasya cābhāvarūpatvād avidyāyāmantarbhāvo 'nupapannaḥ ? naitadevam, kinnāmāyamityaniścayātmakajñānasya saṃśayādivilakṣaṇasyānubhūyamānatayāpalāpāyogāt । tasya cāvidyālakṣaṇayuktatvādavidyāyāmantarbhāva iti ।
analyzed: nanu evam tarhi kva viṣaye nadhyavasāyaḥ iti āha saṅketa abhāvāt viśeṣa saṃjñā ullekhinī panasaḥ yam iti pratipattiḥ na bhavati iti   nanu evam tarhi pratipatti abhāvaḥ nadhyavasāyaḥ syāt tasya ca abhāva rūpa tvāt avidyāyām antarbhāvaḥ nupapannaḥ na etat evam kim nāma ayam iti aniścaya ātmaka jñānasya saṃśaya ādi vilakṣaṇasya anubhūyamāna tayā apalāpa ayogāt tasya ca avidyā lakṣaṇa yukta tvāt avidyāyām antarbhāvaḥ iti

original: (“anumānaviṣaye 'pi nārikeladvīpavāsinaḥ sāsnāmātradarśanāt ko nu khalvatra prāṇī syādityanadhyavasāyo bhavati ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: anumāna viṣaye pi nārikela dvīpa vāsinaḥ sāsnā mātra darśanāt kaḥ nu khalu atra prāṇī syāt iti anadhyavasāyaḥ bhavati

original: “anumānaviṣaye 'pi nālikeradvīpavāsinaḥ”(*) akṛtasamayasya piṇḍānupalambhe “sāsnāmātradarśanāt ko nu khalvatra prāṇī syādityanadhyavasāyo bhavati”(*) pūrvaṃ hi saṅketāpratipattāvapi sāsnā prāmāṇyāvinābhūtopalabdhā, tadupalambhāt piṇḍānupalambhe 'pi avinābhāvasambandhasmaraṇānantaraṃ parāmarśajñāne sati ko nu khalvatra pradeśe prāṇīti, kinnāmātra prāṇīti syādityanadhyavasāyaḥ ।
analyzed: anumāna viṣaye pi nālikera dvīpa vāsinaḥ akṛta samayasya piṇḍa anupalambhe sāsnā mātra darśanāt kaḥ nu khalu atra prāṇī syāt iti anadhyavasāyaḥ bhavati pūrvam hi saṅketa apratipattau api sāsnā prāmāṇya avinābhūta upalabdhā tad upalambhāt piṇḍa anupalambhe pi avinābhāva sambandha smaraṇa anantaram parāmarśa jñāne sati kaḥ nu khalu atra pradeśe prāṇī iti kinnāma atra prāṇī iti syāt iti anadhyavasāyaḥ

original: {svapnavaidharmyam}
analyzed: svapna vaidharmyam

original: (“uparatendriyagrāmasya pralīnamanaskasyendriyadvāreṇeva yadanubhavanaṃ mānasaṃ tat svapnajñānam ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: uparata indriya grāmasya pralīna manaskasya indriya dvāreṇa iva yat anubhavanam mānasam tat svapna jñānam

original: tadevamanadhyavasāyasya kāraṇādibhedena bhedamabhidhāya svapnanirūpaṇamāha “uparatendriyagrāmasya”(*) ityādi । uparataḥ svaviṣayagrahaṇaṃ prati nivṛtta indriyāṇāṃ grāmo yasyāsau tathoktastasya । “pralīnamanaskasya”(*) iti । pralīnaṃ nendriyadeśena saṃyuktaṃ mano yasyāsau tasya pralīnamanaskasya । “indriyadvāreṇeva yadanubhavanaṃ mānasam”(*) utpadyate, “tat svapnajñānam”(*) iti । manasi bhavaṃ mānasaṃ tacca smaraṇasukhādyapi bhavatīti tannivṛttyarthamanubhavanapadam । anubhavanañca bāhyendriyajamapīti mānasagrahaṇam । tathāpi sukhaduḥkhādyanubhavairvyabhicārastadarthamuparatendriyagrāmasyeti । sukhādyanubhavaścendriyaja eva manasastatra vyāpārāt । athoparatendriyagrāmasya mānasaṃ svapnāntikamapi bhavatīti vyabhicāraḥ, tanna, tasya smṛtirūpatayā anubhavanapadenaiva vyavacchinnatvāt ।
analyzed: tat evam anadhyavasāyasya kāraṇa ādi bhedena bhedam abhidhāya svapna nirūpaṇam āha uparata indriya grāmasya ityādi uparataḥ sva viṣaya grahaṇam prati nivṛttaḥ indriyāṇām grāmaḥ yasya asau tathā uktaḥ tasya pralīna manaskasya iti pralīnam na indriya deśena saṃyuktam manaḥ yasya asau tasya pralīna manaskasya indriya dvāreṇa iva yat anubhavanam mānasam utpadyate tat svapna jñānam iti manasi bhavam mānasam tat ca smaraṇa sukha ādi api bhavati iti tad nivṛtti

original: anye tvasya vyavacchedārthamavidyāsāmānyalakṣaṇamanuvartayantīti ।
analyzed: anye tu asya vyavaccheda artham avidyā sāmānya lakṣaṇam anuvartayanti iti

original: na ca nimīlitākṣasya nīlapītādijñānamuparatendriyagrāmasya bhavatītyāśaṅkanīyam, viṣayasānnidhye satīndriyāntareṇa tasya jñānotpādāt । yadā hi <II,133> viṣayasānnidhye 'pi nendriyeṇa jñānaṃ tadaivoparatendriyagrāmaḥ puruṣo 'bhidhīyata iti । na ca cakṣurvyāpāraṃ vinā nīlapītādiṣvanubhavanaṃ sambhavatīti smaraṇametannyāyyam, taccānubhavapadenaiva vyavacchinnam । nanvevamapyuparatendriyagrāmasya mānasānubhavanatvāt svapnajñānam itarasmād bhidyate ityukte vyabhicārābhāvaḥ, kimarthaṃ pralīnamanaskasyendriyadvāreṇeveti padadvayam ? lakṣaṇāntarārtham । tathāhi, pralīnamanaskasya yadanubhavanaṃ mānasaṃ tat svapnajñānamiti dvitīyaṃ lakṣaṇam । pralīnamanaskasya svapnāntikamapi bhavatītyanubhavanapadam । anubhavanañca sukhādiṣu bhavatīti pralīnamanaskapadam ।
analyzed: na ca nimīlita akṣasya nīla pīta ādi jñānam uparata indriya grāmasya bhavati iti āśaṅkanīyam viṣaya sānnidhye sati indriya antareṇa tasya jñāna utpādāt yadā hi viṣaya sānnidhye na indriyeṇa jñānam tadā eva uparata indriya grāmaḥ puruṣaḥ bhidhīyate iti na ca cakṣuḥ vyāpāram vinā nīla pīta ādiṣu anubhavanam sambhavati iti smaraṇam etat nyāyyam tat ca anubhava padena eva vyavacchinnam nanu evam api uparata indriya grāmasya mānasa anubhavana tvāt svapna

original: ataḥ pralīnamanaskānubhavatvāt itarasmād bhidyate, tathendriyadvāreṇevotpadyamānatve sati mānasānubhavanatvāditi । indriyadvāreṇevotpadyate svapnāntikamato 'nubhavanamiti । anubhavanañca sukhādāvapi bhavatīti indriyadvāreṇeveti padam ।
analyzed: atas pralīna manaska anubhava tvāt itarasmāt bhidyate tathā indriya dvāreṇa iva utpadyamāna tve sati mānasa anubhavana tvāt iti indriya dvāreṇa iva utpadyate svapnāntikam atas nubhavanam iti anubhavanam ca sukha ādau api bhavati iti indriya dvāreṇa iva iti padam

original: {svapnotpattiprakāraḥ}
analyzed: svapna utpatti prakāraḥ

original: (“katham ? yadā buddhipūrvādātmanaḥ śarīravyāpārādahani khinnānāṃ prāṇināṃ niśi viśrāmārthamāhārapariṇāmāthaṃ vā adṛṣṭakāritaprayatnāpekṣādātmāntaḥkaraṇasambandhānmanasi kriyāprabandhādantarhṛdaye nirindriye ātmapradeśe niścalaṃ manastiṣṭhati tadā pralīnamanaska ityākhyāyate ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: katham yadā buddhi pūrvāt ātmanaḥ śarīra vyāpārāt ahani khinnānām prāṇinām niśi viśrāma artham āhāra pariṇāma atham vā adṛṣṭa kārita prayatna apekṣāt ātma antaḥkaraṇa sambandhāt manasi kriyā prabandhāt antar hṛdaye nirindriye ātma pradeśe niścalam manaḥ tiṣṭhati tadā pralīna manaskaḥ iti ākhyāyate pdhs

original: (“pralīne ca tasminnuparatendriyagrāmo bhavati । tasyāmavasthāyāṃ prabandhena prāṇāpānasantānapravṛttāvātmamanaḥsaṃyogaviśeṣāt svāpākhyāt saṃskārāccendriyadvāreṇeva asatsu viṣayeṣu pratyakṣākāraṃ svapnajñānamutpadyate ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: pralīne ca tasmin uparata indriya grāmaḥ bhavati tasyām avasthāyām prabandhena prāṇa apāna santāna pravṛttau ātma manaḥ saṃyoga viśeṣāt svāpa ākhyāt saṃskārāt ca indriya dvāreṇa iva asatsu viṣayeṣu pratyakṣa ākāram svapna jñānam utpadyate pdhs

original: atha kathaṃ svapnajñānamutpadyate, puruṣaścoparatendriyagrāmaḥ pralīnamanaskaśca bhavatītyāha “yadā”(*) ityādi । yadāntarhṛdaye na bāhye, nirgatānīndriyāṇi yasyāsau tathoktastasminnātmapradeśe, niścalaṃ kriyāśūnyaṃ manastiṣṭhati tadā puruṣaḥ pralīnamanaska ityākhyāyate ।
analyzed: atha katham svapna jñānam utpadyate puruṣaḥ ca uparata indriya grāmaḥ pralīna manaskaḥ ca bhavati iti āha yadā ityādi yadā antar hṛdaye na bāhye nirgatāni indriyāṇi yasya asau tathā uktaḥ tasmin ātma pradeśe niścalam kriyā śūnyam manaḥ tiṣṭhati tadā puruṣaḥ pralīna manaskaḥ iti ākhyāyate

original: anye tvāgamābhimatam adhomukhaṃ kamalaṃ nirindriyātmapradeśastatra niścalaṃ manastiṣṭhatīti bruvate ।
analyzed: anye tu āgama abhimatam adhomukham kamalam niḥ indriya ātma pradeśaḥ tatra niścalam manaḥ tiṣṭhati iti bruvate

original: sa ca viśiṣṭātmasambandhaḥ kriyāprabandhāt kriyāsantānād bhavati । kriyā<II,134>prabandhaścātmāntaḥkaraṇasaṃyogādadṛṣṭakāritāt prayatnāpekṣādutpadyate । tathāhi, manaḥ samavāyikāraṇam, ātmamanaḥsaṃyogo 'samavāyikāraṇam, adṛṣṭakāritaprayatno nimittakāraṇamityevaṃ manasi kriyāprabandhād viśiṣṭātmapradeśena saṃyogaḥ svāpākhyaḥ sampadyate ।
analyzed: sa ca viśiṣṭa ātma sambandhaḥ kriyā prabandhāt kriyā santānāt bhavati    prayatna apekṣāt utpadyate tathā hi manaḥ samavāyi kāraṇam ātma manaḥ saṃyogaḥ samavāyi kāraṇam adṛṣṭa kārita prayatnaḥ nimitta kāraṇam iti evam manasi kriyā prabandhāt viśiṣṭa ātma pradeśena saṃyogaḥ svāpa ākhyaḥ sampadyate

original: sa ca kadā ? “niśi”(*) iti bāhulyāpekṣayā tasya । kimarthañca bhavatīti “viśrāmārthamāhārapariṇāmārthaṃ vā”(*) iti । puruṣabhedāpekṣayā samastaṃ vyastañcaitad vivakṣitam । kasyacidekaṃ prayojanaṃ kasyacidubhayamapi bhavatīti । kiṃviśiṣṭasya prāṇinaḥ ? ahani khinnasya । kutaḥ ? śarīravyāpārāt । sa ca nāvādyārūḍhasyāpi sambhavati na ca tasmāt khedaḥ, tadartham “buddhipūrvāt”(*) buddhiśca smaraṇecchādvāreṇa vyāpārotpattau kāraṇaṃ na sākṣāt । tathāpi śarīrāntareṣu buddhipūrvako vyāpāro niyogadvāreṇa sambhavati, na ca tasmāt khedastadartham “ātmanaḥ”(*) svaśarīrasyeti । evamuktakrameṇa nirindriyapradeśasambaddhaṃ pralīnaṃ mano 'padiśyate । pralīne ca tasmin uparatendriyagrāmaḥ puruṣo bhavati, manasānadhiṣṭhitānāmindriyāṇāṃ svaviṣaye vyāpārāsambhavāt । jīvanantu tasyāmavasthāyāmanumīyate । “prabandhena”(*) sātatyena, prāṇāpānasantānasya pravṛttau satyām । tathāhi, prāṇāpānasantānapravṛttiḥ prayatnakāryā na cecchādveṣapūrvakaḥ prayatno 'tra sambhavatyato jīvanapūrvakaḥ prayatno 'numīyata iti vakṣyāmaḥ prayatnādhikāre ।
analyzed: sa ca kadā niśi iti bāhulya apekṣayā tasya kimartham ca bhavati iti viśrāma artham āhāra pariṇāma artham vā iti puruṣa bheda apekṣayā samastam vyastam ca etat vivakṣitam kasyacid ekam prayojanam kasyacid ubhayam api bhavati iti kiṃviśiṣṭasya prāṇinaḥ ahani khinnasya kutas śarīra vyāpārāt sa ca nāvā ādi ārūḍhasya api sambhavati na ca tasmāt khedaḥ tad artham buddhi pūrvāt buddhiḥ ca smaraṇa icchā dvāreṇa vyāpāra utpattau kāraṇam na sākṣāt ta

original: athaivaṃ pralīnamanaskasyoparatendriyagrāmasyātmanaḥ kutaḥ svapnajñānamutpadyata ityāha “ātmamanaḥsaṃyogaviśeṣāt”(*) asamavāyikāraṇāt, svāpa ityākhyā saṃjñā yasyātmamanaḥsaṃyogaviśeṣasyāsau tathoktastasmāt । “saṃskārācca”(*) iti । saṃskāraḥ smṛtyutpattidvāreṇa svapnajñānotpattau kāraṇamiti ।
analyzed: atha evam pralīna manaskasya uparata indriya grāmasya ātmanaḥ kutas svapna jñānam utpadyate iti āha ātma manaḥ saṃyoga viśeṣāt asamavāyi kāraṇāt svāpaḥ iti ākhyā saṃjñā yasya ātma manaḥ saṃyoga viśeṣasya asau tathā uktaḥ tasmāt saṃskārāt ca iti saṃskāraḥ smṛti utpatti dvāreṇa svapna jñāna utpattau kāraṇam iti

original: yadvā svāpākhyāditi saṃskāraviśeṣaṇam । yo hi saṃskāraḥ svāpāvasthāyāṃ smṛtidvāreṇa svasaṃjñānaheturbhavatyasau svāpākhya iti । tasmād dikkālādibhyaścendriyadvāreṇeva asatsu avidyamāneṣu viṣayeṣu hastyādiṣu pratyakṣākāraṃ pratyakṣamiva svapnajñānamutpadyate ।
analyzed: yat vā svāpa ākhyāt iti saṃskāra viśeṣaṇam yaḥ hi saṃskāraḥ svāpa avasthāyām smṛti dvāreṇa sva saṃjñāna hetuḥ bhavati asau svāpa ākhyaḥ iti tasmāt diś kāla ādibhyaḥ ca indriya dvāreṇa iva asatsu a vidyamāneṣu viṣayeṣu hasti ādiṣu pratyakṣa ākāram pratyakṣam iva svapna jñānam utpadyate

original: anye tu kuḍyādaya eva hastyātmanā vyavasthitāḥ svapnajñānasyālambanamiti manyante । yaccedam asatsu viṣayeṣūtpadyate svapnajñānamityuktaṃ tadapi hastyādisvarūpāpekṣayā, tena hi rūpeṇa teṣāmasattvāditi ।
analyzed: anye tu kuḍya ādayaḥ eva hasti ātmanā vyavasthitāḥ svapna jñānasya ālambanam iti manyante yat ca idam asatsu viṣayeṣu utpadyate svapna jñānam iti uktam tat api hasti ādi svarūpa apekṣayā tena hi rūpeṇa teṣām asattvāt iti

original: tadetadasat, kuḍyāderālambanatve pramāṇābhāvāt । na ca svapnotthitasya “mamaite kuḍyādayo hastyādirūpatayā pratibhātā” iti pratyabhijñānamasti । nāpīndriyāṇāṃ kuḍyādiṣu hastyādijñānajanmani vyāpāraḥ sambhavati, tadvyāpāroparame sati tatra jñānasya bhavanāt । manaso 'pi bahirviṣaye svātantryeṇa vyāpāraḥ pratiṣiddha eva । tasmānnirviṣaya eva svapnajñānamiti ।
analyzed: tat etat asat kuḍya ādeḥ ālambana tve pramāṇa abhāvāt na ca svapna utthitasya mama ete kuḍya ādayaḥ hasti ādi rūpa tayā pratibhātāḥ iti pratyabhijñānam asti na api indriyāṇām kuḍya ādiṣu hasti ādi jñāna janmani vyāpāraḥ sambhavati tad vyāpāra uparame sati tatra jñānasya bhavanāt bahis viṣaye svātantryeṇa vyāpāraḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ eva tasmāt nirviṣayaḥ eva svapna jñānam iti

original: atha svapnajñānaṃ na viparyayādibhyo 'rthāntaram । tathāhi, svapnajñānam atasmiṃstadityutpadyamānaṃ viparyayajñānameva । kimayaṃ sthāṇuḥ puruṣo vetyubhayollekhitve sati saṃśayajñānam । kiṃnāmāyamiti cotpāde 'nadhyavasāya iti na svapnajñānametebhyo 'rthāntaram । pṛthagabhidhānantu śubhāśubhasūcakatvāditi ।
analyzed: atha svapna jñānam na viparyaya ādibhyaḥ rtha antaram tathā hi svapna jñānam a tasmin tat iti utpadyamānam viparyaya jñānam eva kim ayam sthāṇuḥ puruṣaḥ vā iti ubhaya ullekhi tve sati saṃśaya jñānam kiṃnāmā ayam iti ca utpāde na adhyavasāyaḥ iti na svapna jñānam etebhyaḥ rtha antaram pṛthak abhidhānam tu śubha aśubha sūcaka tvāt iti

original: naitad yuktam, kāraṇādibhedenāsya viparyayādibhyo 'rthāntaratvāditi kecit । tathāhi, viparyayajñānaṃ pratyakṣānumānaviṣaye pittakaphānilopahatendriyasya puruṣasyotpadyate । saṃśayastu sāmānyopalambhāditaḥ pratyakṣānumānaviṣaye prasiddhobhayaviśeṣasya bhavatītyevamanadhyavasāyasyāpi vilakṣaṇameva kāraṇamuktam । tadviparītāni tu svapnajñānotpattau kāraṇānīti kāraṇabhedād bhedaḥ । lakṣaṇabhede 'pyabhedābhyupagame sarvatra tathābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ । tathātyantāprasiddhe 'pyarthe svapnajñānamutpadyate, na caivaṃ viparyayādāviti । tasmādubhayollekhitvādisadbhāve 'pi svapnalakṣaṇopapatteḥ saṃśayādivilakṣaṇaṃ svapnajñānamevaitadityabhyupagantavyam ।
analyzed: na etat yuktam kāraṇa ādi bhedena asya viparyaya ādibhyaḥ rtha antara tvāt iti kecid tathā hi viparyaya jñānam pratyakṣa anumāna viṣaye pitta kapha anila upahata indriyasya puruṣasya utpadyate saṃśayaḥ tu sāmānya upalambhāt itas pratyakṣa anumāna viṣaye prasiddha ubhaya viśeṣasya bhavati iti evam anadhyavasāyasya api vilakṣaṇam eva kāraṇam uktam tad viparītāni tu svapna jñāna utpattau kāraṇāni iti kāraṇa bhedāt bhedaḥ lakṣaṇa bhede pi abheda abhyu

original: {svapnabhedāḥ}
analyzed: svapna bhedāḥ

original: (“tattu trividham । saṃskārapāṭavāt dhātudoṣāt, adṛṣṭācca ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: tat tu trividham saṃskāra pāṭavāt dhātu doṣāt adṛṣṭāt ca

analyzed: tatra saṃskāra pāṭavāt tāvat kāmī kruddhaḥ vā yadā yam artham ādṛtaḥ cintayan svapiti tadā sā eva cintā santatiḥ pratyakṣa ākārā sañjāyate

original: (“dhātudoṣāt, vātaprakṛtistaddūṣito vā ākāśagamanādīn paśyati । pittaprakṛtiḥ pittadūṣito vā agnipraveśakanakaparvatādīn paśyati । śleṣmaprakṛtiḥ śleṣmadūṣito vā saritsamudraprataraṇahimaparvatādīn paśyati ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: dhātu doṣāt vāta prakṛtiḥ tad dūṣitaḥ vā ākāśa gamana ādīn paśyati pitta prakṛtiḥ pitta dūṣitaḥ vā agni praveśa kanaka parvata ādīn paśyati śleṣma prakṛtiḥ śleṣma dūṣitaḥ vā sarit samudra prataraṇa hima parvata ādīn paśyati

original: (“yat svayamanubhūteṣvananubhūteṣu vā prasiddhārtheṣvaprasiddhārtheṣu vā yacchubhāvedakaṃ gajārohaṇacchatralābhādi tat sarvaṃ saṃskāradharmābhyāṃ bhavati । viparītañca tailābhyañjanakharoṣṭrārohaṇādi tat sarvamadharmasaṃskārābhyāṃ bhavati ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: yat svayam anubhūteṣu an anubhūteṣu vā prasiddha artheṣu aprasiddha artheṣu vā yat śubha āvedakam gaja ārohaṇa chatra lābha ādi tat sarvam saṃskāra dharmābhyām bhavati viparītam ca taila abhyañjana khara uṣṭra ārohaṇa ādi tat sarvam adharma saṃskārābhyām bhavati

original: (“atyantāprasiddhārtheṣvadṛṣṭādeveti ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: atyanta aprasiddha artheṣu adṛṣṭāt eva iti

original: tasya kāraṇabhedād bhedamāha “tattu”(*) svapnajñānam । “trividham saṃskārapāṭavād dhātudoṣād adṛṣṭācca”(*) iti । saṃskārapāṭavāt tāvat svapnajñānamāha “kāmī”(*) yasyāmaṅganāyāmanuraktastāmādṛto 'tiśayena prayatnayuktaścintayan, kruddho vāyaṃ śatruṃ prayatnāccintayan svapiti । “saiva”(*) suptasya, “cintāsantatiḥ pratyakṣākārā sañjāyate”(*) nādṛṣṭāt ।
analyzed: tasya kāraṇa bhedāt bhedam āha tat tu svapna jñānam trividham saṃskāra pāṭavāt dhātu doṣāt adṛṣṭāt ca iti saṃskāra pāṭavāt tāvat svapna jñānam āha kāmī yasyām aṅganāyām anuraktaḥ tām ādṛtaḥ u tiśayena prayatna yuktaḥ cintayan kruddhaḥ vā ayam śatrum prayatnāt cintayan svapiti sā eva suptasya cintā santatiḥ pratyakṣa ākārā sañjāyate na adṛṣṭāt

original: dhātudoṣāt svapnamāha “vātaprakṛtiḥ”(*) vātamadhikaṃ nimittamapekṣamāṇaiḥ paramāṇubhirārabdhaḥ, vātadūṣitaśca tathāvidhāhāropagamād ākāśādigamanāni paśyati । evaṃ pittaprakṛtirityādāvapi draṣṭavyam ।
analyzed: dhātu doṣāt svapnam āha vāta prakṛtiḥ vātam adhikam nimittam apekṣamāṇaiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ ārabdhaḥ vāta dūṣitaḥ ca tathāvidha āhāra upagamāt ākāśa ādi gamanāni paśyati evam pitta prakṛtiḥ ityādau api draṣṭavyam

original: adṛṣṭakāritaṃ svapnamāha “yatsvayamanubhūteṣvananubhūteṣu”(*) artheṣu, “prasiddheṣvaprasiddheṣu vā”(*) śubhāvedakamutpadyate svapnajñānaṃ tadadṛṣṭāt । tatra yad gajārohaṇacchatralābhādiśubhāvedakaṃ “tat sarvaṃ saṃskāradharmābhyām”(*) utpadyate । saṃskāro hi pūrvānubhavajanitaḥ, sa ca smṛtyutpattidvāreṇa svapnajñānotpattau kāraṇam ।
analyzed: adṛṣṭa kāritam svapnam āha yat svayam anubhūteṣu ananubhūteṣu artheṣu prasiddheṣu aprasiddheṣu vā śubhā vedakam utpadyate svapna jñānam tat adṛṣṭāt tatra yat gaja ārohaṇa chatra lābha ādi śubhā vedakam tat sarvam saṃskāra dharmābhyām utpadyate saṃskāraḥ hi pūrva anubhava janitaḥ sa ca smṛti utpatti dvāreṇa svapna jñāna utpattau kāraṇam

original: viparītamaśubhāvedakam “tailābhyañjanakharoṣṭrārohaṇādi”(*) taccādharmasaṃskārābhyāṃ bhavati ।

original: atyantāprasiddheṣu ananubhūteṣvadṛṣṭādeva svapnajñānamutpadyate । tathāhi, brahmādipadārūḍhātmānaṃ paśyatīti ।
analyzed: atyanta aprasiddheṣu ananubhūteṣu adṛṣṭāt eva svapna jñānam utpadyate tathā hi brahma ādi pada ārūḍha ātmānam paśyati iti

original: (“svapnāntikaṃ yadyapyuparatendriyagrāmasya bhavati tathāpyatītajñānaprabandhapratyavekṣaṇāt smṛtireveti bhavatyeṣā caturvidhā avidyeti ।”)<PDhS>

original: atha svapnāntaṃ svapnajñānameva, āhosvidarthāntaramityāha “svapnāntikam”(*) svapnānte svapnāvasāne bhavaṃ svapnāntikam । “yadyapyuparatendriyagrāmasya bhavati tathāpi”(*) smṛtireveti । “atītajñānaprabandhapratyavekṣaṇāt”(*) iti । <II,137> atītaścāsau jñānaprabandhaśca tasmin pratyavekṣaṇarūpatvāt smṛtireveti ।

original: nanu śābdajñānasyāpi vidyārūpatvādihānupanyāse kiṃ prayojanam ? vipratipattijñāpanamiti । tathā hi, śābdamanumāne 'ntarbhavatīti kecit, anye tu pramāṇāntaramiti vaiśeṣikāṇāṃ vipratipattistenehānabhidhānam । atra tu vidyāvibhāgapareṇāpi vākyenopasarjanatayā tajjanakamapi sāmagryāṃ pratijñātameva । prādhānyena tu karaṇavyutpattidvāreṇa pratyakṣādivibhāgābhyupagame vidyāvibhāganirūpaṇamupasarjanatayā syāt, tattu na yuktam, buddhibhedasya pūrvaṃ pratijñātasyeha nirūpaṇāt ।

original: (“tatrākṣamakṣaṃ pratītyotpadyata iti pratyakṣam । akṣāṇīndriyāṇi ghrāṇarasanacakṣustvakchrotramanāṃsi ṣaṭ । taddhi dravyādiṣu padārtheṣūtpadyate । dravye tāvat trividhe mahatyanekadravyavattvodbhūtarūpaprakāśacatuṣṭayasannikarṣād dharmādisāmagrye ca svarūpālocanamātram ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: tatra akṣam akṣam pratītya utpadyate iti pratyakṣam akṣāṇi indriyāṇi ghrāṇa rasana cakṣuḥ tvac śrotra manāṃsi ṣaḍ tat hi dravya ādiṣu padārtheṣu utpadyate dravye tāvat trividhe mahati aneka dravyavat tva udbhūta rūpa prakāśa catuṣṭaya sannikarṣāt dharma ādi sāmagrye ca sva rūpa ālocana mātram

original: tatra pratyakṣasya nirūpaṇārthamāha “akṣamakṣaṃ pratītyotpadyata iti pratyakṣam”(*) । pratigatamakṣaṃ pratyakṣamiti prādisamāsaḥ, anyathāvyayībhāvasamāsābhyupagame pratyakṣaṃ rūpam, pratyakṣāḥ pumāṃsaḥ, pratyakṣā strīti liṅgabhedo vacanabhedaśca na syāt । akṣamakṣamiti vīpsāvidhānaṃ sakalendriyāvarodhārtham । athākṣamiti sāmānyaśabdāt sakalendriyāvarodho bhavatyeva ? na, sāmānyaśabdasyobhayathāpi pravṛtteḥ । tathāhi, “brāhmaṇo na hantavyaḥ” iti sakalabrāhmaṇā<II,138>pekṣayā pratiṣedhaḥ, “brāhmaṇān bhojaya” iti brāhmaṇaviśeṣāpekṣayā niyogaḥ । tasmād vyāptyarthaṃ vīpsākaraṇamiti । atha vīpsāsadbhāve 'pi vyāptirnopalabdhā । yathā antarvedyāṃ grāmaḥ, grāmo ramaṇīyaḥ, 〈ramaṇīyaḥ〉 puruṣaḥ, puruṣe guṇaviśeṣa iti vīpsākaraṇamatra । satyam, tathāpyalpasaṃkhyāyogini padārthe vyāptāveva vīpsopalabdheti ।
analyzed: tatra pratyakṣasya nirūpaṇa artham āha akṣam akṣam pratītya utpadyate iti pratyakṣam pratigatam akṣam pratyakṣam iti prādi samāsaḥ anyathā avyayībhāva samāsa abhyupagame pratyakṣam rūpam pratyakṣāḥ pumāṃsaḥ pratyakṣā strī iti liṅga bhedaḥ vacana bhedaḥ ca na syāt akṣam akṣam iti vīpsā vidhānam sakala indriya avarodha artham atha akṣam iti sāmānya śabdāt sakala indriya avarodhaḥ bhavati eva na sāmānya śabdasya ubhayathā api pravṛtteḥ ta

original: anye tu dvitīyākṣapadamavadhāraṇārthamiti manyante । akṣameva pratītya prāpya yadutpadyate jñānaṃ tatpratyakṣam । atha jñānasyānutpannatvād akṣeṇa prāptirnāstīti kathamakṣaṃ prāpyotpadyate ? upacārasya vivakṣitatvādadoṣaḥ । yathāhi, śiśuraya mātaraṃ bhakṣayitvopajāta iti । ata evākṣāśritaṃ kāryamiti, 〈tattvena〉 tajjñānamiti । indriyarūpādiścendriyāśrito na ca jñānamiti ।
analyzed: anye tu dvitīya akṣa padam avadhāraṇa artham iti manyante akṣam eva pratītya prāpya yat utpadyate jñānam tat pratyakṣam  atha jñānasya anutpanna tvāt akṣeṇa prāptiḥ na asti iti katham akṣam prāpya utpadyate upacārasya vivakṣita tvāt adoṣaḥ yathā hi śiśuḥ aya mātaram bhakṣayitvā upajātaḥ iti atas eva akṣa āśritam kāryam iti tattvena tat jñānam iti indriya rūpa ādiḥ ca indriya āśritaḥ na ca jñānam iti

original: nanvevamapi saṃśayajñānañcākṣaṃ pratītyotpadyata ityatiprasaṅgaḥ ? tanna, vidyāsāmānyalakṣaṇānuvṛttistu viśeṣalakṣaṇe 'nukte 'pi labhyata iti । vakṣyati ca “yadavitathamavyapadeśyaṃ jñānamutpadyate tatpratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam” iti । na vitathamavitathamityanena viparyayasaṃśayajñānayorvyudāsaḥ । vitathaṃ hi saṃśayajñānaṃ vipayayajñānañceti ।
analyzed: nanu evam api saṃśaya jñānam ca akṣam pratītya utpadyate iti atiprasaṅgaḥ tat na vidyā sāmānya lakṣaṇa anuvṛttiḥ tu viśeṣa lakṣaṇe labhyate iti vakṣyati ca yat avitatham avyapadeśyam jñānam utpadyate tat pratyakṣam pramāṇam iti na vitatham avitatham iti anena viparyaya saṃśaya jñānayoḥ vyudāsaḥ vitatham hi saṃśaya jñānam vipaya ya jñānam ca iti

original: anye tu pratitantranyāyena vyavasāyātmakapadamanuvartanīyamiti manyante । avyapadeśyamiti, vyapadeśaḥ śabdastasyedaṃ vyapadeśyam, na vyapadeśyamavyapadeśyam aśabdajanyaṃ jñānamiti । nanvakṣaṃ prāpya notpadyate śābdajñānamityanenaiva vyavacchinnam ? na, indriyasahakāriṇā śabdena yajjanyate tasya vyavacchedārthatvāt । tathāhi, akṛtasamayo rūpaṃ paśyannapi cakṣuṣā rūpamiti na jānīte, rūpamiti śabdoccāraṇānantaraṃ pratipadyata ityubhayajaṃ jñānam ।
analyzed: anye tu prati tantra nyāyena vyavasāya ātmaka padam anuvartanīyam iti manyante avyapadeśyam iti vyapadeśaḥ śabdaḥ tasya idam vyapadeśyam na vyapadeśyam avyapadeśyam aśabda janyam jñānam iti nanu akṣam prāpya na utpadyate śābda jñānam iti anena eva vyavacchinnam na indriya sahakāriṇā śabdena yat janyate tasya vyavaccheda artha tvāt tathā hi akṛta samayaḥ rūpam paśyan api cakṣuṣā rūpam iti na jānīte rūpam iti śabda uccāraṇa anantaram pratipadyate iti ubhaya j

original: nanu ca śabdendriyayorekasminneva kāle vyāpārāsambhavādayuktametat । tathāhi, manasādhiṣṭhitantu śrotraṃ śabdaṃ gṛhṇāti, punaḥ kriyākrameṇa cakṣuṣā sambandhe sati rūpagrahaṇam । na ca śabdajñānasyaitāvatkālamavasthānaṃ sambhavatīti kathamubhayajaṃ jñānam ? atraikā śrotrasambaddhe manasi kriyotpannā vibhāgamārabhate, vibhāgācca yadaiva saṃyogasya vinaśyattā tadaiva śabdajñānasyotpadyamānatā, tataḥ <II,139> śabdajñānasyotpādaḥ, saṃyogasya vināśaḥ, uttarasaṃyogasyotpadyamānatā tato viṣayasambaddhena cakṣuṣā saha saṃyogasyotpādo rūpajñānasyotpadyamānatā, tataḥ svajñānasahāyaśabdasahakāriṇā cakṣuṣā rūpajñānamutpadyate ityubhayajaṃ jñānam ।
analyzed: nanu ca śabda indriyayoḥ ekasmin eva kāle vyāpāra asambhavāt ayuktam etat tathā hi manasā adhiṣṭhita ntu śrotram śabdam gṛhṇāti punar kriyā krameṇa cakṣuṣā sambandhe sati rūpa grahaṇam na ca śabda jñānasya etāvatkālam avasthānam sambhavati iti katham ubhaya jam jñānam atra ekā śrotra sambaddhe manasi kriyā utpannā vibhāgam ārabhate vibhāgāt ca yadā eva saṃyogasya vinaśyat tā tadā eva śabda jñānasya utpadyamāna tā tatas śabda jñānasya utpādaḥ s

original: yad vā gṛhītasya śabdasyārthaparicchede vyāpāra ityayaṃ niyamo nāvaśyaṃ grahaṇasahakāriṇā iti, kālāntareṇāpi manasaścakṣuṣā sambandhe rūpaśabdasya gṛhītatvāt bhavatyevobhayajaṃ jñānam । kāryasadbhāvena ca kāraṇakalpanā kriyate । taccehopalabdhamityanena krameṇotpattiścintyate । tathā śabdena vyapadeśāccakṣuṣā paśyatāpi rūpamiti mayā na jñātaṃ rūpaśabdācca pratipannamityubhayajaṃ jñānam । yādi śabdasya vyāpārādapratyakṣaṃ tarhi indriyavyāpārānna śābdamiti pramāṇāntaraphalaṃ syāt ? naitadevam, pratyakṣalakṣaṇe 'vyapadeśyamiti viśeṣaṇavacchabdalakṣaṇe 'nindriyajamiti viśeṣaṇāśravaṇāt śabde sahakāriniyamābhāvaḥ । śābdaṃ hi jñānaṃ śabdādindriyasahakāriṇaḥ, tadrahitād vā bhavatu sarvathā tajjanakaṃ śābdaṃ pramāṇaṃ bhavati ।
analyzed: yat vā gṛhītasya śabdasya artha paricchede vyāpāraḥ iti ayam niyamaḥ na avaśyam grahaṇa sahakāriṇā iti kāla antareṇa api manasaḥ cakṣuṣā sambandhe rūpa śabdasya gṛhīta tvāt bhavati eva ubhaya jam jñānam kārya sadbhāvena ca kāraṇa kalpanā kriyate tat ca iha upalabdham iti anena krameṇa utpattiḥ cintyate tathā śabdena vyapadeśāt cakṣuṣā paśyatā api rūpam iti mayā na jñātam rūpa śabdāt ca pratipannam iti ubhaya jam jñānam  /

original: atra cākṣaṃ pratītyotpadyate yajjñānaṃ tatpratyakṣamiti vākye vivaraṇavākyeṣū catuṣṭayādisannikarṣābhidhānāt ṣoḍhā sambandho labhyata eva । sa ca saṃyogaḥ, saṃyuktasamavāyaḥ, saṃyuktasamavetasamavāyaḥ, samavāyaḥ, samavetasamavāyo, viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaśceti ।
analyzed: atra ca akṣam pratītya utpadyate yat jñānam tat pratyakṣam iti vākye vivaraṇa vākyeṣu catuṣṭaya ādi sannikarṣa abhidhānāt ṣoḍhā sambandhaḥ labhyate eva sa ca saṃyogaḥ saṃyukta samavāyaḥ saṃyukta samaveta samavāyaḥ samavāyaḥ samaveta samavāyaḥ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ ca iti

original: nanvevamapīndriyārthasannikarṣapadenaiva vyavacchinnam । athendriyaṃ mano 'rthaścātmā tatsannikarṣād anumānādijñānamapi bhavatīti pratyakṣaphalaṃ syāt ? na, jñānamātrotpattāvantaḥkaraṇasyendriyatvānupapatteḥ । karaṇatvādiviśeṣaṇasyāparokṣajñānajanakatvamindriyalakṣaṇamityuktam । na cānumānajñānamindriyagrāhye 'rthe bhavatīti । tadevamindriyaṃ pratītyārthe yadavitathamavyapadeśyaṃ vyavasāyātmakaṃ jñānamutpadyate, tad yato bhavati tat pratyakṣamiti phalaviśeṣaṇapakṣaḥ । etāni tvavyabhicāritvādīni vyavacchedakāni atīte 'pi viśeṣyajñāne buddhisamāropaṇād bhavantīti ।
analyzed: nanu evam api indriya artha sannikarṣa padena eva vyavacchinnam atha indriyam manaḥ rthaḥ ca ātmā tad sannikarṣāt anumāna ādi jñānam api bhavati iti pratyakṣa phalam syāt na jñāna mātra utpattau antaḥkaraṇasya indriya tva anupapatteḥ karaṇa tva ādi viśeṣaṇasya aparokṣa jñāna janaka tvam indriya lakṣaṇam iti uktam na ca anumāna jñānam indriya grāhye rthe bhavati iti tat evam indriyam pratītya arthe yat avitatham avyapadeśyam vyavasāya ātmakam jñānam utpad

original: sāmagrīviśeṣaṇapakṣe tu na sākṣādavyabhicāritvādiviśeṣaṇayogaḥ । athā<II,140>kṣamakṣaṃ pratītyotpadyate sāmagrī, tasyāḥ kārakasākalyarūpatvāt । sākalyantu caramasahakāriprāptāveva na pūrvamityutpadyata eva । tathā jñāyate 'nayeti jñānamakṣādyupalakṣitā sāmagryeva avyabhicāri, vyavasāyātmikā, avyapadeśyapadena jñānajanakatvena sāmagryāstad vyapadeśa iti sāmagrīviśeṣaṇapakṣe 'pi viśeṣaṇayogaḥ ? satyam, tathāpi avyabhicāritvādiviśeṣaṇāni phalasya, taddvāreṇa tu sāmagryā bhavantīti paraṃ phalaviśeṣaṇapakṣaḥ ।
analyzed: sāmagrī viśeṣaṇa pakṣe tu na sākṣāt avyabhicāri tva ādi viśeṣaṇa yogaḥ pratītya utpadyate sāmagrī tasyāḥ kāraka sākalya rūpa tvāt sākalyan tu carama sahakāri prāptau eva na pūrvam iti utpadyate eva tathā jñāyate naya iti jñānam akṣa ādi upalakṣitā sāmagrī eva avyabhicāri vyavasāya ātmikā avyapadeśya padena jñāna janaka tvena sāmagryāḥ tat vyapadeśaḥ iti sāmagrī viśeṣaṇa pakṣe pi viśeṣaṇa yogaḥ satyam tathā api avyabhicāri tva

original: svarūpaviśeṣaṇapakṣastu nirasta eva, pramāṇaśabdasya karaṇārthatvāt । tathāhi, pramīyate 'neneti pramāṇam, yena kartṛkarmavilakṣaṇena pramā kriyate । svarūpaviśeṣaṇapakṣe tu na janyajanakarūpatayā pramāṇasya prāmāṇyam, kintvavyabhicāritvādidharmopetatvenaiva । taccātivyāpakamavyāpakañca । tathā ca parāmarśādijñānasyāpyevaṃ rūpamasti, na ca tasya pratyakṣatvam, anumitijanakatvenānumānatvāt । sāmagryāstu pratyakṣatvenābhimatāyāḥ pratyakṣatvaṃ na labhyata ityavyāptiḥ ।
analyzed: svarūpa viśeṣaṇa pakṣaḥ tu nirastaḥ eva pramāṇa śabdasya karaṇa artha tvāt tathā hi pramīyate nena iti pramāṇam yena kartṛ karma vilakṣaṇena pramā kriyate svarūpa viśeṣaṇa pakṣe tu na janya janaka rūpatayā pramāṇasya prāmāṇyam kintu avyabhicāri tva ādi dharma upeta tvena eva tat ca ati vyāpakam avyāpakam ca  / tathā ca parāmarśa ādi jñānasya api evam rūpam asti na ca tasya pratyakṣa tvam anumiti janaka tvena anumāna tvāt sāmagryāḥ tu pratya

original: saugatānāntu pramāṇaphalayoravyatireka iti tatpakṣe svarūpaviśeṣaṇataiva ghaṭate । tathā 〈hi〉, sautrāntikānāmākāraḥ pramāṇaṃ prameyo 'rthaḥ svasaṃvit phalamiṣyata iti jñānaṃ sa eva pramāṇaphalavyavahāraḥ kalpanaṃ vā । na caitad yuktam, kriyākaraṇayorabhedānupalabdheḥ । na ca bodhe viṣayākāraḥ sambhavatītyuktam, kathaṃ tasya prāmāṇyam ? na ca meyarūpatayā viṣayaparicchedye prāmāṇyaṃ yuktam, viṣayasyātyantaparokṣatayā tena saha pratibandhānupalabdheḥ । yadi cāgṛhītapratibandho vyāpāro viṣayaviśeṣaṃ gamayet atiprasaṅgaḥ syāt । tathā ca rūpākārasya rūpavad rasādivyavasthāpakatvamapi syāt, ubhayatrāpi pratibandhānupalambhasyāviśeṣāt । na cākāramātrasaṃvedanavādino viṣayaviśeṣāntaragrahaṇam ākāre sambhavati, viṣayasyātyantaparokṣatve 'vasthitasya pratisandhāturabhāve ca anvayavyatirekayoratyantaparokṣatvāt ।
analyzed: saugatānām tu pramāṇa phalayoḥ avyatirekaḥ iti tad pakṣe svarūpa viśeṣaṇa tā eva ghaṭate tathā hi sautrāntikānām ākāraḥ pramāṇam prameyaḥ rthaḥ sva saṃvid phalam iṣyate iti jñānam saḥ eva pramāṇa phala vyavahāraḥ kalpanam vā na ca etat yuktam kriyā karaṇayoḥ abheda anupalabdheḥ na ca bodhe viṣaya ākāraḥ sambhavati iti uktam katham tasya prāmāṇyam na ca meya rūpa tayā viṣaya paricchedye prāmāṇyam yuktam viṣayasya atyanta parokṣa

original: parakīyañca pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ gurubhirvistareṇa nirastamiti noktam ।
analyzed: parakīyam ca pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam gurubhiḥ vistareṇa nirastam iti na uktam

original: akṣaśabdasyānekārthatvādāha “akṣāṇīndriyāṇi”(*) । tāni tu “ghrāṇarasana<II,141>cakṣustvakchrotramanāṃsi”(*) na karmendriyāṇi parābhyupagatāni । nirviṣayajñānasya pratiṣedhena smṛtivyavacchedārthamāha “taddhi”(*) pratyakṣaṃ yasmāt “dravyādiṣu padārtheṣūtpadyate”(*) tasmānna nirviṣayamiti । atra ca ādiśabdena guṇakarmasāmānyāni gṛhyante । samavāyo 'pītyanye ।
analyzed: akṣa śabdasya aneka artha tvāt āha akṣāṇi indriyāṇi tāni tu na karmendriyāṇi para abhyupagatāni nirviṣaya jñānasya pratiṣedhena smṛti vyavaccheda artham āha tat hi pratyakṣam yasmāt dravya ādiṣu padārtheṣu utpadyate tasmāt na nirviṣayam iti atra ca ādi śabdena guṇa karma sāmānyāni gṛhyante samavāya u pi iti anye

original: anye tu indriyasyārthena sannikarṣapratipādanārthaṃ taddhi dravyādiṣu padārtheṣūtpadyate pratyakṣam । tasmādastīndriyeṇa saṃyuktasamavāyādisambandhaḥ ।
analyzed: anye tu indriyasya arthena sannikarṣa pratipādana artham tat hi dravya ādiṣu padārtheṣu utpadyate pratyakṣam tasmāt asti indriyeṇa saṃyukta samavāya ādi sambandhaḥ

original: yato vā dravyādiṣu padārtheṣūtpadyate pratyakṣamato “dravye tāvat”(*) vyākhyāyata iti । kiṃ viśiṣṭe ? “trividhe”(*) tisro vidhā yasya tat tathoktaṃ tasmin । “mahati”(*) mahattvādhikaraṇe “svarūpālocanam”(*) nirvikalpakaṃ jñānamutpadyate । kutaḥ ? 〈“anekadravyavattvodbhūtarūpaprakāśacatuṣṭayasannikarṣāt”(*)〉 anekadravya〈vat〉<?>tvaṃ ca 〈udbhūta〉rūpañca prakāśaśca catuṣṭayasannikarṣaśceti tathoktastasmāt । “dharmādisāmagrye ca”(*) iti । anekañca dravyañcetyanekadravyaṃ tad yasyāsti tat, tadvat tasya bhāvo 'nekadravyavattvam । rūpañcātra rūpaviśeṣo vivakṣitaḥ । tathā ca sūtram “mahattvādanekadravyavattvād rūpaviśeṣācca dravyaṃ pratyakṣam” <vai. sū. 4.1.6> iti । aparokṣajñānasadbhāve sati samastaṃ vyastañcedaṃ pratyakṣajñānasya kāraṇaṃ vivakṣitamityuktaṃ vāyvadhikāre । catuṣṭaya sannikarṣaśca ātmā manasā saṃyujyate, mana indriyeṇa, indriyamartheneti catuṣṭayasannikarṣastasmāt । dharmādisāmagrye ceti ādipadād dikkālādergrahaṇamiti ।
analyzed: yatas vā dravya ādiṣu padārtheṣu utpadyate pratyakṣam atas dravye tāvat vyākhyāyate iti  kim viśiṣṭe trividhe tisraḥ vidhāḥ yasya tat tathā uktam tasmin mahati mahat tva adhikaraṇe sva rūpa ālocanam nirvikalpakam jñānam utpadyate kutas aneka dravyavat tva udbhūta rūpa prakāśa catuṣṭaya sannikarṣāt aneka dravyavat tvam ca udbhūta rūpam ca prakāśaḥ ca catuṣṭaya sannikarṣaḥ ca iti tathā uktaḥ tasmāt dharma ādi sāmagrye ca iti anekam ca dravyam ca iti

original: athāstvevaṃ nirvikalpakajñānotpattiḥ । sadbhāve kiṃ pramāṇam ? savikalpakajñānotpattireva । anyathā hi viśiṣṭārthānupalabdhau viśiṣṭasya saṅketasmaraṇasyānupapatteḥ savikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ na syāt, tasya tatkāryatvāt । na ca saṅketasmaraṇameva tasya nimittam, akṣaṇikatve sati arthasya nirvikalpajñānotpattāviva savikalpakajñānotpattāvanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ vyāpāropalabdherityuktanyāyāt ।
analyzed: atha astu evam nirvikalpaka jñāna utpattiḥ sadbhāve kim pramāṇam savikalpaka jñāna utpattiḥ eva anyathā hi viśiṣṭa artha anupalabdhau viśiṣṭasya saṅketa smaraṇasya anupapatteḥ savikalpakam jñānam na syāt tasya tad kārya tvāt na ca saṅketa smaraṇam eva tasya nimittam akṣaṇika tve sati arthasya nirvikalpa jñāna utpattau iva savikalpaka jñāna utpattau anvaya vyatirekābhyām vyāpāra upalabdheḥ iti ukta nyāyāt

original: {savikalpakapratyakṣanirūpaṇam}
analyzed: sa vikalpaka pratyakṣa nirūpaṇam

original: (“sāmānyaviśeṣadravyaguṇakarmaviśeṣaṇāpekṣādātmamanaḥsannikarṣāt pratyakṣamutpadyate saddravyam pṛthivī, viṣāṇī, śuklo gaurgacchatīti ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: sāmānya viśeṣa dravya guṇa karma viśeṣaṇa apekṣāt ātma manaḥ sannikarṣāt pratyakṣam utpadyate sat dravyam pṛthivī viṣāṇī śuklaḥ gauḥ gacchati iti

original: tadevaṃ nirvikalpakaṃ pratipādya savikalpakaṃ viśeṣyajñānamāha “sāmānya<II,142>viśeṣadravyaguṇakarmaviśeṣaṇāpekṣāt”(*) ityādinā । sāmānyañca sāmānyaviśeṣaśca dravyañca guṇaśca karma ceti tathoktāni । tānyeva viśeṣaṇāni, tānyapekṣata iti tadapekṣaḥ samuccaye । na kevalaṃ svarūpālocanamātramuktakāraṇebhyo niṣpadyate, sāmānyādiviśeṣaṇāpekṣañca tata evotpadyata iti ।
analyzed: tat evam nirvikalpakam pratipādya savikalpakam viśeṣya jñānam āha ityādinā sāmānyam ca sāmānya viśeṣaḥ ca dravyam ca guṇaḥ ca karma ca iti tathā uktāni tāni eva viśeṣaṇāni tāni apekṣate iti tad apekṣaḥ samuccaye na kevalam svarūpa ālocana mātra mukta kāraṇebhyaḥ niṣpadyate sāmānya ādi viśeṣaṇa apekṣaḥ ca tatas eva utpadyate iti

original: nanu catuṣṭayasannikarṣasyāpavādaṃ vinā ūrdhvaṃ sarvatrānuvṛtterabhyupagamād vyartham ātmamanaḥsannikarṣasyābhidhānam ? na, anantarajñāne 'pyasyāsamavāyikāraṇatvajñāpanārthatvāt ।
analyzed: nanu catuṣṭaya sannikarṣasya apavādam vinā ūrdhvam sarvatra anuvṛtteḥ abhyupagamāt vyartham ātma manaḥ sannikarṣasya abhidhānam na anantara jñāne pi asya asamavāyi kāraṇa tva jñāpana artha tvāt

original: tatra saditi sattāviśeṣaṇaṃ dravyamiti sāmānyam, viśeṣāpekṣaṃ pṛthivīti, tathā viṣāṇīti dravyaviśeṣaṇam, śukla iti guṇaviśeṣaṇāpekṣam, gauriti sāmānyaviśeṣaviśeṣaṇāpekṣam, gacchatīti kriyāviśiṣṭaṃ jñānamityudāharaṇāni ।
analyzed: tatra sat iti sattā viśeṣaṇam dravyam iti sāmānyam viśeṣa apekṣam pṛthivī iti tathā viṣāṇi iti dravya viśeṣaṇam śuklaḥ iti guṇa viśeṣaṇa apekṣam gauḥ iti sāmānya viśeṣa viśeṣaṇa apekṣam gacchati iti kriyā viśiṣṭam jñānam iti udāharaṇāni

original: {guṇādiṣu pratyakṣotpattiprakāraḥ}
analyzed: guṇa ādiṣu pratyakṣa utpatti prakāraḥ

original: (“rūparasagandhasparśeṣvanekadravyasamavāyāt svagataviśeṣāt svāśrayasannikarṣānniyatendriyanimittamutpadyate । śabdasya trayasannikarṣācchrotrasamavetasya tenaivopalabdhiḥ । saṃkhyāparimāṇapṛthaktvasaṃyogavibhāgaparatvāparatvasnehadravatvavegakarmaṇāṃ pratyakṣadravyasamavāyāccakṣuḥsparśanābhyāṃ grahaṇam । buddhisukhaduḥkhecchādveṣaprayatnānāṃ dvayorātmamanasoḥ saṃyogādupalabdhiḥ ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: rūpa rasa gandha sparśeṣu aneka dravya samavāyāt svagata viśeṣāt sva āśraya sannikarṣāt niyata indriya nimittam utpadyate śabdasya traya sannikarṣāt śrotra samavetasya tena eva upalabdhiḥ saṃkhyā parimāṇa pṛthaktva saṃyoga vibhāga para tva apara tva sneha drava tva vega karmaṇām pratyakṣa dravya samavāyāt cakṣuḥ sparśanābhyām grahaṇam buddhi sukha duḥkha icchā dveṣa prayatnānām dvayoḥ ātma manasoḥ saṃyogāt upalabdhiḥ pdhs

original: guṇādiṣu pratyakṣamāha “rūparasagandhasparśeṣu”(*) viṣayeṣu anekadravyeṇa saha samavāyāt । “svagataviśeṣāt”(*) ca, yatkṛtā kvacid viṣaye teṣāmupalabdhiryadabhāvāccānupalabdhiḥ sa udbhavasamākhyāto rūpādidharmaḥ sahakāriviśeṣastasmāt । “svāśrayasannikarṣāt”(*) ca । svāśrayeṇa dravyeṇa saṃyuktamindriyaṃ tatsamavāyāt, dharmādisāmagrye ca sati pratiniyatendriyanimittamutpadyate jñānam । “śabdasya trayasannikarṣāt”(*) iti । ātmā manasā saṃyujyate mana indriyeṇeti trayasya sannikarṣaḥ । “śrotrasamavetasya”(*) iti । indriyārthasannikarṣo 'pyupadarśita eva । tenaiva śrotreṇopalabdhirnendriyāntaraṇeti ।
analyzed: guṇa ādiṣu pratyakṣam āha rūpa rasa gandha sparśeṣu viṣayeṣu aneka dravyeṇa saha samavāyāt svagata viśeṣāt ca yad kṛtā kvacid viṣaye teṣām upalabdhiḥ yad abhāvāt ca anupalabdhiḥ saḥ udbhava samākhyātaḥ rūpa ādi dharmaḥ sahakāri viśeṣaḥ tasmāt sva āśraya sannikarṣāt ca sva āśrayeṇa dravyeṇa saṃyuktam indriyam tad samavāyāt dharma ādi sāmagrye ca sati pratiniyata indriya nimittam utpadyate jñānam śabdasya traya sannikarṣāt iti ātm

original: anye tu trayaścāsau sannikarṣaścetīndriyārthasannikarṣo 'pyupalabhyate । tasmācchrotrasamavetasya tenaivopalabdhiriti ।
analyzed: anye tu trayaḥ ca asau sannikarṣaḥ ca iti indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ u pi upalabhyate tasmāt śrotra samavetasya tena eva upalabdhiḥ iti

original: “saṃkhyāparimāṇapṛthaktvasaṃyogavibhāgaparatvāparatvasnehadravatvavegakarmaṇām”(*) <II,143> grahaṇam । kutaḥ ? “pratyakṣadravyasamavāyāccakṣuḥsparśanābhyām”(*) tatsamavāyāt saṃkhyādīnāṃ grahaṇamiti । “buddhisukhaduḥkhecchadveṣaprayatnānāṃ dvayorātmanasoḥ”(*) sannikarṣādupalabdhiḥ । buddhyādayo hi ātmani samavetāstatsambaddhena manasā gṛhyante ।
analyzed: saṃkhyā parimāṇa pṛthaktva saṃyoga vibhāga para tva apara tva sneha drava tva vega karmaṇām grahaṇam kutas pratyakṣa dravya samavāyāt cakṣuḥ sparśanābhyām tad samavāyāt saṃkhyā ādīnām grahaṇam iti buddhi sukha duḥkha icchā dveṣa prayatnānām dvayoḥ ātma nasoḥ sannikarṣāt upalabdhiḥ buddhi ādayaḥ hi ātmani samavetāḥ tad sambaddhena manasā gṛhyante  /

original: (“bhāvadravyatvaguṇatvakarmatvādīnāmupalabhyādhārasamavetānāmāśrayagrāhakairindriyairgrahaṇamityetadasmadādīnāṃ pratyakṣam ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: bhāva dravya tva guṇa tva karma tva ādīnām upalabhya ādhāra samavetānām āśraya grāhakaiḥ indriyaiḥ grahaṇam iti etat asmat ādīnām pratyakṣam

original: sāmānye pratyakṣamāha 〈“bhāvadravyatvaguṇatvakarmatvādīnāmupalabhyādhārasamavetānāmāśrayagrāhakairindriyairgrahaṇam”(*)〉 bhāvaśca dravyatvañca karmatvañca tathoktāni, tānyādiryeṣāmityādipadena pṛthivītvotkṣepaṇatvādīnāṃ grahaṇam । upalabhyaścāsāvādhāraśca, tatsamavetānāmāśrayagrāhakairindriyairgrahaṇam । yenaivendriyeṇāśrayagrahaṇaṃ tenaiva tatsamavetānāṃ sattādīnāṃ grahaṇamiti । tathāhi, sattā dravye vartamānā saṃyuktasamavāyena cakṣuḥsparśanābhyāmupalabhyate । gandharasarūpasparśeṣu samavetā ghrāṇarasanacakṣustvagindriyairupalabhyante saṃyuktasamavetasamavāyena । śabde tu samavetasamavāyācchrotreṇa । sukhādi tu saṃyuktasamavetasamavāyānmanasā gṛhyate । guṇatvamapyevam । ataḥ sattāyāṃ guṇatve ca sarvendriyaṃ jñānamiti । dravyatvaṃ saṃyuktasamavāyena cakṣuḥsparśanābhyāmupalabhyate । karmatvañca saṃyuktasamavetasamavāyāt । rūpatvādāvapyevaṃ grahaṇam । “ityetadasmadādīnāṃ pratyakṣam”(*) ityupasaṃhāraḥ ।
analyzed: sāmānye pratyakṣam āha bhāva dravya tva guṇa tva karma tva ādīnām upalabhya ādhāra samavetānām āśraya grāhakaiḥ indriyaiḥ grahaṇam bhāvaḥ ca dravya tvam ca karma tvam ca tathā uktāni tāni ādiḥ yeṣām iti ādi padena pṛthivī tva utkṣepaṇa tva ādīnām grahaṇam upalabhyaḥ ca asau ādhāraḥ ca tad samavetānām āśraya grāhakaiḥ indriyaiḥ grahaṇam yena eva indriyeṇa āśraya grahaṇam tena eva tad samavetānām sattā ādīnām grahaṇam iti tathā

original: {yogipratyakṣanirūpaṇam}

(“asmadviśiṣṭānāntu yogināṃ yuktānāṃ yogajadharmānugṛhītena manasā svātmāntarākāśadikkālaparamāṇuvāyumanassu tatsamavetaguṇakarmasāmānyaviśeṣeṣu samavāye cāvitathaṃ svarūpadarśanamutpadyate । viyuktānāṃ punaścatuṣṭayasannikarṣād yogajadharmānugrahasāmarthyāt sūkṣmavyavahitaviprakṛṣṭeṣu pratyakṣamutpadyate ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: asmad viśiṣṭānām tu yoginām yuktānām yoga ja dharma anugṛhītena manasā sva ātma antar ākāśa diś kāla paramāṇu vāyu manassu tad samaveta guṇa karma sāmānya viśeṣeṣu samavāye ca avitatham sva rūpa darśanam utpadyate viyuktānām punar catuṣṭaya sannikarṣāt yoga ja dharma anugraha sāmarthyāt sūkṣma vyavahita viprakṛṣṭeṣu pratyakṣam utpadyate pdhs

original: tathāsmadviśiṣṭānāṃ yogināṃ keṣvartheṣu kathañca pratyakṣamutpadyata iti vyākhyāyate । tatra yuktānāṃ samādhyavasthānāṃ yogajadharmānugṛhītena tatsahakāriṇā manasā aparokṣasvarūpadarśanaṃ janyate । keṣvartheṣu ? svātmā cātmāntarañcā<II,144>kāśañca dik ca kālaśca vāyuśca paramāṇavaśca manaśceti tathoktāni teṣu । tathā na paraṃ svātmādiṣu saṃyuktena manasā yogināmaparokṣagrahaṇaṃ tatsamaveteṣu guṇakarmasāmānyādiviśeṣeṣu saṃyuktasamavāyena, samavāye ca saṃyuktaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvena grahaṇam । ata eva samavāyasya pṛthagabhidhānaṃ vibhinnasannikarṣaparicchedyatvāt । guṇakarmasu paramāṇvādigateṣu yatsāmānyaṃ tatra saṃyuktasamavetasamavāyena ।
analyzed: tathā asmat viśiṣṭānām yoginām keṣu artheṣu kathaṃca pratyakṣam utpadyate iti vyākhyāyate tatra yuktānām samādhi avasthānām yoga ja dharma anugṛhītena tad sahakāriṇā manasā aparokṣa sva rūpa darśanam janyate keṣu artheṣu svātmā diś ca kālaḥ ca vāyuḥ ca paramāṇavaḥ ca manaḥ ca iti tathā uktāni teṣu tathā na param svātma ādiṣu saṃyuktena manasā yoginām aparokṣa grahaṇam tad samaveteṣu guṇa karma sāmānya ādi viśeṣeṣu saṃyuk

original: atha yogī yadā svamantaḥkaraṇaṃ gṛhṇāti tadā kiṃ karaṇam ? ātmamanaḥsaṃyogaḥ, tasmin manaḥparicchedye mana eva karaṇamiti । parakīyena ca manasā sūkṣmaśarīrasthaṃ manaḥ preryamabhisambandhayati, tatsambaddhañca tadgṛhṇātīti ।
analyzed: atha yogī yadā svam antaḥkaraṇam gṛhṇāti tadā kim karaṇam ātma manaḥ saṃyogaḥ tasmin manaḥ paricchedye manaḥ eva karaṇam iti parakīyena ca manasā sūkṣmaśarīra stham manaḥ preryam abhisambandhayati tad sambaddham ca tat gṛhṇāti iti

original: “viyuktānāṃ punaścatuṣṭayasannikarṣāt”(*) asmadādīnāmiva pratyakṣamutpadyate jñānam । keṣvartheṣu ? “sūkṣmavyavahitaviprakṛṣṭeṣu”(*) iti । sūkṣmāḥ paramāṇavo vyavahitā nāgabhuvanādayo viprakṛṣṭā mervādayasteṣvaparokṣaṃ jñānam । asamādhyavasthānāṃ yogajadharmānugrahasāmarthyāt tadutpadyate, yogīndriyāṇāṃ hi dharmaviśeṣānugraheṇa sarvatrāpratibandhāt । catuṣṭayasannikarṣagrahaṇamudāharaṇārtham, trayasannikarṣeṇāpi grahaṇāt । tathā hi yogī brahmādibhāṣitaṃ yogajadharmānugrahādapratibadhyamānasantānanyāyena śrotradeśamāgataṃ gṛhṇāti trayasannikarṣeṇa ।
analyzed: viyuktānām punar catuṣṭaya sannikarṣāt asmat ādīnām iva pratyakṣam utpadyate jñānam  keṣu artheṣu sūkṣma vyavahita viprakṛṣṭeṣu iti sūkṣmāḥ paramāṇavaḥ vyavahitāḥ nāga bhuvana ādayaḥ viprakṛṣṭāḥ meru ādayaḥ teṣu aparokṣam jñānam asamādhi avasthānām yoga ja dharma anugraha sāmarthyāt tat utpadyate yogi indriyāṇām hi dharma viśeṣa anugraheṇa sarvatra apratibandhāt catuṣṭaya sannikarṣa grahaṇam udāharaṇa artham traya

original: nanu sarvametadasat, yogināṃ sadbhāve pramāṇābhāvād, bādhakopapatteśca । tathā ca na yogī atīndriyārthadraṣṭā prāṇitvād asmadādivat । yogīndriyāṇi vā na sarvaviṣayāṇi indriyatvād asmadādīndriyavat । naitad yuktam, svatantre yogināmaprasiddhatayā prāṇitvādihetorāśrayāsiddhatvāt । atha paravyāptyā parasyāniṣṭāpādanametat ? tatra yadi samyak pramāṇena paraprasiddhistenaiva bādhyamānatvādanutthānaṃ tatpratiṣedhahetūnām । na ca kāryeṇaiva kāraṇasya vyāghātaḥ, tadantareṇāpakṣadharmatayā tanmūlasya hetoraprāmāṇyaprasaṅgāt । atha pramāṇaṃ vinaiva pareṇābhyupagatā yogina iti pratiṣidhyante । tarhi pramāṇābhāvenaiva prameyasyāprasiddhervyarthaṃ tatpratiṣedhānumānam ।
analyzed: nanu sarvam etat asat yoginām sadbhāve pramāṇa abhāvāt bādhaka upapatteḥ ca  / tathā ca na yogī atīndriya artha draṣṭā prāṇi tvāt asmat ādi vat yogi indriyāṇi vā na sarva viṣayāṇi indriya tvāt asmat ādi indriya vat  na etat yuktam svatantre yoginām aprasiddha tayā prāṇi tva ādi hetoḥ āśraya asiddha tvāt  atha para vyāptyā parasya aniṣṭa āpādanam etat tatra yadi samyak pramāṇena para prasiddhiḥ tena eva bādhyamāna tvāt anutthānam tad pratiṣedha

original: asti ca yogināṃ sadbhāve 'numānam । tathāhi, asmadādīnāṃ pratyakṣeṇā<II,145>nupalabhyamānāḥ paramāṇvādayaḥ kasyacit pratyakṣāḥ prameyatvād ghaṭādivaditi । pakṣīkṛteṣu paramāṇvādiṣu prameyatvasya hetoḥ sadbhāvāt pakṣadharmatvam । tathā kasyacit pratyakṣeṇa sādhyena prameyatvasya hetorghaṭādau vyāpterupalambhaḥ । na cāsya pratyakṣāgamābhyāmasti bādhā । nāyaṃ satpratipakṣa ityavyabhicāritvād gamaka eva ।

original: tathā jīvaccharīraṃ nirātmakaṃ na bhavati, aprāṇādimattvaprasaṅgād, yad yad nirātmakaṃ tattadaprāṇādimad yathā ghaṭādi, na ca tathā jīvaccharīram, tasmānnirātmakaṃ na bhavatīti, sarvasya nirātmakatvābhyupagamājjīvaccharīrasya nairātmyapratiṣedhe sādhye na sapakṣo 'sti । prāṇādimattvañca vipakṣādevātyantavyāvṛttam, ato vyatirekāvyabhicāreṇaiva gamakatvam । na caivamasādhāraṇam, tasya pakṣādivat sapakṣādapi vyāvṛttervyabhicāreṇāgamakatvāt । atha nairātmyapratiṣedhenātra sātmakatvaṃ vivakṣitam, na cātmā prasiddha ityaprasiddhaviśeṣaṇaḥ pakṣaḥ, tannairātmye 'pi samānam, aprasiddhatvādātmanaḥ kathaṃ tatpratiṣedhaḥ ? na ca kalpanāsamāropitasya pratiṣedhaḥ, vāstavatvena pratipādanāt । pratyakṣādipramāṇaiśca ātmā pratipādakasya prasiddhastadapekṣayā na aprasiddhaviśeṣaṇatā pakṣadoṣaḥ । pratipādyāpekṣayā tu naitad dūṣaṇam, apratipannatattvasya pratipādyatvāt । sapakṣe tu aprasiddhatvaṃ na vyatirekiṇo dūṣaṇam, tasya vyatirekāvyabhicāreṇaiva gamaka<II,152>tvāt । ayaṃ sapakṣābhāva eva sapakṣastasminnanuvṛttāvanvayopapattiḥ, vyāvṛttau tu asādhāraṇatvameva । taduktam,
