original: ata ityuktarūpālliṅgād yad viparītamekena dharmeṇa dharmadvitayena, “vā”śabdāt tribhiśceti. tadaliṅagaṃ liṅagapratirūpakamiti kāśyapo 'bravīt । viruddhāsiddhasandigdhamiti viśeṣasaṃjñānirdeśaḥ । tatra dharmadvayasadbhāve 'pi sandigdho na vipakṣād vyāvṛtta ityekena dharmeṇa viparītaḥ । viruddhastu pakṣadharmatvasadbhāve 'pi na sapakṣe vartate nāpi vipakṣād vyāvṛtta iti dharmadvayena viparītaḥ । asiddhastvekena dvābhyāṃ tribhiśca viparīto bhavatīti ।
analyzed: atas iti ukta rūpāt liṅgāt yat viparītam ekena dharmeṇa dharma dvitayena vā śabdāt tribhiḥ ca iti tat aliṅagam liṅaga pratirūpakam iti kāśyapaḥ bravīt viruddha asiddha sandigdham iti viśeṣa saṃjñā nirdeśaḥ tatra dharma dvaya sadbhāve sandigdhaḥ na vipakṣāt vyāvṛttaḥ iti ekena dharmeṇa viparītaḥ viruddhaḥ tu pakṣa dharma tva sadbhāve na sapakṣe vartate na api vipakṣāt vyāvṛttaḥ iti dharma dvayena viparītaḥ asiddhaḥ tu ekena dvābhyām trib

original: tatra nityaḥ śabdaḥ sāmānyavattve sati cākṣuṣatvādityekena viparītaḥ । tathā ca, asya sapakṣe ghaṭādau sadbhāve 'pi vipakṣācca sāmānyādervyāvṛttāvapi na pakṣadharmatvamastīti । tathā nityaḥ śabdo 'prameyatvāditi dvitayana viparītaḥ, aprameyatvasya hi vipakṣādeva vyāvṛttirna sapakṣe sadbhāvo nāpi pakṣa iti । tribhiśca viparīto yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ akāryatvādityasya hi na śabde pakṣe sadbhāvo na sapakṣe ghaṭādau nāpi vipakṣād vyāvṛttiriti ।
analyzed: tatra nityaḥ śabdaḥ sāmānyavat tve sati cākṣuṣa tvāt iti ekena viparītaḥ tathā ca asya sapakṣe ghaṭa ādau sadbhāve vipakṣāt ca sāmānya ādeḥ vyāvṛttau api na pakṣa dharma tvam asti iti tathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ prameya tvāt iti viparītaḥ aprameya tvasya hi vipakṣāt eva vyāvṛttiḥ na sapakṣe sadbhāvaḥ na api pakṣaḥ iti tribhiḥ ca viparītaḥ yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ akārya tvāt iti asya hi na śabde pakṣe sadbhāvaḥ na sapakṣe ghaṭa ādau

original: (“yadanumeyenārthena deśaviśeṣe kālaviśeṣe vā sahacaritam, anumeyadharmānvite cānyatra sarvasminnekadeśe vā prasiddham, anumeyaviparīte ca sarvasmin pramāṇato 'sadeva tadaprasiddhārthasyānumāpakaṃ liṅgaṃ bhavatīti ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: yat anumeyena arthena deśa viśeṣe kāla viśeṣe vā sahacaritam anumeya dharma anvite ca anyatra sarvasmin eka deśe vā prasiddham anumeya viparīte ca sarvasmin sat eva tat aprasiddha arthasya anumāpakam liṅgam bhavati iti

original: pūrvasya saṅgrahavākyasya spaṣṭārthaṃ vivaraṇamāha “yadanumeyenārthena”(*) ityādi । anumeyena sambaddhamityasya vivaraṇamanumeyenārthena paricchedyamānena sahacaritamajahadvṛttīti । “deśaviśeṣe kālaviśeṣe vā”(*) sarvasmin deśe sarvasmiṃśca kāla iti । prasiddhañca tadanvite ityasya vivaraṇam “anumeyadharmānvite cānyatra sarvasminnekadeśe vā prasiddham”(*) iti । anumeyaḥ pakṣastasya dharmastena tatsamānadharmeṇānvito yuktaḥ sapakṣastasmin sarvatraikadeśe vā prasiddha ityādi niyamaḥ । tadabhāve ca nāstyevetyasya vivaraṇam “anumeyaviparīte ca sarvasmin pramāṇato 'sadeva”(*) iti । anumeyaviparīto 'numeyadharmarahito vipakṣastasmin sarvatrāsadeva, “pramāṇataḥ” iti pramāṇena sādhyavyāvṛttyā sādhanavyāvṛttirvācyetyupadarśayati । “anumāpakam” ityasya vivaraṇam yadetaduktarūpaṃ liṅgaṃ “tadaprasiddhārthasyānumāpakam”(*) bhavatīti ।
analyzed: pūrvasya saṅgraha vākyasya spaṣṭa artham vivaraṇam āha yat anumeyena arthena ityādi anumeyena sambaddham iti asya vivaraṇam anumeyena arthena paricchedyamānena sahacaritam ajahat vṛtti iti deśa viśeṣe kāla viśeṣe vā sarvasmin deśe sarvasmin ca kāle iti prasiddham ca tad anvite iti asya vivaraṇam anumeya dharma anvite ca anyatra sarvasmin eka deśe vā prasiddham iti anumeyaḥ pakṣaḥ tasya dharmaḥ tena tad samāna dharmeṇa anvitaḥ yuktaḥ sapakṣaḥ tasmin sarvatr

original: {liṅgābhāsalakṣaṇam}
(“yattu yathoktāt trirūpālliṅgādekena dharmeṇa dvābhyāṃ vā viparītaṃ tadanumeyasyādhigame liṅgaṃ na bhavatītyetadevāha sūtrakāraḥ “aprasiddho 'napadeśo 'san sandigdhaścānapadeśaḥ” iti ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: yat tu yathā uktāt trirūpāt liṅgāt ekena dharmeṇa dvābhyām vā viparītam tad anumeyasya adhigame liṅgam na bhavati iti etat eva āha sūtrakāraḥ aprasiddhaḥ san sandigdhaḥ ca anapadeśaḥ iti

original: dvitīyasya saṅgrahavākyasya vivaraṇam “yattu yathoktāt trirūpālliṅgāt”(*) iti । abādhitaviṣayatvāt satpratipakṣatvasahitādekena dharmeṇa dvābhyāṃ vā dharmābhyāṃ tribhiśca viparītaṃ tadanumeyasyādhigame kartavye liṅgaṃ na bhavatīti । “etadevāha sūtrakāraḥ,”(*) “aprasiddho 'napadeśo 'san sandigdhaśca” <vai. sū.> iti sūtritatvopadarśanam ।
analyzed: dvitīyasya saṅgraha vākyasya vivaraṇam yat tu yathā uktāt trirūpāt liṅgāt iti abādhita viṣaya tvāt sat pratipakṣa tva sahitāt ekena dharmeṇa dvābhyām vā dharmābhyām tribhiḥ ca viparītam tad anumeyasya adhigame kartavye liṅgam na bhavati iti etat eva āha sūtrakāraḥ aprasiddhaḥ san sandigdhaḥ ca vai iti sūtrita tva upadarśanam

original: “aprasiddho 'napadeśaḥ” iti viruddhāvarodhaḥ, tasya sapakṣe 'prasiddhatvāt । “asan” ityasiddhaḥ, tasya hi pakṣadharmatvenāsattvāt । “sandigdhaścānapadaśaḥ” ityanaikāntikasaṅgrahaḥ । kālātyayāpadiṣṭaprakaraṇasamayoścāprasiddhapadenaivāvarodhaḥ, tayorabādhitaviṣayatvāsatpratipakṣatvenāprasiddhatvāt । samānatantranyāyena vā saṅgrahaḥ ।
analyzed: aprasiddhaḥ iti viruddha avarodhaḥ tasya sapakṣe prasiddha tvāt asan iti asiddhaḥ tasya hi pakṣa dharma tvena asat tvāt sandigdhaḥ ca iti anaikāntika saṅgrahaḥ kāla atyaya apadiṣṭa prakaraṇa samayoḥ ca aprasiddha padena eva avarodhaḥ tayoḥ abādhita viṣaya tva asat pratipakṣa tvena aprasiddha tvāt samāna tantra nyāyena vā saṅgrahaḥ

original: {vidhi(vyāpti)nirūpaṇam}

(“vidhistu yatra yatra dhūmastatra tatrāgniragnyabhāve ca dhūmo 'pi na bhavatīti । evaṃ prasiddhasamayasyāsandigdhadhūmadarśanāt sāhacaryānusmaraṇāt tadanantaramagnyadhyavasāyo bhavatīti । evaṃ sarvatra deśakālāvinābhūtamitarasya liṅgam ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: vidhiḥ tu yatra yatra dhūmaḥ tatra tatra agniḥ agni abhāve ca na bhavati iti evam prasiddha samayasya asandigdha dhūma darśanāt sāhacarya anusmaraṇāt tad anantaram agni adhyavasāyaḥ bhavati iti evam sarvatra deśa kāla avinābhūtam itarasya liṅgam

original: yathoktarūpaṃ liṅgaṃ nāgahītāvinābhāvasya gamakamityavinābhāvasvarūpopadarśanātham “vidhistu yatra yatra dhūmaḥ”(*) ityādi vākyam । vidhirvyāptiravinābhāva iti ।
analyzed: yathā ukta rūpam liṅgam nāga hīta avinābhāvasya gamakam iti avinābhāva svarūpa upadarśana atham vidhiḥ tu yatra yatra dhūmaḥ ityādi vākyam vidhiḥ vyāptiḥ avinābhāvaḥ iti

original: atha yadi sāmānyayoravinābhāvaḥ siddhasādhanam, apāstaviśeṣasya sāmānyasya siddhatvāt, niyatadeśāvacchedena viśeṣārthināṃ pravṛttinivṛttyorabhāvaprasaṅgaḥ । na ca viśeṣayoravinābhāvaḥ, teṣāmānantyenāprasiddhestadāyattasyāvinābhāvasyāprasiddheḥ । (manuṣya)<?>〈anukta〉dharmāṇāñca sarva eva viśeṣāḥ pratipattuṃ na śakyanta iti yāvatāmupalambhastāvatsvevāvinābhāvagrahaṇe ca nāgṛhītāvinābhāvasya viśeṣāntarasyopalambhādanumānaṃ syāt ॥
analyzed: atha yadi sāmānyayoḥ avinābhāvaḥ siddha sādhanam apāsta viśeṣasya sāmānyasya siddha tvāt niyata deśa avacchedena viśeṣa arthinām pravṛtti nivṛttyoḥ abhāva prasaṅgaḥ na ca viśeṣayoḥ avinābhāvaḥ teṣām ānantyena aprasiddheḥ tad āyattasya avinābhāvasya aprasiddheḥ manuṣya anukta dharmāṇām ca sarve eva viśeṣāḥ pratipattum na śakyante iti yāvatām upalambhaḥ tāvatsu eva avinābhāva grahaṇe ca na agṛhīta avinābhāvasya viśeṣa antarasya

original: naitad dūṣaṇam, sāmānyavatoravinābhāvagrahaṇābhyupagamāt । yadyapyagniviśeṣā dhūmaviśeṣāścānantyenāvasthitāstathāpi teṣvevāvasthitamagnitvaṃ dhūmatvañca sāmānyam upagrāhakamastīti tadupagrāhakavaśād bhūyodarśanabalādagnidhūmayordeśādivyabhicāre 'pyavyabhicāragrahaṇam । tathāhi, prātarmadhyāhnādibhedena kālasya bhede, samaviṣamādibhedena ca deśabhede dhūmasyāgninā sāhacaryopalabdherdeśāntare kālāntare ca dhūmo 'gniṃ vināpi bhaviṣyatītyāśaṅkā na syāt । ata eva na kulālasya rāsabhena vyāptigrahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ, kālāntare ca tena vināpyupalambhāt ।
analyzed: na etat dūṣaṇam sāmānyavatoḥ avinābhāva grahaṇa abhyupagamāt yadi api agni viśeṣāḥ dhūma viśeṣāḥ ca ānantyena avasthitāḥ tathā api teṣu eva avasthitam agni tvam dhūma tvañca sāmānyam upagrāhakam asti iti tad upagrāhaka vaśāt bhūyas darśana balāt agni dhūmayoḥ deśa ādi vyabhicāre pi avyabhicāra grahaṇam tathā hi prātar madhyāhna ādi bhedena kālasya bhede sama viṣama ādi bhedena ca deśa bhede dhūmasya agninā sāhacarya upalabdheḥ deśa antare

original: anye tu vyāptigrahaṇakāle pratipatturyogina iva aśeṣaviṣayaṃ parijñānamastīti bruvate । anyathā hi sarvo dhūmo 'gniṃ vinā na bhavatīti vyāptismaraṇaṃ na syāt । vivekena cāpratibhāsaḥ samānābhivyāhārāt । yathā dhānyarāśinikṣiptāyā dhānyavyakteriti ।
analyzed: anye tu vyāpti grahaṇa kāle pratipattuḥ yoginaḥ iva aśeṣa viṣayam parijñānam asti iti bruvate anyathā hi sarvaḥ dhūmaḥ gnim vinā na bhavati iti vyāpti smaraṇam na syāt vivekena ca apratibhāsaḥ samāna abhivyāhārāt yathā dhānya rāśi nikṣiptāyāḥ dhānya vyakteḥ iti

original: tadevaṃ “yatra yatra” iti vīpsārthasya vivakṣitatvāt “yatra yatra dhūmastatra <II,156> tatrāgniragnyabhāve ca dhūmo 'pi na bhavatītyevaṃ prasiddhasamayasya”(*) gṛhītāvinābhāvasya pratipatturasandigdhadhūmadarśanānantaraṃ sāhacaryānusmaraṇam 'yatra yatrāhaṃ dhūmamadrākṣaṃ tatra tatrāgnirastīti “sāhacaryānusmaraṇāt”(*) tadanantaram agniradhyavasīyate aneneti “agnyadhyavasāyaḥ”(*) parāmarśajñānam । tasmāccāgnipratipattiriti ।
analyzed: tat evam yatra yatra iti vīpsā arthasya vivakṣita tvāt yatra yatra dhūmaḥ tatra tatra agniḥ agni abhāve ca na bhavati iti evam prasiddha samayasya gṛhīta avinābhāvasya pratipattuḥ asandigdha dhūma darśana anantaram sāhacarya anusmaraṇam yatra yatra aham dhūmam adrākṣam tatra tatra agniḥ asti iti sāhacarya anusmaraṇāt tad anantaram agniḥ adhyavasīyate anena iti agni adhyavasāyaḥ parāmarśa jñānam tasmāt ca agni pratipattiḥ iti

original: anye tu parāmarśajñānasyābhāvameva bruvate । taccāsat, avinābhāvasambandhasmaraṇasyāniyatatvānniyatapradeśe 'gnipratipattirna syāt । upanayavaiyarthyañca, upanayārthasyānabhyupagamāt । tasmād vyutpattyā upacāreṇa vā “agnyadhyavasāyaḥ” parāmarśajñānaṃ vyākhyeyamiti ।
analyzed: anye tu parāmarśa jñānasya abhāvam eva bruvate tat ca asat avinābhāva sambandha smaraṇasya aniyata tvāt niyata pradeśe gni pratipattiḥ na syāt upanaya vaiyarthyam ca upanaya arthasya anabhyupagamāt tasmāt vyutpattyā upacāreṇa vā agni adhyavasāyaḥ parāmarśa jñānam vyākhyeyam iti

original: anye tu kāryakāraṇabhāvāt, svabhāvācca niyāmakādavinābhāvagrahaṇamiti manyante । taccāsat । kāryakāraṇabhāve 'pyavaśyaṃ bhūyodarśanabalādevāvinābhāvagrahaṇamiti vācyam । anyathā hi deśāntare kālāntare vā agniṃ vināpi dhūmo bhaviṣyatītyāśaṅkā syāt । athāgnidhūmayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvāvagatau kathamagniṃ vinā dhūmasya sambhava ityāśaṅkā, tasya nirhetukatvapratiṣedhenāvaśyaṃ svakāraṇādevotpatteriti । satyametat, yadi nāma sarvo dhūmo 'gnikārya iti jñānamapi bhūyodarśanaṃ vinā na bhavatīti tadabhyupagantavyam ।

original: bhedamāha “tat”(*) anumānam । “dvividham”(*) । kena rūpeṇa ? “dṛṣṭaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭañca”(*) iti । “tatra dṛṣṭaṃ prasiddhasādhyayorjātyabhede 'numānam”(*) prasiddhaśca sādhyaśceti prasiddhasādhyau, tayoḥ prasiddhasādhyayordṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayorjātyabhede sati yadanumānaṃ tad dṛṣṭam । yathā hi sādhyadharmo dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi pratyakṣārhastathā dārṣṭāntike 'pīti sādhyadharmābhedo na tu jāteḥ sāmānyasya । tathāhi, brāhmaṇakartṛkaṃ citrādikāryaṃ pratipadya punaḥ kṣatriyādikartṛkasyāpyupalambhāt kenacit kartrā sampāditametat, citrādikāryatvāt pūrvopalabdhaivaṃvidhacitrādikāryavadityanumānaṃ jāteḥ sāmānyasya bhede 'pi dṛṣṭameva, sādhyadharmasyānumānāt pūrvaṃ ūrdhvañca pratyakṣagrahaṇārthatvāt ।

original: anye tu prasiddhau ca tau sādhyau ceti prasiddhasādhyāviti samāsaṃ kurvate । tatra dṛṣṭāntadharmī prasiddhatvāt sādhyo na bhavati, dārṣṭāntikaśca na prasiddha iti kathametat ? upacārasya vivakṣitatvādadoṣaḥ । tathā hi, dṛṣṭāntadhamā sādhyasamānadharmādhikaraṇatvādupacāreṇa sādhyaḥ, dārṣṭāntikastvanumānādūrdhvaṃ prasiddhiṃ yāsyatīti pūrvamapi prasiddhaḥ । śeṣaṃ pūrvavaditi ।
analyzed: anye tu prasiddhau ca tau sādhyau ca iti prasiddha sādhyau iti samāsam kurvate tatra dṛṣṭānta dharmī prasiddha tvāt sādhyaḥ na bhavati dārṣṭāntikaḥ ca na prasiddhaḥ iti katham etat upacārasya vivakṣita tvāt adoṣaḥ tathā hi dṛṣṭānta dhamā sādhya samāna dharma adhikaraṇa tvāt upacāreṇa sādhyaḥ dārṣṭāntikaḥ tu anumānāt ūrdhvam prasiddhim yāsyati iti pūrvam api prasiddhaḥ śeṣam pūrvavat iti

original: asyodāharaṇaṃ yathā gavyeva sāsnāmupalabhya punardeśāntare gopiṇḍavyavadhāne 'pi sāsnādarśanād gavi pratipattiḥ gauriyaṃ sāsnāvattvāt pūrvopalabdhasāsnādivaditi ।
analyzed: asya udāharaṇam yathā gavi eva sāsnām upalabhya punar deśa antare go piṇḍa vyavadhāne sāsnā darśanāt gavi pratipattiḥ gauḥ iyam sāsnāvat tvāt pūrva upalabdha sāsnā ādi vat iti

original: sāmānyato dṛṣṭañca “prasiddhasādhyayoḥ”(*) dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayoratyantaṃ sarvathā jātibhede sādhyadharmabhede 'numānam । tathā ca sādhyadharmo 'numānāt pūrvamūrdhvañca sarvadā aprasiddha eveti । atha sādhyadharmasya bhede 'vinābhāvasyaivāprasiddheḥ kathamanumānamityāha “liṅgānumeyadharmasāmānyānuvṛttitaḥ”(*) iti । liṅgañca anumeyadharmaśca tayoḥ sāmānyenānuvṛttiḥ, yatra yatredaṃ sādhanasāmānyam, tatra tatredaṃ sādhyasāmānyamiti, tadgrahaṇe 'numānaṃ pravartata eva । yathā karṣakavaṇigrājapuruṣāṇāṃ pravṛtterabhipretaphalatvena phalavattvamupalabhya, varṇāśramiṇāmapi, kiṃ viśiṣṭānām ? dṛṣṭaṃ bhikṣālābhādikaṃ prayojanamanuddiśya pravartamānānāmabhipretaphalānumānam । tathāhi, varṇāśramiṇāñca pravṛttiḥ abhipretaphalena phalavatī prekṣāpūrvakāripravṛttitvāt karṣakādipravṛttivat ।
analyzed: sāmānyatas dṛṣṭam ca prasiddha sādhyayoḥ dṛṣṭānta dārṣṭāntikayoḥ atyantam sarvathā jāti bhede sādhya dharma bhede numānam tathā ca sādhya dharmaḥ numānāt pūrvam ūrdhvam ca sarvadā aprasiddhaḥ eva iti atha sādhya dharmasya bhede vinābhāvasya eva aprasiddheḥ katham anumānam iti āha liṅga anumeya dharma sāmānya anuvṛttitaḥ iti liṅgam ca anumeya dharmaḥ ca tayoḥ sāmānyena anuvṛttiḥ yatra yatra idam sādhana sāmānyam tatra tatra idam sādhya

original: na ca dṛṣṭaprayojanāpekṣayā siddhasādhanamiti dūṣaṇam, dṛṣṭaṃ prayojanamanuddiśyeti pakṣaviśeṣaṇena nirastatvāt । ye tu dṛṣṭamevoddiśya pravartate na te pakṣīkriyanta iti । nāpyadṛṣṭaphalena phalavattvaṃ sādhyate yena dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhyavikalo hetuśca viruddhaḥ syāt । kiṃ tarhi ? sāmānyenābhipretaphalena phalavattvaṃ sādhyate, tacca karṣakādipravṛttāvastyeveti na dṛṣṭāntasya sādhyavikalatvaṃ viruddhatvaṃ vā hetordoṣaḥ ।
analyzed: na ca dṛṣṭa prayojana apekṣayā siddhasādhanam iti dūṣaṇam dṛṣṭam prayojanam an uddiśya iti pakṣa viśeṣaṇena nirasta tvāt  ye tu dṛṣṭam eva uddiśya pravartate na te pakṣīkriyante iti  na api adṛṣṭa phalena phalavat tvam sādhyate yena dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhya vikalaḥ hetuḥ ca viruddhaḥ syāt  kim tarhi sāmānyena abhipreta phalena phalavat tvam sādhyate tat ca karṣaka ādi pravṛttau asti eva iti na dṛṣṭāntasya sādhya vikala tvam viruddha tv

original: sarvānumāneṣu samānañca viśeṣaviruddhānumānamityanumānamātrasyocchedaprasaṅgaḥ । atheṣyata evānumānasyāprāmāṇyam । tathā ca sāmānye siddhasādhanaṃ viśeṣe 'nugamābhāvaḥ । dharmiṇośca samudāye sādhye na hetoḥ pakṣadharmatvam, na cānvayaḥ samudāyasyānyatrāvṛtteḥ । atha samudāyaikadeśe 'pi vartamānaḥ samudāye varteta ityupacaryate, tarhi pramāṇasya gauṇatvād anumānārthaniścayo durlabhaḥ । tathā hi, pramāṇaṃ pratyakṣam, gauṇam anumānam, (vā) upacaritapakṣadharmāpekṣitvāt । gauṇamityapramāṇam । dharmasyāpi sādhyatve 'nvayasadbhāve 'pi na pakṣadhamatvaṃ samudāyasyānyatra । atha pratipādyamānadharmaviśiṣṭo dharmī sādhyaḥ ? tena cānvayābhāva eveti sarvamanumānamapramāṇam ।
analyzed: sarva anumāneṣu samānam ca viśeṣa viruddha anumānam iti anumāna mātrasya uccheda prasaṅgaḥ atha iṣyate eva anumānasya aprāmāṇyam tathā ca sāmānye siddhasādhanam viśeṣe nugama abhāvaḥ dharmiṇoḥ ca samudāye sādhye na hetoḥ pakṣa dharma tvam na ca anvayaḥ samudāyasya anyatra avṛtteḥ atha samudāya eka deśe vartamānaḥ samudāye varteta iti upacaryate tarhi pramāṇasya gauṇa tvāt anumāna artha niścayaḥ durlabhaḥ tathā hi pramāṇam pratyakṣam ga

original: tadatadasat, pratipādyadharmaviśiṣṭasya dharmiṇaḥ sādhyatve pakṣadharmatvopapatteḥ, anvayastu sādhyasamānadharmeṇa । nahi ekatra deśe hetorvṛttiḥ vyatirekastu tadabhāve <II,162> vyāvṛttiriti । liṅgopalambhācca sādhyadharmiṇi pratipatterdṛṣṭatvād itthambhūtānvayaparikalpanā kriyate । anabhyupagame (vā)<?>〈ca〉 vyabhicārijñānameva na syāt, tattu dṛṣṭamiti viśeṣaḥ । viruddhena tu niyataviśeṣapratiṣedhe viśeṣāntaropagamaḥ syāt । samastaviśeṣapratiṣedhe tu tanniyatasya sāmānyasyāpyasiddhiḥ । sādhanasāmānyavyāpakaṃ vā avaśyaṃ 〈sādhya〉sāmānyaṃ sidhyatīti । ataḥ 〈sādhya〉sāmānyasyaiva ākṣiptaviśeṣasyaiva anumānāt prasiddhervarṇāśramiṇāṃ phalantu adṛṣṭaṃ viśeṣātītameva sidhyatīti ।
analyzed: tat atadasat pratipādya dharma viśiṣṭasya dharmiṇaḥ sādhya tve pakṣa dharma tva upapatteḥ anvayaḥ tu sādhya samāna dharmeṇa nahi ekatra deśe hetoḥ vṛttiḥ vyatirekaḥ tu tad abhāve vyāvṛttiḥ iti liṅga upalambhāt ca sādhya dharmiṇi pratipatteḥ dṛṣṭa tvāt ittham bhūta anvaya parikalpanā kriyate anabhyupagame vāca vyabhicāri jñānam eva na syāt tat tu dṛṣṭam iti viśeṣaḥ viruddhena tu niyata viśeṣa pratiṣedhe viśeṣa antara upagamaḥ sy

original: {laiṅgikajñānasya pramāṇaphalavibhāgaḥ}
analyzed: laiṅgika jñānasya pramāṇa phala vibhāgaḥ

original: (“tatra liṅgadarśanaṃ pramāṇam, anumeyaṃ jñānaṃ phalam, prameyo 'gniḥ, pramātā ātmā । athavā agnijñānameva pramāṇaṃ pramitiragnau guṇadoṣamādhyasthyadarśanam, ityetat svaniścayārthamanumānam ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: tatra liṅga darśanam pramāṇam anumeyam jñānam phalam prameyaḥ gniḥ pramātā ātmā athavā agni jñānam eva pramāṇam pramitiḥ agnau guṇa doṣa mādhyasthya darśanam iti etat sva niścaya artham anumānam

original: śiṣyavyutpādanāya pramāṇaphalavibhāgaṃ darśayati “tatra liṅgadarśanaṃ pramāṇam, anumeyaṃ jñānaṃ phalam, prameyo 'gniḥ, pramātā ātmā”(*) iti । nanu liṅgadarśanaṃ vyadhikaraṇatvāt kathamagnijñānotpattau pramāṇam ? vyāpārāpekṣayā tadviṣayatvāt । yathā hi dhūmajñānaṃ dhūmaviṣayam ātmalābhāpekṣayā, tathā agnipratipattau vyāpārāpekṣayā agniviṣayamapīti । svāvayavasamavetasya cakṣuṣaḥ samutpāde vyāpārāpekṣayā rūpaviṣayatvamiveti ।
analyzed: śiṣya vyutpādanāya pramāṇa phala vibhāgam darśayati tatra liṅga darśanam pramāṇam anumeyam jñānam phalam prameyaḥ gniḥ pramātā ātmā iti  nanu liṅga darśanam vyadhikaraṇa tvāt katham agni jñāna utpattau pramāṇam vyāpāra apekṣayā tad viṣaya tvāt yathā hi dhūma jñānam dhūma viṣayam ātma lābha apekṣayā tathā agni pratipattau vyāpāra apekṣayā agni viṣayam api iti sva avayava samavetasya cakṣuṣaḥ samutpāde vyāpāra apekṣayā rūpa viṣay

original: nanvevamekasmin viṣaye vyāpārāpekṣayā karaṇādivyavasthānupapattiḥ । vibhinnalakṣaṇayogitvena tadbhāvāt । tathāhi, pramādhāratvaṃ pramāturlakṣaṇamuktam, evaṃ pramiterviṣayaḥ prameyam, tadvyatiriktañca pramājanakaṃ pramāṇam, tatsādhyañca phalamityevaṃ lakṣaṇabhedādeṣāṃ bheda iti ।
analyzed: nanu evam ekasmin viṣaye vyāpāra apekṣayā karaṇa ādi vyavasthā anupapattiḥ vibhinna lakṣaṇa yogitvena tad bhāvāt tathā hi pramā ādhāra tvam pramātuḥ lakṣaṇam uktam evam pramiteḥ viṣayaḥ prameyam tad vyatiriktam ca pramā janakam pramāṇam tad sādhyam ca phalam iti evam lakṣaṇa bhedāt eṣām bhedaḥ iti

original: “athavā”(*) iti pramāṇaphalavibhāge prakārāntaramāha “agnijñānameva pramāṇaṃ pramitiragnau guṇadoṣamādhyasthyadarśanam”(*) iti । agnijñāne satyavinābhāvasambandhasmaraṇāt parāmarśajñānāt sukhaṃsādhanatvāvabodhe sati upādeyajñānam, duḥkhasādhanatvāvabodhe ca heyajñānam, yasya nedaṃ sukhasādhanaṃ nāpi duḥkhasādhanam ityevaṃ bodhastasyopekṣaṇīyajñānamiti । agnijñānaphalatvañcopādeyādijñānasya pāramparyeṇeti pūrvavad vācyam ।
analyzed: athavā iti pramāṇa phala vibhāge prakāra antaram āha agni jñānam eva pramāṇam pramitiḥ agnau guṇa doṣa mādhyasthya darśanam iti agni jñāne sati avinābhāva sambandha smaraṇāt parāmarśa jñānāt sukham sādhana tva avabodhe sati upādeya jñānam duḥkha sādhana tva avabodhe ca heya jñānam yasya na idam sukha sādhanam na api duḥkha sādhanam iti evam bodhaḥ tasya upekṣaṇīya jñānam iti agni jñāna phala tvam ca upādeya ādi jñānasya pāramparyeṇa iti pūrvav

original: “ityetat svaniścayārthamanumānam”(*) ityupasaṃhāraḥ parārthānumānasaṃsūcakaḥ ।
analyzed: iti etat sva niścaya artham anumānam iti upasaṃhāraḥ para artha anumāna saṃsūcakaḥ

original: {śabdādīnāṃ anumāne 'ntarbhāvaḥ}
analyzed: śabda ādīnām anumāne ntarbhāvaḥ

original: (“śabdādīnāmapyanumāne 'ntarbhāvaḥ samānavidhitvāt । yathā prasiddhasamayasyāsandigdhaliṅgadarśanaprasiddhyanusmaraṇābhyāmatīndriye 'rthe bhavatyanumānamevaṃ śabdādibhyo 'pīti । śrutismṛtilakṣaṇo 'pyāmnāyo vaktṛprāmāṇyāpakṣaḥ, tadvacanādāmnāyaprāmāṇyam, liṅgāccānityo buddhipūrvā vākyakṛtirvede buddhipūrvo dadātirityuktatvāt ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: śabda ādīnām api anumāne ntarbhāvaḥ samāna vidhi tvāt  yathā prasiddha samayasya asandigdha liṅga darśana prasiddhi anusmaraṇābhyām atīndriye rthe bhavati anumānam evam śabda ādibhyaḥ pi iti śruti smṛti lakṣaṇaḥ u pi āmnāyaḥ vaktṛ prāmāṇya apakṣaḥ tad vacanāt āmnāya prāmāṇyam liṅgāt ca anityaḥ buddhi pūrvā vākya kṛtiḥ vede buddhi pūrvaḥ dadātiḥ iti ukta tvāt pdhs

original: athedānīṃ pramāṇavibhāgasya nyūnatāparihārāya tatsāmānyalakṣaṇasya vyabhicāraparihārārthaṃ “śabdādīnāmapyanumāne 'ntarbhāvaḥ”(*) ityādi prakaraṇam । nanu pūrvamanyeṣāmanumāne 'ntarbhāvasyānuktatvāt “api”śabdavaiyarthyam ? na, anumānapadenābhisambandhāt । na paraṃ pratyakṣa eva anumāne 'pyantarbhāva iti । pramāṇavibhāgaśca vidyāvibhāgapareṇāpi vākyena pūrvamupadarśita eva । tatra ca śabdādīnāmapi pramāṇānāṃ sadbhāvādanupapanno 'yamityāśaṅkā, tadvyudāsārthamantarbhāvaprakaraṇam । tathā śabdādeḥ kārakajātasyānumānasāmagryāmantarbhāve tatphalasyāpi phale 'ntarbhāvo jñāyata eva ।
analyzed: atha idānīm pramāṇa vibhāgasya nyūnatā parihārāya tad sāmānya lakṣaṇasya vyabhicāra parihāra artham śabda ādīnām api anumāne ntarbhāvaḥ ityādi prakaraṇam nanu pūrvam anyeṣām anumāne ntarbhāvasya anukta tvāt apiśabda vaiyarthyam na anumāna padena abhisambandhāt na param pratyakṣe eva anumāne pi antarbhāvaḥ iti pramāṇa vibhāgaḥ ca vidyā vibhāga pareṇa api vākyena pūrvam upadarśitaḥ eva tatra ca śabda ādīnām api pramāṇānām sadbhāvāt anupap

analyzed: tatra śabdaḥ ādau yeṣām tāni tathā uktāni atas teṣām anumāne ntarbhāvaḥ lakṣaṇa aikyam iti tad guṇa saṃvijñāna bahuvrīhi abhyupagame śabdasya api anumāne ntarbhāvaḥ a tad guṇa saṃvijñāne śabdam vinā apareṣām iti

original: antarbhāvavyavahāre ca “samānavidhitvāt”(*) samānalakṣaṇayogitvāditi hetūpanyāsaḥ kathaṃ sādhyānna viśiṣyate ? lakṣaṇaikatvasya tadvyavahārādanyatvāt । samāno vidhirupāyo lakṣaṇaṃ yeṣāṃ tāni tathoktāni, teṣāṃ bhāvastattvaṃ tasmāditi । tadevāha “yathā 〈prasiddhasamayasyāsandigdha〉liṅgadarśanaprasiddhyanusmaraṇābhyām atīndriye 'rthe bhavatyanumānamevaṃ śabdādibhyo 'pīti”(*) । yathā hi gṛhītasambandhasya liṅgadarśanānantaram avinābhāvasambandhasmaraṇaṃ tābhyāmatīndriye 'rthe paricchedye bhavatyanumānam । anumīyate 'neneti parāmarśajñānamevopacāreṇa vyutpattyā vā, tad vivakṣitam । “evaṃ śabdādibhyo 'pīti” dārṣṭāntikavyākhyānam ।
analyzed: antarbhāva vyavahāre ca samāna vidhi tvāt samāna lakṣaṇa yogi tvāt iti hetu upanyāsaḥ katham sādhyāt na viśiṣyate lakṣaṇa ekatvasya tad vyavahārāt anya tvāt samānaḥ vidhiḥ upāyaḥ lakṣaṇam yeṣām tāni tathā uktāni teṣām bhāvaḥ tattvam tasmāt iti  tat eva āha yathā prasiddha samayasya asandigdha liṅga darśana prasiddhi anusmaraṇābhyām atīndriye rthe bhavati anumānam evam śabda ādibhyaḥ pi iti  yathā hi gṛhīta sambandhasya liṅga darśana an

original: tadetadasat, gośabdasya kakudādimadarthavattāyāḥ pratipādayitumaśakyatvāt । tathāhi, śabdasyārthena anyasambandhābhāvād vācyavācakatvenārthapratipādakatve sādhye gośabdatvamahetuḥ, pratipādakatvasya pratipattyavaseyatvāt, svābhāvikasambandhānupapatteśca । dhūmo hi svābhāvikasambandhena sarvaprāṇabhṛtāmanumeyārthapratipādakaḥ, na caivaṃ śabdaḥ, puruṣecchāsampāditasamayāpekṣasyārthapratipādakatvāt । svābhāvikasambandhe hi vināpi saṅketaṃ mlecchādiśabdaśravaṇād arthapratipattiḥ syāt । saṅketāpekṣasya tu arthapratipādakatve sa evāstu, alaṃ nityasambandheneti । na ca nityasambandhābhāve 'tiprasaṅgaḥ, naimittikaśabdānāṃ dravyatvādinimittasadbhāve satyeva saṅketāt, yādṛcchikaśabdānāntu puruṣecchā〈nu〉vidhānāditi । yatra ca viśiṣṭānupūrvīmattvasadbhāvastadeva niyamena vācakam, itaracca vācyamiti vyavasthā saṅketajñānasyobhayaniṣṭhatvāviśeṣāditi ।
analyzed: tat etat asat go śabdasya kakud ādimat arthavat tāyāḥ pratipādayitum aśakya tvāt tathā hi śabdasya arthena anya sambandha abhāvāt vācya vācaka tvena artha pratipādaka tve sādhye go śabda tvam ahetuḥ pratipādaka tvasya pratipatti avaseya tvāt svābhāvika sambandha anupapatteḥ ca  dhūmaḥ hi svābhāvika sambandhena sarva prāṇabhṛtām anumeya artha pratipādakaḥ na ca evam śabdaḥ puruṣa icchā sampādita samaya apekṣasya artha pratipādaka tvāt svābhāvika sambandhe

original: saṅketastu śabdād vṛddhavyavahārataśca pratīyate । tathāhi, “idamasya vācakam”, “idamasya vācyam” iti vākyāt saṅketapratipattiḥ । vṛddhavyavahārād yathā “devadatta ! gāmabhyāja śuklāṃ daṇḍena” iti prayogād avyutpanno 'nvayavyatirekābhyāṃ devadattādiśabdeṣu saṅketaṃ pratipadyate । vṛddhavyavahartṝṇāmapi saṅketapratipattiranyato vyavahārādityanāditvaṃ parihāraḥ । yad vā ādipuruṣaḥ sākṣāddraṣṭā keṣāñcit saṅketakartā astīti । vākyarūpastu śabdo 'rthapratipattau samayamapi nāpekṣata iti sambandhabalenārthapratipādakatvamasiddham ।
analyzed: saṅketaḥ tu śabdāt vṛddha vyavahārataḥ ca pratīyate tathā hi idam asya vācakam idam asya vācyam iti vākyāt saṅketa pratipattiḥ vṛddha vyavahārāt yathā devadatta gām abhyāja śuklām daṇḍena iti prayogāt avyutpannaḥ nvaya vyatirekābhyām devadatta ādi śabdeṣu saṅketam pratipadyate vṛddha vyavahartṝṇām api saṅketa pratipattiḥ anyatas vyavahārāt iti anādi tvam parihāraḥ yat vā ādi puruṣaḥ sākṣāt draṣṭā keṣāñcid saṅketa kartā asti

original: anyadeva rūpādisvalakṣaṇamindriyagrāhyam, tasmādanyaḥ śabdasya gocaro '<II,172>poha〈viṣaya〉 iti gṛhyatām । yataḥ śabdāt pratyeti bhinnākṣaḥ pradhvastanayanaḥ, na tu pratyakṣaṃ yathā bhavati tathekṣate । samānaviṣayatve vā anandhasyevāndhasyāpi śabdādaparokṣaiva pratipattiḥ syāt । tathātve indriyāgnisambandhādivad dāhaśabdādapi dāhārthapratipattiḥ syādityāha,
analyzed: anyat eva rūpa ādi sva lakṣaṇam indriya grāhyam tasmāt anyaḥ śabdasya gocaraḥ iti gṛhyatām yatas śabdāt pratyeti bhinna akṣaḥ pradhvasta nayanaḥ na tu pratyakṣam yathā bhavati tathā īkṣate samāna viṣaya tve vā anandhasya iva andhasya api śabdāt aparokṣā eva pratipattiḥ syāt tathātve indriya agni sambandha ādi vat dāha śabdāt api dāha artha pratipattiḥ syāt iti āha

original: anyathaivāgnisambandhād dāhaṃ dagdho 'bhimanyate /
analyzed: anyathā eva agni sambandhāt dāham dagdhaḥ bhimanyate

original: anyathā dāhaśabdena dāhārthaḥ sampratīyate //
analyzed: anyathā dāha śabdena dāha arthaḥ sampratīyate

original: tasmānnendriyeṇa samānaviṣayatvaṃ śabdasya । tathā padādiśabdasya svalakṣaṇaviṣayatve tasya nirbhāgatayā śuklādiśabdānāmapi paryāyatā bhavet । apohaviṣayatve tu nāyaṃ doṣaḥ, vibhinnānāṃ samāropavyavacchedaparatvāditi ।
analyzed: tasmāt na indriyeṇa samāna viṣaya tvam śabdasya tathā pada ādi śabdasya sva lakṣaṇa viṣaya tve tasya nirbhāga tayā śukla ādi śabdānām api paryāya tā bhavet apoha viṣaya tve tu na ayam doṣaḥ vibhinnānām samāropa vyavaccheda para tvāt iti

original: vāstavārthaviṣayatve ca śabdānāṃ puruṣecchāvaśena aniyatārthatvaṃ na syāt । vyavahārastu śabdānmayā pratipannaṃ śabdena ca pratipādayāmīti, pratipādyapratipādakayostamirikadvayadvicandradarśanavad bhaviṣyatīti । yathaikastaimirikaścandradvayaṃ pratipadya pratipādayati, aparaśca pratipadyate, tathā sarvatra vyavahartṝṇāmayaṃ śabdo vyavahāra iti । atha parīkṣakāstarhi śabdārthādhyavasāye sati mithyātvaṃ manyamānāḥ pravartante ? lokavyavahārānusāritayā, “lokavyavahāraṃ prati sadṛśau bālapaṇḍitau” iti nyāyāt । mithyājñānasya cārthapratipādakatvaṃ kvacidupalabdham । yathā maṇipradīpaprabhayormaṇibuddhyābhidhāvatormithyājñānāviśeṣe 'pi viśeṣo 'rthakriyāṃ prati ।
analyzed: vāstava artha viṣaya tve ca śabdānām puruṣa icchā vaśena aniyata artha tvam na syāt vyavahāraḥ tu śabdāt mayā pratipannam śabdena ca pratipādayāmi iti pratipādya pratipādakayoḥ tamirika dvaya dvi candra darśana vat bhaviṣyati iti yathā ekaḥ taimirikaḥ candra dvayam pratipadya pratipādayati aparaḥ ca pratipadyate tathā sarvatra vyavahartṝṇām ayam śabdaḥ vyavahāraḥ iti atha parīkṣakāḥ tarhi śabda artha adhyavasāye sati mithyātvam manyamānāḥ pravarta

original: tadetadasat, śabdādarthādhyavasāye sati pravartamānasya arthāvisaṃvādena akṣajajñānavad abhrāntatvena prāmāṇyopapatteḥ । tathā hi indriyajñānasyāpi samyaktve na arthāvisaṃvādaṃ vinā pramāṇāntaramasti, sa ca śābdajñāne 'pyastīti kathamapramāṇam ?
analyzed: tat etat asat śabdāt artha adhyavasāye sati pravartamānasya artha avisaṃvādena akṣa ja jñāna vat abhrānta tvena prāmāṇya upapatteḥ tathā hi indriya jñānasya api samyaktve na artha avisaṃvādam vinā pramāṇa antaram asti sa ca śābda jñāne pi asti iti katham apramāṇam

original: pratibandho 'pi kāryaviśeṣopalabdherindriyāṇāmiva śabdasyāpyarthena vācyaḥ । sa ca vācyavācakālambanaṃ saṅketajñānameva, anyasyāsambhavāt । tasya ca viśeṣāṇāmānantye 'pi ekasāmānyasyopagrahādupapattirityuktameva । yadi ca śabdānāmaprāmāṇyam, pramāṇādisvarūpāvabodhārthaṃ śāstramanarthakaṃ syāt, pramāṇādisvarūpasya pāramparyeṇāpi tasmādapratīteḥ ।
analyzed: pratibandhaḥ u pi kārya viśeṣa upalabdheḥ indriyāṇām iva śabdasya api arthena vācyaḥ sa ca vācya vācaka ālambanam saṅketa jñānam eva anyasya asambhavāt tasya ca viśeṣāṇām ānantye pi eka sāmānyasya upagrahāt upapattiḥ iti uktam eva yadi ca śabdānām aprāmāṇyam pramāṇa ādi svarūpa avabodha artham śāstram anarthakam syāt pramāṇa ādi svarūpasya pāramparyeṇa api tasmāt apratīteḥ

original: yadi ca vivakṣāsūcakatvenaiva prāmāṇyamiṣyeta, tarhi sarvavākyānāṃ tatrāvyabhicārādaviśeṣeṇa prāmāṇye vādiprativādinorvivāde jayaparājayavyavasthā na syāt । atha yadvākyamarthapratiba(ndhāṃ)<?>〈ddhāṃ〉 vivakṣāṃ sūcayati, tadeva pramāṇaṃ na sarvamiti cet, na, śabdavad vivakṣāṇāmapi ekāntena arthapratibandhābhāvāt । tathā ca arthadarśanānusmaraṇakrameṇa vivakṣākāle nārthasyāvasthānamastīti । ato bāhyārthādhyavasāye satyeva pravartante na “dṛśyavikalpyāvarthāvekīkṛtya tatsamāropeṇa” iti ।
analyzed: yadi ca vivakṣā sūcaka tvena eva prāmāṇyam iṣyeta tarhi sarva vākyānām tatra avyabhicārāt aviśeṣeṇa prāmāṇye vādi prativādinoḥ vivāde jaya parājaya vyavasthā na syāt atha yat vākyam artha pratibandhāṃddhām vivakṣām sūcayati tat eva pramāṇam na sarvam iti ced na śabda vat vivakṣāṇām api ekāntena artha pratibandha abhāvāt tathā ca artha darśana anusmaraṇa krameṇa vivakṣā kāle na arthasya avasthānam asti iti atas bāhya artha adhyavasāye sati e

original: na ca dṛśyasyānupalabdhervikalpyenakīkaraṇaṃ yuktam, upalabhyamānapadārthe hi candrādau dvitvādisamāropasyānyatropalabdheḥ, śabdārthapratipattau bādhakānupapatteśca mṛṣaiṣā kalpanā ।
analyzed: na ca dṛśyasya anupalabdheḥ vikalpya inakīkaraṇam yuktam upalabhyamāna padārthe hi candra ādau dvi tva ādi samāropasya anyatra upalabdheḥ śabda artha pratipattau bādhaka anupapatteḥ ca mṛṣā eṣā kalpanā

original: yaccedaṃ vivakṣākrameṇa śabdotpattikāle nārthasyāvasthānamastīti, tadapāstam, kṣaṇikatvānabhyupagamena ।
analyzed: yat ca idam vivakṣā krameṇa śabda utpatti kāle na arthasya avasthānam asti iti tat apāstam kṣaṇika tva anabhyupagamena

original: atha sāmānyaviśeṣavyatiriktaviṣayābhāvādapramāṇatvaṃ śabdānām, tadasat, ekāntena pramāṇeṣu vyavasthānabhyupagamāt । tathā ca, āgamādātmā pratīyate, punarutpādaliṅgaiḥ yogabalācca pratyakṣato 'pīti saṃplavaḥ । kvacid vyavasthā ca । yathā āgamasya medhyāmedhyapratipattau, indriyāṇāṃ svaviṣayeṣviti । ataḥ pratyakṣādiviṣaye 'pi śabdasya pravṛtterna viṣayāntarābhāvastadaprāmāṇye heturiti । viṣayadvaividhyena ca pramāṇadvitvāvadhāraṇe dūṣaṇaṃ gurubhirvistareṇābhihitamiti nehocyate ।
analyzed: atha sāmānya viśeṣa vyatirikta viṣaya abhāvāt apramāṇa tvam śabdānām tat asat ekāntena pramāṇeṣu vyavasthā anabhyupagamāt tathā ca āgamāt ātmā pratīyate punar utpāda liṅgaiḥ yoga balāt ca pi iti saṃplavaḥ kvacid vyavasthā ca yathā āgamasya medhya amedhya pratipattau indriyāṇām sva viṣayeṣu iti atas pratyakṣa ādi viṣaye pi śabdasya pravṛtteḥ na viṣaya antara abhāvaḥ tad aprāmāṇye hetuḥ iti viṣaya dvaividhyena ca pramāṇa dvi tva avad

original: yattu śabdānāṃ svalakṣaṇaviṣayatve andhānandhayoraviśeṣaprasaṅga ityuktam, tadasat, viṣayaikatve 'pi karaṇabhedena pratipattyorbhedāt । andhasya hi śabdād rūpaviṣayaṃ vijñānamutpadyate, na tu cākṣuṣamiti । yasya ca aparokṣaṃ cākṣuṣaṃ vijñānamasti, asau anandhaḥ । śabdo hi vyavahitamapyarthaṃ prakāśayati, sannikṛṣṭañca indriyam ityanayorvibhinnapratipattijanakatvam ।
analyzed: yat tu śabdānām sva lakṣaṇa viṣaya tve andha anandhayoḥ aviśeṣa prasaṅgaḥ iti uktam tat asat viṣaya ekatve pi karaṇa bhedena pratipattyoḥ bhedāt andhasya hi śabdāt rūpa viṣayam vijñānam utpadyate na tu cākṣuṣam iti yasya ca aparokṣam cākṣuṣam vijñānam asti asau an andhaḥ śabdaḥ hi vyavahitam api artham prakāśayati sannikṛṣṭam ca indriyam iti anayoḥ vibhinna pratipatti janaka tvam

original: yattu tvagindriyāgnisambandhādiva dāhaśabdādapi dāhārthaḥ sampratīyetetyuktam, tatra yadi dāho duḥkham, tatpratīyata eva dāhaśabdāt । na caivaṃ śroturduḥkhi<II,174>tvaprasaṅgaḥ, duḥkhāsamavāyāt । yasya hi duḥkhaṃ samavetamupajātam, sa eva duḥkhī, na tu dāhaśabdād ātmani samavetaṃ duḥkhamutpadyate । kiṃ tarhi ? parātmasamavetamapi tato vijānātīti । sphoṭādilakṣaṇastu dāhastvaco 'gnisambandhādupajāyate, na dāhaśabdāditi । tasmādedhāgnisambandhādutpannasphoṭādikāryastajjanitaduḥkham ātmāntaḥkaraṇasambandhād anubhavatīti duḥkhītyatidiśyate । dāhaśabdañca anyathaiva anutpannasphoṭādikāryo duḥkhaṃ parātmagataṃ pratipadyate, ityadūṣaṇametat ।
analyzed: yat tu tvac indriya agni sambandhāt iva dāha śabdāt api dāha arthaḥ sampratīyeta iti uktam tatra yadi dāhaḥ duḥkham tat pratīyate eva dāha śabdāt na ca evam duḥkha asamavāyāt yasya hi duḥkham samavetam upajātam saḥ eva duḥkhī na tu dāha śabdāt ātmani samavetam duḥkham utpadyate kim tarhi parātma samavetam api tatas vijānāti iti sphoṭa ādi lakṣaṇaḥ tu dāhaḥ tvacaḥ gni sambandhāt upajāyate na dāha śabdāt iti tasmāt edha agni sambandhāt utpanna spho

original: na ca svalakṣaṇasya nirbhāgatayā śuklādiśabdānāṃ paryāyatvaprasaṅgaḥ, dharmadharmiṇorvyatirekāt pratyayabhedasya bhedalakṣaṇatvādityuktam । tasmād bhinnapravṛttinimittānāṃ śabdānāmekārthatve 'pi na paryāyatvamiti ।
analyzed: na ca sva lakṣaṇasya nirbhāga tayā śukla ādi śabdānām paryāya tva prasaṅgaḥ dharma dharmiṇoḥ vyatirekāt pratyaya bhedasya bheda lakṣaṇa tvāt iti uktam tasmāt bhinna pravṛtti nimittānām śabdānām eka artha tve pi na paryāya tvam iti

original: na cāpohaḥ śabdārthaḥ, tasyaivāsambhavāditi vakṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: na ca apohaḥ śabda arthaḥ tasya eva asambhavāt iti vakṣyāmaḥ

original: yattu vāstavārthaviṣayatve puruṣecchāvaśena aniyatārthatvaṃ na syāditi, tadasat, naimittikaśabdānāṃ nimittavaśena pravṛtternāniyatārthatvam, yādṛcchikānāntu puruṣecchāvaśena aniyatārthatvamiṣyata eva, bādhakānupapatteśca na taimirikasya dvicandradarśanavacchābdo vyavahāraḥ । tathāhi, taimirikasya dvicandradarśane timirotpatteḥ prāgūrdhvañca bādhakamasti, anupajātatimirasya tu sarvadā, na caivaṃ śabdavyavahāre ।
analyzed: yat tu vāstava artha viṣaya tve puruṣa icchā vaśena aniyata artha tvam na syāt iti tat asat naimittika śabdānām nimitta vaśena pravṛtteḥ na aniyata artha tvam yādṛcchikānām tu puruṣa icchā vaśena aniyata artha tvam iṣyate eva bādhaka anupapatteḥ ca na taimirikasya dvi candra darśana vat śābdaḥ vyavahāraḥ tathā hi taimirikasya dvi candra darśane timira utpatteḥ prāk ūrdhvam ca bādhakam asti anupajāta timirasya tu sarvadā na ca evam śabda vyavahāre anupajāta

original: yattu mithyājñānāviśeṣe 'pyarthakriyāsiddhiḥ, yathā maṇipradīpaprabhayorityuktam, tadaparijñānāt । tathāhi, samīpavartino yanmaṇāveva vijñānaṃ tadevārthakriyājanakam, na prabhāyāmiti । śābdajñānantu arthaprāptiparyantavyavahāropalabdherindriyajajñānavad bhrāntaṃ na bhavatīti ।
analyzed: yat tu mithyā jñāna aviśeṣe pi arthakriyā siddhiḥ yathā maṇi pradīpa prabhayoḥ iti uktam tad aparijñānāt tathā hi samīpa vartinaḥ yat maṇau eva vijñānam tat eva arthakriyā janakam na prabhāyām iti śābda jñānam tu artha prāpti paryanta vyavahāra upalabdheḥ indriya ja jñāna vat bhrāntam na bhavati iti

original: na ca vāstavasambandhābhāve śabdānām aśvaśabdādaśvādhyavasāyo gośabdācca gavyadhyavasāya iti vikalpaniyamo ghaṭate, dṛṣṭaścāsāviti । tathāśvaśabde 'pi sambandhāgrahe sambandhipratyayo na syādityalamativistareṇa ।
analyzed: na ca vāstava sambandha abhāve śabdānām aśva śabdāt aśva adhyavasāyaḥ go śabdāt ca gavi adhyavasāyaḥ iti vikalpa niyamaḥ ghaṭate dṛṣṭaḥ ca asau iti tathā aśva śabde pi sambandha agrahe sambandhi pratyayaḥ na syāt iti alam ati vistareṇa

original: tadevaṃ tādātmyatadutpattipratibandhasya pūrvameva pratiṣedhāt śabdānāntu <II,175> samayavaśenārthapratipādakatvād upapannam anumānādarthāntaratve sati prāmāṇyamiti ।
analyzed: tat evam tādātmya tad utpatti pratibandhasya pūrvam eva pratiṣedhāt śabdānām tu samaya vaśena artha pratipādaka tvāt upapannam anumānāt artha antara tve sati prāmāṇyam iti

original: {ceṣṭāyā anumāne 'ntarbhāvaḥ}
analyzed: ceṣṭāyāḥ anumāne ntarbhāvaḥ

original: (“prasiddhābhinayasya ceṣṭayā pratipattidarśanāt tadapyanumānameva”)<PDhS>
analyzed: prasiddha abhinayasya ceṣṭayā pratipatti darśanāt tat api anumānam eva

original: atha ceṣṭāpramāṇāntaramiti kecit, tanniṣedhārthamāha “prasiddhābhinayasya ceṣṭayā pratipattidarśanāt tadapyanumānameva”(*) prasiddho 'bhinayaśceṣṭā kāyiko vyāpāro 'rthaviśeṣāvinābhūto yasyāsau tathoktaḥ, tasya ceṣṭayā arthaviśeṣe pratipattiḥ । yathā mukhāñjalisaṃyogād viśiṣṭāt pipāsāpratipattiḥ, tasya tayā pūrvamavinābhāvopalabdheḥ । tathā ca, ayaṃ pipāsānvitaḥ, viśiṣṭamukhāñjalisaṃyogavattvāt, tadanyaivaṃvidhadevadattavat । ataḥ pakṣadharmatvādibalena gamakatvād etadapyanumānameveti । evamanyāpi ceṣṭā nāṭyaśāstraprasiddhā anumāne 'ntarbhāvanīyeti ।
analyzed: atha ceṣṭā pramāṇa antaram iti kecid tad niṣedha artham āha prasiddha abhinayasya ceṣṭayā pratipatti darśanāt tat api anumānam eva prasiddhaḥ bhinayaḥ ceṣṭā kāyikaḥ vyāpāraḥ rtha viśeṣa avinābhūtaḥ yasya asau tathā uktaḥ tasya ceṣṭayā artha viśeṣe pratipattiḥ yathā mukha añjali saṃyogāt viśiṣṭāt pipāsā pratipattiḥ tasya tayā pūrvam avinābhāva upalabdheḥ tathā ca ayam pipāsā anvitaḥ viśiṣṭa mukha añjali saṃyoga vat tvā

original: {upamānasyānumāne 'ntarbhāvaḥ}
analyzed: upamānasya anumāne ntarbhāvaḥ

original: (“āptenāprasiddhagavayasya gavā gavayapratipādanādupamānamāptavacanameva ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: āptena aprasiddha gavayasya gavā gavaya pratipādanāt upamānam āpta vacanam eva

original: athopamānaṃ pramāṇāntaramiti kecit, tanniṣedhārthamāha  “āptenāprasiddhagavayasya gavā gavayapratipādanād upamānamāptavacanameva”(*) iti । āptena prasiddhagogavayasārūpyeṇa 〈a〉prasiddhagavayasya gavā gavayapratipādanāditi । yathā gaurevaṃ gavaya ityupamānamiṣṭam । tad āptavacanameva na pramāṇāntaramiti । na cāsya upamārūpatvāt pramāṇāntaratvam, vidhyarthavādādibhedenāpi pramāṇānantyaprasaṅgāt । atha satyapyavāntarabhede nāmīṣām āptopadeśād bhedaḥ, tadupamāne 'pi samānam ।
analyzed: atha upamānam pramāṇa antaram iti kecid tad niṣedha artham āha āptena aprasiddha gavayasya gavā gavaya pratipādanāt upamānam āpta vacanam eva iti āptena prasiddha go gavaya sārūpyeṇa aprasiddha gavayasya gavā gavaya pratipādanāt iti yathā gauḥ evam gavayaḥ iti upamānam iṣṭam tat āpta vacanam eva na pramāṇa antaram iti na ca asya upamā rūpa tvāt pramāṇa antara tvam vidhi artha vāda ādi bhedena api pramāṇa ānantya prasaṅgāt atha sati api avāntarabhede na am

original: atha vākyādupalabdhasādṛśyasyāṭavyāmaṭato gavayārthino madīyā gauranena sadṛśīti jñānamupamānam, asadetat, phalābhāvāt । ajñānanivṛttiḥ phalamityuktam, nivṛtteḥ pradhvaṃsatvāt । tathāhi, yadi jñānānutpattiḥ, viparītaṃ vā jñānamajñānam ubhayathāpi tannivṛttiḥ pradhvaṃsa eva । pramājanakañca pramāṇam । na ca heyādibuddhayaḥ phalam, tadapāye sati kālāntareṇa sukhaduḥkhādiviniścayānantaramutpatteḥ । na ca sādṛśyasya prameyatvam, tajjñānasyāphalatvāt । abhyupagame vā anyat pramāṇaṃ vācyamiti ।
analyzed: atha vākyāt upalabdha sādṛśyasya aṭavyām aṭataḥ gavaya arthinaḥ madīyā gauḥ anena sadṛśī iti jñānam upamānam asat etat phala abhāvāt ajñāna nivṛttiḥ phalam iti uktam nivṛtteḥ pradhvaṃsa tvāt tathā hi yadi jñāna anutpattiḥ viparītam vā jñānam ajñānam ubhayathā api tad nivṛttiḥ pradhvaṃsaḥ eva pramā janakam ca pramāṇam na ca heya ādi buddhayaḥ phalam tad apāye sati kāla antareṇa sukha duḥkha ādi viniścaya anantaram utpatteḥ  /

original: atha gavayajñānamupamānaṃ madīyā gauranena sadṛśīti jñānaphalam, sādṛśyāvacchinnaḥ piṇḍaḥ, tadavacchinnaṃ vā sādṛśyaṃ prameyamiti । na cedaṃ jñānamindriyajam, aṭavyāṃ vyavasthitasya gṛhāvasthitapiṇḍaviṣayatvenotpatteḥ । na cānumānajam, liṅgavyāpārānupalabdheḥ । gosādṛśyantu gavaye gṛhyamāṇamapyasiddham, vyadhikaraṇatvāt । tathā ca, madīyā gauranena sadṛśī, asya tatsadṛśatvād iti vyadhikaraṇataiva । anupapadyamānasyārthasyābhāvād nārthāpattijam । śabdaṃ vināpyutpatterna śābdam । abhāvasya ca niyataviṣayatvam । na cedaṃ smaraṇam, gavayasādṛśyasya gopiṇḍe pūrvamananubhūtatvāt । ataḥ pramāṇāntaraphalametadityāśayaḥ parasya ।
analyzed: atha gavaya jñānam upamānam madīyā gauḥ anena sadṛśī iti jñāna phalam sādṛśya avacchinnaḥ piṇḍaḥ tad avacchinnam vā sādṛśyam prameyam iti na ca idam jñānam indriya jam aṭavyām vyavasthitasya gṛha avasthita piṇḍa viṣaya tvena utpatteḥ na ca anumāna jam liṅga vyāpāra anupalabdheḥ go sādṛśyam tu gavaye gṛhyamāṇam api asiddham vyadhikaraṇa tvāt tathā ca madīyā gauḥ anena sadṛśī asya tad sadṛśa tvāt iti vyadhikaraṇa tā eva anupapady

original: yadi ca gosādṛśyāvacchinnaṃ gavayapiṇḍam indriyārthasannikarṣādevopalabhyate, tadā pratyakṣaphalameva, na pramāṇāntaraphalam । tatra kiṃ smaraṇāpekṣamindriyamevaṃ jñānaṃ janayati, anapekṣaṃ vā ? anapekṣasya jñānajanakatve 'prasiddhagopiṇḍasya smaraṇe 'pyetat syāt । atha piṇḍamātrasmaraṇe, aśvādipiṇḍasmaraṇe 〈'pi〉 syāt, atha gavayasādṛśyāvacchinnasmaraṇāpekṣaṃ janakam, tatrāpi yadi smaraṇamātramapekṣeta, gajādismaraṇe 'pi syāt । atha gopiṇḍasmaraṇāpekṣam, tatrāpi kiṃ gopiṇḍamātrasmaraṇamapekṣate, gavayasādṛśyāvacchinnaṃ gopiṇḍasmaraṇaṃ vā । gopiṇḍamātrasmaraṇe 'śvādipi(ṇḍasmaraṇe 'pi)<?>〈ṇḍe 'pi〉 syāt । gavayasādṛśyāvacchinnagopiṇḍasmaraṇāpekṣitve pūrvamevānubhavo vācyastadantareṇa saṃskārānutpatteḥ smaraṇasyaivābhāvāt । ataḥ savikalpakajñānābhāve 'pi gavayasādṛśyāvacchinne gopiṇḍe pūrvamanubhavo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ । yena hi saṃskārotpattau smaraṇād madīyayā gavā sadṛśo 'yaṃ gavaya iti jñānaṃ syāt । pūrvañca gavayasādṛśyāvacchinnagopiṇḍe 'nubhavaprasiddhau gavayopalambhād madīyā gauranena sadṛśīti kathametat smaraṇaṃ na syāt ? tathā pṛṣṭo bravīti etatsadṛśī mayopalabdhā, na tu pramāṇāntaraṃ nirdiśatīti manyamānaḥ praśasto bhagavān antarbhāvamāheti ।
analyzed: yadi ca go sādṛśya avacchinnam gavaya piṇḍam indriya artha sannikarṣāt eva upalabhyate tadā pratyakṣa phalam eva na pramāṇa antara phalam  / tatra kim smaraṇa apekṣam indriyam evam jñānam janayati anapekṣam vā anapekṣasya jñāna janaka tve prasiddha go piṇḍasya smaraṇe pi etat syāt atha piṇḍa mātra smaraṇe aśva ādi piṇḍa smaraṇe syāt atha gavaya sādṛśya avacchinna smaraṇa apekṣam janakam tatra api yadi smaraṇa mātram apekṣeta gaja ādi smara

original: anye tu yathā gaurgavayastatheti vanecaravākyāt sādṛśyopalambhe sati upajātasaṃskārasyāṭavyāṃ paribhramato gośādṛśyāvacchinnagavayadarśane sati avinābhāvasambandhasmaraṇānantaraṃ tathā cāyaṃ gosadṛśa iti jñānamupamānaṃ <II,177> manyante । tasmāccānantaraṃ gavayanā(me)<?>〈māyami〉ti saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhapratipattiḥ । phalaṃ saṃjñāsaṃjñirūpam, saṃjñāvacchinno vā piṇḍaḥ prameyamiti । na ca vākyādeva saṅketapratipattirgavayapiṇḍasya parokṣatvāt, “pratyakṣaṃ saṃjñākarma” <vai. sū.> iti sūtravyāghātācca ।
analyzed: anye tu yathā gauḥ gavayaḥ tathā iti vanecara vākyāt sādṛśya upalambhe sati upajāta saṃskārasya aṭavyām paribhramataḥ go śādṛśya avacchinna gavaya darśane sati avinābhāva sambandha smaraṇa anantaram tathā ca ayam go sadṛśaḥ iti jñānam upamānam manyante tasmāt ca anantaram gavaya nāmā imā ayam iti saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha pratipattiḥ phalam saṃjñā saṃjñi rūpam saṃjñā avacchinnaḥ vā piṇḍaḥ prameyam iti na ca vākyāt eva saṅketa prati

original: na yuktametat, vākyādeva saṅketasya pratītatvāt । tathāhi, sādṛśyavākyasyāyamartho yo gosadṛśaḥ, sa gavaya ityevaṃ vyavahartavyaḥ । sa ca vākyādupalabdhasaṅketaḥ sādṛśyāvacchinnaṃ piṇḍamupalabhamānaḥ paraṃ vyavaharati “ayaṃ gavayaḥ” iti, na tu saṅketaṃ pratipadyate pratipiṇḍam, anyatrāpi saṅketaprasaṅgāt । tathāhi, yatra yatra gotvaṃ paśyasi, tatra tatra gośabdaḥ prayoktavyaḥ, tasmācca asāvarthaḥ pratipattavya iti saṅketagrahe sati gopiṇḍopalambhādayaṃ gauriti pratipadyate, na tu gonā( me)<?>〈māyami〉ti, vyavahārābhāvaprasaṅgāt । na tu sūtravyāghātaḥ, pratyakṣaśabdasya dṛḍhapramāṇopalakṣaṇatvāt । dṛḍhapramāṇaparicchinne 'rthe saṃjñā pravartate । yathā deśāntaravyavasthito 'pi pitā svaputrasya nāma karoti “yajñadatta nāmāsau” iti ।
analyzed: na yuktam etat vākyāt eva saṅketasya pratīta tvāt tathā hi sādṛśya vākyasya ayam arthaḥ yaḥ go sadṛśaḥ sa gavayaḥ iti evam vyavahartavyaḥ sa ca vākyāt upalabdha saṅketaḥ sādṛśya avacchinnam piṇḍam upalabhamānaḥ param vyavaharati ayam gavayaḥ iti na tu saṅketam pratipadyate prati piṇḍam anyatra api saṅketa prasaṅgāt tathāhi yatra yatra go tvam paśyasi tatra tatra go śabdaḥ prayoktavyaḥ tasmāt ca asau arthaḥ pratipattavyaḥ iti saṅketa grahe

original: atha jātiśabdasya pratyakṣa evārthe saṅketaḥ, na, atīndriyeṣu asaṅketaprasaṅgāt । dṛṣṭañca manaḥ śabdasyātīndriye 'pi manasi dṛḍhapramāṇaparicchinne saṅketaḥ । tathā ayaṃ gavaya iti kathaṃ punarbhavān jānātīti pareṇa pṛṣṭo vanecareṇa mamākhyātamiti vacanameva nirdiśati, na tu sādṛśyāt pratipannamiti । kārakeṇa ca vyapadeśaḥ । yathā cakṣuṣā pratipannamanumānācca pratipannamiti, tathā nirviṣayavācyapramāṇamupamānam । athāsti saṃjñāsaṃjñirūpaṃ prameyam, na, sambandhapratipatteḥ phalatve sambandhinaḥ prameyatvānupapatteḥ । atha sambandha iva sambandhinaḥ pratipattireva ubhayaniṣṭhatayā upacāreṇābhidhīyate । tathāpi na saṃjñāsaṃjñirūpaṃ prameyam, saṃjñāyāstadabhāvāt । atha svayamuccārya śabdaṃ pratipadyate, na, vivakṣākrameṇa śabdotpattikāle sādṛśyajñānasya pramāṇasyāsambhavāt । atha jagato vistīrṇatayā kvacidutpanno gavayaśabdaḥ prameyaḥ, na, tasyāśrūyamāṇasya prameyatvānupapatteḥ । atha apratibandhanyāyena dūrasthasyāgamane brahmabhāṣitasyāgamanaṃ syāt ।
analyzed: atha jāti śabdasya pratyakṣaḥ eva arthe saṅketaḥ na atīndriyeṣu a saṅketa prasaṅgāt dṛṣṭam ca manaḥ śabdasya atīndriye manasi dṛḍha pramāṇa paricchinne saṅketaḥ tathā ayam gavayaḥ iti katham punar bhavān jānāti iti pareṇa pṛṣṭaḥ vanecareṇa mama ākhyātam iti vacanam eva nirdiśati na tu sādṛśyāt pratipannam iti kārakeṇa ca vyapadeśaḥ yathā cakṣuṣā pratipannam anumānāt ca pratipannam iti tathā nirviṣaya vācya pramāṇam upamā

original: na ca sannihitaḥ kvacit tadaiva śabdamuccarati, asaṃvedanāt । atha smṛtisamāropitasya gavayaśabdasya prameyatvam, na, tatkalpanāyāṃ kāraṇābhāvāt । sādṛśyajñānānantaraṃ ayaṃ gavayanāmeti pratipadyate, na cāntarāle tatsmṛteranupraveśe pramāṇamastīti । saṃjñāvacchinnasya tu piṇḍasya prameyatvena sambandhajñānaṃ syāt, tasyobhayālambanatvāditi । tathā pareṇāpi anumānādupamānasya bhedamupadarśayatā “yathā tathetyupasaṃhārādupamānasiddhernāviśeṣaḥ” iti vākyarūpamupamānamiṣṭamava । tasya cāgame 'ntarbhāvo na doṣāyeti ।
analyzed: na ca sannihitaḥ kvacid tadā eva śabdam uccarati asaṃvedanāt  / atha smṛti samāropitasya gavaya śabdasya prameya tvam na tad kalpanāyām kāraṇa abhāvāt sādṛśya jñāna anantaram ayam gavaya nāmā iti pratipadyate na ca antarāle tad smṛteḥ anupraveśe pramāṇam asti iti saṃjñā avacchinnasya tu piṇḍasya prameya tvena sambandha jñānam syāt tasya ubhaya ālambana tvāt iti tathā pareṇa api anumānāt upamānasya bhedam upadarśayatā yathā tathā iti upasaṃhārāt

original: {arthāpatteranumāne 'ntarbhāvaḥ}
analyzed: arthāpatteḥ anumāne ntarbhāvaḥ

original: (“darśanārthādarthāpattistadapyanumānameva ।”)<PDhS>
analyzed: darśana arthāt arthāpattiḥ tat api anumānam eva pdhs

original: atha arthāpatteranumāne 'ntarbhāvārthaṃ “darśanā〈rthāda〉rthāpattistadapyanumānameva”(*) iti vākyam । dṛśyata iti darśanaṃ tasmādupalabhyamānādarthādanyathānupapadyamānād arthasyāptiḥ prāptiḥ prasaṅga iti । taduktam,
analyzed: atha arthāpatteḥ anumāne ntarbhāva artham darśana arthāt arthāpattiḥ tat api anumānam eva iti vākyam dṛśyate iti darśanam tasmāt upalabhyamānāt arthāt anyathā anupapadyamānāt arthasya āptiḥ prāptiḥ prasaṅgaḥ iti tat uktam

original: pramāṇaṣaṭkavijñāto yatrārtho nānyathā bhavet /
analyzed: pramāṇa ṣaṭka vijñātaḥ yatra arthaḥ na anyathā bhavet

original: adṛṣṭaṃ kalpayedanyā sārthāpattirudāhṛtā // <ślo. vā. 450 pṛ.>
analyzed: adṛṣṭam kalpayet anyā sā arthāpattiḥ udāhṛtā

original: iti ṣaḍbhedā arthāpattiḥ । tatra pratyakṣapūrvikā tu yathā sphoṭādilakṣaṇaṃ kāryamupalabhya tadanyathānupapattyā vahnerdāhikā śaktiḥ pratīyate । na cātra pramāṇāntareṇa avinābhāvagrahaṇam, śakteḥ pramāṇāntarāgocaratvāt । anupalabdhāvinābhāvaśca liṅgaṃ na bhavatyeva । ataḥ pramāṇāntarametat ।
analyzed: iti ṣaṭ bhedāḥ arthāpattiḥ tatra pratyakṣa pūrvikā tu yathā sphoṭa ādi lakṣaṇam kāryam upalabhya tad anyathā anupapattyā vahneḥ dāhikā śaktiḥ pratīyate na ca atra pramāṇa antareṇa avinābhāva grahaṇam śakteḥ pramāṇa antara agocara tvāt anupalabdha avinābhāvaḥ ca liṅgam na bhavati eva atas pramāṇa antaram etat

original: anumānapūrvikā tu yathā dhūmādagniṃ pratipadya tadanyathānupapattyā tadviśeṣapratītiriti । upamānapūrvikā ca yathā aṭavyāṃ gavayadarśanāntaraṃ madīyā gauranena sadṛśīti gāṃ pratipadya tadanyathānupapattyā vāhadohādisāmarthyapratipattiḥ । arthāpattipūrvikā tu rūpopalambhānyathānupapattyā avagatasya cakṣuṣaḥ paricchedikā śaktiḥ pratīyata iti । āgamapūrvikā tu jīvati devadatte gṛhe nāstīti vākyād gṛhe 'sattvaṃ pratipadya tadanyathānupapattyā bahirbhāvapratipattiḥ । na bahirbhāvāvinābhūtaṃ kiñcilliṅgamastīti pramāṇāntaraphalametat ।
analyzed: anumāna pūrvikā tu yathā dhūmāt agnim pratipadya tad anyathā anupapattyā tad viśeṣa pratītiḥ iti upamāna pūrvikā ca yathā aṭavyām gavaya darśana antaram madīyā gauḥ anena sadṛśī iti gām pratipadya tad anyathā anupapattyā vāha doha ādi sāmarthya pratipattiḥ arthāpatti pūrvikā tu rūpa upalambha anyathā anupapattyā avagatasya cakṣuṣaḥ paricchedikā śaktiḥ pratīyate iti āgama pūrvikā tu jīvati devadatte gṛhe na asti iti vākyāt gṛhe sattvam pratipa

original: abhāvapūrvikā tu yathā sadupalambhakapramāṇapañcakavyāvṛttyā devadattasya gṛhe 'sattvaṃ pratipadya tadanyathānupapattyā bahirdeśasambandhaḥ pratīyate ।
analyzed: abhāva pūrvikā tu yathā sat upalambhaka pramāṇa pañcaka vyāvṛttyā devadattasya gṛhe sattvam pratipadya tad anyathā anupapattyā bahis deśa sambandhaḥ pratīyate

original: antarbhāvamāha “tadapyanumānameva”(*) na pramāṇāntaram । tathā ca sphoṭādikāryeṇa agneratīndriyā śaktiḥ pratīyate, ityasadetat, tasyāścaramasahakārivyatirekeṇa pūrvameva pratiṣedhāt । pratibandhakābhāvaviśiṣṭo 'gnisaṃyoga eva agneḥ śaktiḥ, tatsadbhāve kāryakaraṇāt । agnitvantu nijā śaktiḥ, sāpi pratyakṣaiva । yaccānumānāt sāmānyāvabodhe satyāpattito viśeṣāvabodha iti, tadapāstameva, sāmānyaviśeṣasya sādhyatvāditi vadatā । upamānasya tu smaraṇādabhede 'pi tatpūrvikārthāpattiranumānameva, vyāpteḥ pūrvameva grahaṇāt । tathā ca sādṛśyāvacchinno gopiṇḍo vāhādisamarthaḥ, tatpiṇḍatvāt pūrvopalabdhaivaṃvidhagopiṇḍavat । arthāpattipūrvikāpi arthāpattiranumitānumānameva । tathā ca rūpopalabdhiḥ karaṇakāryā kriyātvāt, chidikriyāvaditi । cakṣuḥ prasiddham, taccānumitaṃ śaktimat karaṇatvāt vāsyādivaditi ।
analyzed: antarbhāvam āha tat api anumānam eva na pramāṇa antaram tathā ca sphoṭa ādi kāryeṇa agneḥ atīndriyā śaktiḥ pratīyate iti asat etat tasyāḥ carama sahakāri vyatirekeṇa pūrvam eva pratiṣedhāt pratibandhaka abhāva viśiṣṭaḥ gni saṃyogaḥ eva agneḥ śaktiḥ tad sadbhāve kārya karaṇāt agni tvan tu nijā śaktiḥ sā api pratyakṣā eva  yat ca anumānāt sāmānya avabodhe satya āpattitaḥ viśeṣa avabodhaḥ iti tat apāstam eva sāmānya viśeṣasya sādh

original: yā ceyaṃ jīvati devadatte gṛhe nāstītyanyathānupapattyā bahirbhāvapratipattiḥ, sāpyanumānameva, vyāpteḥ pūrvameva grahaṇāt । tathāhi devadatto bahirdeśasambandhī jīvanasambandhitve sati gṛhe 'nupalabhyamānatvād viṣṇumitravat । jīvanasambandhitvañca devadattasya arthāpattivādināpi āgamādeva pratipattavyam, anyathā athāpattirna pravarteta । samānañcaitadabhāvapūrvikāyāmapyarthāpattāviti ।
analyzed: yā ca iyam jīvati devadatte gṛhe na asti iti anyathā anupapattyā bahirbhāva pratipattiḥ sā api anumānam eva vyāpteḥ pūrvam eva grahaṇāt tathā hi devadattaḥ bahis deśa sambandhī jīvana sambandhi tve sati gṛhe nupalabhyamāna tvāt viṣṇumitra vat jīvana sambandhi tvañca devadattasya arthāpatti vādinā api āgamāt eva pratipattavyam anyathā atha āpattiḥ na pravarteta samānam ca etat abhāva pūrvikāyām api arthāpattau iti

original: pramāṇapañcakābhāvenāpi jīvato devadattasya gṛhe 'sattvapratipattau bahirdeśasambandho 'numīyate । evamanyadapyudāharaṇamarthāpatteravinābhāvopadarśanena anumāna eva antarbhāvanīyam, tathotpattiṃ vinā anyathānupapatterupadarśayitumaśakyatvāditi ।
analyzed: pramāṇa pañcaka abhāvena api jīvataḥ devadattasya gṛhe sattva pratipattau bahis deśa sambandhaḥ numīyate evam anyat api udāharaṇam arthāpatteḥ avinābhāva upadarśanena anumāne eva antar bhāvanīyam tathā utpattim vinā anyathā anupapatteḥ upadarśayitum aśakya tvāt iti

original: atha virodhinaḥ sarpādervisphūrjanādiśabdaśravaṇād tadanumitau virodhinyeva nakulādau pratipattiḥ pramāṇāntaramiṣṭaṃ kaiścit । tadanumitānumānameva, vyāpteḥ pūrvameva grahaṇāt । prayogastu visphūrjanaśabdo bhujaṅgakāryo visphūrjanaśabdatvāt pūrvopalabdhaivaṃvidhavisphūrjanaśabdavat । evamanumitaḥ sarpaḥ sannihitena virodhinā tadvān, visphūrjanaśabdakartṛtvāt pūrvopalabdhaivaṃvidhāhivaditi ।

original: sadupalambhakapramāṇapañcakavyāvṛttyā tu abhāvagrahaṇe kathaṃ ṣaḍeva pramāṇānītyavadhāraṇam, pramāṇāgrahe tasyānupapatteḥ । na hi sadupalambhakapramāṇābhāvasya paricchedyatve anyat tasya paricchedakaṃ pramāṇamasti । atha pramāṇapañcakābhāvasyānekatvāt kaścit kasyacid grāhako bhavati ? evaṃ tarhi tasyāpyanyena grahaṇaṃ tasyāpyanenetyanavasthā syāt । na ca pramāṇavyakteranekatvāt tadagrahaṇe tanniṣṭhasya ṣaḍevetyavadhāraṇasya sambhavaḥ syāt । vaiśeṣikāṇāntu pramāṇavyaktīnāmānantye 'pi ekaṃ lakṣaṇamupagrāhakamastīti yuktaṃ pramāṇagrahaṇe satyavadhāraṇamiti ।
analyzed: sat upalambhaka pramāṇa pañcaka vyāvṛttyā tu abhāva grahaṇe katham ṣaḍ eva pramāṇāni iti avadhāraṇam pramāṇa agrahe tasya anupapatteḥ na hi sat upalambhaka pramāṇa abhāvasya paricchedya tve anyat tasya paricchedakam pramāṇam asti atha pramāṇa pañcaka abhāvasya aneka tvāt kaścid kasyacid grāhakaḥ bhavati evam tarhi tasya api anyena grahaṇam tasya api anena iti anavasthā syāt na ca pramāṇa vyakteḥ aneka tvāt tad agrahaṇe tad niṣṭhasya ṣaṣ eva it

original: yaccedaṃ devakulamātraṃ dṛṣṭavā niṣkrānto 'nyena pṛṣṭastadaiva hastyādernāstitā pratipadyata ityuktam, tanna, asya smaraṇatvāt । yadyapi pūrvaṃ hastītyādi savikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ notpannam; tathāpi hastyādyabhāvaviśiṣṭe devakule nirvi<II,183>kalpakaṃ jñānamutpannam । anyathā hi yadāhaṃ devakulamadrākṣam, na tadā taṃ samīpavartinaṃ hastinamiti praśnānantaraṃ smaraṇaṃ na syāt । tattu dṛṣṭam । yasya vastunaḥ pūrvaṃ nābhāvaḥ paricchinnastatra parapraśnānantaraṃ saṃśete, na nirīkṣitaṃ mayā kiṃ tatra devadatto 'sti uta nāstīti । na cedānīmabhāvaṃ niścinoti āgamasyāpi pramāṇāntareṇārthatathābhāvapratipattiḥ । nāptopadeśena kadācit sambhavāt । ataḥ pūrvameva hastyādyabhāvasya pratīteryuktametat smaraṇaṃ na mayā tatra hastī dṛṣṭa ityādi । abhāvasya ca prameyatvaṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgāvasare vyavasthāpitameveti ।
analyzed: yat ca idam devakula mātram dṛṣṭavā niṣkrāntaḥ nyena pṛṣṭaḥ tadā eva hasti ādeḥ nāstitā pratipadyate iti uktam tat na asya smaraṇa tvāt yadi api pūrvam hasti ityādi sa vikalpakam jñānam na utpannam tathā api hasti ādi abhāva viśiṣṭe devakule jñānam utpannam anyathā hi yadā aham devakulam adrākṣam na tadā tam samīpa vartinam hastinam iti praśna anantaram smaraṇam na syāt tat tu dṛṣṭam yasya vastunaḥ pūrvam na abhāvaḥ paricchinnaḥ tatra par

original: atha prāk sūcitasya parārthānumānasya vyākaraṇārthaṃ “pañcāvayavena”(*) ityādi prakaraṇam । parārthānumiti〈riti〉 lakṣyanirdeśaḥ । “pañcāvayavena vākyena svaniścitārthapratipādanam”(*) iti lakṣaṇam । svaniścitārthaḥ sādhyaḥ, pratipādyate 'neneti svaniścitārthapratipādanaṃ liṅgam, tat pañcāvayavena vākyena sahitaṃ parārthamanumānam । pratipattirvā pratipādanam, svaniścitārthaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ pañcāvayavena vākyena janitam, yataḥ kārakasamūhād bhavati tat parārthānumānamiti sādhyārthavākyārthavādinā vyākhyānam । liṅgavākyārthapakṣe tu arthyate 'nenetyartho liṅgam, pratipādyata iti pratipādanam, pañcāvayavena vākyena pratipādyamānaṃ liṅgaṃ parārthānumānamiti । yadvā svaniścitārthapratipattiḥ pratipādanam, tacca pañcāvayavena vākyena janitaṃ parārthānumānamiti ।
analyzed: atha prāk sūcitasya parārtha anumānasya vyākaraṇa artham pañcāvayavena ityādi prakaraṇam parārthā anumitiḥ iti lakṣya nirdeśaḥ pañcāvayavena vākyena sva niścita artha pratipādanam iti lakṣaṇam sva niścita arthaḥ sādhyaḥ pratipādyate nena iti sva niścita artha pratipādanam liṅgam tat pañcāvayavena vākyena sahitam parārtham anumānam pratipattiḥ vā pratipādanam sva niścita artha viṣayam jñānam pañcāvayavena vākyena janitam yatas kāraka samūhāt bhava

original: nanvetasmin pakṣe kathaṃ svārthād viśiṣyate parārthānumānam, cakṣurādinā śabdena vā liṅgaṃ pratipadya tasmāt sādhyaṃ pratipadyata iti kutaḥ svārthaparārtha iti bhedaḥ ? na ca parasampāditācchabdālliṅgaṃ pratipadyata iti viśeṣaḥ, cakṣurāderapi parasampāditatvāt śabdarūpatāvailakṣaṇyantu vaidharmyamātrameva । ataḥ sādhyavākyārthapakṣo doṣānupapatter(a)<?>grāhya iti । tathā ca kevalaṃ liṅgaṃ cakṣurādinā pratipannaṃ sādhyapratipattau svārthānumānamaśabdasahitam, śabdasahitantu parārthānumānamiti viśeṣaḥ । tasmādityanena samarthaliṅgaparāmarśānantaram anitya evāyam iti sādhyapratipatteḥ saṃvedanācca sādhyameva vākyārthaḥ । tasmādityevamantameva vākyam । śeṣañca abhiprāyanivedanamiti, na tvārtham, sādhyavākyārthapakṣe bādhakānupapatterityalamativistareṇa ।
analyzed: nanu etasmin pakṣe katham svārthāt viśiṣyate parārtha anumānam cakṣuḥ ādinā śabdena vā liṅgam pratipadya tasmāt sādhyam pratipadyate iti kutas svārtha parārthaḥ iti bhedaḥ na ca para sampāditāt śabdāt liṅgam pratipadyate iti viśeṣaḥ cakṣuḥ ādeḥ api para sampādita tvāt śabda rūpatā vailakṣaṇyam tu vaidharmya mātram eva atas sādhya vākya artha pakṣaḥ doṣa anupapatteḥ agrāhyaḥ iti tathā ca kevalam liṅgam cakṣuḥ ādinā pratipannam sād

original: pūrvasya saṅgrahavākyasya vivaraṇam “pañcāvayavenaiva vākyena, na dvyavayavena daśāvayavena ve”ti । keṣām ? “saṃśayitavipa(rītā)<?>〈ryastā〉vyutpannānām”(*) svaniścitārthapratipādanaṃ parārthānumānaṃ vijñeyam ।

original: atha niravayavatvād vākyasyānupapannametat pañcāvayaveneti । tathā ca varṇānāṃ na samuditānāmarthapratipādakatvam, kramabhāvināmāśuvināśitvena samudāyāsambhavāt । na vyastānām, ekasmādevārthapratītāvanyeṣāmuccāraṇavaiyarthyāt । upalabhyate ca śabdād uccaritārthapratipattiḥ । atastadanyathānupapattyā varṇakalāpādatiricyamānaḥ sphoṭātmā pratīyata iti । tathā gauriti śabdoccāraṇād abhinnākāraṃ vijñānaṃ śrotravyāpārādutpadyamānaṃ dṛṣṭam । na cedaṃ saṃśayaviparyayavyatirekādavayavijñānavad abhinnamarthaṃ vinā bhavatīti । varṇoccāraṇantu sphoṭasvarūpābhivyaktaye kriyata iti na vyartham ।
analyzed: atha niravayava tvāt vākyasya anupapannam etat pañca avayavena iti  tathā ca varṇānām na samuditānām artha pratipādaka tvam krama bhāvinām āśu vināśi tvena samudāya asambhavāt  na vyastānām ekasmāt eva artha pratītau anyeṣām uccāraṇa vaiyarthyāt upalabhyate ca śabdāt uccarita artha pratipattiḥ atas tad anyathā anupapattyā varṇa kalāpāt atiricyamānaḥ sphoṭa ātmā pratīyate iti tathā gauḥ iti śabda uccāraṇāt abhinna ākāram vijñānam śrotra vyāpārā

original: asadetat, pūrvavarṇānugṛhītasyāntyavarṇasya svānubhavasahakāriṇo 'rthapratipādakatvāt । yathā ca, ekasmin varṇe jñānam, tena kriyate saṃskāraḥ; punardvitīyavarṇajñānam, tenāpi pūrvavarṇasaṃskārasahakāriṇā saṃskāra iti krameṇa antyavarṇajñānam, tasmāt pūrvasaṃskārābhivyaktāvaśeṣavarṇānusmaraṇe sati antyavarṇādarthapratipattiḥ । na caivaṃ ghaṭādyanubhavajanitasaṃskārasya anubhavāntarasahakāriṇaḥ saṃskārārambhakatvenātiprasaṅgaḥ, tatra viśiṣṭādṛṣṭābhāvāt । tadabhāvastu kāryā<II,185>bhāvenaiva jñāyata iti । atra ca kāryasya sadbhāvād viśiṣṭo 'dṛṣṭaḥ kāraṇatvena kalpyata iti ।
analyzed: asat etat pūrva varṇa anugṛhītasya antya varṇasya sva anubhava sahakāriṇaḥ rtha pratipādaka tvāt yathā ca ekasmin varṇe jñānam tena kriyate saṃskāraḥ punar dvitīya varṇa jñānam tena api pūrva varṇa saṃskāra sahakāriṇā saṃskāraḥ iti krameṇa antya varṇa jñānam tasmāt pūrva saṃskāra abhivyakta avaśeṣa varṇa anusmaraṇe sati antya varṇāt artha pratipattiḥ na ca evam ghaṭa ādi anubhava janita saṃskārasya anubhava antara sahakāriṇaḥ sa

original: anye tu śabdārthopabhogaprāpakādṛṣṭaniyamitāḥ pūrvavarṇānubhavajanitasaṃskārāḥ pūrvavarṇeṣvekaṃ smaraṇamārabhante tatsahakārī cāntyo varṇaḥ padam । yadvā saṃskāramekaṃ vicitramārabhante, tasmācca pūrvavarṇeṣvekaṃ smaraṇamiti ।
analyzed: anye tu śabda artha upabhoga prāpaka adṛṣṭa niyamitāḥ pūrva varṇa anubhava janita saṃskārāḥ pūrva varṇeṣu ekam smaraṇam ārabhante tad sahakārī ca antyaḥ varṇaḥ padam yat vā saṃskāram ekam vicitram ārabhante tasmāt ca pūrva varṇeṣu ekam smaraṇam iti

original: anye tu pūrvavarṇānāṃ tajjñānānāñca atītānāmapi antyavarṇasahakāritvam, anvayavyatirekopapatteḥ । yathā hi, vartamānasya kāraṇatvam anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ vijñātam, evamatītasyāpīti । yad vā pūrvavarṇavināśāstajjñānapradhvaṃsāśca samīpavartino 'ntyavarṇasahakāriṇa iti kṣīṇārthāpattiḥ । evaṃvidhakalpanānabhyupagame ca varṇoccāraṇavaiyarthyameva syāt । na ca sphoṭābhivya(kta)<?>〈ñjaka〉muccāraṇam, samastavyastavikalpānupapatteḥ । na samastairabhivyajyate, samudāyānabhyupagamāt, na vyastaiḥ, ekenaivābhivyaktau śeṣoccāraṇavaiyarthyaprasaṅgāt । atha kalpanā āśrīyate, sā arthapratipattāvapi samarthetyalaṃ sphoṭaparikalpanayā । abhinnākārañca jñānamantyavarṇaviṣayaṃ varṇatvaviṣayaṃ vā ।
analyzed: anye tu pūrva varṇānām tad jñānānām ca atītānām api antya varṇa sahakāri tvam anvaya vyatireka upapatteḥ yathā hi vartamānasya kāraṇa tvam anvaya vyatirekābhyām vijñātam evam atītasya api iti yat vā pūrva varṇa vināśāḥ tad jñāna pradhvaṃsāḥ ca samīpa vartinaḥ ntya varṇa sahakāriṇaḥ iti kṣīṇa arthāpattiḥ evaṃvidha kalpanā anabhyupagame ca varṇa uccāraṇa vaiyarthyam eva syāt na ca sphoṭa abhivyakta añjakam uccāraṇam samasta vyasta vi

original: yad vā ghanāvasthitipratyakṣeṣviva varṇeṣu bhrāntamabhinnākāraṃ vijñānamiti na sphoṭasiddhiḥ । śabdābhivyaktāviva sphoṭābhivyaktāvapi doṣā iti samānatayā śabdaparīkṣāyāmevābhidhāsyanta ityalam ।

original: vākyakalpanā tvekasmin pade jñānasyotpādaḥ, saṃskārasya saṅketasmaraṇasya ca utpadyamānatā, tataḥ saṃskārasya saṅketasmaraṇasya ca utpādaḥ, padārthapratipatterutpadyamānatā, padajñānasya vinaśyattā, tataḥ padārthapratipatterutpattiḥ, smaraṇasya vinaśyattā, padajñānasya vināśaḥ, saṃskārasya dvitīyapadajñānasya ca utpadyamānatā, tato dvitīyapadajñānasyotpādaḥ, pūrvasaṃskārasacivena padārthajñānena saṃskārasyotpādaḥ, saṃskārāntarasyotpadyamānatā saṅketasmaraṇasyāpyutpadyamānatā, padārthapratipattevinaśyattā, pūrvasaṅketasmaraṇasya vināśaḥ, tato dvitīyapadajñānasaṃskārasyotpādaḥ saṅketasmaraṇasyāpyutpādaḥ, padajñānasya vinaśyattā, padārthapratipatterutpadyamānatā, pūrvapadārthapratipattervināśa ityayaṃ <II,186> nyāyastāvad yāvadantyapade jñānam । tena ca kalpanayā tatsaṃskārābhivyakteraśeṣapadārthaviṣayaṃ smaraṇaṃ janyate । tena ca svānubhavena ca viśiṣṭamantyapadameva vākyam, tasmācca vākyārthapratipattiriti ।
analyzed: vākya kalpanā tu ekasmin pade jñānasya utpādaḥ saṃskārasya saṅketa smaraṇasya ca utpadyamāna tā tatas saṃskārasya saṅketa smaraṇasya ca utpādaḥ padārtha pratipatteḥ utpadyamāna tā pada jñānasya vinaśyat tā tatas padārtha pratipatteḥ utpattiḥ smaraṇasya vinaśyat tā pada jñānasya vināśaḥ saṃskārasya dvitīya pada jñānasya ca utpadyamāna tā tatas dvitīya pada jñānasya utpādaḥ pūrva saṃskāra sacivena padārtha jñānena saṃskārasya utpāda

original: nanu padajñānotpatteḥ pūrvam adṛṣṭavaśāt padapadārthaviṣayasmaraṇotpādābhyupagame tasya padajñānāt saṅketasmaraṇakāle nāvasthānamiti padārthapratipatterūrdhvaṃ kathaṃ vākyārthapratipattiḥ ? na ca padārthapratipattiṃ vinaiva vākyārthapratipattiḥ, adarśanāt । atha padajñānādūrdhvaṃ kalpanayā tatsaṃskāreṇa smaraṇaṃ janyate tataḥ padajñānasya vinaśyatteti saṅketasmaraṇakāle tasyānavasthānāt padārthapratipattyabhāve na vākyārthapratipattiriti dūṣaṇaṃ tadavasthameva ?
analyzed: nanu pada jñāna utpatteḥ pūrvam adṛṣṭa vaśāt pada padārtha viṣaya smaraṇa utpāda abhyupagame tasya pada jñānāt saṅketa smaraṇa kāle na avasthānam iti padārtha pratipatteḥ ūrdhvam katham vākya artha pratipattiḥ na ca padārtha pratipattim vinā eva vākya artha pratipattiḥ adarśanāt atha pada jñānāt ūrdhvam kalpanayā tad saṃskāreṇa smaraṇam janyate tatas pada jñānasya vinaśyat tā iti saṅketa smaraṇa kāle tasya anavasthānāt padārtha pratipatti ab

original: asadetat, vākye saṅketānupapatteḥ । antyapadaṃ vākyameva, tad antyārthastu vākyārtha iti । yadā ca pūrvavarṇatajjñānādūrdhvaṃ kalpanayā tatsaṃskāreṇa smaraṇaṃ janyate, tataḥ padajñānasya vinaśyatteti saṅketasmaraṇābhāvaviśiṣṭo 'ntyo vaṇaḥ padam, tadeṣā vākyakalpanā । anyathā pūrvavarṇeṣu jñānadvāreṇa saṃskārād vicitrasmaraṇānugṛhīto 'ntyo varṇaḥ padamityabhyupagamena padārthajñānānantaraṃ padajñānaṃ syāt, varṇajñānavyavadhānāt ।
analyzed: asat etat vākye saṅketa anupapatteḥ antya padam vākyam eva tat antya arthaḥ tu vākya arthaḥ iti  yadā ca pūrva varṇa tad jñānāt ūrdhvam kalpanayā tad saṃskāreṇa smaraṇam janyate tatas pada jñānasya vinaśyat tā iti saṅketa smaraṇa abhāva viśiṣṭaḥ ntyaḥ vaṇaḥ padam tat eṣā vākya kalpanā anyathā pūrva varṇeṣu jñāna dvāreṇa saṃskārāt vicitra smaraṇa anugṛhītaḥ ntyaḥ varṇaḥ padam iti abhyupagamena padārtha jñāna anantaram pada

analyzed: anye tu pūrva arthasya pratisamādhāna artham antya pada jñāna anantaram kalpanayā tad saṃskāraḥ saṅketa anubhava janita saṃskāraḥ ca ekam smaraṇam ārabhate tatas padārtha jñānasya utpādaḥ pada jñānasya vinaśyat tā smaraṇa anubhavayoḥ ca avirodhaḥ iti tatas smaraṇa anubhava viśiṣṭāt antya padāt vākya artha pratipattiḥ iti

original: anye tu yadyapyantyapadajñānānantaraṃ saṅketasmaraṇāt padārthāvabodhe sati padajñānaṃ vinaṣṭam, tathāpi punastasminneva jñānamutpadyate, tataḥ kalpanayā tatsaṃskārāt smaraṇotpāde sati antyapadād vākyārthapratipattiriti ।

original: asadetat, śabdasya viramya vyāpārapratiṣedhāt । ekadā padaṃ svaviṣayajñānaṃ kṛtvā punarna karotīti ।

original: anye tu pratijñādipadasya padāntaroccāraṇakāle 'pi ākāśe padāntarāmbhakatvenāvasthānaṃ tāvad yāvadantyapadam, tataḥ pañcabhiḥ padaiḥ śrotradeśe <II,187> vākyam avayavibhūtamārabhyate, tato vākyārthapratipattiriti । nirastañcaitad anubhavena । na hi pūrvapūrvapadasyottarottarapadakāle sarveṣāñca vākyakāle 'nubhavo 'stīti ।

original: anye tu ekasmin pade jñānam, tena kriyate saṃskāraḥ, punardvitīyapadajñānam, tena prāktanena saṃskāreṇānyaḥ saṃskāra iti tāvad yāvadantyapade jñānamiti; tataḥ prāktanasaṃskārābhivyaktī padacatuṣṭayaviṣayaṃ smaraṇamutpayate, tadviśiṣṭañcāntyapadaṃ vākyamiti । na cātrānubhavena virodhaḥ, karaṇāṃśasyaiva kīrtanāt ।

original: anye smaraṇenānubhavasyāvirodhaṃ manyamānāḥ kalpanāmāśrayante । padajñānāt saṅketasmaraṇasyotpādaḥ, padārthapratipatterutpadyamānatā, tataḥ padārthajñānasyotpādaḥ pūrvapadajñānasya vinaśyattā, dvitīyapadajñānasyotpadyamānatā, tato dvitīyapadajñānasyotpādaḥ, padārthajñānasya vinaśyattā, padajñānasya vināśaḥ, saṅketasmaraṇasyotpadyamānatetyanena krameṇa antyapadajñāne sati vākyārthapratipattiḥ । na cātra pūrvapadapadārthānusmaraṇena prayojanamasti, tatkāryasya vinaśyadavasthapadajñānenaiva kṛtatvāt । pūrvapadānurakte hi dvitīyapade jñānamutpannam, tadanuraktaṃ tṛtīyapadamiti aśeṣapadānuraktam antyapadaṃ vākyamiti ।

original: etaccāsat, pūrvapadānurāgasyāntyapade 'pratibhāsanāt । yathā hi, daṇḍīti jñānaṃ daṇḍānuraktameva, naivaṃ dvitīyādipadajñānaṃ pūrvapadānuraktamiti । na cāyaṃ niyamaḥ sambhavati pūrvapadānantarameva dvitīyādipadoccāraṇam, katipayakālavyavadhāne 'pi uccāraṇe 'rthapratipattidarśanāditi pūrvaiva kalpanā nyāyyā ।
analyzed: etat ca asat pūrva pada anurāgasya antya pade pratibhāsanāt yathā hi daṇḍī iti jñānam daṇḍa anuraktam eva na evam dvitīya ādi pada jñānam pūrva pada anuraktam iti na ca ayam niyamaḥ sambhavati pūrva pada anantaram eva dvitīya ādi pada uccāraṇam katipaya kāla vyavadhāne uccāraṇe rtha pratipatti darśanāt iti pūrvā eva kalpanā nyāyyā

original: athāstvevaṃ vākyaparikalpanā vācakatvantu niṣidhyata, anvayavyatirekābhāvāt । padārthabhyastu vākyārthapratipattiḥ । yatra hi pramāṇāntareṇāpi padārthaprasiddhistatrāntareṇāpi vākyaṃ vākyārthaprattipatirdṛṣṭā । yathā,
analyzed: atha astu evam vākya parikalpanā vācaka tvantu niṣidhyata anvaya vyatireka abhāvāt padārthabhyaḥ tu vākya artha pratipattiḥ yatra hi pramāṇa antareṇa api padārtha prasiddhiḥ tatra antareṇa api vākyam vākya artha prattipatiḥ dṛṣṭā yathā

original: tathā ca dūrāccakṣuṣā śvetaṃ rūpamupalabhya heṣāśabdena vā aśvatvajātimanuminoti, khuranikṣepaśabdena ca dhāvanakriyāmavagatya vākyaṃ vināpi vākyārthaṃ pratipadyate । satyapi ca vākye padārthānāmapratipatterna vākyārthapratipattiḥ, yathā prasiddhapadārthaiḥ kavibhirviracite vākya iti । tasmādabhihitapadārthānām ākāṅkṣāyogyatāsannidhidvāreṇa vākyārthagamakatvamiti ।
analyzed: tathā ca dūrāt cakṣuṣā śvetam rūpam upalabhya heṣā śabdena vā aśva tva jātim anuminoti khura nikṣepa śabdena ca dhāvana kriyām avagatya vākyam vinā api vākya artham pratipadyate sati api ca vākye padārthānām apratipatteḥ na vākya artha pratipattiḥ yathā prasiddha padārthaiḥ kavibhiḥ viracite vākye iti tasmāt abhihita padārthānām ākāṅkṣā yogyatā sannidhi dvāreṇa vākya artha gamaka tvam iti

original: vākyantu pāramparyeṇāpyavācakamiti kathaṃ śabdaḥ pramāṇaṃ syāt ? atha padairabhihitānāñca padārthānāṃ gamakatvāditi pāramparyeṇa śabdaḥ pramāṇam ? tarhi śrotraparicchinnasya śabdasyārthaparicchede vyāpārāditi pāramparyeṇa pratyakṣasyāpi codanāviṣaye sannidhiprāmāṇyopapatteḥ kathaṃ codanaiva dharma pramāṇam । pramāṇameva codaneti nāsyāvadhāraṇasya vyāghātaḥ । vākyasyārthaparicchedakatvānabhyupagame ca pramāṇāntarāsambhavāt padārthānāṃ pratyakṣādiṣvantarbhāvaścintanīyaḥ ॥

original: tatrendriyārthasannikarṣeṇa saha vyāpārānupalabdherna pratyakṣe 'ntarbhāvaḥ । avinābhāvasyānupapatternānumāne । anupapadyamānārthāsambhavānnārthāpattau । upamānābhāvayośca niyataviṣayatvameva । pramāṇāntarasya ca anabhyupagamādayuktametat ।
analyzed: tatra indriya artha sannikarṣeṇa saha vyāpāra anupalabdheḥ na pratyakṣe ntarbhāvaḥ avinābhāvasya anupapatteḥ na anumāne anupapadyamāna artha asambhavāt na artha āpattau upamāna abhāvayoḥ ca niyata viṣaya tvam eva pramāṇa antarasya ca anabhyupagamāt ayuktam etat

original: na ca padānāṃ svārthapratipattāveva caritārthatvam, uktanyāyena vākyārthapratipattāvapi vyāpārāt । viramya vyāpārastu ekamarthaṃ pratipādya punastam pratipādayantīti pratiṣiddhaḥ ।

original: yaccedaṃ vināpi vākyaṃ vākyārthapratipattirityuktam, tadaparijñānāt । vākyena hi janitā vākyārthapratipattiḥ, pratyakṣānumānasampāditāḥ śveto 'śvo dhāvatīti buddhayaḥ । yadapīdaṃ padārthāpratipattau satyapi vākyena vākyārthapratipattiriti, tadasat, pūrvapadārthasmaraṇānugṛhītasya antyapadasya vākyatvācca avaśyamarthapratipādakatvamiti vyabhicārābhāvaḥ ।
analyzed: yat ca idam vinā api vākyam vākya artha pratipattiḥ iti uktam tad aparijñānāt vākyena hi janitā vākya artha pratipattiḥ pratyakṣa anumāna sampāditāḥ śvetaḥ śvas dhāvati iti buddhayaḥ yat api idam padārtha apratipattau sati api vākyena vākya artha pratipattiḥ iti tat asat pūrva padārtha smaraṇa anugṛhītasya antya padasya vākya tvāt ca avaśyam artha pratipādaka tvam iti vyabhicāra abhāvaḥ

original: anvitābhidhānantu na sarvapadānām, ekenaiva kriyākārakasaṃsargānvitasya padārthasyābhidhāne śeṣapadoccāraṇavaiyarthyaprasaṅgāt । atha antyaṃ padamanvitābhidhāyakam ? tasyāpi pūrvapadānapekṣitve taduccāraṇavaiyarthyam, sāpekṣitve tu na asmatsiddhāntād bhedaḥ ।
analyzed: anvita abhidhānam tu na sarva padānām ekena eva kriyā kāraka saṃsarga anvitasya padārthasya abhidhāne śeṣa pada uccāraṇa vaiyarthya prasaṅgāt atha antyam padam anvita abhidhāyakam tasya api pūrva pada anapekṣi tve tad uccāraṇa vaiyarthyam sāpekṣi tve tu na asmad siddhāntāt bhedaḥ

original: {avayavoddeśaḥ pratijñāvaidharmyañca}
